description_en:
Express your radiant femininity with **Diva Contact Lenses Latte**, the monthly lenses that offer you a natural and captivating look inspired by the colors of life. **Diva Contact Lenses Latte** are designed to be exceptionally soft and comfortable for wear, giving you a sense of confidence and beauty throughout the day.

â­ Inspired by nature for a magical look.
â­ Soft and comfortable for extended wear.
â­ Enhances your self-confidence and natural beauty.
â­ Monthly lenses for convenient use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Diva Contact Lenses Latte**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water.
â­ Gently place the lens on the tip of your index finger.
â­ Using one hand, gently open your upper and lower eyelids.
â­ Carefully place the lens onto the iris (cornea) of your eye.
â­ Avoid wearing lenses while sleeping or in dusty environments.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Diva Contact Lenses Latte**:
â­ Prime Quality Contact Lenses (43% water, 57% Polymacon).
â­ Immersed in sterile saline solution.

description_en:
Reveal the captivating beauty of your eyes with **Diva Her Lili** monthly contact lenses, expertly designed for unparalleled comfort and stunning natural colors. Grant your look a touch of magic and radiance with these innovative lenses that blend high performance with exquisite beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Diva Her Lili**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before touching the lenses.
â­ Place the lens on your index fingertip.
â­ Use one hand to gently pull down your lower eyelid and the other hand to gently pull up your upper eyelid to keep your eye open.
â­ Look straight ahead and gently place the lens onto your iris (cornea).
â­ Close your eye gently and allow the lens to settle in its correct position.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Diva Her Lili**:
â­ Each pack contains two monthly contact lenses.
â­ Made from high-quality Polymacon material.
â­ Hydrating formula with 43% water content for all-day comfort.
â­ Immersed in a sterile solution to maintain purity.
â­ Designed for monthly use and available in beautiful, medical-grade aesthetic designs and colors.

#DivaLenses #MonthlyLenses #ColoredLenses #EyeLenses #DivaHer #KSAFashion #EyeMakeup #Beauty #EyeCare #SaudiShopping

description_en:
Unleash your natural beauty with **Diva Nut Monthly Contact Lenses**. Inspired by the gentle touch of nature, these innovative lenses offer superior comfort and enchant your eyes with a captivating hue that accentuates your femininity and boosts your confidence. Enjoy vibrant colors and exceptional clarity all day long with **Diva Nut Monthly Contact Lenses**.

â­ Nature-inspired design for a naturally captivating look.
â­ Soft and comfortable for extended wear.
â­ Imparts a distinct color to your eyes, enhancing their beauty.
â­ Ideal for monthly use, allowing you to change your look whenever you desire.
â­ Boosts your confidence and highlights your femininity.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Diva Nut Monthly Contact Lenses**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before handling the lenses.
â­ Gently place the lens on the tip of your index finger.
â­ Use your fingertips to gently open your upper and lower eyelids.
â­ Position the lens directly onto the cornea of your eye.
â­ Avoid wearing lenses while sleeping or in dusty environments.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Diva Nut Monthly Contact Lenses**
â­ Prime quality contact lenses made with Polymacon (57%) and water (43%).
â­ Immersed in sterile saline solution to maintain moisture and comfort.

description_en:
Introducing **Diva Contact Lenses Cream**, designed to enhance your natural beauty with a touch of captivating charm. Inspired by nature's subtle elegance, these lenses offer unparalleled comfort and a confidence-boosting radiance, allowing you to express your unique femininity effortlessly.

â­ Achieve a soft, natural cream hue that accentuates your eyes.
â­ Experience ultimate comfort with a smooth, breathable design for all-day wear.
â­ Boost your confidence and allure with a distinctly feminine touch.
â­ High-quality lenses for a full month of wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Diva Contact Lenses Cream**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before handling lenses.
â­ Place the lens on the tip of your index finger.
â­ Gently hold your upper and lower eyelids open with your index and middle fingers.
â­ Look straight ahead and place the lens directly onto your cornea.
â­ Blink gently to ensure the lens settles correctly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Diva Contact Lenses Cream**:
â­ High-hydration hydrogel material.
â­ Oxygen-permeable design for eye comfort.
â­ Natural color embedded within the lens layers.
â­ Pack includes one pair for monthly use.

description_en:
Experience ultimate protection and superior comfort with **Durex Extra Safe Condoms**. Specifically designed to offer peace of mind with increased lubrication for a pleasurable and safe experience. **Durex Extra Safe Condoms** exceed global quality standards, being 100% electronically, rigorously, and dermatologically tested for maximum security. Enjoy a natural feel and unmatched reliability with every use, thanks to its innovative formula and improved scent. The world's No. 1 condom brand, **Durex Extra Safe Condoms**, are specially shaped for easy application and ultimate comfort. Cherish your moments with the utmost confidence and safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Durex Extra Safe Condoms**
â­ Carefully open the package with your hands, ensuring the teat is pointing upwards. Avoid using scissors or teeth to prevent tearing.
â­ Squeeze the condom to remove any air and ensure the teat is clear.
â­ Place the condom on an erect penis and roll it down to the base.
â­ After ejaculation, hold the condom firmly at the base and withdraw the penis while still erect to prevent slippage.
â­ Dispose of the used condom safely in a trash bin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Durex Extra Safe Condoms**
â­ Made from natural, elastic latex for a perfect fit.
â­ Enhanced with extra lubricant for superior comfort.
â­ Electronically and dermatologically tested for quality and safety.

Experience enhanced protection and unparalleled comfort with **Durex Extra Safe Condoms 12 pcs**. These **Durex** condoms are designed with slightly thicker latex and extra lubrication to provide you with maximum reassurance without sacrificing comfort. **Durex** products are ideal for those seeking complete peace of mind, knowing the condom you're using is completely safe. They feature an easy-fit design for effortless application and superior comfort. Enjoy a better scent thanks to our special manufacturing process, ensuring a more pleasurable experience.

â­ Exceeds worldwide quality standards and is 100% tested for true confidence and trust.
â­ Discreet packaging ensures your privacy.
â­ Pleasant, improved scent for uninterrupted pleasure.
â­ Specially shaped for easy wearing and superior comfort.
â­ Made from flexible, natural latex for a perfect fit.
â­ Provides real sensation while ensuring your safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Durex Extra Safe Condoms 12 pcs**:
â­ Open the package wrapper carefully with clean hands, ensuring the teat is pointing upwards.
â­ Squeeze the condom to remove air and hold the teat.
â­ Put on the condom, unroll it all the way down, continuing to hold the teat.
â­ After use, tie the condom and dispose of it safely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Durex Extra Safe Condoms 12 pcs**:
â­ Flexible natural latex.
â­ Extra lubrication.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled intimacy with **Durex Real Feel Condoms**, designed for a natural, skin-on-skin sensation.

â­ Discover the ultimate natural feeling with **Durex Real Feel Condoms**, a revolutionary latex-free condom.
â­ Crafted from advanced polyisoprene, these condoms are ideal for those with latex sensitivities.
â­ Featuring a smooth, easy-on shape with a teat end and silicone lubricant for effortless application.
â­ Enjoy a comfortable and secure fit with a 56mm nominal width, offering flexibility and pleasure.
â­ Designed for a better sensory experience with an improved smell.
â­ All Durex condoms are 100% electronically tested for durability, reliability, and excellence, exceeding global quality standards.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Durex Real Feel Condoms**
â­ Carefully open the condom wrapper.

â­ Roll the condom down to the base of the erect penis.
â­ After ejaculation, hold the base of the condom and withdraw while the penis is still erect.
â­ Dispose of the used condom responsibly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Durex Real Feel Condoms**
â­ Polyisoprene (Latex-Free)
â­ Silicone Lubricant

Experience natural intimacy with **Durex Naturals Pure Intimate Gel 100ml**. This 100% natural ingredient gel is designed to enhance smoothness and excitement. Its gentle, water-based formula is free from added fragrances or colors, pH friendly, and works with your body to moisturize intimate areas for naturally comfortable experiences. It also contains probiotics to help maintain the health and freshness of intimate areas, easing discomfort while creating an amazing and adventurous experience. Itâ€™s a light, smooth lubricant designed to enhance pleasure, safe for all-over body use, and contains no spermicide. It's water-soluble and easy to wash off without leaving stains.

Product Features:
â­ Be confident: **Durex Naturals Pure Intimate Gel 100ml** is safe to use all over the body for an intensely sensual experience.
â­ Smooth Formula: Helps for enhanced sensation, suitable for vaginal and non-vaginal sex.
â­ Water-Soluble: No allergic reactions and easily washed off, even for sensitive skin.
â­ Safe with Condoms: Maximizes satisfaction levels without being a contraceptive.
â­ Gentle on skin: Designed for your personal comfort.

â­ First Step: Twist the pump to open.

â­ PACK CONTENT: The pack contains 6 units of **Durex Intense Pleasure** condoms.
â­ INNOVATIVE DESIGN: Ribbed and dotted for enhanced mutual stimulation.

description_en:
Experience natural sensation with **Durex Featherlite Ultra** condoms, designed for maximum pleasure and heightened feeling.

**Durex Featherlite Ultra** condoms offer a unique experience thanks to the innovative Sensi-Fit technology, making them up to 20% thinner than standard Durex latex condoms, for deeper sensation and greater confidence.

â­ Engineered with Sensi-Fit technology for a superior fit and enhanced sensation.
â­ Ultra-thin for increased natural feeling and intimacy.
â­ Made from high-quality natural latex for safety and durability.
â­ 100% electronically and dermatologically tested for ultimate confidence and protection.
â­ Discreet packaging ensures your privacy.
â­ Pleasant, enhanced scent to minimize traditional latex odor.
â­ Easy and comfortable to wear, designed to maximize enjoyment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Durex Featherlite Ultra**
â­ Open the package carefully, avoiding scissors to prevent tearing the condom.
â­ Ensure the reservoir end is on the outside when putting it on.
â­ Pinch the tip to release any air before wearing.
â­ Place the condom on the erect penis and roll down to the base.
â­ After ejaculation, hold the condom firmly at the base while withdrawing to prevent slippage.
â­ Tie the condom and dispose of it safely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Durex Featherlite Ultra**
â­ Flexible natural latex.
â­ Special lubricant for enhanced comfort.

Experience heightened intimacy and ultimate protection with **Durex Invisible Extra Lubricated Condoms**. These ultra-thin condoms are crafted from natural rubber latex, designed to provide maximum pleasure without compromising on safety. Their smooth, hypo-allergenic material ensures comfort and reduces irritation for prolonged use. Each condom is rigorously tested for breakage and leakage, offering you true confidence and trust.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Durex Invisible Extra Lubricated Condoms**:
â­ Carefully open the package wrapper with clean hands.
â­ Gently squeeze the air out of the tip.
â­ Place the condom on the erect penis and roll down to the base.
â­ After ejaculation, hold the base of the condom firmly and withdraw while still erect.
â­ Dispose of the used condom safely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Durex Invisible Extra Lubricated Condoms**:
â­ Made from high-quality natural rubber latex.
â­ Enhanced with extra lubrication for superior comfort.
â­ Transparent with straight walls for easy application.
â­ Features a pleasant scent to enhance the experience.

Experience sensual pleasure with **Durex Massage 2 in 1 Sensual Seductive Yang Yang** massage gel, the perfect blend for relaxation and arousal. Ylang Ylang flowers are renowned for their calming and aphrodisiac properties, making this gel a uniquely enticing experience. ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Durex Massage 2 in 1 Sensual Seductive Yang Yang**:

â­ Simply remove the cap and squeeze the gel onto your desired areas all over your body for a relaxing and exciting massage.
â­ Safe to use with all Durex condoms.
â­ This product is not a contraceptive and does not contain spermicide.
â­ Suitable for both vaginal and non-vaginal intimacy.
â­ For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a doctor if it persists.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Durex Massage 2 in 1 Sensual Seductive Yang Yang**:

â­ Ylang Ylang extract.

â­ Sweet, safe-to-taste ingredients.

description_en:
Experience intimacy like never before with **Durex Condom Extended Pleasure**. These condoms are meticulously designed to enhance pleasure and prolong the experience, providing you with extra confidence and a natural feel. Crafted from premium natural latex, they are transparent and perfectly lubricated for maximum comfort and sensation.

**Durex Condom Extended Pleasure** condoms feature a unique formulation containing Benzocaine, a local anesthetic that helps to delay ejaculation, allowing you and your partner to enjoy longer-lasting intimacy. They are also infused with a pleasant scent, setting them apart from conventional condoms.

â­ Made from high-quality natural latex
â­ Enhanced with a special lubricant for delayed ejaculation (Benzocaine)
â­ Pleasant scent to enhance the sensory experience
â­ Transparent and lubricated for a natural feel
â­ Designed for a secure and comfortable fit
â­ Rigorously tested to ensure the highest global safety and quality standards
â­ A globally trusted brand for enhanced confidence and safety

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Durex Condom Extended Pleasure**
â­ Carefully open the package with clean hands.
â­ Ensure the condom's teat is facing upwards and squeeze to expel air.
â­ Place it on an erect penis and unroll to the base.
â­ After intercourse, hold the condom at the base while withdrawing to prevent slippage.
â­ Dispose of it safely after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Durex Condom Extended Pleasure**
â­ Natural Rubber Latex
â­ Benzocaine (for ejaculation delay)
â­ Added lubricants for improved comfort and glide

Experience ultimate intimacy with **Durex Invisible Extra Sensitive Condoms**. These condoms are designed to provide a natural and comfortable sensual experience, minimizing barriers for unparalleled lovemaking.

â­ **Extra Sensitive:** Enjoy a closer-to-nature feel with heightened sensitivity, allowing you and your partner to feel every moment.

â­ **Naturally Soft:** A soft and natural texture enhances ultimate comfort and pleasure.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Durex Invisible Extra Sensitive Condoms**:
â­ Carefully open the packaging to avoid tearing the condom.
â­ Place the condom on an erect penis before any sexual contact.
â­ Squeeze the tip of the condom to release air.
â­ Roll the condom down along the penis.
â­ After ejaculation, hold the base of the condom firmly and withdraw.
â­ Dispose of the used condom properly.

description_en:
Experience heightened intimacy with **Durex** Invisible condoms, meticulously crafted for maximum sensation and closeness. These ultra-thin, extra-lubricated condoms minimize the barrier between you and your partner, amplifying sensitivity for a more natural and pleasurable experience. **Durex** Invisible condoms offer the perfect blend of elasticity and flexibility for a secure, comfortable fit that feels just right â€“ never too tight, never too loose. Enjoy a smooth, natural sensation for both partners. Made from high-quality transparent natural rubber latex with a 52mm nominal width, their easy-on, teat-ended, smooth shape ensures effortless application and uninterrupted intimacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Durex** Invisible Condoms:
â­ Carefully open the package to avoid tearing the condom.
â­ Gently squeeze the teat to release any trapped air.
â­ Place the condom on an erect penis before any sexual contact.
â­ Roll it all the way down to the base of the penis.
â­ After ejaculation, withdraw the penis while still erect.
â­ Dispose of the used condom properly in a trash bin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Durex** Invisible Condoms:
â­ Transparent Natural Rubber Latex.
â­ Lubricant.
â­ Preservative.

Newly improved with an odor masker, enjoy a pure sensory experience without distracting latex smells. **Durex Maxima Condoms 12 pcs** are suitable for all skin types, offering unparalleled comfort and safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Durex Maxima Condoms 12 pcs**
â­ Read the leaflet inside the pack carefully before use.
â­ Open the package wrapper carefully to avoid any tearing.
â­ Do not bite or use scissors as this could rupture the condom.
â­ Applying a few drops of lube increases the sensation and comfort.
â­ Wear the condom properly.
â­ After orgasm or ejaculation, pull out from your partner while still erect to avoid the risk of the condom slipping off.
â­ Hold the condom with one hand while pulling out to prevent it from slipping off.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Durex Maxima Condoms 12 pcs**

â­ Newly improved with an odor masker for a pure sensory experience.

â­ Provides reliable protection against unintended pregnancy and sexually transmitted infections.

Elevate your intimacy with **Durex Massage Gel 2 in 1**, a sensual and arousing formula infused with the invigorating essence of Guarana. Native to the Amazon basin, Guarana's natural properties are known to enhance alertness and mood, making this a perfect addition to your intimate moments. This silky smooth, pH-balanced, and non-sticky gel glides effortlessly, leaving no residue and boasting a sweet taste. It's also safe to use with all Durex condoms, adding an extra layer of pleasure and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Durex Massage Gel 2 in 1**:
â­ Remove the cap and gently squeeze the lube onto your intimate areas and all over your body for a relaxing massage.
â­ Can be used safely with all Durex condoms.
â­ This product is not a contraceptive and does not contain spermicide.
â­ Suitable for both vaginal and non-vaginal sex.
â­ If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a doctor.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

â­ Enriched with Guarana extract, known for its caffeine content.

Experience true sensation with **Durex Featherlite Ultra Thin Condoms**, specially designed to enhance pleasure and reduce friction for an unparalleled experience. These condoms feature an ultra-thin profile and Sensi-Fit technology for a perfect fit and deeper sensation, being 20% thinner than regular Durex latex condoms.

â­ Ultra-thin design for enhanced sensation.
â­ Sensi-Fit technology for better fit and ultimate comfort.
â­ Made from flexible and skin-safe natural rubber latex.
â­ Lubricated to reduce friction and increase comfort.
â­ 100% electronically and medically tested for the highest safety and trust standards.
â­ Discreet packaging for privacy.
â­ Reduced latex smell for uninterrupted pleasure.
â­ Easy to wear and comfortable during use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Durex Featherlite Ultra Thin Condoms**:
â­ Carefully open the package wrapper with clean hands, ensuring the reservoir tip is at the top.
â­ Squeeze the condom to ensure all air is out of the reservoir tip.
â­ Place the condom and unroll it to the base, continuing to hold the reservoir.
â­ After intercourse, withdraw while still erect, holding the condom base to prevent slippage, then tie and dispose of safely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Durex Featherlite Ultra Thin Condoms**:
â­ Flexible natural rubber latex.
â­ Special non-spermicidal lubricant.

description_en:
Experience ultimate pleasure and guaranteed protection with **Durex Invisible Extra Thin 3 pcs**. Designed for a natural feel and unparalleled comfort, making it your ideal choice for an unforgettable intimate experience.

**Durex Invisible Extra Thin 3 pcs** features an ultra-thin layer of natural latex, enhancing sensation and providing maximum pleasure without compromising safety and protection. Each condom has been rigorously tested for strength and elasticity, giving you complete confidence and peace of mind.

â­ Offers a natural, skin-like feel.
â­ Made from high-quality, ultra-thin natural latex.
â­ Ensures maximum protection against unintended pregnancy and STIs.
â­ 100% electronically and dermatologically tested for complete confidence.
â­ Enhanced fragrance to reduce typical latex smell.
â­ Specially shaped for easy application and maximum comfort.
â­ Provides a secure and comfortable fit.
â­ Discreet packaging for your privacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Durex Invisible Extra Thin 3 pcs**

â­ Carefully open the package wrapper, avoiding teeth or scissors.
â­ Ensure the condom's teat is pointing upwards when applying.
â­ Squeeze out any air from the condom before putting it on.
â­ Place on an erect penis and roll down to the base.
â­ After ejaculation, hold the condom firmly at the base and carefully remove to prevent leakage.
â­ Dispose of the used condom safely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Durex Invisible Extra Thin 3 pcs**

â­ High-quality natural rubber latex.
â­ Gentle lubricants.
â­ Enhanced fragrance.

description_en:
Experience an authentic and intimate connection with **Durex Real Feel** condoms.

**Durex Real Feel** condoms are expertly crafted to deliver a superior skin-on-skin sensation, enhancing pleasure and bringing you closer to your partner.

Made from advanced, latex-free polyisoprene, these condoms are perfect for those with latex sensitivities. Featuring a 56mm nominal width and exceptional elasticity, they ensure a comfortable and secure fit for maximum enjoyment.

With **Durex Real Feel**, you can rely on Durex's renowned quality. Each condom undergoes rigorous electronic testing, guaranteeing the highest standards of safety and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Durex Real Feel**:
â­ Open the package carefully; do not use teeth or scissors.
â­ Ensure the condom is the right way up.
â­ Pinch the teat to remove air.
â­ Place the condom on the tip of the erect penis.
â­ Roll down to the base of the penis.
â­ After ejaculation, hold the base of the condom firmly and withdraw from the penis.
â­ Dispose of the condom hygienically.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Durex Real Feel**:
â­ Polyisoprene (Latex-Free)
â­ Silicone Oil (Lubricant)

description_en:
Discover optimal nutrition for your little one with **Ronalac Ronagrow** Vanilla, the growing-up milk specially formulated for children aged 1 to 3 years. The perfectly balanced **Ronalac Ronagrow** formula supports your baby's visual and mental development, strengthens their immune system with essential vitamins and minerals, and is fortified with IMMUNOBOOSTER system and lactoferrin. Enriched with prebiotics, it promotes beneficial gut flora and enhances immune response and protection, while being easily digestible and meeting your child's increasing needs for calories, calcium, iron, and protein for optimal development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ronalac Ronagrow**:
â­ Wash hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Clean and sterilize all feeding utensils (feeding bottle, nipple) by boiling them in water for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water and allow it to cool until lukewarm.
â­ Pour the correct amount of lukewarm water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Add 1 leveled scoop (5g) for every 30 ml of water, and prepare the total volume according to your babyâ€™s needs.
â­ Close the feeding bottle and shake gently until the powder is completely dissolved, then feed immediately.
â­ Test the milk's temperature on the back of your hand before feeding your baby. You can cool it under cold water if needed.
â­ Close the tin tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place for a maximum of 4 weeks from the date of opening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Ronalac Ronagrow**:
â­ Skimmed cowâ€™s milk
â­ Vegetable oils (palm, soya)
â­ Demineralized cowâ€™s whey (milk)
â­ Maltodextrin
â­ Sucrose
â­ Fructo-oligosaccharides
â­ Minerals (calcium carbonate, potassium chloride, sodium chloride, magnesium sulfate, calcium phosphate, ferric pyrophosphate, sodium citrate, zinc sulfate, copper sulfate, manganese sulfate, potassium iodide, sodium selenite)
â­ Vegetable emulsifier (soyalecithin)
â­ Fish oil
â­ Vitamins (C, E, beta-carotene, D3, A, PP, biotin, B5, B1, K1, B2, B6, B9, B12)
â­ Antioxidants (mixed tocopherol concentrate, ascorbyl palmitate)
â­ L-carnitine-L-tartrate
â­ Lactoferrin

title_ar: Ø±ÙˆÙ†Ø§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø±Ù‚Ù… (2) - Ø¯Ø¹Ù… Ù†Ù…Ùˆ ÙˆØªØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ù…ØªÙˆØ§Ø²Ù†Ø© Ù„Ø±Ø¶ÙŠØ¹Ùƒ (850 Ø¬Ù…)
description_en:
Experience the best nutrition for your baby with **Ronalac Baby Milk (2)**. Specifically designed for infants aged 6 to 12 months, it represents an advanced step in your baby's growth journey. **Ronalac Baby Milk (2)** provides your baby with the necessary energy for growth and activity, thanks to its iron-fortified formula, as well as the unique IMMUNOBOOSTER system that enhances immune response and protection. It is also fortified with prebiotics to improve the growth of beneficial microflora, making it easily digestible and gentle on the digestive system without any issues. Its nutritionally balanced formula provides all essential vitamins and minerals, meeting the increased needs for calories, calcium, iron, protein, and more, ensuring optimal visual, mental, and psychomotor development for your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ronalac Baby Milk (2)**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Clean and sterilize all utensils (feeding bottle, nipple) by boiling them in water for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool until lukewarm.
â­ Pour the calculated amount of lukewarm water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Add 1 leveled scoop of powder to every 30 ml of water, and prepare the total volume according to your baby's needs.
â­ Close the feeding bottle and shake gently until the powder is completely dissolved, then feed immediately.
â­ Test the temperature of the feed on the back of your hand before giving it to your baby; you can cool it under cold water until it becomes lukewarm.
â­ Close the tin tightly after each use, and store it in a cool, dry place for only 4 weeks from the date of opening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Ronalac Baby Milk (2)**:
â­ Demineralized cowâ€™s whey (milk), vegetable oils (palm, soya, coconut, sunflower).
â­ Skimmed cowâ€™s milk, maltodextrin, sucrose.
â­ Minerals: calcium chloride, potassium chloride, calcium phosphate, sodium chloride, calcium carbonate, magnesium sulfate, ferric pyrophosphate, sodium citrate, zinc sulfate, potassium phosphate, copper sulfate, potassium iodide, manganese sulfate, sodium selenite.
â­ Fructo-oligosaccharides, fish oil.
â­ Vegetable emulsifier (soya lecithin).
â­ Vitamins: C, E, beta-carotene, D3, A, PP, B5, biotin, K1, B6, B1, B9, B2, B12.
â­ Choline bitartrate.
â­ Antioxidants: ascorbyl palmitate, mixed tocopherol concentrate.

description_en:
Discover optimal nutrition for your child with **Ronalac Ronagrow** growing up milk, suitable for children from 1 to 3 years old. The perfectly balanced **Ronalac Ronagrow** formula is designed to support your child's healthy growth, promote visual and cognitive development, and strengthen the immune system. Enriched with essential vitamins and minerals, fortified with IMMUNOBOOSTER system and lactoferrin, it enhances immune response and supports digestive health for maximum comfort and nourishment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ronalac Ronagrow**:

â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Clean and sterilize all feeding utensils by boiling them for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water for 5 minutes and allow it to cool down to lukewarm temperature.
â­ Pour the exact amount of lukewarm water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Add 1 leveled scoop (5g) of powder for every 30 ml of water. Prepare the total volume according to your baby's needs.
â­ Close the feeding bottle and shake gently until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Test the temperature of the milk on your wrist before feeding your baby.
â­ You can cool the bottle under cold running water until it becomes lukewarm.
â­ Close the tin tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place for no more than 4 weeks from the date of opening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Ronalac Ronagrow**:

â­ Skimmed cowâ€™s milk, vegetable oils (palm, soya), demineralized cowâ€™s whey (milk), maltodextrin, sucrose, fructo-oligosaccharides.
â­ Minerals: calcium carbonate, potassium chloride, sodium chloride, magnesium sulfate, calcium phosphate, ferric pyrophosphate, sodium citrate, zinc sulfate, copper sulfate, manganese sulfate, potassium iodide, sodium selenite.
â­ Vegetable emulsifier (soya lecithin), fish oil.
â­ Vitamins: C, E, beta-carotene, D3, A, PP, biotin, B5, B1, K1, B2, B6, B9, B12.
â­ Antioxidants (mixed tocopherol concentrate, ascorbyl palmitate).
â­ L-carnitine-L-tartrate, lactoferrin.

description_en:
Ronalac Ronagrow Vanilla (3) is a perfectly balanced growing-up formula designed to support your child's growth, visual and mental development, and boost their immune system. **Ronalac Ronagrow** provides all essential nutrients, vitamins, and minerals, fortified with Lactoferrin to support immune system functions and response, alongside prebiotics to enhance digestive health and ease of absorption.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ronalac Ronagrow**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Sterilize all utensils (feeding bottle, nipple) by boiling for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool to lukewarm temperature.
â­ Pour the exact amount of lukewarm water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Add 1 leveled scoop of **Ronalac Ronagrow** powder to every 30 ml of water.
â­ Close the bottle and shake gently until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Feed the baby immediately after checking the temperature on your wrist.
â­ Cool the feed under cold running water if needed.
â­ Tightly close the tin after each use and store in a cool, dry place for only 4 weeks from opening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Ronalac Ronagrow**:
â­ Skimmed cowâ€™s milk, vegetable oils (palm, soya), demineralized cowâ€™s whey, maltodextrin, sucrose, fructo-oligosaccharides, various minerals, emulsifier (soya lecithin), fish oil, multiple vitamins, antioxidants, L-carnitine, lactoferrin.

description_en:
Elevate your child's growth journey with **Ronalac Ronagrow**, the vanilla-flavored growing-up milk expertly formulated for children aged 1 to 3 years. Perfectly balanced, **Ronalac Ronagrow** supports visual and mental development, while its IMMUNOBOOSTER system and lactoferrin, along with prebiotics, strengthen the immune system and ensure optimal digestibility. Packed with essential nutrients, vitamins, and minerals, it's the ideal choice to meet your growing child's increasing needs for comprehensive and healthy development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ronalac Ronagrow**

â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Clean and sterilize all feeding utensils by boiling them for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool to lukewarm temperature.
â­ Pour the exact amount of lukewarm water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Add 1 leveled scoop of **Ronalac Ronagrow** to 30 ml of water, and prepare the total volume according to your baby's needs.
â­ Close the feeding bottle and shake gently until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Feed your baby immediately after testing the temperature on the back of your hand.
â­ You can cool the feed under cold water until it becomes lukewarm.
â­ Close the tin tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place.
â­ Use the powder within 4 weeks from the date of opening the tin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Ronalac Ronagrow**

â­ Skimmed cow's milk, vegetable oils (palm, soya).
â­ Demineralized cowâ€™s whey, maltodextrin, sucrose, fructo-oligosaccharides.
â­ Minerals: Calcium carbonate, potassium chloride, sodium chloride, magnesium sulfate, calcium phosphate, ferric pyrophosphate, sodium citrate, zinc sulfate, copper sulfate, manganese sulfate, potassium iodide, sodium selenite.
â­ Vegetable emulsifier (soya lecithin), fish oil.
â­ Vitamins: C, E, beta-carotene, D3, A, PP, biotin, B5, B1, K1, B2, B6, B9, B12.
â­ Antioxidants (mixed tocopherol concentrate, ascorbyl palmitate).
â­ L-carnitine-L-tartrate, lactoferrin for immune support.

#Ronalac #BabyMilk #Ronagrow #ChildGrowth #BabyNutrition #KidsVitamins #ChildImmunity #KidsHealth #VanillaMilk #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover optimal nutrition for your little one with **Ronalac Ronagrow**, the growing-up formula specifically designed for children aged 1 to 3 years. Its perfectly balanced formulation supports healthy growth, visual and mental development, and strengthens the immune system. **Ronalac Ronagrow** contains all essential nutrients, vitamins, and minerals, plus lactoferrin to support immune response and protection. It is also fortified with prebiotics to promote the growth of beneficial gut bacteria, ensuring easy digestion and reducing digestive issues.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ronalac Ronagrow**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Sterilize all feeding utensils (feeding bottle, nipple) by boiling them in water for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water for 5 minutes and allow it to cool slightly until lukewarm.
â­ Pour the measured amount of lukewarm water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Add 1 leveled scoop (5g) for every 30 ml of water. Prepare the total volume according to your baby's needs.
â­ Close the feeding bottle and shake gently until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Feed immediately after testing the temperature on your hand.
â­ You can cool the feed under cold water until it becomes lukewarm.
â­ Close the tin tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place. Use the powder within 4 weeks of opening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Ronalac Ronagrow**
â­ Skimmed cow's milk, vegetable oils (palm, soya).
â­ Demineralized cow's whey (milk), maltodextrin, sucrose, fructo-oligosaccharides.
â­ Minerals: Calcium carbonate, potassium chloride, sodium chloride, magnesium sulfate, calcium phosphate, ferric pyrophosphate, sodium citrate, zinc sulfate, copper sulfate, manganese sulfate, potassium iodide, sodium selenite.
â­ Vegetable emulsifier (soya lecithin), fish oil.
â­ Vitamins: C, E, beta-carotene, D3, A, PP, biotin, B5, B1, K1, B2, B6, B9, B12.
â­ Antioxidants: Mixed tocopherol concentrate, ascorbyl palmitate.
â­ L-carnitine, lactoferrin.

shortdescription_en: Ronalac Ronagrow (3) milk for your child's growth (1-3 years). Supports immunity, mental & visual development. Fortified with Lactoferrin & Prebiotics.

title_en: Ronalac Baby Milk (2) 1700 gm - Complete Nutrition to Support Your Baby's Growth
title_ar: Ø±ÙˆÙ†Ø§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø±Ù‚Ù… (2) 1700 Ø¬Ù… - ØªØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ù…ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„Ø© Ù„Ø¯Ø¹Ù… Ù†Ù…Ùˆ Ø·ÙÙ„Ùƒ
description_en:
Discover optimal nutrition for your baby with **Ronalac Baby Milk (2)**. This balanced formula is designed to meet the increasing nutritional needs of infants from 6 to 12 months, fortified with iron for healthy growth, the IMMUNOBOOSTER system for enhanced immunity, and prebiotics for improved digestive health. **Ronalac Baby Milk (2)** provides essential calories, calcium, iron, and protein, along with vital vitamins and minerals to ensure your baby's optimal visual, mental, and psychomotor development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ronalac Baby Milk (2)**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly.
â­ Clean and sterilize all utensils (feeding bottle, nipple) by boiling them for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water for 5 minutes and allow it to cool.
â­ Pour the precise amount of lukewarm water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Add 1 leveled scoop (4.7g) to 30 ml of water, and prepare the total volume according to your baby's needs.
â­ Close the feeding bottle and shake gently until the powder is completely dissolved, then feed immediately.
â­ Before feeding, test the temperature on the back of your hand. You can cool it under cold water until it becomes lukewarm.
â­ Close the tin tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place for no more than 4 weeks from opening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Ronalac Baby Milk (2)**
â­ Demineralized cowâ€™s whey (milk), vegetable oils (palm, soya, coconut, sunflower), skimmed cowâ€™s milk, maltodextrin, sucrose.
â­ Minerals: Calcium chloride, potassium chloride, calcium phosphate, sodium chloride, calcium carbonate, magnesium sulfate, ferric pyrophosphate, sodium citrate, zinc sulfate, potassium phosphate, copper sulfate, potassium iodide, manganese sulfate, sodium selenite.
â­ Fructo-oligosaccharides, fish oil, vegetable emulsifier (soya lecithin).
â­ Vitamins: C, E, beta-carotene, D3, A, PP, B5, biotin, K1, B6, B1, B9, B2, B12.
â­ Choline bitartrate, antioxidants: ascorbyl palmitate, mixed tocopherol concentrate.

title_en: Ronalac Baby Milk Stage 2 - Follow-on Formula 400 gm
title_ar: Ø±ÙˆÙ†Ø§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø±Ù‚Ù… 2 - ØªØ±ÙƒÙŠØ¨Ø© Ù…ØªØ§Ø¨Ø¹Ø© 400 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Ensure your baby has healthy growth and continuous activity with **Ronalac** Baby Milk Stage 2, a follow-on formula specifically designed for infants from 6 to 12 months. It's fortified with iron to promote growth, and enhanced with the IMMUNOBOOSTER system to support immune response and protect your baby. **Ronalac** 2 is also enriched with prebiotics to improve the growth of beneficial microflora, making it easily digestible and gentle on your baby's stomach for a comfortable, problem-free feeding experience. Its nutritionally balanced formula provides all the essential vitamins and minerals to meet your baby's increasing needs for calories, calcium, iron, protein, and more, supporting optimal visual, mental, and psychomotor development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ronalac** 2:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Clean and sterilize all feeding utensils (feeding bottle, nipple) by boiling them in water for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water for 5 minutes and allow it to cool to lukewarm temperature.
â­ Pour the correct amount of lukewarm water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Add one leveled scoop (4.7g) for every 30 ml of water, and prepare the total volume according to your baby's needs.
â­ Close the feeding bottle and shake gently until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Feed immediately, and test the temperature on the back of your hand before giving the feed to your baby.
â­ You can cool the feed under cold running water until it reaches a lukewarm temperature.
â­ Close the tin tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place for no more than 4 weeks from the date of opening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Ronalac** 2:
â­ Demineralized cow's whey (milk), vegetable oils (palm, soya, coconut, sunflower), skimmed cow's milk, maltodextrin, sucrose.
â­ Minerals: calcium chloride, potassium chloride, calcium phosphate, sodium chloride, calcium carbonate, magnesium sulfate, ferric pyrophosphate, sodium citrate, zinc sulfate, potassium phosphate, copper sulfate, potassium iodide, manganese sulfate, sodium selenite.
â­ Fructo-oligosaccharides, fish oil, vegetable emulsifier (soya lecithin).
â­ Vitamins: C, E, beta-carotene, D3, A, PP, B5, biotin, K1, B6, B1, B9, B2, B12.
â­ Choline bitartrate, antioxidants: ascorbyl palmitate, mixed tocopherol concentrate.

#Ronalac #BabyMilk #InfantFormula #BabyNutrition #BabyCare #BabyHealth #SaudiArabia #BabyEssentials #InfantFood #SaudiBabies

description_en:
Introducing **Ronalac Baby Milk AR**, a specialized formula designed for infants experiencing reflux and regurgitation. **Ronalac Baby Milk AR** is formulated with pre-thickened ingredients to help reduce frequent reflux episodes, promoting better sleep, less crying, and improved growth. It is easily digested, absorbed, and nutritionally balanced.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ronalac Baby Milk AR**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Sterilize all feeding utensils (bottle, nipple) by boiling them in water for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool to lukewarm.
â­ Pour the exact amount of lukewarm water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Add 1 leveled scoop (4.4g) of powder for every 30 ml of water, and prepare the total volume according to your baby's needs.
â­ Close the feeding bottle and shake gently until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Feed immediately after testing the temperature on the back of your hand.
â­ You can cool the feed by placing the bottle under cold water.
â­ Close the tin tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place for no more than 4 weeks from opening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Ronalac Baby Milk AR**:
â­ Demineralized cowâ€™s milk whey, vegetable oils (palm oil, rapeseed oil, sunflower oil).
â­ Skimmed cowâ€™s milk, pregelatinized starch, maltodextrin.
â­ Minerals (calcium phosphate, calcium carbonate, potassium chloride, sodium chloride, magnesium sulfate, ferric pyrophosphate, zinc sulfate, copper sulfate, manganese sulfate, potassium iodide, sodium selenite).
â­ Fish oil, choline bitartrate, vegetable emulsifier (soya lecithin).
â­ Vitamins (C, E, PP, A, D3, B5, B8, K1, B6, B1, B2, B9, B12).
â­ L-tyrosine, taurine, L-tryptophan.
â­ Antioxidants (ascorbyl palmitate, mixed tocopherol concentrate).
â­ Inositol, L-carnitine L-tartrate.

title_ar: Ø±ÙˆÙ†Ø§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø¨Ø±ÙŠÙ…Ø§ØªÙŠÙˆØ±: ØªØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ù…ØªØ®ØµØµØ© Ù„Ù„Ø®Ø¯Ø¬ ÙˆÙ†Ø§Ù‚ØµÙŠ Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ²Ù†
description_en:
**Ronalac Premature** is a specialized baby milk formula designed to support the optimal growth of premature and low birth weight babies. It provides your baby with essential extra nutrients like iron, calcium, protein, and calories to meet their increased needs and help them catch up to normal growth. 

**Ronalac Premature** is enriched with the IMMUNOBOOSTER system to strengthen infant immunity and supports mental and visual development with crucial fatty acids ARA and DHA.

**Ronalac Premature** features easy-to-digest protein, complemented by lactose and maltodextrin for good carbohydrate digestion and energy provision for growth. It also contains calcium and vitamin D for bone development. This nutritionally balanced formula provides all the necessary vitamins and minerals for optimal visual, mental, and psychomotor development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ronalac Premature**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly.
â­ Clean and sterilize all utensils (feeding bottle, nipple) by boiling them in water for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water for 5 minutes and allow it to cool.
â­ Pour the exact amount of lukewarm water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Add 1 leveled scoop (5.33g) to 30 ml of water, and prepare the total volume according to the babyâ€™s needs.
â­ Close the feeding bottle and gently shake until the powder is completely dissolved, then feed immediately.
â­ Before feeding, test the temperature on the back of your hand. You can cool it under cold water until it becomes lukewarm.
â­ Close the tin tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place for only 4 weeks from opening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Ronalac Premature**:
â­ Demineralized whey protein, skimmed cowâ€™s milk, cowâ€™s milk protein, vegetable oils (palm, coconut, soy, sunflower), medium chain triglycerides, ARA, DHA, lactose, maltodextrin, soy lecithin (emulsifier), choline bitartrate, taurine, nucleotides, antioxidants (tocopherol concentrate), L-carnitine, inositol, vitamins (A, D, E, K, B, C), minerals (calcium, iron, iodine, phosphorus, zinc, magnesium, sodium, potassium, chloride, copper, selenium).

title_en: Ronalac Baby Milk AC for Constipation Relief 400 gm
title_ar: Ø±ÙˆÙ†Ø§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø§ÙŠÙ‡ Ø³ÙŠ Ù„Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ø¬ Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ù…Ø³Ø§Ùƒ 400 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
**Ronalac Baby Milk AC** is a specialized formula for medical purposes, specifically designed for infants and children suffering from constipation from birth. This unique formula is developed to provide relief through a balanced blend of nutrients that help soften stool and facilitate digestion.

**Ronalac Baby Milk AC** contains a restructured fat blend with Î²-palmitate, which enhances fat digestion and absorption, contributing to softer stools. Additionally, it incorporates prebiotics to support digestive health and improve stool consistency.

**Ronalac Baby Milk AC** is formulated to be nutritionally complete, providing all the essential vitamins and minerals to ensure optimal visual, mental, and psychomotor development for your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ronalac Baby Milk AC**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Clean and sterilize all utensils (feeding bottle, nipple) by boiling them in water for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water for 5 minutes and allow it to cool until lukewarm.
â­ Pour the exact amount of lukewarm water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Add 1 leveled scoop (4.3g) to every 30 ml of water, and prepare the total volume according to your baby's needs.
â­ Close the feeding bottle and shake gently until the powder is completely dissolved, then feed immediately.
â­ Before feeding, test the temperature on the back of your hand. You can cool it under cold water until it becomes lukewarm.
â­ Close the tin tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place. Use the contents within 4 weeks of opening the tin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Ronalac Baby Milk AC**:
â­ Demineralized cow's milk whey.
â­ Vegetable oils (palm oil, rapeseed oil, sunflower oil).
â­ Lactose, skimmed cow's milk.
â­ Minerals (calcium carbonate, potassium chloride, sodium chloride, magnesium sulfate, calcium phosphate, ferric pyrophosphate, potassium phosphate, zinc sulfate, copper sulfate, potassium iodide, manganese sulfate, sodium selenite).
â­ Fructo-oligosaccharides.
â­ Lactic acid.
â­ Fish oil.
â­ Choline bitartrate.
â­ Emulsifier (soya lecithin).
â­ Maltodextrin.
â­ Vitamins (C, E, PP, A, D3, B5, B8, B1, K1, B6, B9, B2, B12).
â­ L-tyrosine, taurine, L-tryptophan.
â­ Antioxidants (ascorbyl palmitate, mixed tocopherol concentrate).
â­ Inositol.
â­ L-carnitine L-tartrate.

#BabyMilk #Ronalac #ConstipationRelief #BabyHealth #InfantNutrition #Babies #SaudiArabia #BabyEssentials #Infants #BabyCare

description_en:
Experience ultimate protection and a powdery-soft feel with **Rexona Deo Spray Women Powder 150 ml**. This antiperspirant deodorant offers powerful defense against sweat and odor, leaving a refreshing floral scent and a touch of powder-like dryness. Specially formulated for women to keep you confident all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Deo Spray Women Powder 150 ml**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Hold the can 15 cm from your underarm and spray.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona Deo Spray Women Powder 150 ml**:
â­ Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, PPG-14 Butyl Ether, Perfume, Disteardimonium Hectorite, BHT, Propylene Carbonate, Dimethiconol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Gelatin Crosspolymer, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Hydrated Silica, Water, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate, Maltodextrin, Hydrolysed Corn Starch Octenylsuccinate, Silica, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled freshness with **Rexona Roll On Women Deodorant Shower Fresh 50 Ml**, your perfect solution for up to 48 hours of sweat and odor protection. **Rexona Roll On Women Deodorant Shower Fresh 50 Ml** features a light formula that provides a lasting feeling of freshness, with a gentle scent inspired by the refreshing smell of a shower. Ideal for daily use, it gives you confidence and comfort all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Roll On Women Deodorant Shower Fresh 50 Ml**:
â­ Apply a thin layer to clean, dry underarm skin.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Do not apply to broken or irritated skin.
â­ Discontinue use if rash or irritation occurs.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona Roll On Women Deodorant Shower Fresh 50 Ml**:
â­ Water, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Steareth-2, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Perfume, Steareth-20, Disodium EDTA, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Gelatin Crosspolymer, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Hydrated Silica, Potassium Lactate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
**Rexona Shower Fresh Roll-On Antiperspirant Deodorant for Women, 50ml** is your ultimate partner for long-lasting freshness and protection. Feel confident throughout your day, whether you're heading to an important meeting or enjoying a day out. This antiperspirant deodorant offers superior protection against sweat and body odor for up to 48 hours, with a refreshing scent that leaves you feeling shower-fresh. Featuring MotionSenseâ„¢ technology, it releases bursts of freshness with every move, ensuring you stay revitalized all day long. Trust **Rexona Shower Fresh Roll-On Antiperspirant Deodorant for Women, 50ml** to keep you confident and protected, no matter what your day holds.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Shower Fresh Roll-On Antiperspirant Deodorant for Women, 50ml**:
â­ Apply to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Use daily for best results.
â­ Do not apply to broken or irritated skin.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona Shower Fresh Roll-On Antiperspirant Deodorant for Women, 50ml**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Aluminum Chlorohydrate
â­ Steareth-2
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil
â­ Parfum (Fragrance)
â­ Steareth-20
â­ Silica Dimethyl Silylate
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate

â­ Benzyl Alcohol

â­ Cinnamyl Alcohol
â­ Citronellol

â­ Hexyl Cinnamal
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool

Its portable design ensures you stay protected wherever you go.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona** Shower Fresh:
â­ Shake well before use.

â­ Allow the product to dry completely before dressing.
â­ For external use only. Avoid use on bruised skin.
â­ Discontinue use if rash or irritation occurs.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona** Shower Fresh:
â­ Combines effective protection with refreshing extracts for a distinctive experience.
â­ Light and captivating long-lasting fragrance.

description_en:
Experience long-lasting freshness and confidence with **Rexona** Powder Dry Stick Deodorant for Women. This antiperspirant stick is expertly formulated to provide powerful protection against sweat and odor for up to 48 hours, leaving you with a clean, shower-fresh feeling. Our MotionSense Technology works to double this freshness when you need it most; micro-capsules break with friction to release bursts of fragrance with every move, keeping you feeling fresh, no matter what.

â­ Superior protection against sweat and odor for up to 48 hours.
â­ Delivers a clean, shower-fresh sensation.
â­ MotionSense Technology releases fragrance with movement.
â­ Gentle Powder Dry scent for a soft feel.
â­ Empowers you with the confidence to perform at your best.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona** Powder Dry Stick:
â­ Ensure underarm skin is clean and dry.
â­ Twist the base to raise the product.
â­ Apply a thin, even layer to each underarm.
â­ Use daily after showering or as needed.
â­ Secure the cap tightly after each use to preserve the product.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona** Powder Dry Stick:
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex GLY
â­ Stearyl Alcohol
â­ C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate
â­ PPG-14 Butyl Ether
â­ Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ Perfume

description_en:
Experience all-day freshness and confidence with **Rexona** Cotton Dry Antiperspirant Deodorant for Women.

Enjoy superior protection for up to 48 hours against sweat and body odor, keeping you feeling dry and comfortable with every move. Featuring the unique MotionSenseTM technology, microcapsules release a refreshing fragrance with every movement, ensuring a gentle scent inspired by fresh cotton sheets.

Indulge in unparalleled comfort with **Rexona**'s gentle, alcohol-free formula, specifically designed for delicate women's skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona** Cotton Dry:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Hold the can 15 cm from your underarm and spray.
â­ Allow the product to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona** Cotton Dry:
â­ 48-hour sweat protection.
â­ Fresh fragrance inspired by natural cotton.
â­ MotionSense technology for motion-activated freshness.
â­ Alcohol-free and gentle on skin formula.
â­ Suitable for daily use.

#Rexona #Deodorant #CottonDry #BodyCare #Freshness #Fragrance #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh #Mecca

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Rexona Deo Spray For Men Xtra Cool 150 ml**. This antiperspirant spray is designed to provide superior protection against sweat and odor, with an innovative formula that keeps you feeling cool and active all day long. Enjoy unparalleled confidence with MotionSense technology, which releases more freshness with every move, keeping you protected and fresh for 48 hours.

**Rexona Deo Spray For Men Xtra Cool 150 ml** is your perfect choice to maintain your freshness at all times.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Deo Spray For Men Xtra Cool 150 ml**:
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Hold the can 15cm from your underarm and spray.
â­ For underarm use only.
â­ Allow the product to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona Deo Spray For Men Xtra Cool 150 ml**:
â­ Advanced formula providing 48-hour protection against sweat and body odor.
â­ Enriched with a fresh, cool menthol feel.
â­ Alcohol-free formula.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

#Rexona #Deodorant #48HourProtection #Freshness #XtraCool #MensCare #BodyCare #Riyadh #Jeddah #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate protection with **Rexona** Men's Spray. Its innovative formula is specifically designed to provide superior defense against sweat and odor for up to 48 hours, while keeping your clothes free from white marks and yellow stains. The unique MotionSense technology gives you unparalleled confidence with every move, as smart microcapsules activate with increased activity to release a long-lasting fresh scent. Feel cool and refreshed all day without effort, with **Rexona**, stay confident and look your best.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona**:
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Hold the can 15cm from the underarm and spray.
â­ For underarm use only.
â­ Avoid direct inhalation and use in well-ventilated areas.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Discontinue use if irritation or rash occurs.
â­ Do not pierce or burn, even after use.
â­ Protect from sunlight and high temperatures.
â­ Do not spray on an open flame or flammable materials.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona**:
â­ Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Cyclopentasiloxane, PPG-14 Butyl Ether, Parfum, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrated Silica, Gelatin Crosspolymer, Aqua, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate, Maltodextrin, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Silica, BHT, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool.

#Rexona #Deodorant #Fragrance #BodyCare #Fitness #Confidence #48HProtection #DeodorantSpray #MensFragrance #SaudiArabia

Featuring innovative Motion Senseâ„¢ technology, **Rexona Men Roll Deodrant 72H Workout** releases bursts of freshness with every move, ensuring continuous protection even during your most demanding moments. Whether you're working out or tackling a busy day, this deodorant will keep up with you.

â­ Effective protection against sweat and body odor for up to 72 hours.
â­ Motion Senseâ„¢ technology releases freshness with every movement.
â­ Provides confidence and freshness throughout the day.
â­ Ideal for men with active lifestyles.

Experience unparalleled protection with **Rexona Deo Stick Men Antibacteria + Invisible**. Experience ultimate freshness and confidence with **Rexona** Women's Stick Deodorant. This advanced formula provides 48-hour protection against sweat and odor, keeping you dry and smelling great all day long. Say goodbye to embarrassing white marks and yellow stains on your clothes, as **Rexona** stick's unique formula protects your fabrics. description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Rexona Men Extra Cool Roll On Deodorant**. It provides superior sweat protection that lasts up to 72 hours, featuring innovative MotionSenseÂ® technology that responds to your movement, giving you unstoppable confidence. Its instant dry formula allows you to get going immediately without worrying about stains or stickiness.

Enjoy stronger sweat protection thanks to its unique formula that works with microcapsules releasing freshness when needed. Whether you're having a long day at work, playing sports, or challenging yourself at the gym, **Rexona Men Extra Cool Roll On Deodorant** is your perfect partner to stay dry, fresh, and confident. Its energizing fragrance gives you an extra boost of vitality to achieve your goals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Men Extra Cool**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Raise your arms above your head.
â­ Gently glide the roller ball onto clean, dry underarm skin daily.

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙƒØ³ÙˆÙ†Ø§ Ø¨Ø®Ø§Ø® Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ø±Ù‚ Ù„Ù„Ø±Ø¬Ø§Ù„ Ø§ÙƒØªÙŠÙ 150 Ù…Ù„ - Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© 48 Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø©
description_en:
Experience long-lasting freshness and confidence with **Rexona Men Active Deo Spray**. Enjoy powerful 48-hour antiperspirant protection powered by innovative MotionSense technology, which reacts to your movement to provide extra freshness whenever you move. Its lightweight formula leaves you feeling cool and dry without white marks, ensuring you're ready for any surprise throughout the day.

â­ Powerful 48-hour protection against sweat and odor.
â­ MotionSense Technology: Freshness that reacts to your movement.
â­ Provides a cool and dry feeling all day long.
â­ Suitable for daily use.
â­ Refreshing and attractive scent.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Men Active Deo Spray**:
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Spray from a distance of 15 cm onto the underarm area.
â­ Use short bursts in well-ventilated areas.
â­ Avoid direct inhalation.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes or broken/irritated skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona Men Active Deo Spray**:
â­ Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Cyclopentasiloxane, PPG-14 Butyl Ether, Perfume, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrated Silica, Gelatin Crosspolymer, Water, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate, Maltodextrin, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Silica, BHT, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
**Rexona Bamboo** provides intense sweat absorption, regulating perspiration to keep your skin dry and offering intensive protection. Its captivating perfume features notes of green freshness, a fruity floral heart, and hints of wood and musk. Experience confidence and dryness all day long with **Rexona Bamboo**. The More You Move, The More It Works!

â­ 48-hour sweat protection.
â­ MotionSense Technology responds to your movement for continuous protection.
â­ Absorbs sweat and keeps your skin dry.
â­ Refreshing fragrance with green, fruity, floral, woody, and musky notes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Bamboo**:
â­ Apply to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Use daily for best results.
â­ Avoid use on broken or irritated skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona Bamboo**:
â­ Water, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Steareth-2, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil.
â­ Perfume, Steareth-20, Silica Dimethyl Silylate.
â­ Disodium EDTA, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate.
â­ Caprylic/ Capric Triglyceride, Gelatin Crosspolymer, Cellulose Gum.
â­ Sodium Benzoate, Hydrated Silica, Potassium Lactate.
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Geraniol.
â­ Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene.

description_en:
Discover **Rexona Stick Men Active Amet 40 gm**, your ultimate daily protection solution. This antiperspirant stick features an innovative formula that prevents white marks and yellow stains on your clothes, giving you extra confidence throughout the day.

Powered by Rexona's unique MotionSenseâ„¢ technology, the more you move, the more you get protected and stay dry. Say goodbye to body odor and its causing bacteria, and enjoy a lasting feeling of freshness and comfort that complements your style. It preserves the original colors of your clothes, whether black or white.

Tested and approved as a skin-friendly product, it does not cause any allergies or irritation. **Rexona Stick Men Active Amet 40 gm** offers effective protection for up to 48 hours with superior care for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Stick Men Active Amet 40 gm**:
â­ For underarm use only on clean, dry skin.
â­ Do not use on broken or irritated skin.
â­ Stop use if rash or irritation occurs.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona Stick Men Active Amet 40 gm**:
â­ Gentle and scientifically proven formula.
â­ Effective ingredients for sweat and odor protection.
â­ Moisturizing agents for skin care.

description_en:
Stay confident and fresh with **Rexona** Cotton Dry for Women. This antiperspirant deodorant is designed to provide you with superior protection for up to 48 hours against sweat and body odor, keeping you comfortable and dry all day long. Enjoy a refreshing cotton scent that reminds you of the purity of clean sheets. The unique MotionSenseâ„¢ technology activates with every move you make, as microcapsules release a burst of fresh fragrance upon friction, keeping you fresh and protected even in the toughest conditions.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona** Cotton Dry:
â­ Apply to clean, dry underarm skin.
â­ Allow skin to dry completely before dressing.
â­ Avoid applying to irritated or broken skin.
â­ For best results, use daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona** Cotton Dry:
â­ Water, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Steareth-2, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Perfume, Steareth-20, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Gelatin Crosspolymer, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Hydrated Silica, Disodium EDTA, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Potassium Lactate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness and protection with **Rexona Deo Roll On Men Active**. 

Gain confidence that lasts all day with this innovative antiperspirant deodorant. Specifically designed for active men, **Rexona Deo Roll On Men Active** provides effective protection against sweat and body odor for up to 48 hours, keeping you ready for any challenge.

â­ Advanced formula for superior protection against sweat and body odor.
â­ Motion Senseâ„¢ technology responds to your movement, releasing freshness with every step.
â­ Long-lasting refreshing scent that boosts your confidence.
â­ Quick-drying, leaves no sticky residue on the skin.
â­ Gentle on the skin, keeping it soft and moisturized.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Deo Roll On Men Active**:
â­ Ensure underarms are clean and dry.
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Roll evenly onto each underarm.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona Deo Roll On Men Active**:
â­ Water, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Steareth-2, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Perfume, Steareth-20, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Gelatin Crosspolymer, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Hydrated Silica, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Disodium EDTA, Potassium Lactate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl alcohol, Benzyl salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Rexona Stick Men Xtra Cool**, the antiperspirant meticulously designed for men who lead active lives. **Rexona Stick Men Xtra Cool** features innovative MotionSense technology, providing continuous protection against sweat and odour, so the more you move, the fresher you feel. Its unique formula protects your clothes from white marks and yellow stains, keeping you looking sharp all day. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Stick Men Xtra Cool**:
â­ For underarm use only on clean, dry skin.
â­ Do not apply on damaged or irritated skin.
â­ If rash or irritation occurs, discontinue use immediately and consult a doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona Stick Men Xtra Cool**:
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex GLY
â­ Stearyl Alcohol
â­ C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate
â­ PPG-14 Butyl Ether
â­ Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ Perfume
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Polyethylene
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Hydrated Silica
â­ Gelatin Crosspolymer
â­ Cellulose Gum
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Water
â­ Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate
â­ Hydrolyzed Corn Starch
â­ Maltodextrin
â­ Silica
â­ BHT
â­ Citronellol
â­ Coumarin
â­ Isoeugenol
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool

description_en:
Experience life in the fast lane without the sweat with **Rexona** Men V8 Deo Spray!

Enjoy superior protection for up to 48 hours with the innovative MotionSenseâ„¢ technology that releases freshness with every move. It features a refreshing formula with a woody scent and fern notes to boost your confidence all day long.

â­ Provides all-day confidence.
â­ Up to 48 hours of protection against sweat and body odor.
â­ MotionSenseâ„¢ technology releases freshness with every move.
â­ Refreshing scent with woody and fern notes.
â­ Gives you a cool and fresh feeling.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona** V8:
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Hold the can 15 cm from your underarm and spray.
â­ For underarm use only.
â­ Avoid direct inhalation.
â­ Keep away from sunlight and heat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona** V8:
â­ Butane, Isobutane, Propane.
â­ Aluminum Chlorohydrate.
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane.
â­ Perfume.
â­ Hydrated Silica.
â­ Water.
â­ And other natural ingredients for freshness.

description_en:
Say goodbye to unpleasant body odour with **Rexona Men Invisible Antiperspirant Deodorant Spray**. Enjoy enhanced protection against bacteria and bad odour, while keeping your clothes free from white and yellow stains. The unique "MotionSense" technology provides you with confidence and protection for 48 hours, reacting to your body's movement to offer extra freshness whenever you need it. With **Rexona Men Invisible Antiperspirant Deodorant Spray**, you'll get a long-lasting fresh and cool feeling, keeping your look flawless without any effort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Men Invisible Antiperspirant Deodorant Spray**:
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Hold the can 15cm from the underarm and spray. For underarm use only.
â­ Allow the product to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona Men Invisible Antiperspirant Deodorant Spray**:
â­ Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, PPG-14 Butyl Ether, Perfume, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrated Silica, Gelatin Crosspolymer, Water, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate, Maltodextrin, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Silica, BHT, Citronellol, Coumarin, Isoeugenol, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
**Rexona** Men Antibacterial Invisible Roll-On is your ultimate shield against sweat and odor. Its exclusive formula protects your clothes from white marks and yellow stains, while actively combating odor-causing bacteria. Say goodbye to embarrassing odors and unsightly stains. Designed for ultimate protection when you need it most, this antiperspirant forms a protective barrier, keeping you dry and fresh. Enjoy long-lasting freshness and a confidence boost that lasts up to 48 hours. The fast-absorbing formula is gentle on skin, leaving it soft and dry without any stickiness. It's tough on sweat but kind to your skin, delivering superior protection without irritation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona** Men Antibacterial Invisible Roll-On:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Raise your arm above your head.
â­ Apply the rollerball evenly to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Use daily for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona** Men Antibacterial Invisible Roll-On:
â­ Water
â­ Aluminum Chlorohydrate
â­ Steareth-2
â­ Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil
â­ Perfume
â­ Steareth-20
â­ Silica Dimethyl Silylate
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Gelatin Crosspolymer
â­ Cellulose Gum
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Hydrated Silica
â­ Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Potassium Lactate
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone
â­ Benzyl alcohol
â­ Benzyl salicylate
â­ Citral
â­ Citronellol
â­ Coumarin
â­ Geraniol
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool

description_en:
Experience intensive protection with **Rexona Stick Women Bamboo 40 gm**. It effectively absorbs sweat, leaving your skin dry and refreshed for long-lasting comfort. Its fragrance features notes of fruits, florals, wood, and musk, giving you a confident feeling throughout the day.

â­ Intensive protection and long-lasting dryness.
â­ Effectively absorbs sweat.
â­ Delicate fragrance with notes of fruits, florals, wood, and musk.
â­ Ideal for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Stick Women Bamboo 40 gm**:
â­ Apply to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Use daily for best results.
â­ Avoid application on irritated or broken skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona Stick Women Bamboo 40 gm**:
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane, Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex GLY, PPG-14 Butyl Ether, Stearyl Alcohol, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Talc, Perfume, Isopropyl Myristate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrated Silica, Gelatin Crosspolymer, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Water, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Maltodextrin, Silica, BHT, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene.

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙƒØ³ÙˆÙ†Ø§ Ø±ÙˆÙ„ Ù…Ø²ÙŠÙ„ Ø¹Ø±Ù‚ Ù„Ù„Ø±Ø¬Ø§Ù„ V8 - Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© 48 Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø©
description_en:
Experience lasting freshness and confidence all day long with **Rexona Deo Roll On V8**. This advanced formula is specifically designed to provide effective protection against sweat and odor for up to 48 hours. Featuring Motion Sense Technology that activates with every move, it keeps you feeling consistently dry and fresh. Its quick-drying formula absorbs rapidly, leaving no sticky residue on your skin, and maintaining its smoothness and dryness. **Rexona Deo Roll On V8** is your ultimate choice for powerful yet gentle underarm protection, combating sweat and providing a distinctive, long-lasting fragrance. Clinically proven to be non-irritating and to maintain skin's softness and moisture.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Deo Roll On V8**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Raise your arm above your head.
â­ Apply the rollerball evenly to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Apply daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona Deo Roll On V8**:
â­ Water
â­ Aluminum Chlorohydrate
â­ Steareth-2
â­ Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil
â­ Perfume
â­ Steareth-20
â­ Silica Dimethyl Silylate
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Gelatin Crosspolymer
â­ Cellulose Gum
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Hydrated Silica
â­ Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Potassium Lactate
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone
â­ Benzyl alcohol
â­ Benzyl salicylate
â­ Citral
â­ Citronellol
â­ Coumarin
â­ Geraniol
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool

Experience ultimate freshness with **Rexona Men Deodorant Charcoal Spray 150 Ml**. This antiperspirant spray offers effective 72-hour protection against sweat and odor, with refreshing charcoal freshness powered by unique MotionSense technology. Specially designed for men to give you confidence and freedom of movement all day long, even with continuous activity. It dries instantly to keep up with your active lifestyle non-stop. **Rexona Men Deodorant Charcoal Spray 150 Ml** is perfect for times when you need maximum protection, whether at work, during sports, or any daily activity. Dermatologically tested and alcohol-free for ultimate care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Men Deodorant Charcoal Spray 150 Ml**:
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Spray from an appropriate distance onto clean, dry skin.
â­ Enjoy instant protection and move freely.
â­ Dermatologically tested and alcohol-free for complete comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona Men Deodorant Charcoal Spray 150 Ml**:
â­ MotionSenseÂ® technology for continuous protection with movement.
â­ Refreshing charcoal formula for a clean feel.
â­ Effective 72-hour protection against sweat and odor.
â­ Gentle formula on the skin and alcohol-free.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled freshness and effective protection with **Rexona** Men's Mint + Cedarwood Roll-On Deodorant. This advanced formula is designed to give you confidence all day long, offering robust protection against sweat and odor without leaving any marks on your clothes. The invigorating scent of mint combined with the woody depth of cedarwood provides a unique and irresistible experience.

â­ Provides long-lasting freshness and a strong, attractive scent.
â­ Fast-absorbing formula leaves skin feeling soft and dry.
â­ Effectively protects against sweat and unpleasant odors.
â­ Clinically proven to be gentle on the skin and non-irritating.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Apply the deodorant to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Roll the ball evenly onto the skin for complete coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona**:
â­ Aqua, Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex GLY, Cyclopentasiloxane, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Stearyl Alcohol, Fragrance, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, BHT, Linalool, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol.

description_en:
Experience continuous freshness with **Rexona** Shower Fresh Antiperspirant Deodorant Spray for Women. It offers superior protection against sweat and odor for up to 72 hours, thanks to its innovative MotionSense technology that responds to your movement to keep you fresh and confident all day long. This spray is designed to provide instant dryness, making it perfect for your active lifestyle. **Rexona** Shower Fresh is suitable for all activities, whether you're at work, working out at the gym, or enjoying your day. Its formula is dermatologically tested and alcohol-free, with a recyclable can to support the environment. **Rexona** â€“ your ultimate choice for protection and confidence.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona** Shower Fresh:

â­ Simply spray and get moving.
â­ The energizing fragrance powers you to move all day.
â­ Stay dry, cool, and confident with **Rexona** antiperspirant deodorant for women.
â­ Designed to provide long-lasting protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona** Shower Fresh:

description_en:
Experience superior sweat protection with **Rexona Women's Extra Dry Antiperspirant Spray** 150ML. It offers maximum protection against sweat and moisture, keeping you dry and refreshed for up to 48 hours. Perfect for daily use to ensure confidence all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Women's Extra Dry Antiperspirant Spray**:
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Hold the can 15 cm away from your underarm.
â­ Spray directly onto the underarm skin.
â­ For underarm use only.
â­ Do not use on broken skin.
â­ Stop use if rash or irritation occurs.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona Women's Extra Dry Antiperspirant Spray**:
â­ Cyclomethicone
â­ Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex Gly
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Cera Microcristallina
â­ Paraffin
â­ Parfum
â­ Silica
â­ Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate
â­ Maltodextrin
â­ Hydrolyzed Corn Starch
â­ Dimethicone Crosspolymer
â­ Bht
â­ Alpha-isomethyl Ionone
â­ Benzyl Cinnamate
â­ Benzyl Salicylate
â­ Butylphenyl Methylpropional
â­ Cinnamyl Alcohol
â­ Citral
â­ Citronellol
â­ Coumarin
â­ Eugenol
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal
â­ Hydroxycitronellal
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool

description_en:
Experience long-lasting freshness with **Rexona Men Charcoal Clean Anti-Perspirant & Stain Roll-On**. Enjoy superior protection against sweat and odor with a breakthrough formula that invigorates your skin, leaving it smooth and dry. The fast-absorbing formula provides a comfortable feel without stickiness, while maintaining skin's softness and moisture. Clinically proven to be gentle on the skin and non-irritating, **Rexona Men Charcoal Clean Anti-Perspirant & Stain Roll-On** is your perfect choice for daily care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rexona Men Charcoal Clean Anti-Perspirant & Stain Roll-On**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Lift your arm and apply **Rexona Men Charcoal Clean Anti-Perspirant & Stain Roll-On** to clean, dry underarm skin.
â­ Roll on evenly for full coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rexona Men Charcoal Clean Anti-Perspirant & Stain Roll-On**:
â­ Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex Gly
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ Fragrance
â­ Activated Charcoal
â­ Vitamin E

Achieve an instant, bold color impact with **Rimmel** SCANDALEYES Waterproof Kohl Eyeliner. 

This high-intensity pigment formula delivers rich, lasting color that won't smudge or fade, day to night. Its ultra-smooth, creamy texture glides on effortlessly, perfect for everyday wear or creating dramatic eye looks.

â­ Won't run or smudge from day to night.
â­ High intensity color for an instant color impact.
â­ Ultra-smooth & creamy formula that glides on easily.
â­ Ophthalmologist tested.
â­ Suitable for contact lens wearers and sensitive eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel** Kohl Pen:
â­ Step 1: Apply your shade of Eye Liner to the upper lash line, gliding lightly across from the inner corner to the outer corner of the eye.
â­ Step 2: Using the built-in sponge tip, lightly blend over the line to smoke eyeliner upwards and outwards.
â­ Step 3: Retrace eyeliner over the upper lash line to add definition to this smokey look. Then, add mascara to finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel** Kohl Pen:
â­ (Ingredients list will be included here)
