Achieve the perfect London look with **Rimmel Maxi Blush**, a lightweight powder formula that gives your cheeks a burst of color and a healthy-looking glow. Whether you're at the office, out shopping, or partying until the early hours, **Rimmel Maxi Blush** delivers long-lasting, vibrant color.

â­ Lightweight powder formula for a flush of color and healthy glow.
â­ Highly pigmented for intense, buildable color.
â­ Micro-fine powders blend effortlessly for smooth application.
â­ Available in 5 shades to complement various skin tones.
â­ Express your confidence with London's edgy, evolving style.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Maxi Blush**:
â­ Apply with a powder brush over foundation or on bare skin.

title_en: Rimmel Day 2 Night Mascara - Black
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ø³ÙƒØ±Ø© Ø¯Ø§ÙŠ ØªÙˆ Ù†Ø§ÙŠØª - Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯
description_en:
Achieve the London look with **Rimmel Day 2 Night Mascara**, the revolutionary mascara that offers two dramatically different lash looks with its magic double cap. During the day, choose the Length cap to exceptionally define and ultra-lengthen your lashes, stretching them to new distances. At night, switch to the Volume cap for up to 15X fuller lashes with voluptuous, oversized volume, completely clump-free. The magic double cap empowers you to create a perfect lash look, day or night. **Rimmel Day 2 Night Mascara** also features a waterproof formula for long-lasting wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Day 2 Night Mascara**
â­ Apply a light coat for naturally defined, lengthened daytime lashes.
â­ Apply a second coat for intense volume and density for an evening look.
â­ Gently brush over your lashes in small upward motions for a bolder look.
â­ Sweep the brush from the center of your lashes outwards for a sleeker appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Day 2 Night Mascara**
â­ Formula designed to enhance lash length and volume.
â­ Waterproof ingredients for lasting hold.
â­ Clump-free formulation for lush, full lashes.
â­ Easy application for a complete look.

#RimmelMascara #LongLashes #FullLashes #EyeMakeup #WaterproofMascara #DaytimeLook #EveningLook #RiyadhBeauty #JeddahStyle #SaudiMakeup

description_en:
Achieve flawless brows with the **Rimmel Brow This Way Sculpting Kit**, your ultimate solution for defining, filling, and setting your eyebrows with ease. This all-in-one kit features a brow powder, wax, a dual-ended brush, and a spoolie to give you a natural, captivating look that lasts.

**Product Features:**
â­ Tinted powder provides a natural brow look with no residue.
â­ Lightweight and comfortable long-lasting formula.
â­ Fills and sets eyebrows for superior definition.
â­ Includes a dual-ended angled brush and a spoolie.
â­ Compact and portable design for easy on-the-go touch-ups.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Brow This Way Sculpting Kit**:
Step 1: Apply the wax to define and set your eyebrows with the angled brush.
Step 2: With the other side of the brush, blend the powder to fill in sparse areas.
Step 3: Finish by using the spoolie to groom your brows for a perfect finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Brow This Way Sculpting Kit**:
â­ Wax for brow definition and setting.
â­ Tinted brow powder for filling sparse areas.
â­ Dual-ended brush (angled and spoolie).

title_ar: Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ 60 Ø«Ø§Ù†ÙŠØ© - Ø¯Ø±Ø¬Ø© Ù…Ø­Ø§ÙŠØ¯Ø© Ø±Ù‚Ù… 203
description_en:
Achieve an impeccable look with **Rimmel 60 Seconds Super Shine Nail Polish - Nude #203**. This unique polish provides a base and a protective glossy finish in just one stroke. Enjoy rich, long-lasting color with 3-in-1 Color Technology that delivers ultra-shiny color, a base coat, and a glossy top coat all at once. And it dries in under a minute!

â­ One stroke gives you a base and a protective glossy finish.
â­ Quick-drying formula completes in under a minute.
â­ Long-lasting and resists chips and fading for up to 10 days.
â­ Gives nails a healthy and attractive appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Seconds Super Shine Nail Polish - Nude #203**:
â­ Apply one coat to nails with a downward stroke.
â­ For a more intense color finish, you can add a second coat.
â­ Allow to dry completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Seconds Super Shine Nail Polish - Nude #203**:
â­ Butyl Acetate
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ Acrylates Copolymer
â­ Benzophenone-1
â­ Dimethicone
â­ May Contain: Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Red 7 (CI 15850), Blue 1 (CI 42090), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Red 30 (CI 73360).

description_en:
Achieve a flawless, soft matte finish with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Soft Matte Lipstick**. This creamy lipstick glides on effortlessly, delivering rich, highly-pigmented color that stays put for up to 8 hours. Perfect for creating a sophisticated and long-lasting lip look that won't budge.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Soft Matte Lipstick**:
â­ Start by defining your lips with a lip liner.
â­ Apply **Rimmel Lasting Finish Soft Matte Lipstick** directly to your lips, gliding from the center outwards for a smooth, even coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Soft Matte Lipstick**:
â­ Creamy, comfortable formula.
â­ Long-lasting wear for up to 8 hours.
â­ Intense color payoff.
â­ Soft matte finish.
â­ Lightweight feel.

description_en:
Discover flawless coverage with the **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer**. This ultra-effective liquid concealer camouflages blemishes, brightens dark circles, and evens out skin tone for a radiant, uniform complexion. Its buildable, high-pigment formula glides on smoothly, creating a brighter, softer look. The super-sized soft-touch wand with a built-in product reservoir allows for precise full coverage wherever you need it â€“ on blemishes, under eyes, or all over your face. The **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer** offers all-day wear that's crease-proof, transfer-proof, and waterproof, with up to 24 hours of hydration. It's your go-to solution to say goodbye to redness, discoloration, acne scars, and visible pores.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer**
â­ Step 1: Using fingertips or a concealer brush, lightly tap and blend out the formula for a seamless finish.
â­ Step 2: To really set your base into place, dust a finishing powder over the concealer and foundation to lock it all in.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer**
â­ A liquid concealer that helps cover up imperfections.
â­ Lightweight and non-greasy formula doesnâ€™t smudge, cake or flake.
â­ Supersized soft-touch wand allows for precise application.
â­ Delivers up to 24-hoursâ€™ hydration effect.
â­ Crease-proof, transfer-proof and waterproof.

#Concealer #Rimmel #EyeMakeup #FaceMakeup #FullCoverage #FlawlessSkin #SkinHydration #DailyMakeup #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Get instant hydrating, buildable colour in a rush with the **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick**. Use it as a cream blush on your cheeks or as a lipstick on your lips for a quick, complete look.

â­ Instant hydrating, buildable colour in perfect shades.
â­ Clean, vegan, cruelty-free formula, free from perfume and mineral oils.
â­ Enriched with nourishing, skin-loving ingredients that glide on effortlessly.
â­ Packaging made with 48% post-consumer recycled material.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick**:
â­ Step 1: Apply on lips and/or cheeks, and blend out using fingertips.
â­ Step 2: Use alone or underneath your base to give skin a natural glow.
â­ Step 3: Layer up to build colour as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick**:
â­ Nourishing formula infused with skin-loving ingredients.

description_en:
Achieve the coveted London look with **Rimmel Soft Kohl Professional Eye Pencil**, expertly designed to give you dense, smudgeable color that lasts up to 12 hours. Its soft texture glides smoothly onto your eyelid without tugging or dragging, making it perfect for creating a captivating smoky eye makeup with ultimate ease. The rich color blends seamlessly into the skin, providing you with the desired flawless finish and long-lasting wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Soft Kohl Professional Eye Pencil**:
â­ Step 1: Ensure your pencil is super-sharp, then use the precision tip to line the upper and lower lash lines.
â­ Step 2: Time to smoke it out. Using fingertips or a cotton bud, blend lightly for a sexy, smudged effect.
â­ Step 3: Finish with lashings of Scandaleyes WOW Wings Mascara to frame eyes perfectly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Soft Kohl Professional Eye Pencil**:
â­ Soft, smudgeable color with long-lasting staying power.
â­ Up to 12-hour wear for continuous radiance.
â­ Soft, smooth texture that glides on easily.
â­ Dense color blends easily for a soft, smudged look.
â­ Won't tug or drag on delicate skin.

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ø­Ø¯Ø¯ Ø¹ÙŠÙ† Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ ÙˆÙ†Ø¯Ø± Ø¥ÙŠÙ†Ùƒ Ø§Ù„ØªÙ…ÙŠØª - Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ | Ø¯Ù‚Ø© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© ÙˆØ«Ø¨Ø§Øª ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
**Rimmel Wonderink Ultimate Liner** - Black is your go-to for creating precise, bold, and long-lasting eye looks. This liquid formula delivers an ultra-matte, jet-black finish, making it perfect for professional-looking eye definition. Its easy application makes it your ultimate choice for captivating eyes every time.

â­ Intensely pigmented liquid eyeliner with a high-impact, ultra-black, matte finish.
â­ Easy-to-apply, smudge-proof, waterproof formula.
â­ Super-sharp precision felt tip glides easily, even over eyeshadow.
â­ Long-wear liner that removes easily when you're ready to take it off.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Wonderink Ultimate Liner**:
â­ Step 1: Start by mapping out where you want to apply the liner. Use the precision tip to make a dot in the centre of the lid, at the outer corner, and in line with the outer edge of the eyebrow.
â­ Step 2: Glide the felt tip over the lid, joining up the three dots and flicking out at the end to create a sharp wing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Wonderink Ultimate Liner**:
â­ Highly pigmented liquid formula.
â­ Jet black color.
â­ Super-sharp precision felt tip.

#Rimmel #Eyeliner #BlackEyeliner #Makeup #Beauty #Eyeshadow #EyeMakeup #Cosmetics #SaudiBeauty #Fashion

title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ†Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ø± Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ù„ØªÙŠ ØªØ§Ø³ÙƒÙŠØ± - Ø¯Ø±Ø¬Ø© 060 Ù…Ø­Ø§ÙŠØ¯
description_en:
The **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer** - Shade 60 Nude is your ultimate solution for covering blemishes, brightening dark circles, and evening out skin tone with a professional touch. It provides precise, full coverage thanks to its large, comfortable wand and a buildable, high-pigment formula that glides on smoothly and blends seamlessly into your skin for a brighter, smoother, and more even complexion. It lasts all day, effectively combating breakouts, discolouration, redness, pigmentation, acne scars, and visible pores.

Product Features:
â­ Effectively covers imperfections with its liquid formula.
â­ Lightweight and non-greasy, it doesn't smudge, cake, or flake.
â­ A supersized soft-touch wand allows for precise application.
â­ Provides up to 24 hours of skin hydration.
â­ Crease-proof, transfer-proof, and waterproof.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer**:
â­ Step 1: Using fingertips or a concealer brush, lightly tap and blend out the formula for a seamless finish.
â­ Step 2: To really set your base into place, dust a finishing powder over the concealer and foundation to lock it all in.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer**:
â­ Covers blemishes and brightens dark circles.
â­ Evens out skin tone.
â­ Buildable high-pigment formula.
â­ Lightweight and non-greasy.
â­ Crease-proof, transfer-proof, and waterproof.

title_en: Rimmel Khol Pen - 05 Nude | Matte Finish Eyeliner
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù‚Ù„Ù… ÙƒØ­Ù„ Ù†ÙˆØ¯ - 05 - Ù…Ø­Ø§ÙŠØ¯ | Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ù†Ù‡Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ© Ø®Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© Ù…Ù† Ø§Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù†
description_en:
Discover captivating beauty with the **Rimmel Khol Pen - 05 Nude**. The Rimmel SCANDALEYES WATERPROOF EYELINER delivers instant color impact with its high-intensity pigments, giving you a look that turns heads. Whether used alone or blended with different shades, you'll achieve a bold look that stays put from day to night without smudging or running.

â­ Smudge-proof and waterproof for all-day wear.
â­ High-intensity color for an instant impact.
â­ Ultra-smooth, creamy formula that glides on effortlessly.
â­ Ophthalmologist tested.
â­ Suitable for contact lens wearers and sensitive eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Khol Pen - 05 Nude**
â­ Step 1: Apply your chosen shade of Eye Liner to the upper lash line, gliding lightly from the inner corner to the outer corner of the eye.
â­ Step 2: Using the built-in sponge tip, lightly blend the eyeliner upwards and outwards to create a smoky effect.
â­ Step 3: Retrace the eyeliner over the upper lash line to add definition to this smokey look. Then, apply mascara to finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Khol Pen - 05 Nude**
(Please note that ingredient lists may vary slightly based on batch. For the most accurate ingredients, please refer to the product packaging.)
â­ High-intensity pigments.
â­ Ultra-smooth, creamy formula.
â­ Waterproof and smudge-proof ingredients.

description_en:
Discover captivating eyes with the **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner** in 002 Brown, the perfect eyeliner pencil that glides on effortlessly, delivering a rich color impact to instantly define and enhance your eyes. This eyeliner boasts a buttery-soft, water-repellent formula, ensuring extreme wear for up to 24 hours. The **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner** is available in 6 stunning shades to complement all your looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner**

â­ Apply your shade of **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner** to the upper lash line, gliding lightly across from the inner corner to the outer corner of the eye.
â­ Using fingers, lightly blend over the line to smoke the eyeliner upwards and outwards.
â­ Retrace eyeliner over the upper lash line to add definition to this smokey look. Then, add mascara to finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner**

â­ Buttery-soft formula
â­ Water-repellent
â­ Up to 24-hour extreme wear

description_en:
Discover the secret to captivating eyes with the **Rimmel Exaggerate Eyeliner - Black**.

This cult-classic waterproof and smudge-proof eyeliner ensures a flawless look that lasts up to 16 hours. Its smooth, highly-pigmented formula glides on effortlessly, giving you complete control to create precise lines or a classic feline flick. Achieve intense color and unparalleled control with the **Rimmel Exaggerate Eyeliner - Black**.

â­ Features intense black color.
â­ Waterproof, smudge-proof, and flake-proof for long-lasting wear.
â­ Precision felt tip for easy application and control.
â­ Smooth formula glides easily onto the eyelid.
â­ Perfect for creating thin lines, cat-eye flicks, or graphic shapes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Exaggerate Eyeliner - Black**:
â­ Step 1: Using the precision tip, glide along the lash line to create your desired line.
â­ Step 2: Use the precision tip to create a cat-eye flick or any graphic shape you desire.
â­ Step 3: Complete your look by applying mascara.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Exaggerate Eyeliner - Black**:
â­ High-quality liquid formula.
â­ Intense black pigments.
â­ Waterproof and smudge-proof ingredients.
â­ Quick-drying formula.

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined lips with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 705 - Cappuccino**. Its creamy, gliding texture ensures precise application and a seamless blend, giving your lips a defined shape that lasts all day. **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 705 - Cappuccino** is available in 14 vibrant shades to perfectly match your favorite lipstick.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 705 - Cappuccino**:
â­ Gently apply along the lip line for precise definition.
â­ Use the fine tip for extra accuracy.
â­ Can be easily blended for natural or bold lip looks.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 705 - Cappuccino**:
â­ Long-wearing creamy formula.
â­ Rich pigments for vibrant color.
â­ Smooth, easy-glide application.

Warning and cautions:
â­ For external use only.

title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ†Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ø± Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ù„ØªÙŠ ØªØ§Ø³ÙƒÙŠØ± Ø±Ù‚Ù… 030 - ÙØ§ØªØ­: Ø¥Ø´Ø±Ø§Ù‚Ø© Ù…Ø«Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© ÙˆØªØºØ·ÙŠØ© Ù…ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„Ø©
description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer** 30- Fair. This liquid concealer is designed to effectively cover blemishes, brighten dark circles, and even out your skin tone. The innovative super-sized, soft-touch wand with a built-in product reservoir allows you to apply precise, full coverage exactly where you need it â€“ whether on blemishes, under the eyes, or all over your face. The buildable, high-pigment makeup formula glides on smoothly and blends perfectly, giving you a brighter-looking, smoother, and more even complexion. This incredible color corrector lasts all day, helping you say goodbye to concerns like breakouts, discolouration, redness, pigmentation, acne scars, and visible pores. Experience unparalleled makeup with **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer**.

â­ Effectively covers imperfections and evens out skin tone.
â­ Brightens dark circles for a more radiant appearance.
â­ Lightweight, non-greasy liquid formula that doesn't smudge, cake, or flake.
â­ Supersized, soft-touch wand for precise and easy application.
â­ Delivers up to 24 hours of hydration.
â­ Crease-proof, transfer-proof, and waterproof for long-lasting wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer**
Step 1: Using fingertips or a concealer brush, lightly tap and blend out the formula for a seamless finish.
Step 2: To truly set your base, dust a finishing powder over the concealer and foundation to lock it all in.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer**
For external use only.

description_en:
Get the London look with **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine** nail polish! One stroke delivers ultra-shiny color with a protective glossy finish and base coat all in one. Our 3-in-1 Colour Technology provides high-shine color, a base coat, and a glossy top coat in a single, speedy stroke. It dries in under a minute, making it perfect for those who love to change their polish often. **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine** resists chips and fading for up to 10 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine**
â­ Apply to nails with a downward stroke.
â­ For a more intensely colored finish, add an extra coat.
â­ Dries incredibly quickly, leaving you with virtually no downtime.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine**
â­ Fast-drying formula.
â­ Long-lasting, shiny color.
â­ Provides superior shine and protection.

description_en:
Achieve the coveted London look with **Rimmel Scandal Eyes Mascara Flex**! Its 30% wider and denser MaxDensity brush captures and coats every lash, even the smallest ones. The unique Triple collagen + keratin formula shapes and plumps even the thinnest lashes, resulting in intense eyes and more lashes revealed. Enjoy longer, fuller lashes with this fiber-enriched, smudge-proof formula, giving you soft, flexible lashes with a stunning finish.

â­ Fibre-enriched formula for longer, fuller lashes.
â­ Smudge-proof for a flawless look all day.
â­ Oversized volumizing mascara with lycra for soft and flexible lashes.
â­ Supplied with a maximum density brush for complete coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Scandal Eyes Mascara Flex**
â­ Step 1: Use the winged side to instantly load your lashes.
â­ Step 2: Use the curved side to define and achieve a full fan effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Scandal Eyes Mascara Flex**
â­ Triple Collagen for lash plumping and shaping.
â­ Keratin for strengthening and smoothing lashes.
â­ Natural fibers for enhanced length.
â­ Lycra for ultimate lash flexibility and softness.

description_en:
Experience bold, velvety lip color with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick** in 390 Plush Pink. This creamy, long-lasting lipstick delivers vibrant, rich color in a single swipe, providing an instant hydration boost and all-day comfort. Its vegan formula, enriched with aloe butter, passionfruit oil, and chamomile/cucumber extract, ensures soft, supple lips with comfortable wear, free from flaking or cracking.

**Product Features:**
â­ Long-lasting color and moisture that stays true.
â­ Vegan formula infused with skin-loving ingredients.
â­ Ultra-creamy, weightless texture that glides on effortlessly.
â­ Does not flake, crack, or crumble on lips throughout the day.
â­ Provides instant hydration and a comfortable feel.
â­ Designed to complement diverse skin tones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick**:
â­ Step 1: Line and define your lip shape with a lip liner.
â­ Step 2: Swipe your favorite shade of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick** directly onto your lips for a rich, velvety finish.

title_en: Rimmel London The Multi-Tasker Concealer 048 Vanilla - Full Coverage & Natural Brightening
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ†Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ø± Ù…Ø§Ù„ØªÙŠ ØªØ§Ø³ÙƒØ± 048 ÙØ§Ù†ÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ§ Ù…Ù† Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ù†Ø¯Ù† - ØªØºØ·ÙŠØ© ÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„Ø© ÙˆØ¥Ø´Ø±Ø§Ù‚Ø© Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Rimmel London The Multi-Tasker Concealer 048 Vanilla**. This innovative liquid concealer covers blemishes, brightens dark circles, and evens out skin tone with its buildable, high-pigment formula. The super-sized soft-touch wand allows for precise full coverage application, whether on blemishes, under the eyes, or all over the face. **Rimmel London The Multi-Tasker Concealer 048 Vanilla** features a lightweight, non-greasy formula that doesn't cake or flake, providing you with a brighter-looking, smoother, and more even canvas that lasts all day. It's also crease-proof, transfer-proof, and waterproof, delivering up to 24 hours of hydration. Achieve a perfected, naturally radiant complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel London The Multi-Tasker Concealer 048 Vanilla**:
â­ Step 1: Using fingertips or a concealer brush, lightly tap and blend out the formula for a seamless finish.
â­ Step 2: To really set your base into place, dust a finishing powder over the concealer and foundation to lock it all in.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel London The Multi-Tasker Concealer 048 Vanilla**:
â­ Liquid concealer formula for blemish coverage.
â­ Lightweight and non-greasy.
â­ Supersized soft-touch wand for precise application.
â­ Provides up to 24-hours hydration.
â­ Crease-proof, transfer-proof, and waterproof.

description_en:
Define your eyes with captivating intensity using the **Rimmel Kohl Pen** in a rich, alluring brown shade. This eyeliner boasts a creamy, smooth texture that glides effortlessly across the eyelid, delivering precise, impactful definition that lasts. Perfect for creating sharp, clean lines or smudging for a soft, smoky effect. Its comfortable design ensures superior control during application, allowing for professional-looking eye makeup every time.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kohl Pen**:
â­ Start from the inner corner of the eye and draw a continuous line towards the outer corner of the upper eyelid.
â­ Apply an additional layer for more intense definition.
â­ For a smoky eye look, use an eyeshadow brush or smudger to gently blend the line.
â­ Can also be used along the lower lash line to enhance eye depth.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kohl Pen**:
â­ Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum)
â­ Candelilla Cera (Euphorbia Cerifera)
â­ Carnauba Wax (Copernicia Cerifera)
â­ Castor Oil (Ricinus Communis)
â­ Beeswax (Cera Alba)
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Mica
â­ Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)
â­ Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)
â­ Blue 1 (CI 42090)

#RimmelKohl #Eyeliner #EyeMakeup #Kajal #BeautyKSA #SmokyEyes #MakeupSaudi #BrownEyeliner #Eyeshadow #BeautyEssentials

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªÙ†Ø¬ ÙÙŠÙ†ÙŠØ´ Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ - 320 Ø¨ÙŠØ¬ Ø­Ø±ÙŠØ±ÙŠ
description_en:
Experience luxurious satin finish with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick**.

Achieve bold, vibrant color in a single swipe with an instant hydration boost that lasts all day. This lipstick provides deep moisturization and comfortable wear, featuring a vegan formula enriched with aloe butter, passionfruit oil, and chamomile/cucumber extract to soften your lips. Its ultra-creamy, weightless texture glides on effortlessly and melts upon application, coating your lips in highly pigmented color, expertly crafted to complement diverse skin tones. It prevents flaking, cracking, and crumbling throughout the day, keeping your lips moisturized.

**Product Features:**
â­ Long-lasting color and moisture that stays true.
â­ No-budge, no-fade, no-flake formula.
â­ Glides on smoothly for instant hydration and mistake-proof application.
â­ Feels smooth and creamy on lips and is comfortable to wear.
â­ Vegan formula infused with skin-loving ingredients and free from parabens and mineral oils.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick**:
â­ Step 1: Line and define your lip shape with a lip liner.
â­ Step 2: Swipe your favorite shade of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick** onto your lips straight from the bullet for a bold satin lip color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick**:
â­ Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil.
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil.
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter.
â­ Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract.
â­ Panthenol.
â­ Sodium Hyaluronate.

description_en:
Discover flawless coverage with the **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer - 80 Tan- Bronze**. This innovative concealer effectively covers blemishes, brightens dark circles, and evens out skin tone for a perfected complexion. The super-sized soft-touch wand with a built-in product reservoir allows for precise full coverage exactly where you need it â€“ on imperfections, under the eyes, or all over your face. Its buildable, high-pigment formula glides on and blends seamlessly into the skin, creating a brighter-looking, smoother, and more even canvas. This color corrector lasts all day, saying goodbye to breakouts, discolouration, redness, pigmentation, acne scars, and visible pores.

â­ Covers blemishes, brightens dark circles, and evens skin tone.
â­ Super-sized soft-touch wand for precise and easy application.
â­ Lightweight, non-greasy formula that won't smudge, cake, or flake.
â­ Provides up to 24 hours of hydration for refreshed skin.
â­ Crease-proof, transfer-proof, and waterproof for long-lasting wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer - 80 Tan- Bronze**

â­ Step 1: Using fingertips or a concealer brush, lightly tap and blend out the formula for a seamless finish.
â­ Step 2: To set your base, dust a finishing powder over the concealer and foundation to lock them in.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer - 80 Tan- Bronze**

â­ (Key ingredients are derived from the available product data, indicating a high-pigment, buildable, hydrating liquid cream formula).

description_en:
Achieve the iconic London look with **Rimmel 60 Seconds Super Shine Nail Polish** in a vibrant Pink shade. One stroke delivers a base, protective, and glossy finish that lasts. Experience super-fast drying in under 60 seconds with its patented 3-in-1 Colour Technology for flawless color, a base coat, and a glossy top coat. Ideal for changing your polish with your mood or keeping up with festival season trends. It resists chips and fading for up to 10 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Seconds Super Shine**
â­ Apply one stroke to nails.
â­ Add an extra coat for more intense color.
â­ Dries in under a minute for no downtime.
â­ Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions.
â­ Choose from 20 shades to match any style.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Seconds Super Shine**
â­ Butyl Acetate
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Aluminum Stearate
â­ Mica
â­ Titanium Dioxide
â­ Colorants
â­ Fragrance

description_en:
Achieve instant, hydrating, buildable color with the **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick 001 Light Brown**. Perfect for use as a cream blush or lipstick, this cruelty-free, clean, and vegan product delivers highly pigmented color with an intensely moisturizing formula. Its nourishing, skin-loving ingredients glide on effortlessly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick 001 Light Brown**:
â­ Step 1. Apply on lips and/or cheeks, and blend out using fingertips.
â­ Step 2. Use alone or underneath your base to give skin a glow.
â­ Step 3. Layer up to build color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick 001 Light Brown**:
â­ Buildable, highly pigmented, intensely moisturizing formula.
â­ Nourishing formula infused with skin-loving ingredients that glides on effortlessly.
â­ Formulated without perfume and mineral oils.
â­ Packaging made with 48% post-consumer recycled material.

description_en:
Achieve instant, hydrating, and buildable color with the **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick**. 

This versatile stick from **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick** delivers moisturizing color that's easily buildable, perfect for use as a creamy blush or a smooth lipstick. Its clean, vegan, and cruelty-free formula is free from perfume and mineral oils, making it ideal for sensitive skin. 

â­ Instant hydrating, buildable color.
â­ Clean, vegan, and cruelty-free formula.
â­ Free from perfume and mineral oils.
â­ Can be used as a blush or lipstick.
â­ Nourishing formula infused with skin-loving ingredients glides on effortlessly.
â­ Packaging made with 48% post-consumer recycled material.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick**
â­ Apply on lips and/or cheeks, and blend out using fingertips.
â­ Use alone or underneath your base to give skin a healthy glow.
â­ Layer up to build desired color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick**
â­ Features a nourishing formula infused with skin-loving ingredients.
â­ (Actual ingredients may vary, please refer to the product packaging for the complete list).

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ ÙƒÙˆÙ†Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ø± Ù…Ù„ØªÙŠ ØªØ§Ø³ÙƒÙŠØ± - 050 Ø¨ÙŠØ¬ Ø¯Ø§ÙƒÙ†
description_en:
Discover the perfect glow with **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer**, the ultimate solution for covering blemishes, brightening dark circles, and evening out skin tone. The innovative, super-sized soft-touch wand with a built-in product reservoir allows you to precisely apply full coverage wherever you need it â€“ on blemishes, under eyes, or all over your face. The buildable, high-pigment formula of **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer** glides on smoothly and blends perfectly, giving you brighter, smoother, and more even-looking skin. This color corrector lasts all day, bidding farewell to breakouts, discolouration, redness, pigmentation, acne scars, and visible pores.

**Product Features:**
â­ A liquid concealer that effectively covers imperfections.
â­ Lightweight and non-greasy formula that doesn't smudge, cake, or flake.
â­ A supersized soft-touch wand ensures precise application.
â­ Provides skin hydration for up to 24 hours.
â­ Crease-proof, transfer-proof, and waterproof.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer**:
â­ Step 1: Using fingertips or a concealer brush, lightly tap and blend out the formula for a seamless finish.
â­ Step 2: To set your base, dust a finishing powder over the concealer and foundation to lock them in.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer**:
â­ Formulated with advanced ingredients for perfect coverage and lasting hydration.
â­ Contains high pigments for rich color and buildable coverage.
â­ Lightweight and non-greasy.

#Concealer #Rimmel #Makeup #FullCoverage #DarkCircles #ClearSkin #EyeMakeup #FaceMakeup #Foundation #Cosmetics

title_en: Rimmel Wonder'Full Brow Gel - 004 Clear
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ø§Ø³ÙƒØ±Ø§ Ø¬Ù„ Ø­ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨ Ø´ÙØ§Ù ÙˆÙ†Ø¯Ø±ÙÙ„ - 004
description_en:
Elevate your brow game with **Rimmel Wonder'Full Brow Gel**. Achieve perfectly groomed and defined brows all day long with this long-wearing clear gel that sweeps and fixes your brow hairs into place. Its lightweight texture tames and sculpts brows in a flash, giving you a natural look or a more sculpted finish.

Featuring a tapered brush designed for total control, it ensures precise, uniform application every time. You can wear **Rimmel Wonder'Full Brow Gel** alone for a naturally groomed look, or as the final step after filling and defining your brows with a pencil for long-lasting hold.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Wonder'Full Brow Gel**:
â­ Gently sweep over your brows in an upward motion for a natural, fluffy look.
â­ Or sweep from the centre of your eyebrows outwards for a sleeker, more defined look.
â­ Allow the gel to set and youâ€™re good to go!

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Wonder'Full Brow Gel**:
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU, ALCOHOL DENAT., CARBOMER, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, POLYVINYL ALCOHOL, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, PANTHENOL, ARGANIA SPINOSA KERNEL OIL, GLYCERIN, BIOTIN, HYDROLYZED KERATIN, PANTOLACTONE, TOCOPHEROL, SODIUM SULFATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, BAMBUSA ARUNDINACEA STEM EXTRACT, SILICA.

description_en:
Discover the perfect finish with the **Rimmel Stay Matte Pressed Powder** in Transparent. This powder is crafted to provide you with flawless, lightweight, and long-lasting coverage that controls shine for up to 6 hours, giving your skin a natural, matte radiance. Enjoy skin that looks and feels beautifully alive, free from oils and parabens.

â­ Delivers perfect, lightweight, and long-lasting coverage
â­ Brings the beauty of your skin to life
â­ Blends flawlessly for a natural-looking matte finish
â­ Fits your skin type perfectly, as it doesnâ€™t contain any oils or parabens
â­ Feather-light, mattifying face powder that doesnâ€™t feel heavy or greasy
â­ Provides 6-hour shine control

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Stay Matte Pressed Powder**:
â­ Apply a light dusting with a brush and blend onto skin to set your foundation and create a true matte look. You can also use it as a shine touch-up throughout the day as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Stay Matte Pressed Powder**:
â­ Talc, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides (for color).

#Rimmel #StayMatte #FacePowder #MatteFinish #ShineControl #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #ClearSkin #DailyMakeup #Foundation

description_en:
Achieve the London look with **Rimmel Soft Kohl Eyeliner Pencil**. This pencil delivers a dense, smudgeable color that lasts for up to 12 hours, perfect for creating a soft, effortless smokey eye. Its smooth texture glides on easily, allowing for quick and seamless blending to achieve a captivating and sultry look that lasts. Enjoy a smooth application and rich color that adds depth to your gaze.

â­ Soft, smudgeable color with superior staying power.
â­ Long-lasting finish for up to 12 hours.
â­ Effortlessly blends for a soft, smudged eye look.
â­ Smooth, creamy texture glides on with ease.
â­ Won't tug or drag on delicate skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Soft Kohl Eyeliner Pencil**:
â­ Step 1: Ensure your eyeliner pencil is super-sharp for precise lining of the upper and lower lash lines.
â­ Step 2: Use your fingertips or a cotton bud to gently blend for a sexy, smudged effect.
â­ Step 3: Finish with generous amounts of your favorite mascara to perfectly frame your eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Soft Kohl Eyeliner Pencil**:
â­ (Eyeliner pencil ingredients are typically complex; focus here is on benefits for smoothness, color, and longevity).
â­ Smooth formulation for easy application and blending.
â­ High-concentration pigments for rich, bold color.
â­ Fixing agents to ensure long-lasting wear.

description_en:
Discover vibrant color and flawless shine with **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish #710 - Red**. This innovative nail polish delivers a protective, glossy finish in just one stroke, offering long-lasting wear that's perfect for changing your look to match your mood. Its incredibly fast drying time means you'll have a dazzling manicure in seconds, saving you precious time.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish #710 - Red**:
â­ Apply one stroke to the nail from base to tip.
â­ For a more intense color finish, add an extra coat.
â­ Dries super quickly, providing virtually no downtime.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish #710 - Red**:
â­ Patented 3-in-1 Colour Technology for flawless colour, base coat, and glossy top coat.
â­ Available in 20 vibrant shades to easily match your style.
â­ Resists chips and fading for up to 10 days.
â­ Provides a protective, glossy finish.

description_en:
Achieve perfectly sculpted brows with the **Rimmel Professional Eyebrow Pencil**. Designed to easily and quickly enhance and refine your brow shape, it's an essential addition to any makeup bag. Its pigmented formula allows you to fill in gaps or lengthen the brow arch to create your desired look. Groom and shape your brows with precision using the integrated brush for effortless styling.

â­ Long-lasting color that doesn't smudge.
â­ Ophthalmologist tested.
â­ Available in three beautiful shades to suit everyone.
â­ Enhances and shapes your eyebrows expertly.
â­ Easy-to-sharpen pencil for consistent precision.
â­ Comfortable to apply and wear all day.
â­ Non-sticky formula for a natural feel.
â­ Features a built-in brush applicator for perfect styling.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Professional Eyebrow Pencil**:
â­ Step 1: Brush through and fluff up eyebrows with the integrated brush.
â­ Step 2: Etch into brows to fill in any gaps with light, precise strokes.
â­ Step 3: Follow your natural brow shape as a guide, define your arches, lengthen brows, and sculpt them to achieve your perfect look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Professional Eyebrow Pencil**:
â­ Detailed ingredient list not provided.

description_en:
Achieve dramatically big lashes with **Rimmel Scandal Eyes Mascara**. This mascara boasts a unique formula with 3x more collagen and 3x more keratin, delivering an exceptional volume with just one stroke. Our 50% larger MaxDensity brush, featuring 12x more volume, is perfect for coating every lash, even the tiny inner ones, without clumping or smudging. Get defined, full lashes that last all day for scandalous eyelash volume. **Rimmel Scandal Eyes Mascara** is your perfect choice for an attractive everyday look or a special occasion. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Scandal Eyes Mascara**:
â­ Step 1: Use the winged side of the brush to instantly load your lashes.
â­ Step 2: Use the curved side to define lashes and achieve a full fan effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Scandal Eyes Mascara**:
â­ Supersize formula with 3x collagen and 3x keratin.
â­ Captures and plumps every lash perfectly.
â­ Supplied with a 50% larger maximum density brush.

#RimmelMascara #VoluminousLashes #EyeMakeup #LongLashes #ScandalEyes #SaudiBeauty #RiyadhMakeup #AttractiveEyes #BeautyLashes #ProMakeup

title_ar: Ø±ÙˆØ¬ Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø«Ø±ÙŠÙ„Ø³ÙŠÙƒØ± Ù„Ø§ØªÙƒØ³ 300 Ø¨Ù„Ø§Ø´ÙŠÙ†Ø¬ - Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† ÙˆØ¬Ø±Ø£Ø© Ù„Ø§ Ù…Ø«ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ù‡Ù…Ø§
description_en:
Get a bold unstoppable look in one swipe with **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Lip Latex**. The liquid lipstick drenches lips in extreme, vivid colour with a lasting lip stain, delivering instant shine, a hit of hydration, comfort that lasts all day, and an ultra-smooth finish. The hyaluronic lipstick features a lightweight, lip-loving vegan formula infused with aloe vera, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin E to provide a smooth shine and leave lips hydrated. In just one swipe, the colour glides on evenly. The diamond-like shape applicator on the **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Lip Latex** ensures a sharp line and full application for a bold, unstoppable look. The easy-grip bottle with a soft-touch finish makes holding the **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Lip Latex** comfortable and less likely to slip out of your hands.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Lip Latex**
â­ Start by applying colour to the upper lip.
â­ Use the tip of the applicator to outline the lip.
â­ Fill in the lips completely for maximum colour payoff.
â­ For a more defined look, blot away any excess.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Lip Latex**
â­ Aloe Vera
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Lightweight Vegan Formula
â­ Long-Lasting Colour Stain

#RimmelLondon #LipLatex #LiquidLipstick #BoldLips #HydratedLips #VeganMakeup #BeautySaudi #MakeupGoals #LipLove #Cosmetics

description_en:
Discover flawless skin with **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer - 030 Medium**. Our first clean makeup that works, with no compromises. This 100% vegan & kind to animals formula is free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients. **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer - 030 Medium** offers buildable, natural coverage to brighten under-eyes, conceal imperfections, and even out skin tone effortlessly, leaving your skin looking refreshed and radiant all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer - 030 Medium**
â­ Step 1: Apply to the face straight from the wand. Simply swipe where you desire coverage: under eyes, blemishes, or to even skin tone.
â­ Step 2: Once applied, gently blend with fingertips, a brush, or a sponge for a seamless, natural finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer - 030 Medium**
â­ Aqua/water/eau
â­ Dicaprylyl carbonate
â­ Dicaprylyl ether
â­ Aluminum starch octenylsuccinate
â­ Glycerin
â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate
â­ Sodium chloride
â­ Tri(polyglyceryl-3/lauryl) hydrogenated trilinoleate
â­ Silica
â­ Stearalkonium bentonite
â­ Cetyl peg/ppg-10/1 dimethicone
â­ Mica
â­ Propylene carbonate
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Panthenol
â­ Triethoxycaprylylsilane
â­ Sodium benzoate
â­ Chlorphenesin
â­ Aloe barbadensis leaf juice
â­ Methicone
â­ Pantolactone
â­ Pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate
â­ [May contain/peut contenir/+/-: Titanium dioxide (CI 77891), Iron oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)]

#Rimmel #Concealer #VeganMakeup #CleanBeauty #HydratingConcealer #NaturalCoverage #HealthySkin #SaudiBeauty #BeautyTrends #RimmelLondon

description_en:
Discover the magic of perfect lips with **Rimmel London Lasting Finish Lipstick**. Enjoy rich color and a creamy formula that lasts up to 8 hours, giving you an unparalleled radiant look. It conceals imperfections and provides a captivating appearance in seconds.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel London Lasting Finish Lipstick**
â­ Step 1: Line and define your lip shape with a lip liner.
â­ Step 2: Sweep your chosen shade of **Rimmel London Lasting Finish Lipstick** directly onto lips for bold, flawless color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel London Lasting Finish Lipstick**
â­ Creamy texture.
â­ Rich, highly-pigmented color.
â­ Lasts up to 8 hours.
â­ Gives lips a luminous finish.

description_en:
Define your lips with precision using the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 110 - Pink Spice**. This lip liner provides a precise application to give lips definition that lasts all day. Its creamy, gliding texture allows for effortless application and a seamless blend, making it your go-to for perfect lips. The **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 110 - Pink Spice** is available in 14 vibrant shades to easily match your favourite lipstick.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 110 - Pink Spice**:
â­ Outline your lips precisely before applying lipstick or gloss.
â­ For a more intense look, fill in your entire lips and blend.
â­ Can be worn alone for naturally defined lips.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 110 - Pink Spice**:
â­ Creamy formula for a smooth glide.
â­ High-quality pigments for rich, captivating color.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients to keep lips soft.

description_en:
Discover a healthy, natural look with **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint**.

Featuring a 100% vegan formula, free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients, making it the perfect choice for your skin.

â­ Light, natural coverage for a healthy-looking complexion.
â­ Moisturizing formula that deeply nourishes the skin.
â­ 100% vegan and kind to animals.
â­ Free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint**

â­ Step 1: Squeeze out a pea-sized amount and apply to skin with your favorite method: fingertips, brush, or sponge. For more coverage, simply apply a little more product until you achieve your desired look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint**

â­ Aqua/water/eau, dicaprylyl carbonate, dicaprylyl ether, glycerin, trimethylsiloxysilicate, aluminum starch octenylsuccinate, ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, sodium chloride, zinc oxide [nano], tri(polyglyceryl-3/lauryl) hydrogenated trilinoleate, stearalkonium bentonite, silica, cetyl peg/ppg-10/1 dimethicone, mica, propylene carbonate, tocopherol, panthenol, sodium benzoate, triethoxycaprylylsilane, chlorphenesin, aloe barbadensis leaf juice, methicone, pantolactone, bht, pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [may contain/peut contenir/ +/-: titanium dioxide (ci 77891), iron oxides (ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499)].

#Rimmel #SkinTint #VeganMakeup #NaturalLook #Skincare #Foundation #Beauty #SaudiBeauty #FragranceFree #CrueltyFree

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù‚Ù„Ù… ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø§Ù„Ø­ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ - 7209001 Ø¯Ø§ÙƒÙ†
description_en:
Achieve perfectly shaped and defined brows with the **Rimmel Professional Eyebrow Pencil**, the ideal tool for any makeup bag to quickly enhance and refine your brow shape. Its richly pigmented formula allows you to fill in any gaps or lengthen the brow's arch for your desired look. The built-in brush makes it easy to groom and apply makeup with precision. The **Rimmel Professional Eyebrow Pencil** features long-lasting, smudge-proof color and is ophthalmologist-tested, making it a safe and effective choice. Available in three beautiful shades to complement all skin tones and hair colors.

Product Features:
â­ Enhances and shapes your eyebrows with precision.
â­ Easy to sharpen, ensuring it's always ready to use.
â­ Comfortable to apply and wear for extended periods.
â­ Non-sticky formula for a natural finish.
â­ Built-in brush for effortless brow grooming and styling.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Professional Eyebrow Pencil**:
â­ Step 1: Brush through and fluff up your eyebrows using the built-in brush to clean and prepare them.
â­ Step 2: Etch into your brows with the pencil to fill in any gaps or define the edges.
â­ Step 3: Follow your natural brow shape as a guide to define arches, lengthen brows, and sculpt them according to your desired look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Professional Eyebrow Pencil**:
â­ Pigmented formula for enhanced color payoff.
â­ Waxes for smooth application and shape retention.
â­ Antioxidants for skin protection.
â­ Moisturizing agents to maintain brow softness.

description_en:
Discover exceptional shine with **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish - Shade 561 Nude**. This polish offers a quick-dry formula that gives you a flawless look in just 60 seconds. Enjoy ultra-glossy, high-impact colored nails that last up to 10 days, with an easy and precise application in a single stroke.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish - Shade 561 Nude**
â­ Apply one coat of nail polish to clean, dry nails.
â­ Wait 60 seconds for it to dry completely.
â­ For additional coverage, a second coat can be applied.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish - Shade 561 Nude**
â­ Butyl Acetate
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ Acetyl Tributyl Citrate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Benzophenone-1
â­ Dipentacene Cyclosiloxane
â­ Polyethylene Terephthalate
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Polyurethane-33
â­ May Contain:
â­ Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140)
â­ Red 30 Lake (CI 73360)
â­ Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499)
â­ Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)

description_en:
Discover **Rimmel Kind & Free Mascara**, our first clean mascara delivering volume and length with no compromise. Enjoy up to 36 hours of moisturized volume and length, all while being 100% vegan and kind to animals. It's free from fragrance, mineral oil, and animal-derived ingredients.

Formulated with 5% organic shea butter and biotin for conditioning benefits, this mascara features an innovative bio-based brush made from 100% bio-based fibers. The formula contains 99% ingredients of natural origin, is water-resistant, and fragrance-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Mascara**:
â­ Step 1: Wiggle the mascara wand through your lashes from base to tip, lifting lashes as you go.
â­ Step 2: Apply however many coats you like to achieve the desired volume & length. Now go flash those lashes!

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Mascara**:
â­ Aqua/water/eau
â­ Candelilla cera/euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax/cire de candelilla
â­ Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter
â­ Biotin
â­ 99% ingredients of natural origin

#RimmelMascara #EyeMakeup #LongLashes #VolumeMascara #CleanMakeup #VeganBeauty #SaudiMakeup #FullLashes #QuickMakeup #RimmelLondon

description_en:
Discover the cult-classic waterproof eyeliner that will not budge. Rimmel London **Rimmel Glam Eye Liquid Eyeliner** has always got you covered with a smooth, highly-pigmented formula that glides on easily. Create precise graphic looks or a classic feline flick that will last up to 16 hours.

Features:
â­ Intense, bold color payoff.
â­ Waterproof and smudge-proof for long-lasting wear.
â­ Flake-proof formula for a flawless finish.
â­ Easy-to-use precision applicator for maximum control.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Glam Eye Liquid Eyeliner**:
Step 1: Using the precision tip, glide along the upper lash line to create your desired look, from fine lines to dramatic winged liner.
Step 2: Frame your lashes with a sweep of mascara to complete your sleek eye look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Glam Eye Liquid Eyeliner**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Acrylates Copolymer
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Black Iron Oxide
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin

description_en:
Discover clean beauty with **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer**. Our first clean makeup that works, with no compromises. This 100% vegan and kind-to-animals concealer delivers fantastic coverage without sacrificing your values. It's free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients, making it gentle on your skin and our furry friends. Achieve a smooth, even complexion with this innovative product.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer**:
â­ Step 1: Apply to the face straight from the wand. Simply swipe where you desire coverage: under eyes, blemishes, or to even skin tone.
â­ Step 2: Once applied, gently blend with fingertips, a brush, or a sponge.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer**:
â­ 100% Vegan Formula
â­ Fragrance-Free
â­ Mineral Oil-Free
â­ Animal-Derived Ingredient-Free
â­ Buildable Coverage
â­ Hydrating

title_en: Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters: Primer, Highlighter & Glow Booster 004
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…ÙŠÙ„ØªÙŠ ØªØ§Ø³ÙƒØ±: Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙŠÙ…Ø±ØŒ Ù‡Ø§ÙŠÙ„Ø§ÙŠØªØ±ØŒ ÙˆÙ…Ø¹Ø²Ø² Ù„Ù„ØªÙˆÙ‡Ø¬ 004
description_en:
Achieve filtered-like skin with **Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters**, the ultimate 3-in-1 solution for flawless skin. It functions as a primer to prep your skin, a highlighter to accentuate your features, and a glow booster for a healthy, radiant finish. This lightweight, blendable formula is infused with skin-loving ingredients like natural biopeptides and Vitamin C, offering anti-aging and antioxidant benefits in just 4 weeks. Its light-reflecting pigments provide your skin with a perfectly lit and smooth glow.

âœ¨ Product Features:
â­ Gives a filter-like radiance
â­ Can be worn alone, under makeup as a primer, mixed with foundation, or over makeup as a highlighter
â­ Lightweight and blendable formula
â­ Infused with natural biopeptides and Vitamin C
â­ Provides anti-aging and antioxidant benefits in 4 weeks
â­ Delivers a smooth, lit-from-within glow
â­ Available in 8 skin-adapting shades
â­ Cruelty-free
â­ Vegan

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters**:
â­ Wear alone for a healthy, natural glow.
â­ Wear under makeup as a tinted, glowy primer.
â­ Mix with your favorite skincare or foundation for a more radiant finish.
â­ Wear over your base as a highlighter to accentuate specific areas.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Isododecane, Mica, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Sodium Chloride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Boron Nitride, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Propylene Carbonate, Panthenol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Methicone, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Pantolactone, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)]

#SaudiMakeup #SkinGlow #Rimmel #Primer #Highlighter #FaceMakeup #HealthySkin #NaturalMakeup #BeautyProducts #Skincare

description_en:
Achieve unparalleled lip definition with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 760 - 90's Nude**. This liner provides precise application to define your lips, featuring a long-wearing formula that ensures your definition lasts all day. Enjoy a creamy, gliding texture that allows for effortless application and a seamless blend with your favorite lipstick. Available in 14 vibrant shades to find the perfect match for every look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 760 - 90's Nude**:
â­ Outline your lips with a smooth line along the natural lip edge.
â­ Use a brush to gently blend the color.
â­ Can be used to fill in the entire lip for a base.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 760 - 90's Nude**:
â­ Long-wearing creamy formula.
â­ Rich pigments.
â­ Moisturizing agents.

description_en:
Achieve a radiant and healthy-looking complexion with **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint Foundation**. Our first clean makeup formulation is 100% vegan and free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients. This moisturizing skin tint provides a lightweight, natural finish that cares for your skin all day long. Experience a fresh feeling and ultimate comfort with every application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint Foundation**
â­ Step 1: Squeeze out a pea-sized amount and apply to your skin using your favorite method: fingertips, brush, or sponge.
â­ For more coverage, simply apply a little more product until you achieve the desired look.
â­ For best results, apply to clean, moisturized skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint Foundation**
â­ 100% vegan and kind to animals ingredients.
â­ Free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients.
â­ Enriched with natural extracts to enhance skin hydration.

#RimmelFoundation #CleanMakeup #HealthySkin #VeganMakeup #SkinTint #FaceMakeup #Foundation #SaudiBeauty #RiyadhBeauty #Moisturizing

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ ÙƒØ§ÙŠÙ†Ø¯ & ÙØ±ÙŠ Ù…Ø­Ø¯Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ø­ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨ Ø«Ù†Ø§Ø¦ÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ø·Ø±Ù 006 Ø¥Ø³Ø¨Ø±Ø³Ùˆ - Ù„Ù…Ø¸Ù‡Ø± Ø­ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨ Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠ ÙˆØ¬Ø±ÙŠØ¡
description_en:
Discover precision and beauty with the **Rimmel Kind & Free Dual Ended Brow Definer 006 Espresso**, Rimmelâ€™s first clean dual-ended eyebrow pencil designed to give you bold yet natural-looking eyebrows. It features a precise spoolie brush and a 1.7mm ultra-fine tip for effortlessly creating precise, hair-like strokes. This vegan formula is infused with organic certified shea butter and biotin to effectively condition, densify, and define your brows.

â­ 1st clean, dual-ended eyebrow pencil
â­ 1.7mm ultra-fine tip for precise application
â­ Vegan formula enriched with Shea Butter and Biotin
â­ Delivers defined, fuller-looking, natural brows
â­ Spoolie brush for seamless blending and a groomed look
â­ Made with no added fragrances or mineral oils
â­ Available in 4 natural shades to match your perfect shade

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Dual Ended Brow Definer 006 Espresso**
â­ Starting at the under-brow arch, apply the eyebrow pencil while moving toward the tail end.
â­ Outline the upper arch.
â­ Blend using the spoolie brush to seamlessly diffuse the tint for a groomed, natural look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Dual Ended Brow Definer 006 Espresso**
â­ Diisostearyl Malate
â­ C20-40 Acid
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ C20-40 Alcohols
â­ Mica
â­ Synthetic Wax
â­ Isoamyl Laurate
â­ Glyceryl Behenate/Eicosadioate
â­ Ethylcellulose
â­ Boron Nitride
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Ascorbyl Palmitate
â­ Propanediol
â­ [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)].

#Rimmel #BrowDefiner #EyebrowMakeup #NaturalBrows #BeautySaudi #MakeupSaudi #SaudiBeauty #BrowGoals #RimmelLondon #CleanBeauty

title_ar: Ù…Ø§Ø³ÙƒØ§Ø±Ø§ Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ ÙˆÙ†Ø¯Ø± Ø¨ÙˆÙ†Ø¯ Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… - Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ 11 Ù…Ù„: Ù„Ø±Ù…ÙˆØ´ ÙƒØ«ÙŠÙØ© ÙˆØ·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø© ÙˆØ¬Ø±ÙŠØ¦Ø©
description_en:
Achieve stunning lashes with the **Rimmel Wonder Bond Serum Mascara** 11 ml - 001 Black, designed to deliver exceptional volume and length. The innovative formula and flexible brush provide an intensely rich black color without any clumping, ensuring a bold, fuller, and longer lash look. It's the perfect choice for everyday wear or for extra building for a more dramatic effect.

â­ Intense, bold black color for captivating lashes.
â­ Adds significant volume and noticeable length to lashes.
â­ Clump-free formula for smooth, perfect application.
â­ Buildable formula to enhance volume and definition as desired.
â­ Long-lasting wear without smudging or flaking to maintain your elegance all day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Wonder Bond Serum Mascara**:
â­ Start at the lash base and wiggle the wand from root to tip for complete coverage.
â­ Apply additional coats to build desired volume without worrying about clumps.
â­ Use the wand tip for precise application on lower lashes for a complete look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Wonder Bond Serum Mascara**:
â­ Water (Aqua).
â­ Iron Oxides (CI 77499) for rich black color.
â­ Carnauba Wax and Beeswax for hold and shine.
â­ Glyceryl Stearate for a smooth formula.
â­ Panthenol for lash care.

#RimmelMascara #WonderBond #VoluminousLashes #LongLashes #Mascara #SaudiMakeup #BeautyKSA #BlackMascara #LashGoals #EyeMakeup

description_en:
Discover the perfect coverage for your skin with **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer**. Our first clean makeup that works, with no compromises. 100% vegan & kind to animals.

â­ 100% vegan makeup.
â­ Free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients.
â­ Provides natural, hydrating coverage.
â­ Lightweight feel on the skin.
â­ Available in a liquid formula for easy blending.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer**:
â­ Step 1: Apply to the face straight from the wand. Simply swipe where you desire coverage: under eyes, blemishes, or to even skin tone.
â­ Step 2: Once applied, gently blend with fingertips, a brush, or a sponge.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer**:
â­ Aqua/water/eau, dicaprylyl carbonate, dicaprylyl ether, aluminum starch octenylsuccinate, glycerin, trimethylsiloxysilicate, sodium chloride, tri(polyglyceryl-3/lauryl) hydrogenated trilinoleate, silica, stearalkonium bentonite, cetyl peg/ppg-10/1 dimethicone, mica, propylene carbonate, tocopherol, panthenol, triethoxycaprylylsilane, sodium benzoate, chlorphenesin, aloe barbadensis leaf juice, methicone, pantolactone, pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [may contain/peut contenir/+/-:titanium dioxide (ci 77891), iron oxides (ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499)].

description_en:
**Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner** is an eyeliner pencil that glides on with exceptional smoothness, delivering rich color impact to instantly define and enhance your eyes. Its buttery-soft, water-repellent formula ensures extreme wear for up to 24 hours, making it perfect for long-lasting looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner**:

â­ Apply your shade of **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner** to the upper lash line, gliding lightly from the inner corner to the outer corner of the eye.
â­ Using your fingers, lightly blend over the line to create a soft, smoky effect.
â­ Retrace the eyeliner over the upper lash line to add extra definition for that smoky look, then finish with mascara.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner**:

â­ Buttery-soft formula.
â­ Water-repellent.
â­ Extreme wear for up to 24 hours.
â­ Available in 6 stunning shades.
â­ For external use only.

description_en:
**Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters** is your 3-in-1 magic product for filter-perfect skin! Use it as a primer, highlighter, or glow booster for an unparalleled skin radiance. Available in 8 skin-adapting shades, itâ€™s time to say goodbye to social media filters!

**Product Features:**
â­ Filters face primer alone, for that instant perfected look.
â­ Mix it, wear it underneath, or layer it above your base for ultimate versatility.
â­ Lightweight, blendable formula infused with skin-loving ingredients like natural biopeptides and Vitamin C.
â­ Delivers anti-ageing and antioxidant benefits in just 4 weeks!
â­ Features light-reflecting pigments that give the skin a perfectly lit and smooth glow.
â­ Available in 8 skin-adapting shades.
â­ Cruelty-free and vegan.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters**:
â­ Wear alone for a healthy, natural glow.
â­ Wear under makeup as a tinted, glowy primer.
â­ Mix with your favourite skincare or foundation for a more radiant finish.
â­ Wear over your base as a highlighter to sculpt and define.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Isododecane, Mica, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Sodium Chloride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Boron Nitride, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Propylene Carbonate, Panthenol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Methicone, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Pantolactone, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

title_en: Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation - 60 Light Honey
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ø§Ù„ØªÙŠ ØªØ§Ø³ÙƒØ± ÙˆÙŠÙƒÙŠ Ù…ÙŠ Ø£Ø¨ ÙƒÙˆÙ†Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ø± ÙˆÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø§Ø³Ø§Ø³ - 60 Ù„Ø§ÙŠØª Ù‡ÙˆÙ†ÙŠ
description_en:
The **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation** works to awaken tired skin and give it instant radiance. This buildable formula with a radiant finish is infused with caffeine to energize the skin, vitamin C to brighten and even skin tone, and 2% niacinamide for firmer-looking skin. Enjoy contouring and gently massaging your skin with a cooling sensation thanks to the innovative applicator.

Product Features:
â­ Brightens, corrects, and revives skin.
â­ Buildable formula with a radiant finish.
â­ Contains Caffeine, Vitamin C, and Niacinamide.
â­ Innovative applicator to contour and massage skin with a cooling feel.
â­ Skin looks depuffed and refreshed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**:
â­ Contour and massage with the cooling metallic applicator on the product.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Isododecane, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Niacinamide, Tri(Polyglyceryl-3/Lauryl) Hydrogenated Trilinoleate, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Triethyl Citrate, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Mica, Sodium Chloride, Caffeine, Silica, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Sodium Benzoate, Methicone, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

title_en: Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish - Dazzling White #703
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ù†Ø§ÙƒÙŠØ± 60 Ø«Ø§Ù†ÙŠØ© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚ Ø§Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† - Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø£Ø¨ÙŠØ¶ Ø³Ø§Ø­Ø± #703
description_en:
Achieve a flawless manicure in seconds with **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish** in Dazzling White #703. Designed for ultimate convenience, it delivers ultra-shiny color, a protective base, and a glossy top coat all in one stroke, drying in under 60 seconds. The advanced 3-in-1 Colour Technology ensures vibrant, chip-resistant wear for up to 10 days. This classic white shade is perfect for any occasion, transitioning effortlessly from day to night. **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish** offers a quick, salon-quality finish that keeps your nails looking polished and chic. Get the London look with this long-lasting, quick-drying formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish**
â­ Apply one coat to nails with a downward stroke.
â­ For a more intensely colored finish, add an extra coat.

description_en:
Discover instant elegance with **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish** in Dark Red #713. Achieve a flawless base and a protective, glossy finish in just one stroke. Perfect for summer, this captivating shade brings the hottest seasonal colors to your fingertips and toes! The patented 3-in-1 Colour Technology delivers perfect color with a base coat and glossy top coat in a single application, drying in under a minute. Ideal for those who love to change their polish with their mood, the long-lasting formula resists chips and fading for up to 10 days. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish**:
â­ Apply to nails with a single downward stroke.
â­ Add an extra coat for a more intensely colored finish.
â­ Dries quickly for minimal downtime.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish**:
â­ 3-in-1 Colour Technology for base, color, and top coat.
â­ Long-lasting formula resists chips and fading.
â­ Dries in 60 seconds.

#RimmelNailPolish #60SecondNailPolish #NailGoals #SaudiBeauty #NailInspo #RimmelLondon #Manicure #NailEnvy #BeautySaudi #SaudiStyle

title_en: Rimmel Wonderfull Brow Gel - Light 002
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ ÙˆÙ†Ø¯Ø±ÙÙ„ Ø¬Ù„ Ø­ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨ - ÙØ§ØªØ­ 002
description_en:
Revitalize your look with **Rimmel Wonderfull Brow Gel**, a 24-hour waterproof brow mascara enriched with fibers, for instantly full and plumped brows that stay put all day. Say goodbye to bad brow days with this revolutionary product that will change the way you style your brows. Achieve perfectly shaped brows as if professionally drawn.

â­ **24-Hour Waterproof:** Enjoy brows that stay put, unaffected by water or humidity.
â­ **Instant Fullness Fibers:** Provides visibly thicker and fuller brows from the first application.
â­ **All-Day Wear:** No need for touch-ups, your brows will remain flawless from morning to night.
â­ **Professional Definition & Shaping:** Achieve precisely defined and groomed brows.
â­ **Smudge-Proof Formula:** Enjoy a clean look without smudging or product transfer.
â­ **Dermatologist Tested:** A safe and gentle formula for your skin and brows.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Wonderfull Brow Gel**:
â­ Start by filling in any gaps or sparse areas in your brows using the fine pencil tip to create natural-looking hair-like strokes.
â­ Use the integrated spoolie brush to comb and tidy any unruly brow hairs, shaping them as desired.
â­ For extra hold, you can finish the look with a clear brow gel to set your brows in place all day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Wonderfull Brow Gel**:
â­ Features a unique formula with fibers that enhance brow fullness.
â­ Contains proven ingredients for long-lasting hold and water resistance.
â­ Formulated without harmful substances, tested for safety.

#BrowMascara #BrowGel #BrowDefinition #NaturalBrows #BrowMakeup #EyeMakeup #RimmelLondon #SaudiMakeup #SaudiBeauty #PerfectBrows

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ø§Ø³ÙƒØ§Ø±Ø§ ÙÙˆÙ„ÙŠÙˆÙ… Ø§ÙˆÙ† Ø¯ÙŠÙ…Ø§Ù†Ø¯ - Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ ÙƒØ«ÙŠÙ
description_en:
Discover the best volumising mascara ever with **Rimmel Scandaleyes Volume On Demand Mascara** in Intense Black, designed to suit every lash mood. This is Rimmel's first customisable and adjustable mascara, giving you complete control over your lash volume.

Start with a single sweep for natural-looking volume and definition. Want to take it next-level? Layer it up for fuller, plumped-up lashes, perfect for after-dark. Want to go even bolder? Build up the volume with the smooth, conditioning formula that delivers a clump-free finish every time.

â­ Features a lash-conditioning formula for a smooth, clump-free finish.
â­ Unique brush with wavy fibre technology catches, loads, and separates every single lash.
â­ Tapered brush shape sweeps through hard-to-reach lashes for perfect lift.
â­ Layerable for bigger, bolder volume anytime with zero clumps.
â­ Available in two shades: intense black or natural-looking brown.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Scandaleyes Volume On Demand Mascara**:
â­ Step 1: Hold the mascara brush right at the root of lashes for lift and volume.
â­ Step 2: Wiggle the wavy, tapered brush from root to tip to separate and define.
â­ Step 3: Sweep the mascara wand through lashes to build fuller-looking lashes on-the-go.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Scandaleyes Volume On Demand Mascara**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Paraffin, Glyceryl Stearate, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Triethanolamine, Talc, Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba, Acrylates Copolymer, Clycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Panthenol, Silica, Iron Oxides (CI 77499).

#Rimmel #Mascara #Lashes #VolumeLashes #EyeMakeup #BlackMascara #Beauty #SaudiShopping #ProMakeup #GlamEyes

description_en:
Discover the secret to radiant skin with **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer**! It's your perfect choice for natural coverage and a healthy, attractive skin appearance. Featuring a 100% vegan formula, free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients, making it gentle on your skin. It provides buildable coverage, from light to medium, to confidently conceal dark circles and blemishes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer**
â­ Step 1: Apply directly from the wand to areas you want to cover, such as under the eyes, blemishes, or to even out skin tone.
â­ Step 2: Once applied, gently blend with fingertips, a brush, or a sponge for a natural, seamless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer**
â­ 100% vegan formula
â­ Free from fragrance and mineral oils
â­ Free from animal-derived ingredients
â­ Hydrates the skin
â­ Buildable natural coverage

title_ar: Ø±ÙˆØ¬ Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªÙŠÙ†Ø¬ Ø¨Ø±ÙˆÙÙˆÙƒØ§ Ù„ÙŠØ¨Ø³ Ù…Ù† Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ - 730 Ù…ÙŠÙƒ Ø§ÙŠ Ù…Ø§ÙˆÙ
description_en:
Discover unparalleled staying power with **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**, a lipstick that delivers 16 hours of gorgeous, glossy color that's transfer-proof and kiss-proof. Experience vibrant color with an easy, exclusive 2-step application. Its lightweight, flexible formula adapts to your lips' movements, ensuring comfort and confidence all day long. Achieve a fun, flirty, and fearless look that lasts with **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**, your perfect companion for every occasion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**:
â­ Apply color and keep lips apart for 60 seconds to set.
â­ Then apply the top coat to lock in the color, moisture, and add shine.
â­ **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips** lipstick can be easily removed with an oil-based makeup remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**:
â­ ISODODECANE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, DIMETHICONE, C9-13 ISOPARAFFIN, DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE.
â­ BARIUM SULFATE / CI 77120, ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE, PROPYLENE CARBONATE, SILICA, PROPYLPARABEN.
â­ PHENOXYETHANOL, TIN OXIDE, BENZOIC ACID, CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE.
â­ [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: MICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE, IRON OXIDES, D&C RED NO. 28, D&C RED NO. 36, D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE, BISMUTH OXYCHLORIDE, CARMINE].
â­ RICINUS COMMUNIS (CASTOR) SEED OIL, CERA ALBA/BEESWAX/CIRE D'ABEILLE, PENTAERYTHRITYL STEARATE/CAPRATE/CAPRYLATE/ ADIPATE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE.
â­ PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, PROPYLPARABEN, ALCOHOL, ISOPROPYL MYRISTATE.
â­ TOCOPHEROL, CAPRYLIC/ CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, ASCORBYL PALMITATE, ASCORBIC ACID, CITRIC ACID, BHT.

#RimmelLondon #Lipstick #LongLastingLipstick #Provocalips #MakeAMauve #SaudiMakeup #GlossyLips #16HourWear #BeautySaudi #LipGoals

description_en:
Achieve intensely thrilling lashes with the **Rimmel Volume Thrill Seeker Mascara**. Experience bold volume, gravity-defying length, and weightless definition. From the UK's #1 makeup brand, Rimmel's NEW viral **Thrill Seeker Mascara** delivers a whipped, creamy formula charged with lash-loving panthenol. This unique formula leaves your lashes feeling softer, smoother, and stronger, while staying fearlessly clump-free and smudge-proof all day long. Live the London look with lashes that thrill!

â­ Bold volume and dramatic lift for fuller-looking lashes.
â­ Gravity-defying length for incredibly long lashes.
â­ Whipped, creamy formula for a soft and strengthened feel.
â­ All-day wear that stays clump-proof and smudge-proof.
â­ Hourglass-shaped brush designed to grab and define every single lash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Volume Thrill Seeker Mascara**:
â­ Swipe the mascara from root to tip in a zig-zag motion.
â­ Layer up for maximum bold volume and outlandish length.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Volume Thrill Seeker Mascara**:
â­ Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5) for lash hydration and strength.
â­ Whipped creamy formula for a smooth application.
â­ Deep black pigments for rich, intense color payoff.

#RimmelMascara #VolumeLashes #LongLashes #EyeMakeup #RimmelLondon #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #ThrillSeeker #VolumizingMascara #MakeupGoals

title_ar: Ø±ÙˆØ¬ Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø«Ø±ÙŠÙ„ Ø³ÙŠÙƒØ± Ù„Ø§ØªÙƒØ³ 150 Ù…Ø§Ø¬Ù†ØªÙŠÙƒ - Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ù‚ÙˆÙŠ ÙˆÙ„Ø§Ù…Ø¹ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Get an extreme 3D latex shine with unstoppable color in one swipe. Achieve a bold, unstoppable look with **Rimmel Thrillseeker**. This liquid lipstick drenches lips in extreme, vivid color with a lasting lip stain, delivering instant shine, a hit of hydration, comfort that lasts all day, and an ultra-smooth finish. Its lightweight, lip-loving vegan formula is infused with aloe vera, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin E, providing a smooth shine and leaving lips hydrated. In just one swipe, the color glides on evenly. The diamond-like shape applicator on **Rimmel Thrillseeker** ensures a sharp line and full application for a bold, unstoppable look. The easy-grip bottle with a soft-touch finish makes it easy to grip and less likely to slide out of your hands.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Thrillseeker**
â­ Use the diamond-shaped applicator for precise application along the lip line.
â­ Fill in the lips completely for a bold color payoff.
â­ Reapply throughout the day to maintain shine and hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Thrillseeker**
â­ Aloe Vera (for hydration and soothing).
â­ Hyaluronic Acid (for added moisture and plumpness).
â­ Vitamin E (as an antioxidant and for lip protection).
â­ Vegan and lip-loving formula.

#RimmelSaudi #Lipstick #LipMakeup #GlossyLips #SaudiBeauty #Thrillseeker #RimmelLondon #MakeupSaudi #BoldColor #LipHydration

title_ar: Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ 60 Ø«Ø§Ù†ÙŠØ© Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø± Ø´Ø§ÙŠÙ† - Ø¯Ø±Ø¬Ø© 707 Ù†ÙŠÙˆØ¯
description_en:
Achieve a chic and captivating look with **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish**, Shade 707 Nude. This nail polish provides full coverage in a single stroke, offering a protective, glossy finish with a built-in base and top coat. Its fast-drying formula ensures perfect nails in under a minute, delivering rich color and long-lasting wear for up to 10 days without chipping. Choose Shade 707 Nude from **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine** for a delicate and trendy touch to your nails on any occasion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine**

*   Apply a single stroke to nails for a base and protective glossy finish.
*   For a more intense color finish, add an extra coat.
*   The nail polish dries incredibly fast, saving you precious time.
*   Ideal for those who love to change their nail polish frequently.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine**

*   Features 3 in 1 Colour Technology for ultra-shiny color with a base coat and glossy top coat in one stroke.
*   Offers long-lasting wear and resistance to chips and fading for up to 10 days.
*   Dries very quickly in under a minute.

description_en:
Achieve a bold, unstoppable look in one swipe with **Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex**.

This liquid lipstick delivers extreme 3D latex shine with unstoppable color in a single application. It drenches your lips in vivid, intense color with a lasting stain, offering instant shine, a surge of hydration, all-day comfort, and an ultra-smooth finish.

Infused with aloe vera, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin E, the lightweight, lip-loving vegan formula provides a smooth shine and leaves lips feeling hydrated.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex**
â­ In just one swipe, the color glides on evenly.
â­ The diamond-shaped applicator ensures a sharp line and full coverage for a bold, unstoppable look.
â­ The easy-grip bottle with a soft-touch finish is comfortable to hold and less likely to slip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex**
â­ Contains moisturizing Aloe Vera.
â­ Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid for intense hydration.
â­ Boosted with nourishing Vitamin E.
â­ Vegan, lip-loving formula.

#Rimmel #LipLatex #Thrillseeker #BoldLips #Lipstick #SaudiMakeup #RiyadhBeauty #JeddahMakeup #LipGloss #BeautySaudi
