title_en: Rimmel Brow This Way Palette - Light
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ€Ù…Ù€ÙŠÙ€Ù„ Ø¹Ù€Ù„Ù€Ø¨Ù€Ø© ØªÙ€Ø­Ù€Ø¯ÙŠÙ€Ø¯ Ø­Ù€ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨ Ù„Ù€ÙˆÙ† Ø¨Ù€Ù†Ù€ÙŠ - ÙÙ€Ø§ØªÙ€Ø­
description_en:
**Rimmel Brow This Way Palette - Light** is a comprehensive eyebrow defining and shaping kit that combines powder and wax to easily define, fill, and fix your eyebrows. This all-in-one kit is designed to be user-friendly and compact, making it perfect to pop in your makeup bag for quick brow touch-ups on the go.

â­ **Product Features:**
* All-in-one brow kit featuring a brow powder, wax, dual ended angled brush, and spoolie.
* The tinted powder gives your brows a natural look and leaves no residue.
* Features a long-lasting formula that feels lightweight and comfortable all day long.
* It fills and fixes your eyebrows for superior definition.
* Includes a double-ended angled brush for precise application and a spoolie grooming brush.
* Compact and portable for easy touch-ups on the go.

ğŸ”¹ **Usage Instructions for Rimmel Brow This Way Palette - Light**
* Step 1: Apply the wax to define and set your eyebrows with the angled brush.
* Step 2: With the other side of the brush, blend the powder to fill in sparse areas.
* Step 3: Finish by using the combing brush to perfect your brow look.

ğŸ”¹ **Ingredients of Rimmel Brow This Way Palette - Light**
* Wax for setting and defining eyebrows.
* Tinted brow powder for filling and shaping.
* Dual-ended angled brush for application.
* Spoolie brush for grooming.

#Rimmel #EyebrowDefining #PerfectBrows #EyeMakeup #BrowPowder #BrowWax #BrowKit #SaudiMakeup #EyebrowCare #Beauty

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…ÙŠÙ„ØªÙŠ ØªØ§Ø³ÙƒØ±: Ø¨Ø¯ÙŠÙ„ Ø§Ù„ÙÙ„Ø§ØªØ± Ù„ØªÙˆÙ‡Ø¬ Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ù„Ø§ Ù…Ø«ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ù‡
description_en:
Achieve the ultimate skin glow with **Rimmel Multitasker**, your secret weapon against social media filters. This innovative 3-in-1 product acts as a primer, highlighter, and glow booster, offering unparalleled versatility for your makeup routine. Wear it alone for a natural, healthy radiance, as a primer to prep your skin, mixed with your foundation for an enhanced luminous finish, or over your base as a targeted highlighter. Its lightweight, blendable formula is infused with skin-loving ingredients like natural biopeptides and Vitamin C, delivering anti-ageing and antioxidant benefits that visibly improve skin in just 4 weeks. Light-reflecting pigments provide a perfectly lit and smooth glow, available in 8 skin-adapting shades. **Rimmel Multitasker** is your go-to for effortlessly radiant skin, and it's proudly cruelty-free and vegan.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multitasker**
â­ Wear **Rimmel Multitasker** alone for a healthy, natural glow.
â­ Apply underneath makeup as a tinted, glowy primer to prep the skin.
â­ Mix with your favorite skincare or foundation for a more radiant finish.
â­ Wear over your base as a highlighter to sculpt and illuminate your features.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multitasker**
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Isododecane, Mica, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Sodium Chloride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Boron Nitride, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Propylene Carbonate, Panthenol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Methicone, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Pantolactone, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

#SaudiMakeup #Foundation #Highlighter #Primer #FaceMakeup #SkinGlow #NaturalMakeup #RimmelLondon #SaudiBeauty #BeautyProducts

title_ar: Ø±ÙˆØ¬ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø«Ø±ÙŠÙ„Ø³ÙŠÙƒØ± Ù„Ø§ØªÙƒØ³ - 100 Ø³Ø§Ø³ÙŠ
description_en:
Discover extreme 3D latex shine with unstoppable color in one swipe with the **Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex 100 Sassy**. Achieve a bold, unstoppable look with a single swipe of this liquid lipstick that drenches lips in extreme, vivid color with a long-lasting lip stain. The **Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex 100 Sassy** delivers instant shine, a hit of hydration, comfort that lasts all day, and an ultra-smooth finish. Its lightweight, lip-loving vegan formula is infused with aloe vera, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin E, providing a smooth shine and leaving lips hydrated. In just one swipe, the color glides on evenly. The diamond-like shape applicator ensures a sharp line and full application for a bold, unstoppable look, while the easy-grip bottle with a soft-touch finish makes it easy to hold.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex 100 Sassy**
â­ Start applying from the center of the upper lip and follow your lip contours.
â­ Apply the color to the lower lip in the same way.
â­ For a perfect finish, use the applicator's edge to draw sharp lines around the lips.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex 100 Sassy**
â­ Aloe Vera: For its soothing and hydrating properties.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: To help maintain lip hydration and plumpness.
â­ Vitamin E: As an antioxidant to protect the lips.
â­ Vegan Formula: Free from animal-derived ingredients.

#RimmelLipstick #LipMakeup #LiquidLipstick #LipBeauty #LipCare #RiyadhMakeup #JeddahBeauty #SaudiMakeup #LongLastingLipstick #RimmelLondon

description_en:
Discover your nails' natural beauty with **Rimmel Kind & Free** Nail Polish, our first 100% vegan and kind-to-animals makeup. This clean, plant-based formula is free from fragrance*, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients, delivering exceptional shine, gloss, and rich pigment while keeping your nails healthy. Experience a chic and healthy look with **Rimmel Kind & Free** Nail Polish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free** Nail Polish:
â­ Step 1: Start with clean, dry nails. Apply one coat of **Rimmel Kind & Free** Nail Polish using three strokes from base to tip: one for each side and one in the middle.
â­ Step 2: Once dry, apply a second coat if needed, allow to dry completely, and finish with a topcoat for dazzling shine and extended wear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free** Nail Polish:
â­ Ethyl acetate
â­ Butyl acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic acid/neopentyl glycol/trimellitic anhydride copolymer
â­ Acetyl

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù‚Ù„Ù… ÙƒØ­Ù„ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡ - 08 Ø£Ø²Ø±Ù‚
description_en:
Discover instant allure with **Rimmel** Scandaleyes Waterproof Gel Eyeliner. This **Rimmel Khol Pen** delivers instant color impact with its high-intensity pigments, ensuring a smudge-proof and waterproof finish that lasts all day. Use it alone for a clean look or combine shades to create a truly scandalous effect.

â­ High-intensity color for an instant, impactful look.
â­ Ultra-smooth and creamy formula that glides on effortlessly.
â­ Waterproof and smudge-proof, staying put from day to night.
â­ Ophthalmologist tested for safe and comfortable wear.
â­ Suitable for contact lens wearers and sensitive eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Khol Pen**:
Step 1: Apply your shade of eyeliner to the upper lash line, gliding lightly from the inner corner to the outer corner of the eye.
Step 2: Using the built-in sponge tip, lightly blend over the line to smoke the eyeliner upwards and outwards.
Step 3: Retrace eyeliner over the upper lash line to add definition to your smokey look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Khol Pen**:
â­ Rich high-intensity pigment formula.
â­ Waterproof and smudge-proof ingredients.
â­ Creamy base for smooth application.

#SaudiMakeup #RimmelKohl #SmokeyEyes #Eyeliner #EyeMakeup #RimmelLondon #KSABeauty #SaudiFashion #ProMakeup #WaterproofEyeliner

description_en:
**Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint** is our first clean makeup that works, with no compromises.

â­ 100% vegan & kind to animals. Free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients.
â­ Offers moisturizing skin tint for a natural finish.
â­ Made with vegan ingredients that are good for you & good for the planet.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint**:
â­ Step 1: Squeeze out a pea-sized amount and apply to skin with your favorite method: fingertips, brush, or sponge. For more coverage, simply apply a little more product until you achieve the desired look.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint**:
â­ Aqua/water/eau, dicaprylyl carbonate, dicaprylyl ether, glycerin, trimethylsiloxysilicate, aluminum starch octenylsuccinate, ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, sodium chloride, zinc oxide [nano], tri(polyglyceryl-3/lauryl) hydrogenated trilinoleate, stearalkonium bentonite, silica, cetyl peg/ppg-10/1 dimethicone, mica, propylene carbonate, tocopherol, panthenol, sodium benzoate, triethoxycaprylylsilane, chlorphenesin, aloe barbadensis leaf juice, methicone, pantolactone, bht, pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [may contain/peut contenir/ +/-:titanium dioxide (ci 77891), iron oxides (ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499)].

description_en:
Discover the secret to perfect lips with Rimmel Lasting Provocalips.

Enjoy endless color for 16 hours with a delectably glossy finish. **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips** is kiss-proof, transfer-proof, and food-proof, making it the ultimate choice for lips that stay vibrant all day.

â­ 16-hour endless color with a high-shine finish.
â­ Kiss-proof, transfer-proof, and food-proof.
â­ Exclusive 2-step process locks in vibrant color.
â­ Lightweight and flexible, it adapts to your lips' movements.
â­ Be fun, flirty, and fearless â€“ your lips won't tell!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**:
â­ Apply the color and keep lips apart for 60 seconds to set.
â­ Then apply the top coat to lock in the color and moisture while adding shine.
â­ **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips** 16HR Kissproof Lip Colour comes off easily with an oil-based makeup remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**:
â­ Features an advanced formula for lasting color and comfort.
â­ Contains moisturizing ingredients to keep lips soft.
â­ For a full ingredient list, please refer to the product packaging.

#SaudiMakeup #LongLastingLipstick #GlossyLips #RimmelLondon #ProfessionalLipstick #BeautyGoals #LipCare #Fashion2024 #EyeMakeup #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Discover vibrant color with **Rimmel Kind & Free Nail Polish**.

Our first clean makeup that works, no compromises. 100% vegan & kind to animals. Free from fragrance*, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients. Vegan & clean plant-based formula that delivers on shine, gloss and rich pigment while still allowing your nails to stay healthy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Nail Polish**:
â­ Step 1: Starting with clean nails, paint nails with 3 strokes from base to tip: 1 per side and 1 in the middle.
â­ Step 2: Once dry, apply a 2nd coat if needed, allow to dry and apply a topcoat for dazzling shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Nail Polish**:
â­ Ethyl acetate
â­ Butyl acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic acid/neopentyl glycol/trimellitic anhydride copolymer
â­ Acetyl

#Rimmel #NailPolish #KindAndFree #VeganMakeup #CleanBeauty #HealthyNails #NailCare #SaudiBeauty #GCCBeauty #BeautyProducts

description_en:
Discover the **Rimmel Kind & Free Universal Natural Brow Wax** for your perfect brows! This wax provides long-lasting hold to lock your brows in place, instantly creating a lifted brow look. Its easy-to-apply, mess-free formula tames unruly brows and sets them without residue or flaking, ensuring your brows stay flawless all day. Use it alone for a natural finish or as a top coat to your eyebrow makeup for an at-home laminated brow effect while keeping your brows conditioned. It's a must-have in your makeup bag.

âœ¨ **Product Features:**
â­ Delivers a natural laminated brow effect.
â­ Holds brows securely throughout the day.
â­ Perfect for use alone or with brow makeup.
â­ Lightweight, easy-to-apply, and mess-free formula.

ğŸ”¹ **Usage Instructions for Rimmel Kind & Free Universal Natural Brow Wax**
â­ Step 1: Apply the wax using fingers or a brow comb.
â­ Step 2: Brush through brows to fix and set them in place.

ğŸ”¹ **Ingredients of Rimmel Kind & Free Universal Natural Brow Wax**
â­ Free from oils and animal-derived ingredients.
â­ Gentle formula for brows.
â­ Provides strong, long-lasting hold.

description_en:
Introducing the **Rimmel Stay Matte** Pressed Powder in Silky Beige 005, your go-to for a flawless, shine-free complexion. 

**Rimmel Stay Matte** offers the perfect lightweight, mattifying, and long-lasting coverage that will bring the beauty of your skin to life. It blends flawlessly for a natural-looking matte finish and delivers up to 6 hours of shine control, ensuring a fresh look all day long. 

â­ Perfect, lightweight coverage
â­ Natural-looking matte finish
â­ 6-hour shine control
â­ Oil and paraben-free, suitable for all skin types
â­ Feather-light feel, never heavy or greasy

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Stay Matte**
â­ Apply a light dusting with a brush and blend onto skin to set your foundation and create a true matte look.
â­ Use it as a shine touch-up throughout the day as needed with the puff.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Stay Matte**
â­ Lightweight, mattifying formula
â­ Free from oils and parabens

description_en:
Achieve the ultimate London look with **Rimmel Scandaleyes Mascara Flex 003 Extreme - Black**. This mascara features a 30% wider and denser MaxDensity brush that precisely captures and coats even the shortest lashes for maximum impact.

Its innovative Triple collagen + keratin formula shapes, plumps, and defines lashes, even the thinnest ones, resulting in intense eyes and a fuller, more voluminous lash appearance.

â­ Fibre-enriched formula for longer, more voluminous lashes.
â­ Smudge-proof formula for all-day confidence.
â­ Oversized volumizing effect with lycra for soft and flexible lashes.
â­ Comes with a maximum density brush for ultimate coverage and separation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Scandaleyes Mascara Flex 003 Extreme - Black**:
Step 1: Use the winged side of the brush to instantly load your lashes with volume.
Step 2: Use the curved side to define lashes and achieve a full, fan-like effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Scandaleyes Mascara Flex 003 Extreme - Black**:
â­ Collagen:
â­ Keratin:
â­ Lycra:
â­ Fibre-rich formula:

description_en:
Discover natural radiance with **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint**. 

Our first clean makeup that works, with no compromises. 100% vegan & kind to animals.

Free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients, our new moisturizing skin tint provides a natural, even skin tone thanks to its 100% vegan ingredients â€“ stuff thatâ€™s simply good for you & good for the planet.

â­ 100% Vegan Formula
â­ Free from Fragrance & Mineral Oils
â­ Non-Comedogenic
â­ Provides Light, Natural Coverage
â­ Suitable for All Skin Types

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint**

â­ Step 1: Squeeze out a pea-sized amount and apply to skin with your favorite method: fingertips, brush, or sponge.
â­ For more coverage, simply apply a little more product until you achieve the desired look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint**

â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Glycerin, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Sodium Chloride, Zinc Oxide [Nano], Tri(Polyglyceryl-3/Lauryl) Hydrogenated Trilinoleate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Silica, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Mica, Propylene Carbonate, Tocopherol, Panthenol, Sodium Benzoate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Methicone, Pantolactone, BHT, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/ +/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

#Rimmel #SkinTint #Foundation #CleanBeauty #VeganMakeup #NaturalLook #Hydration #SkincareMakeup #BeautySaudi #RimmelLondon

title_en: Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish - English Rose 091
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø± Ø¬Ù„ - Ø¥Ù†Ø¬Ù„Ø´ Ø±ÙˆØ² 091
description_en:
Discover salon-style French nails with **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish - English Rose 091**. This is a breakthrough in gel nail technology, offering a two-step gel colour system for a flawless, salon-style French mani. 

Achieve a brilliant gel finish with **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish - English Rose 091**. Enjoy an easy, streak-free application thanks to its precision brush. Best of all, there's no UV lamp needed, and no mess!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish - English Rose 091**:
â­ Step 1: Apply 1-2 coats of the nail polish.
â­ Step 2: Wait for nails to dry completely.
â­ Step 3: Sweep the Super Gel Top Coat over the top to activate curing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish - English Rose 091**:
â­ BUTYL ACETATE, ETHYL ACETATE, NITROCELLULOSE, ACETYL TRIBUTYL CITRATE, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL, TOSYLAMIDE/EPOXY RESIN, STEARALKONIUM BENTONITE, STYRENE/ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, TRIPHENYL PHOSPHATE, GLYCIDYL NEODECANOATE/PHTHALIC ANHYDRIDE/TMP CROSSPOLYMER, ADIPIC ACID/NEOPENTYL GLYCOL/TRIMELLITIC ANHYDRIDE COPOLYMER, AQUA/WATER/EAU, ISOSORBIDE DICAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, SILICA, DIACETONE ALCOHOL, ETOCRYLENE, KAOLIN, MEK, HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/IPDI/PPG-15 GLYCERYL ETHER COPOLYMER, ACRYLATES/DIMETHICONE COPOLYMER, PHOSPHORIC ACID, LITHOTHAMNIOM CALCAREUM EXTRACT, CETYL PEG/ PPG-10/1 DIMETHICONE, MANNITOL, n-BUTYL ALCOHOL, DIMETHICONE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, BENZOPHENONE-1, POLYVINYL BUTYRAL, SOLUM DIATOMEAE/DIATOMACEOUS EARTH/TERRE DE DIATOMEES, CORALLINA OFFICINALIS EXTRACT, TRIMETHYLPENTANEDIYL DIBENZOATE, POLYETHYLENE, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, ZINC SULFATE, MACROCYSTIS PYRIFERA (KELP) EXTRACT, HYDROLYZED CONCHIOLIN PROTEIN, METHYLPARABEN, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/ +/-:MICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), FD&C YELLOW NO. 5 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 19140), D&C RED NO. 6 BARIUM LAKE (CI 15850), D&C YELLOW NO. 11 (CI 47000), D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15850), MANGANESE VIOLET (CI 77742), ULTRAMARINES (CI 77007), FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090), D&C RED NO. 34 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15880), FERRIC FERROCYANIDE (CI 77510), D&C VIOLET NO. 2 (CI 60725)].

description_en:
**Rimmel Nude Edition Eyeshadow Palette (12 Colors) - No. 01** is your perfect collection for soft and radiant looks. This palette has been carefully curated to offer you neutral and versatile shades suitable for all occasions and styles, from subtle daytime looks to glamorous evening ones.

**Product Features:**
â­ 12 rich colors with high-quality pigments.
â­ Smooth, blendable, and easy-to-apply formula.
â­ Neutral shades that suit all skin tones.
â­ Long-lasting wear without creasing or fading.
â­ Ideal for diverse and gradient eye looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Nude Edition Eyeshadow Palette (12 Colors) - No. 01**:
â­ Use an eyeshadow brush to apply your favorite shade onto the eyelid.
â­ Blend colors together to achieve desired eyeshadow gradients.
â­ Apply lighter shades to highlight the inner corner of the eye and the brow bone.
â­ Use darker shades to define the lash line and the outer corner of the eye for added depth.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Nude Edition Eyeshadow Palette (12 Colors) - No. 01**:
â­ Talc.
â­ Mica.
â­ Petrolatum.
â­ Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate.
â­ Vitamin E.

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer - 050 Rich**. Our first clean makeup that works, with no compromises. This 100% vegan formula is free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients, designed to provide natural coverage and a healthy look for your skin. Enjoy a comfortable and fresh feel all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer - 050 Rich**:
â­ Step 1: Apply to the face straight from the wand. Simply swipe where you desire coverage: under eyes, blemishes, or to even skin tone.
â­ Step 2: Once applied, gently blend with fingertips, a brush, or a sponge for a natural and seamless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Hydrating Concealer - 050 Rich**:
â­ 100% vegan formula
â­ Free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients
â­ Provides skin hydration
â­ Buildable, natural coverage
â­ Leaves skin feeling smooth and radiant
â­ Enriched with Aloe Vera and Shea Butter for added moisture.

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ø®ÙÙŠ Ø¹ÙŠÙˆØ¨ ÙƒÙˆÙ†Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ø± Ù…Ù„ØªÙŠ ØªØ§Ø³ÙƒØ± 055 ÙƒÙ„Ø§Ø³ÙŠÙƒ Ø¨ÙŠØ¬ - ØªØºØ·ÙŠØ© Ù…Ø«Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© ÙˆØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ…
description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with the **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Concealer 055 Classic Beige**. This multi-tasking liquid concealer is your ultimate solution for covering blemishes, brightening dark circles, and evening out skin tone. Achieve precise full coverage with its super-sized, soft-touch wand that offers complete control for application, whether it's on small imperfections, under-eye brightening, or all-over face coverage. Its buildable, high-pigment formula glides on smoothly and blends perfectly into the skin, creating a brighter, smoother, and more even complexion. The color corrector lasts all day, so you can say goodbye to breakouts, discolouration, redness, pigmentation, acne scars, and visible pores. Enjoy perfect skin that looks refreshed and radiant all the time.

Product Features:
â­ A liquid concealer that effectively covers imperfections.
â­ Lightweight and non-greasy formula that doesn't smudge, cake, or flake.
â­ Supersized soft-touch wand allows for precise application.
â­ Provides up to 24 hours of hydration effect.
â­ Crease-proof, transfer-proof, and waterproof.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Concealer 055 Classic Beige**:
â­ Step 1: Using fingertips or a concealer brush, lightly tap and blend out the formula for a seamless finish.
â­ Step 2: To set your base in place, dust a finishing powder over the concealer and foundation to lock them in.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Concealer 055 Classic Beige**:
â­ Buildable, high-pigment formula.
â­ Delivers up to 24-hours' hydration effect.

#Rimmel #Concealer #Makeup #FullCoverage #FlawlessSkin #EyeMakeup #Hydration #SaudiMakeup #UndereyeCorrector #RimmelConcealer

description_en:
Discover the perfect look with **Rimmel Stay Matte Pressed Powder**, designed to give you a lightweight, mattifying, and long-lasting coverage that enhances your skin's natural beauty. This powder offers superior shine control for up to 6 hours, ensuring a fresh and shine-free complexion all day long. Its unique formula is free from oils and parabens, making it suitable for all skin types and providing a comfortable, refreshing feel.

â­ Perfect lightweight, mattifying, and long-lasting coverage.
â­ Enhances skin's beauty and provides natural vitality.
â­ Controls shine for 6 hours.
â­ Free from oils and parabens to suit all skin types.
â­ Feather-light texture that doesn't feel heavy on the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Stay Matte Pressed Powder**:
â­ Apply a light dusting with a brush and blend onto skin to set your foundation and create a true matte look.
â­ Use it to touch up shine as needed throughout the day with a puff.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Stay Matte Pressed Powder**:
â­ Oil-free formula.
â­ Paraben-free.
â­ Provides shine control.

#Rimmel #RimmelMakeup #FacePowder #SaudiMakeup #MattePowder #SkinCare #FlawlessCoverage #MakeupSetting #SaudiBeauty #BeautyEssentials

description_en:
Experience rich color and deep hydration with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick**, featuring a captivating satin finish. Its vegan formula, enriched with natural extracts, delivers soft, supple, and comfortable lips all day long. It glides on effortlessly, providing high-pigment color in a single swipe, while ensuring no flaking, cracking, or crumbling. Designed to complement all skin tones, it gives you a radiant and alluring look.

â­ Bold, vibrant color in one swipe.
â­ Instant hydration that lasts all day.
â­ Ultra-creamy, weightless formula.
â­ Does not flake, crack, or crumble.
â­ Vegan formula with skin-loving ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick**:
â­ Step 1: Line and define your lips with a lip liner.
â­ Step 2: Apply your favorite shade directly from the bullet for a bold-impact satin lip color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick**:
â­ Castor Seed Oil.
â­ Coconut Oil.
â­ Shea Butter.
â­ Magnolia Bark Extract.
â­ Panthenol.
â­ Sodium Hyaluronate.
â­ Sunflower Seed Oil.
â­ Free from parabens and mineral oils.

#RimmelLondon #SaudiMakeup #LipstickAddict #BeautySaudi #KSAbeauty #LongLastingLipstick #SatinFinish #MakeupGoals #LipCare #MustHaveMakeup

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…ÙŠÙ„ØªÙŠ ØªØ§Ø³ÙƒØ± Ø¨ÙŠØªØ± Ø°Ø§Ù† ÙÙ„ØªØ±ÙŠØ² 001 ÙÙŠØ±
description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters 001 Fair**. This innovative 3-in-1 product acts as a primer, highlighter, and glow booster, giving you a radiant, blemish-free complexion, just like using beauty filters. It comes in 8 skin-adapting shades.

â­ Face filter primer in one.
â­ Wear it alone, mixed, underneath, or above your base for the ultimate look.
â­ Lightweight, blendable formula infused with skin-loving ingredients like natural biopeptides and Vitamin C.
â­ Delivers anti-aging and antioxidant benefits in just 4 weeks!
â­ Features light-reflecting pigments that give skin a perfectly lit and smooth glow.
â­ Available in 8 skin-adapting shades.
â­ Cruelty-free.
â­ Vegan.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters 001 Fair**:
â­ Wear alone for a healthy, natural glow.
â­ Apply under makeup as a tinted, glowy primer.
â­ Mix with your favorite skincare or foundation for a more radiant finish.
â­ Wear over your base as a highlighter to emphasize facial features.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters 001 Fair**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Isododecane, Mica, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Sodium Chloride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Boron Nitride, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Propylene Carbonate, Panthenol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Methicone, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Pantolactone, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

#SaudiMakeup #Foundation #Highlighter #Primer #NaturalGlow #FaceFilter #Rimmel #HealthySkin #FaceMakeup #SaudiBeauty

title_en: Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation - 50 Sand
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ø§Ù„ØªÙŠ ØªØ§Ø³ÙƒØ± ÙˆÙŠÙƒÙŠ Ù…ÙŠ Ø£Ø¨ ÙƒÙˆÙ†Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ø± ÙˆÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø§Ø³Ø§Ø³ - 50 Ø³Ø§Ù†Ø¯
description_en:
Discover the secret to refreshed skin with **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation** in shade 50 Sand. This innovative Rimmel product combines the power of foundation and concealer to give you visibly awake and revitalized skin. Its buildable formula offers perfect coverage with a radiant finish, powered by potent ingredients that awaken, brighten, and even out skin tone. It features a unique cooling metallic applicator designed to contour and massage the skin, providing a refreshing sensation, reducing puffiness, and sculpting facial features. Achieve a healthy, vibrant complexion with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**
â­ Contour and massage with the cooling metallic applicator on this **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation** that works like a facial tool. Can be used in targeted areas or all over the face for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**
â­ Caffeine: To wake up skin and give it vitality.
â­ Vitamin C: To brighten and even out skin tone.
â­ 2% Niacinamide: To promote skin firmness and improve overall appearance.
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Isododecane, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Niacinamide, Tri(Polyglyceryl-3/Lauryl) Hydrogenated Trilinoleate, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Triethyl Citrate, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Mica, Sodium Chloride, Caffeine, Silica, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Sodium Benzoate, Methicone, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

#Rimmel #Foundation #Concealer #Makeup #Beauty #WakeMeUp #RadiantSkin #SaudiMakeup #RiyadhBeauty #FaceMakeup

title_en: Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex 450 Majesty - Extreme 3D Shine

description_en:
Achieve a bold, unstoppable look with **Rimmel Thrillseeker** Lip Latex, delivering extreme 3D latex shine and unshakeable color in a single swipe.

This liquid lipstick drenches lips in vivid, intense color with a lasting lip stain, providing instant shine, a hit of hydration, and all-day comfort with an ultra-smooth finish.

Experience a lightweight, lip-loving vegan formula infused with Aloe Vera, Hyaluronic Acid, and Vitamin E, ensuring a smooth shine and leaving lips feeling hydrated.

â­ Extreme 3D latex shine.
â­ Unstoppable color in one swipe.
â­ Delivers instant shine and all-day comfort.
â­ Ultra-smooth finish.
â­ Lightweight, nourishing vegan formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Thrillseeker**:
â­ Use the diamond-shaped applicator for a sharp line and full application in one swipe.
â­ Glides on evenly for a bold, unstoppable look.
â­ Easy-grip bottle with a soft-touch finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Thrillseeker**:
â­ Aloe Vera.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ Vitamin E.

description_en:
Achieve a flawless look with **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish** in Dark Blue 720. This polish offers a unique experience with just one stroke for rich color, a protective base, and a long-lasting super shine. Thanks to its innovative 3-in-1 technology, it unifies nail color, provides a captivating shine, and dries in under a minute.

â­ Delivers rich, high-shine color in a single stroke.
â­ 3-in-1 formula: base coat, color, and glossy top coat.
â­ Dries ultra-fast in under 60 seconds.
â­ Long-lasting wear, resisting chips and fading for up to 10 days.
â­ Elegant and trendy dark blue shade suitable for all occasions.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish**:
â­ Apply one coat to nails with an upward stroke.
â­ For a more intense color finish, add an extra coat after the first has dried.
â­ Ensure the bottle is tightly closed after use to maintain product quality.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Sec Super Shine Nail Polish**:
â­ Butyl Acetate
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Phthalic Anhydride/Hexanal/Ncopentyl Glycol/Copolymer.
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol.
â­ May Contain: Iron Oxides, Titanium Dioxide, Yellow 5 Lake, Blue 1, Red 34, etc.

#RimmelNailPolish #NailPolish #NailMakeup #DarkBlue #RimmelLondon #NailCare #HomeSalon #SaudiFashion #SaudiBeauty #QuickMakeup

description_en:
Achieve an extreme 3D latex shine with unstoppable color in just one swipe with the **Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex 250 Honey-Bun**. This liquid lipstick drenches your lips in intense, vivid color with a long-lasting lip stain, delivering instant shine, a boost of hydration, and comfort that lasts all day with an ultra-smooth finish.

**ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex 250 Honey-Bun**
â­ In just one swipe, the color glides on evenly.
â­ The diamond-like applicator ensures a sharp line and full application for a bold, unstoppable look.
â­ The easy-grip bottle with a soft-touch finish makes it easy to hold and less likely to slip from your hands.

**ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex 250 Honey-Bun**
â­ Lightweight, lip-loving vegan formula.
â­ Infused with Aloe Vera for added moisture.
â­ Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid for plumper-looking lips.
â­ Contains Vitamin E to nourish your lips.
â­ Provides a smooth shine and leaves lips hydrated.

description_en:
Master the art of shaping and defining your brows with the Rimmel London Professional Eyebrow Pencil. This pencil is your perfect makeup bag essential for quickly enhancing and refining your brow shape like a pro. Its pigmented formula allows you to fill in gaps or lengthen the brow's arc to create your desired look. Effortlessly groom and shape your brows with the integrated brush for easy styling.

â­ Long-lasting color that doesn't smudge.
â­ Ophthalmologist tested.
â­ Available in 3 shades: Hazel, Dark Brown, and Black Brown.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Professional Eyebrow Pencil Dark 7209002**
â­ Step 1: Brush through and fluff up eyebrows with the **Rimmel Professional Eyebrow Pencil Dark 7209002**'s built-in brush.
â­ Step 2: Etch into brows to fill in any gaps with precision.
â­ Step 3: Follow your natural brow shape as a guide, define your arches, lengthen brows, and sculpt them according to your desired look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Professional Eyebrow Pencil Dark 7209002**
â­ Enhances and shapes your eyebrows with precision.
â­ Easy-to-sharpen brow pencil.
â­ Comfortable to apply and wear for extended comfort.
â­ Non-sticky formula for a pleasant feel.
â­ Built-in brush applicator for perfect application and styling.

description_en:
Discover healthy, shiny nails with **Rimmel Kind & Free Nail Polish** in the captivating shade 150 Oxygen Wave. Our clean, 100% vegan formula, free from fragrance*, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients, delivers rich color and superior shine while keeping your nails healthy. Achieve a natural, stunning look with every application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Nail Polish**
â­ Step 1: Starting with clean nails, paint nails with 3 strokes from base to tip: 1 per side and 1 in the middle.
â­ Step 2: Once dry, apply a 2nd coat if needed, allow to dry and apply a topcoat for dazzling shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Nail Polish**
â­ Ethyl acetate
â­ Butyl acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic acid/neopentyl glycol/trimellitic anhydride copolymer
â­ Acetyl

title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ ÙƒØ§ÙŠÙ†Ø¯ & ÙØ±ÙŠ Ù…Ù† Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ - 010 ÙÙŠØ± | Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ© Ø®Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© Ù…Ù† Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø·ÙˆØ±
description_en:
**Rimmel Kind & Free Pressed Powder - 010 Fair** is your go-to for a clean, healthy-looking complexion. This 100% vegan and kind-to-animals pressed powder offers a lightweight, natural finish without compromises. Free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients, **Rimmel Kind & Free Pressed Powder - 010 Fair** delivers a fresh, natural-looking glow. Experience makeup that feels as good as it looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Pressed Powder - 010 Fair**

*   Swirl a fluffy brush across the powder and gently sweep across areas of the face you want to mattify, typically the forehead, nose & chin.
*   Alternatively, sweep a powder sponge across the powder and tap onto the face. Can be used to set under-eye make-up.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Pressed Powder - 010 Fair**

*   100% vegan formula.
*   Fragrance-free.
*   Free from mineral oils.
*   Free from animal-derived ingredients.
*   Mica, Kaolin, Zinc Stearate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Tapioca Starch, Isopropyl Palmitate, Calcium Silicate, Dimethicone, Aqua/Water/Eau, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice.

#RimmelPowder #VeganMakeup #FacePowder #RimmelLondon #SaudiMakeup #HealthySkin #NaturalMakeup #Cosmetics #GlowingSkin #Skincare

description_en:
Wake up to revitalized skin with **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**, the ultimate solution for tired complexions. This revolutionary product brightens, corrects, and revives your skin in one step, leaving it looking radiant and refreshed. It features a buildable formula for perfect coverage and a radiant finish, infused with caffeine to awaken skin, vitamin C to brighten and even skin tone, and 2% niacinamide to promote firmer-looking skin. It comes with an innovative facial tool-inspired applicator, designed to target specific areas or your entire face effectively. Experience the difference **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation** can make in your beauty routine.

**Product Features:**
â­ It contours and massages with a cooling, refreshing feeling.
â­ Skin looks depuffed and continuously refreshed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**:
â­ Contour and massage the skin with the integrated cooling metallic applicator. This tool acts as a comprehensive facial tool to enhance skin health.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Isododecane, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Niacinamide, Tri(Polyglyceryl-3/Lauryl) Hydrogenated Trilinoleate, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Triethyl Citrate, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Mica, Sodium Chloride, Caffeine, Silica, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Sodium Benzoate, Methicone, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

title_en: Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 154 Shell Yeah!
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 60 Ø³ÙƒÙ†Ø¯Ø³ Ø³Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙŠÙ…Ø± - 154 Ø´ÙŠÙ„ ÙŠØ§Ù‡
description_en:
Get super-glossy, ultra-shiny nails with a single sweep using **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 154 Shell Yeah!** This quick-dry nail polish delivers high-impact colour with a super-shiny finish. Enjoy flawless, chip-resistant colour for up to 10 days of wear. The precision brush locks in superior colour with a quick, down-and-out motion, drying in just 60 seconds so you're ready to hit the town without missing a beat.

Celebrate creativity with these fun, flirty, and flirty or shimmering neutral shades to add a special touch to your look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 154 Shell Yeah!**

â­ Glide on your shade of nail polish in one stroke and wait 60 seconds for colour to set.
â­ Apply a top coat to maintain colour and moisture while adding shine.
â­ This nail polish can be easily removed with an oil-based makeup remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 154 Shell Yeah!**

â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Tosylamide/epoxy Resin, Styrene/acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Silica, Triphenyl Phosphate, Adipic Acid/neopentyl Glycol/ Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Aqua/water/eau, Diacetone Alcohol, Etocrylene, Kaolin, Glycidyl Neodecanoate/ Phthalic Anhydride/tmp Crosspolymer, Mek, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Acrylates/ Dimethicone Copolymer, Isosorbide Dicaprylate/caprate, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Phosphoric Acid, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, N- Butyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Tocopheryl Acetate, Benzophenone-1, Cetyl Peg/ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Polyvinyl Butyral, Polybutylene Glycol/mdi Copolymer, Acetone, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyethylene, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Hydrolyzed Conchiolin Protein, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Tin Oxide, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-:mica, D&c Yellow No. 11 (CI 47000), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), D&c Red No. 7 Calcium Lake (CI 15850), Fd&c Yellow No. 5 Aluminum Lake (CI 19140), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Aluminum Powder (CI 77000), D&c Red No. 6 Barium Lake (CI 15850), Fd&c Blue No. 1 Aluminum Lake (CI 42090), D&c Red No. 34 Calcium Lake (CI 15880), Ferric Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), D&c Violet No. 2 (CI 60725)].

description_en:
Discover the secret to perfect brows with the **Rimmel Kind & Free Dual Ended Brow Definer 005 Chocolate**. This is Rimmelâ€™s first clean, dual-ended eyebrow pencil, meticulously designed to give you bold yet natural-looking eyebrows. Its ultra-fine 1.7mm tip makes creating precise, hair-like strokes easier than ever, while the integrated spoolie brush allows for seamless blending for a polished, groomed finish. 

This luxurious vegan formula, dedicated to brow care, is infused with certified organic shea butter and biotin to nourish, thicken, and define your brows like never before. The **Rimmel Kind & Free Dual Ended Brow Definer 005 Chocolate** is an indispensable tool for enhancing your brow's natural beauty in an attractive way. It's kind to animals and free from added fragrances and mineral oils.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Dual Ended Brow Definer 005 Chocolate**
â­ Start by defining the under-brow arch, then outline the upper arch.
â­ Use the integrated spoolie brush to comb and blend the color for a natural, cohesive look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Dual Ended Brow Definer 005 Chocolate**
â­ Certified Organic Shea Butter: For hydrating and nourishing brows.
â­ Biotin: To strengthen and thicken brow hair.
â­ Ultra-fine tip (1.7mm): For drawing precise, natural-looking hair strokes.
â­ Integrated spoolie brush: For blending color and grooming brows.

#SaudiMakeup #PerfectBrows #RimmelLondon #BrowDefiner #BrowPencil #EyeMakeup #SaudiBeauty #VeganBeauty #NaturalMakeup #SheaButter

description_en:
Want the London look? All eyes on you! The **Rimmel Magnif'Eyes Spice Edition** is an 12-shade ALL IN ONE eyeshadow, liner, and highlighter palette designed to create endless combinations of looks. Its high-shimmer, ultra-smooth, and blendable formula provides a velvety finish that doesn't crease, making it perfect for both day and night. This dermatologist-tested palette is your go-to for creating striking to subtle eye looks wherever you are.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Magnif'Eyes Spice Edition**:
â­ Choose a light shade to highlight or use as a base over the entire lid.
â­ Choose a medium shade to deepen the outer corner and blend.
â­ For a precise line along the lash line, apply a dark shade wet.
â­ The **Rimmel Magnif'Eyes Spice Edition** is your perfect on-the-go product for creating versatile eye looks.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Magnif'Eyes Spice Edition**:
â­ High-quality pressed eyeshadow powder.
â­ Velvety smooth, easily blendable formula.
â­ Contains shimmering and matte shades for all looks.
â­ Dermatologist-tested.

title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø¨Ø±ÙˆÙ†Ø²Ø± Ù†Ø§ØªØ´ÙˆØ±Ø§Ù„ Ù…Ù† Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ù†Ø¯Ù† - Ø¯Ø±Ø¬Ø© 002
description_en:
Discover the magic of natural radiance with **Rimmel London Natural Bronzer Powder**, specially formulated to give your skin a healthy and captivating bronze hue. Its ultra-fine formula glides onto the skin effortlessly, mimicking the perfect sunkissed tan and a natural bronzed glow for a radiant look.

This versatile powder features a delicate blend of natural pigments and an unparalleled lightness, making you feel as if you're wearing no makeup at all. It's the ideal choice for achieving skin that looks healthy and glowing all day long. Give your skin a touch of sunshine with **Rimmel London Natural Bronzer Powder**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel London Natural Bronzer Powder**:
â­ Use a soft brush to apply the powder to areas you wish to highlight, such as the tops of the cheeks, the bridge of the nose, and the forehead.
â­ Blend the powder well for a natural and graduated look.
â­ Can be used to contour facial features or add a bronzed touch to the entire face.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel London Natural Bronzer Powder**:
â­ Talc, Mica, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Magnesium Stearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Polybutene, Methylparaben, Tocopheryl Acetate, Propylparaben, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Paraffinum Liquidum/Mineral Oil/Huile Minerale, Parfum/Fragrance, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool.

#RimmelLondon #NaturalBronzer #SunKissedGlow #MakeupSaudi #HealthySkin #FaceMakeup #BeautyProducts #BronzerPowder #MakeupAddict #RadiantComplexion

description_en:
Experience perfectly moisturized lips with a dewy kiss of color with the **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm**. This hydrating balm nourishes and conditions, gliding on effortlessly with a buttery texture and a sheer, lightweight finish. It features a clean, 100% vegan, and cruelty-free formula, housed in sustainable FSC-certified packaging with at least 30% post-consumer recycled content.

Product Features:
â­ Hydrates and nourishes lips effectively.
â­ Provides natural-looking color and a healthy sheen.
â­ 100% vegan and cruelty-free formula for safe care.
â­ Buttery texture that glides on smoothly.
â­ Eco-friendly and sustainable packaging.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ Apply directly to your lips.
â­ Reapply as needed throughout the day for continuous hydration and color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ Vegan skincare formula.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients for lip nourishment.
â­ Cruelty-free.

#Rimmel #LipBalm #TintedLipBalm #SaudiMakeup #HydratedLips #LipCare #VeganBeauty #CrueltyFree #NaturalMakeup #Moisturizing

description_en:
Achieve a stunning, glossy finish in seconds with **Rimmel 60 Sec Rg Berries And Cream#340- Mauve** nail polish. This innovative formula delivers ultra-shiny color, a base coat, and a glossy top coat all in one stroke, allowing you to be on your way in no time. Its quick-drying properties make it perfect for your fast-paced lifestyle.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Sec Rg Berries And Cream#340- Mauve**:
â­ Apply one stroke to your nails.
â­ For a more intense color finish, apply an extra coat.
â­ Dries in under a minute for maximum convenience.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Sec Rg Berries And Cream#340- Mauve**:
â­ 3-in-1 Colour Technology: Ultra-shiny colour, base coat, and glossy top coat.
â­ Super-fast drying technology.
â­ Long-lasting wear, resists chips and fading for up to 10 days.

description_en:
Achieve a flawless base with the **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Primer**, a lightweight and breathable gel-texture primer that offers all-day gripping power. This vegan formula, enriched with Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid, instantly hydrates, smooths, and enhances your complexion, allowing your skin to breathe without clogging pores. It's perfect for prepping skin for makeup or as a daily gel moisturiser.

â­ The **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Primer** provides all-day gripping power.
â­ Lightweight gel texture for ultimate comfort.
â­ Vegan formula with Vitamin C & Hyaluronic Acid for hydration and nourishment.
â­ Smoothing effect for an enhanced complexion.
â­ Instant hydration for skin that breathes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Primer**

â­ Step 1: Apply to clean skin.
â­ Step 2: Wear under makeup or on its own as a gel moisturiser.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Primer**

â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, PVP, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Beheneth-25 Methacrylate Crosspolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Hyaluronate, Arginine, Blue 1 (CI 42090)

description_en:
Achieve a healthy, clean, and naturally radiant look with **Rimmel Kind & Free** pressed powder. Our first clean makeup that works, this lightweight pressed powder delivers a fresh, natural-looking glow. It's 100% vegan and kind to animals, formulated without fragrance, mineral oils, or animal-derived ingredients, making it gentle on your skin and compassionate towards animals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ Step 1: Swirl a fluffy brush across the powder and gently sweep across areas of the face you want to mattify, usually the forehead, nose & chin.
â­ Step 2: Alternatively, sweep a powder sponge across the powder and tap onto face. Can be used to set under-eye make-up.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ Mica, Kaolin, Zinc Stearate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Tapioca Starch, Isopropyl Palmitate, Calcium Silicate, Dimethicone, Aqua/Water/Eau, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)].

#Rimmel #KindAndFree #VeganMakeup #NaturalGlow #CleanBeauty #SaudiBeauty #FacePowder #LightweightMakeup #FragranceFree #CrueltyFreeMakeup

description_en:
Discover summer vibes with **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 153 Under The Palms**, the perfect nail polish that delivers high-impact color with an ultra-shiny finish in a single stroke. Its quick-drying formula ensures a flawless look in just 60 seconds, making it the ideal choice for modern women who value style and speed.

â­ Quick-drying formula ensures a flawless look in 60 seconds.
â­ High-impact color with an ultra-shiny finish.
â­ Chip and fade-resistant for up to 10 days of radiant wear.
â­ One-stroke precise application for ease of use.
â­ Celebrate your creativity with fun, shimmering colors.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 153 Under The Palms**:
â­ Apply the color to your nails with a single downward stroke.
â­ Let it dry for just one minute.
â­ For more intense color payoff, add another coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 153 Under The Palms**:
â­ ETHYL ACETATE, BUTYL ACETATE, NITROCELLULOSE, ACETYL TRIBUTYL CITRATE.
â­ ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL, TOSYLAMIDE/EPOXY RESIN, STYRENE/ACRYLATES COPOLYMER.
â­ SILICA, STEARALKONIUM BENTONITE, TRIPHENYL PHOSPHATE, ADIPIC ACID/NEOPENTYL GLYCOL/TRIMELLITIC ANHYDRIDE COPOLYMER.
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU, DIACETONE ALCOHOL, ETOCRYLENE, KAOLIN, ACETONE.
â­ [May Contain/ Peut Contenir/+/-: MICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE, IRON OXIDES, ALUMINUM POWDER, D&C Red Lakes, FD&C Yellow Lakes, etc.]

description_en: Achieve a flawless manicure in seconds with **Rimmel 60 Seconds Super Shine Nail Polish**. This innovative formula delivers vibrant black color with a base and protective glossy top coat in just one stroke. Enjoy a super shiny finish that dries in under a minute, perfect for your busy lifestyle. **Rimmel 60 Seconds Super Shine Nail Polish** offers long-lasting wear and chip resistance for up to 10 days, ensuring your nails look impeccable from day to night. Embrace the London look with this essential nail polish.

Achieve perfectly defined lips with the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 790 - Light Brown**. This lip liner offers precise application with its creamy, gliding texture, ensuring a seamless definition that lasts all day. The **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 790 - Light Brown** complements any lipstick with its 14 vibrant shades. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 790 - Light Brown**:
â­ Outline your lips with a precise line.
â­ Gently blend for a softer finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 790 - Light Brown**:

description_en:
Define your lips with precision using the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner**. Its long-lasting formula ensures your lip definition stays put all day, while the creamy, glide-on texture allows for effortless application and seamless blending. Available in 14 vibrant shades to perfectly match your favorite lipstick.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner**:
â­ Outline your lips with the pencil for a defined shape.
â­ Use it to fill in your lips completely for a lipstick-like finish.
â­ For best results, use the tip of the pencil for a precise line.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner**:
â­ Creamy and blendable formula.
â­ High-pigment for rich color payoff.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients to keep lips soft.

description_en:
Discover clean beauty with **Rimmel Kind & Free** Nail Polish, our first clean makeup that works. 100% vegan & kind to animals, this formula is free from fragrance*, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients. **Rimmel Kind & Free** delivers brilliant shine, rich color, and healthy-looking nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free**
â­ Step 1: Starting with clean nails, paint nails with 3 strokes from base to tip: 1 per side and 1 in the middle.
â­ Step 2: Once dry, apply a 2nd coat if needed, allow to dry, and apply a topcoat for dazzling shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free**
â­ Ethyl acetate
â­ Butyl acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic acid/neopentyl glycol/trimellitic anhydride copolymer
â­ Acetyl

description_en:
Achieve your ultimate lip goal with **Rimmel London Lasting Finish Lipstick**. This creamy lipstick boasts a long-lasting formula that creates the perfect lip look in seconds. Simply glide it onto your lips to veil your pout in highly-pigmented, vibrant color that stays put for up to eight hours, ensuring a flawless finish without constant touch-ups.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel London Lasting Finish Lipstick**

â­ Step 1: Line and define your lip shape with an easy-to-use lip liner.
â­ Step 2: Sweep your shade of **Rimmel London Lasting Finish Lipstick** onto lips straight from the bullet for bold, flawless color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel London Lasting Finish Lipstick**

â­ Creamy, pigment-rich formula.
â­ Hydrating, long-lasting ingredients.
â­ Professional finish.

description_en:
Discover unparalleled softness with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 007 Golden Beige**. This lightweight, soft-touch powder foundation offers buildable, natural-looking coverage that controls shine without drying out your skin, ensuring a radiant look all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 007 Golden Beige**
â­ Use the included brush or applicator sponge to apply the powder all over your face.
â­ Start with a small amount and blend to achieve desired coverage.
â­ Can be used for on-the-go makeup touch-ups.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 007 Golden Beige**
â­ Fine powder for a silky-smooth finish.
â­ Lightweight vegan formula that controls shine.
â­ Transfer-proof, sweat, and water-resistant for long-lasting wear.
â­ Dermatologist-tested and suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Non-comedogenic and suitable for all skin types.

#Rimmel #RimmelFoundation #JeddahBeauty #FullCoverage #FacePowder #SaudiMakeup #BeautyBlogger #Cosmetics #Skincare #ForYou

title_en: Rimmel Multitasker Bundle - Primer, Refreshing Mist & Setting Spray
title_ar: Ø¨Ø§Ñ˜ÙƒØ© Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…ØªØ¹Ø¯Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù‡Ø§Ù… - Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙŠÙ…Ø±ØŒ Ø¨Ø®Ø§Ø® Ù…Ù†Ø¹Ø´ØŒ ÙˆØ¨Ø®Ø§Ø® ØªØ«Ø¨ÙŠØª
description_en:
Achieve flawless makeup with the Rimmel Multitasker Bundle, the ultimate solution for priming, refreshing, and setting your makeup for long-lasting perfection.

ğŸŒŸ Product Features:
â­ 3-in-1 Functionality: Acts as a primer to prepare the skin, a refreshing mist to revive your complexion, and a setting spray to ensure makeup stays put all day.
â­ Infused with Cucumber and Chamomile extracts to deeply nourish and hydrate the skin, providing an immediate feeling of freshness.
â­ Oil-free and vegan formula, making it suitable for all skin types.
â­ Improves the appearance of dull and dry skin, enhancing its radiance and vitality.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel** Multitasker:
â­ Before Makeup: Spray onto clean skin as a primer to prep the skin for better makeup application.
â­ During Makeup: Use to refresh and update your makeup look throughout the day.
â­ After Makeup: Spray as a final step to set your makeup and ensure it lasts for hours without smudging or fading.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel** Multitasker:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Alcohol Denat., Butylene Glycol, Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Glycerin, Parfum/Fragrance, Caprylyl Glycol, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Pca, Urea, Sorbic Acid, Propylene Glycol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Trehalose, Hexylene Glycol, Limonene, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Polyquaternium-51, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Geraniol, Citronellol, Triacetin, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hydroxycitronellal, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Hyaluronate.

#SaudiMakeup #RimmelLondon #SettingSpray #MakeupPrimer #Cosmetics #Skincare #Beauty #FaceMakeup #Hydration #ProMakeup

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ø§ÙŠ Ù„ØªÙŠÙ†Ø¬ Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙŠÙ…Ø± ÙˆÙ‡Ø§ÙŠÙ„Ø§ÙŠØªØ± 005
description_en:
Discover the ultimate skin glow with **Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters 005 Medium**. This innovative 3-in-1 product acts as a primer, highlighter, and glow booster, giving you a filter-free, flawless skin appearance. Wear it your way for the ultimate skin glow, available in 8 skin-adapting shades. Say goodbye to social media filters! With **Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters 005 Medium**, achieve a naturally radiant complexion. It's the perfect face primer for an illuminated finish. Use it alone for a healthy glow, under makeup as a tinted, glowy primer, mix it with your favorite skincare or foundation for a more radiant finish, or apply it over your base as a highlighter. Its lightweight, blendable formula is infused with skin-loving ingredients like natural biopeptides and Vitamin C, offering anti-ageing and antioxidant benefits in just 4 weeks. Light-reflecting pigments give the skin a perfectly lit and smooth glow. Plus, it's cruelty-free and vegan.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters 005 Medium**
â­ Wear alone for a healthy, natural glow.
â­ Wear under makeup as a tinted, glowy primer.
â­ Mix with your favorite skincare or foundation for a more radiant finish.
â­ Apply over your base as a highlighter to accentuate features.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters 005 Medium**
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Isododecane, Mica, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Sodium Chloride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Boron Nitride, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Propylene Carbonate, Panthenol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Methicone, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Pantolactone, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

#RiyadhMakeup #SkinGlow #Primer #Highlighter #OOTD #BeautyProducts #Skincare #NaturalBeauty #MakeupBrands #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Define your lips with precision and long-lasting color using the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 120 - Perfect Pink**. This exceptional lip liner offers a creamy, gliding texture for a seamless application that perfectly outlines and shapes your lips, ensuring a flawless look that lasts all day.

â­ Creamy, smooth formula for effortless, precise application.
â­ Vibrant pink shade complements a wide range of lipsticks.
â­ Delivers up to 12 hours of defined, beautiful lips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 120 - Perfect Pink**

â­ Outline your lips with a fine line along the natural lip contour.
â­ Gently blend the color using your fingertip or a lip brush.
â­ Use before or after applying lipstick for enhanced definition.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 120 - Perfect Pink**

â­ Paraffinum Liquidum
â­ Candelilla Cera
â­ Copernicia Cerifera Cera
â­ Ozokerite
â­ Mica

description_en:
Achieve stunning, long-lasting lip color with **Rimmel Lasting Provocalaps** in 220 Come Up Roses. This unique lipstick delivers vibrant color and a glossy finish that stays put for up to 16 hours, resisting transfer, food, and kisses. Enjoy a simple two-step application for a lively hue that's lightweight and adapts to your lip's movements. Make your lips the center of attention with confidence, thanks to **Rimmel Lasting Provocalaps**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Provocalaps**:
â­ Apply the color and keep lips apart for 60 seconds to set.
â­ Apply the top coat to lock in color and moisture while adding shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Provocalaps**:
â­ ISODODECANE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, DIMETHICONE.
â­ C9-13 ISOPARAFFIN, DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE, BARIUM SULFATE / CI 77120.
â­ ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE, PROPYLENE CARBONATE, SILICA.
â­ RICINUS COMMUNIS (CASTOR) SEED OIL, CERA ALBA/BEESWAX.
â­ TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, ALCOHOL, TOCOPHEROL.
â­ PHENOXYETHANOL, TIN OXIDE, BENZOIC ACID.
â­ [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: MICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE, IRON OXIDES, D&C RED].

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ù†Ø¯Ù† Ø³ÙƒÙ†Ø¯Ù„ Ø§ÙŠØ² Ù‚Ù„Ù… ÙƒØ­Ù„ Ø§ÙˆØªÙˆ Ù„Ø§ÙŠÙ†Ø± 004 - Ø£Ø²Ø±Ù‚ Ø³Ù…Ø§ÙˆÙŠ
description_en:
Achieve perfect definition and captivating eyes with **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner 004 - Cobalt Blue**.

The **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner 004 - Cobalt Blue** features a super-smooth, buttery formula that glides on effortlessly, delivering high colour impact for instantly defined and enhanced eyes. It's water-repellent and offers extreme wear for up to 24 hours, ensuring a stable and attractive look all day without smudging or fading. Available in six stunning shades to suit all your looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner 004 - Cobalt Blue**
â­ Apply your shade of Scandaleyes Exaggerate Waterproof Eye Definer to the upper lash line, gliding lightly across from the inner corner to the outer corner of the eye.
â­ Using fingers, lightly blend over the line to smoke eyeliner upwards and outwards.
â­ Retrace eyeliner over the upper lash line to add definition to this smokey look. Then, add mascara to finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner 004 - Cobalt Blue**
â­ Buttery-soft formula.
â­ Water-repellent.
â­ Up to 24-hour extreme wear.
â­ Available in 6 stunning shades.

#EyeMakeup #RimmelKohl #EyeLiner #SaudiMakeup #Lashes #Eyeliner #ProMakeup #SmokeyEyes #RimmelLondon #ScandalEyes

description_en:
Wake up to revitalized skin with the **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**. This foundation makeup brightens, corrects, and revives tired skin, giving you a radiant and healthy glow. It features a buildable formula with a radiant finish, infused with caffeine to wake up skin, vitamin C to brighten and even skin tone, and 2% niacinamide for firmer-looking skin. It comes with an innovative facial tool-inspired applicator designed to contour and massage the skin, providing a cooling and refreshing sensation, leaving skin looking depuffed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**:
â­ Contour and massage with the cooling metallic applicator, which functions like a facial tool.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Isododecane, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Niacinamide, Tri(Polyglyceryl-3/Lauryl) Hydrogenated Trilinoleate, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Triethyl Citrate, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Mica, Sodium Chloride, Caffeine, Silica, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Sodium Benzoate, Methicone, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

description_en:
Make your eyes pop with the **Rimmel Scandaleyes Waterproof Kohl Eyeliner Pencil** in captivating Emerald shade, 06. This eyeliner boasts a unique formula that stays put for up to 24 hours without smudging or fading, giving you a long-lasting, bold look day and night. Designed for ultimate precision, whether you desire a sharp, defined line or a smoky, alluring effect.

â­ Waterproof formula for up to 24-hour wear.
â­ Rich and bold Emerald green color.
â­ Easy to apply for high precision.
â­ Smudge-proof and fade-proof.
â­ Suitable for all occasions.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Scandaleyes Waterproof Kohl Eyeliner Pencil**:
â­ Line your upper and lower lash lines for a complete look.
â­ Use the precise tip to create fine or dramatic lines as desired.
â­ Can be easily blended for a smoky eye effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Scandaleyes Waterproof Kohl Eyeliner Pencil**:
â­ Polyethylene
â­ Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax
â­ Mineral Oil
â­ Isododecane
â­ Beeswax
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ May Contain: Iron Oxides, Titanium Dioxide, Prussian Blue, Chromium Green, Yellow 5 Lake, etc.

description_en:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer**, your go-to for covering blemishes, brightening dark circles, and evening out skin tone for a radiant, uniform look.

The super-sized, soft-touch wand, with its built-in product reservoir, lets you apply precise, full coverage precisely where you need it â€“ on blemishes, under the eyes, or all over the face. The buildable, high-pigment formula glides on and blends seamlessly into the skin, creating a brighter, smoother, and velvety finish that lasts all day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer**
â­ Step 1: Using fingertips or a concealer brush, lightly tap and blend out the formula for a seamless finish.
â­ Step 2: To really set your base into place, dust a finishing powder over the concealer and foundation to lock it all in.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multitasker Concealer**
â­ A liquid concealer that helps cover up imperfections.
â­ The lightweight and non-greasy formula doesnâ€™t smudge, cake or flake.
â­ A supersized soft-touch wand allows for precise application.
â­ The makeup also delivers up to 24-hoursâ€™ hydration effect.
â­ Crease-proof, transfer-proof and waterproof.

description_en:
Wake up tired skin with **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**! Discover an innovative formula that combines buildable foundation coverage with the brightening, corrective power of a concealer, all with a radiant finish that revives your fatigued complexion. Infused with caffeine to wake up skin, vitamin C to brighten and even skin tone, and 2% niacinamide for firmer-looking skin. It features a unique facial tool-inspired applicator, designed to massage and contour targeted areas or provide full-face coverage. Give your skin a boost of freshness and radiance with **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**:
â­ Contour and massage your skin with the cooling metallic applicator for a refreshing sensation.
â­ Use the applicator to massage the face or apply the product to targeted areas.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**:
â­ Formula enriched with caffeine to wake up skin.
â­ Vitamin C to brighten and even skin tone.
â­ 2% Niacinamide for firmer-looking skin.
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Isododecane, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Niacinamide, Tri(Polyglyceryl-3/Lauryl) Hydrogenated Trilinoleate, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Triethyl Citrate, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Mica, Sodium Chloride, Caffeine, Silica, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Sodium Benzoate, Methicone, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)]

description_en:
Achieve naturally perfected brows with the **Rimmel** Brow Pro Micro 24HR Precision-Stroke Pen. This innovative pen features an ultra-fine 0.2mm tip, offering ultimate precision to draw fine, hair-like strokes for naturally perfected brows. Its buildable color allows you to achieve your desired brow intensity, and it's smudge-proof and sweat-proof, ensuring worry-free brows all day long. Live the London Look with **Rimmel**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel** Brow Pro Micro 24HR Precision-Stroke Pen:
â­ For the most natural effect, follow the direction of your brow hairs to create fine, hair-like strokes.
â­ Fill in gaps and shape your brows as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel** Brow Pro Micro 24HR Precision-Stroke Pen:
â­ Smudge-proof and sweat-proof formula.
â­ Ultra-fine 0.2mm tip for hair-like strokes.

description_en:
Capture the edgy flair of London fashion with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick by Kate** â€” the first lipstick collection created by supermodel Kate Moss. Its unique formula delivers up to 8 hours of vibrant colour, thanks to the exclusive Black Diamond pigment complex that reflects light like never before for extraordinary colour that pops. The semi-matte finish provides a beautiful sheen to your lips, making it the ultimate weapon to amp up your style at the office, while shopping, or out with the girls. When you want a high-intensity colour that lasts all day, choose **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick by Kate**. It perfectly captures the flair, edge, and timelessness of the Kate Moss look. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick by Kate**:
â­ Apply directly from the tube for a stunning pout that lasts for hours.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick by Kate**:
â­ Exclusive Black Diamond pigment complex for exceptional light reflection.
â­ Up to 8 hours of wear.
â­ Semi-matte finish with a beautiful sheen.

description_en:
Achieve an captivating glassy finish with **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 350 Pink To The Berry**. This luxurious lip gloss delivers rich color payoff with a mirror-like, ultra-high shine finish, featuring a delightful blend of pink and berry tones for a vibrant, fresh look perfect for any occasion. **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 350 Pink To The Berry** is formulated with a non-sticky texture for comfortable all-day wear, offering superior hydration and a smooth, moisturized feel with a refreshing fruity scent. Whether worn alone for a bold pop of color or layered over your favorite lipstick, it ensures your lips remain plump, glossy, and beautiful.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 350 Pink To The Berry**:
â­ Prep your lips by exfoliating and applying a lip balm.
â­ Apply the gloss using the applicator, starting from the center of the lips and moving outwards for even coverage.
â­ Layer for increased color intensity and shine.
â­ Apply over lipstick to enhance shine and depth.
â­ Reapply as needed throughout the day to maintain gloss and hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 350 Pink To The Berry**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ Antioxidant Berry Complex.

#Rimmel #LipGloss #LipMakeup #GlossyLips #SaudiMakeup #RimmelLondon #Lipstick #LipCare #JeddahMakeup #RiyadhMakeup

description_en:
Revive tired skin with **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**, your ultimate solution for an awakened look! This innovative makeup brightens, corrects, and revives your complexion for a radiant finish. Experience a buildable formula infused with caffeine to energize your skin, Vitamin C to brighten and even out skin tone, and 2% niacinamide for firmer-looking skin. It features a unique facial tool-inspired applicator designed to contour and massage with a cooling sensation, leaving skin looking depuffed and refreshed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**:
â­ Contour and massage with the cooling metallic applicator.
â­ Can be used for targeted areas or all over the face.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Isododecane, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Niacinamide, Tri(Polyglyceryl-3/Lauryl) Hydrogenated Trilinoleate, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Triethyl Citrate, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Mica, Sodium Chloride, Caffeine, Silica, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Sodium Benzoate, Methicone, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)]

title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ù†Ø¯Ù† Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªÙŠÙ†Ø¬ ÙÙŠÙ†ÙŠØ´ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¶ØºÙˆØ·Ø© - 002 Ù„Ø¤Ù„Ø¤ÙŠ - Ø¨ÙŠØ¬
description_en:
Discover flawless, shine-free skin with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder**. This lightweight, soft-touch powder foundation offers medium, buildable coverage with a natural-looking finish that lasts all day. It effectively controls shine without feeling dry on your skin, ensuring comfort throughout the day. The **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder** comes in a convenient, on-the-go compact for easy touch-ups. It's a vegan formula, transfer-proof, sweat & water-resistant, and dermatologist-tested to be suitable for sensitive skin and non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder**:
â­ Step 1: Using the included sponge or a foundation brush, apply the compact powder foundation onto moisturised skin. Start at the centre and blend outwards for a flawless, all-day finish.
â­ Step 2: Use the sponge or brush to build up coverage in areas where you need extra concealment.
â­ Step 3: For the best results, finish with the Lasting Finish Setting Spray to lock your look in place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder**:

Unleash your inner artist with the **Rimmel Eyeshadow Palette Blush Edition (12 Colors) - Brown**. This exquisite palette features 12 richly pigmented brown shades, perfect for crafting a spectrum of looks from subtle daytime glamour to dramatic evening statements. The velvety smooth formula blends effortlessly, delivering intense, long-lasting color payoff.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Eyeshadow Palette Blush Edition (12 Colors) - Brown**:

â­ Blend colors together to create seamless transitions and depth.
â­ Can be applied dry for a soft finish or wet for intensified color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Eyeshadow Palette Blush Edition (12 Colors) - Brown**:

â­ Long-wearing color pigments.
â­ Blendable and buildable formula.

description_en:
Achieve the ultimate shine and captivating color with **Rimmel 60 Seconds Super Shine Nail Polish**. This innovative nail polish delivers a base and a glossy top coat in just one stroke, giving you perfect nails in under a minute. Its long-lasting formula resists chips and fading for up to 10 days, making it your ideal choice for everyday and special occasions. Let your nails sparkle with a touch of Rimmel London.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Seconds Super Shine Nail Polish**:
â­ Apply one stroke to your nails.
â­ For a more intensely colored finish, add an extra coat.
â­ The nail polish dries incredibly quickly, saving you valuable time.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Seconds Super Shine Nail Polish**:
â­ 3 in 1 Colour Technology: Ultra shiny color, base coat, and glossy top coat all in one.
â­ Quick-drying formula.
â­ Provides super shine.

title_en: Rimmel New Match Perfection SPF20 Foundation - No. 100 Ivory
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù†ÙŠÙˆÙ…Ø§ØªØ´ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø£Ø³Ø§Ø³ SPF20 - Ø±Ù‚Ù… 100 Ø¹Ø§Ø¬ÙŠ
description_en:
Achieve flawless skin with **Rimmel New Match Perfection Foundation**. This innovative foundation offers seamless coverage and a natural finish, protecting your skin with SPF20. Experience a smooth, even complexion that lasts all day.

â­ Provides buildable medium-to-full coverage.
â­ Blends effortlessly into the skin for a natural look.
â­ Protects against harmful sun rays with SPF20.
â­ Moisturizes the skin for a comfortable feel.
â­ Available in shade No. 100 Ivory, suitable for various skin tones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel New Match Perfection Foundation**:
â­ Begin with a clean and moisturized face.
â­ Dispense a small amount of **Rimmel New Match Perfection Foundation** onto the back of your hand.
â­ Using your fingertips, a foundation brush, or a sponge, blend the foundation onto your face.
â­ Start from the center of your face and blend outwards with light strokes.
â­ Apply additional layers for more coverage if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel New Match Perfection Foundation**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate
â­ Titanium Dioxide
â­ Glycerin
â­ Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone
â­ Magnesium Sulfate
â­ Rosa Damascena Flower Water
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Parabens
â­ Fragrance

#Rimmel #Foundation #Beauty #Makeup #FlawlessSkin #SaudiBeauty #FaceMakeup #SPF #LongLasting #Cosmetics

description_en:
Achieve the ultimate HD look with the **Rimmel Kind & Free** Clean Eye Definer in Black Pitch. This eyeliner offers an ultra-smooth application experience with a 100% vegan and high-color impact formula, defining your eyes with precision and professionalism. Crafted with Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified wood, it ensures complete environmental consciousness, making it the perfect choice for those seeking beauty and responsibility. 

The **Rimmel Kind & Free** boasts an ultra-creamy and buttery texture that glides effortlessly around the eyes, giving you a captivating and distinctive look. Available in five stunning, prestige-inspired shades, you're sure to look amazing for every occasion. Live the London look with this exceptional eyeliner that instantly defines and enhances eyes with its super-rich, high-color impact.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ Effortlessly glide on the lash line.
â­ Blend out quickly for a soft pigmented look, or leave it as-is for a bold and vibrant cat eye.
â­ Finish with a Rimmel Mascara for extra volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ C10-18 TRIGLYCERIDES, MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX / CERA MICROCRISTALLINA, HYDROGENATED COCONUT OIL, HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, BEHENYL ALCOHOL, RHUS SUCCEDANEA FRUIT WAX, CETYL PALMITATE, SORBITAN PALMITATE, COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX / COPERNICIA CERIFERA CERA, HYDROGENATED COCO-GLYCERIDES, MYRISTYL MYRISTATE, STEARALKONIUM HECTORITE, PROPYLENE CARBONATE, BIOTIN, PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-t-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE.
â­ MAY CONTAIN (+/-): TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), BLUE 1 LAKE (CI 42090), BLACK 2 (CI 77266) [NANO], YELLOW 5 LAKE (CI 19140).

#RimmelEyeliner #KindAndFree #VeganMakeup #BlackEyeliner #EyeDefinition #RimmelLondon #CrueltyFreeBeauty #MakeupSaudi #SaudiMakeup #BeautyEssentials
