title_en: Rimmel Kind & Free Pressed Powder Vegan - 040 Tan
title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ ÙƒØ§ÙŠÙ†Ø¯ & ÙØ±ÙŠ Ù…Ù† Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ - 040 ØªØ§Ù†
description_en:
Rimmel Kind & Free Pressed Powder Vegan - Discover our first clean makeup that works, no compromises. Achieve a healthy, natural-looking finish with this lightweight pressed powder.

â­ 100% vegan & kind to animals.
â­ Free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients.
â­ Delivers a fresh, natural-looking glow and a clean, healthy look.
â­ Lightweight pressed powder to set makeup and control shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Pressed Powder Vegan**:
â­ Step 1: Swirl a fluffy brush across the powder and gently sweep across areas of the face you want to stop shining, usually the forehead, nose & chin.
â­ Step 2: Alternatively, sweep a powder sponge across the powder and tap onto face. Can be used to set under-eye make-up.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Pressed Powder Vegan**:
â­ Mica, Kaolin, Zinc Stearate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Tapioca Starch, Isopropyl Palmitate, Calcium Silicate, Dimethicone, Aqua/Water/Eau, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)].

#RimmelSaudi #VeganMakeup #PressedPowder #CleanBeauty #SaudiBeauty #NaturalGlow #LightweightMakeup #Cosmetics #Skincare #DailyMakeup

description_en: Achieve the iconic London look with **Rimmel Moisture Renew** lipstick in a captivating Vintage Pink shade. This lipstick drenches your lips in a brilliant burst of rich, pure color, infused with a creamy, hydrating formula that pampers and cares for your lips day after day. Enriched with Vitamins A, C, and E, **Rimmel Moisture Renew** provides deep hydration and extra SPF protection, making it the perfect choice for a classic feminine rosy-mauve lip look. With its ultra-creamy soft texture, it glides on effortlessly for a rich, luscious, and irresistible finish. Make **Rimmel Moisture Renew** an essential addition to your daily makeup collection; it's the perfect gift for any lady seeking confidence and allure.

title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ ÙƒØ§ÙŠÙ†Ø¯ & ÙØ±ÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø¨Ø§ØªÙŠØ© - 001 Ø´ÙØ§Ù
description_en:
Achieve a clean and fresh look with **Rimmel Kind & Free Pressed Powder Vegan**. This lightweight pressed powder delivers a healthy, natural finish, and is made with 100% vegan ingredients for a healthy glow without compromise. Free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients, **Rimmel Kind & Free Pressed Powder Vegan** offers comfort and purity for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Pressed Powder Vegan**:
â­ Step 1: Swirl a fluffy brush across the powder and gently sweep across areas of the face you want to control shine, typically the forehead, nose, and chin.
â­ Step 2: Alternatively, sweep a powder sponge across the powder and tap onto the face. Can be used to set under-eye make-up.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Pressed Powder Vegan**:
â­ Mica, Kaolin, Zinc Stearate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Tapioca Starch, Isopropyl Palmitate, Calcium Silicate, Dimethicone, Aqua/Water/Eau, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, [May contain/Peut contenir/+/-:Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)].

#RimmelLondon #KindAndFree #VeganMakeup #CleanBeauty #PressedPowder #TranslucentPowder #SettingPowder #EverydayMakeup #SaudiMakeup #NaturalGlow

description_en:
Discover your lips' best look with the **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 006 Berry**. It leaves your lips perfectly moisturized with a subtle sheen to bolder colors, suitable for all skin tones. With a cruelty-free vegan formula, it nourishes your lips with a soft, buttery texture. FSC certified packaging made with a minimum of 30% recycled content.

â­ Hydrating tinted lip balm that nourishes and conditions lips.
â­ 100% vegan and cruelty-free formula.
â­ Buttery texture glides effortlessly with sheer, lightweight coverage.
â­ Eco-friendly packaging certified by FSC and PCR content.
â­ Available in 5 stunning shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 006 Berry**
â­ Start by lining your lips with a lip pencil.
â­ Top it off with the hydrating **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 006 Berry**, and reapply throughout the day for maximum hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 006 Berry**
â­ Contains nourishing vegan ingredients for lip care.
â­ Clean, 100% vegan formula.

#Rimmel #LipBalm #SaudiMakeup #LipCare #HydratedLips #VeganProducts #NaturalBeauty #CleanMakeup #HealthyLips #RiyadhBeauty

description_en:
Discover luxurious shine with **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 600 - Berry Glace**. This ultra-glossy lip gloss delivers a rich berry shade and an irresistible glassy finish to your lips. Its non-sticky and moisturizing formula ensures all-day comfort with a refreshing fruity scent. Wear it alone for a bold look or as a top coat to enhance your lipstickâ€™s color, making it perfect for any occasion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 600 - Berry Glace**:
â­ Prep your lips by exfoliating and moisturizing.
â­ Apply the gloss starting from the center of your lips and moving outwards.
â­ Layer for increased intensity and shine.
â­ Use over lipstick to enhance color and dimension.
â­ Reapply as needed to maintain freshness and hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 600 - Berry Glace**:
â­ Antioxidant Berry Complex
â­ Hyaluronic Acid

description_en:
Define your lips with precision using **Rimmel Lasting Finish RG Lip Liner 505 - Dynamite Red**. This lip liner offers a flawless finish and long-lasting color, ensuring your lips stay perfectly shaped all day.

âœ¨ **Product Features:**
â­ Delivers a precise, impeccable application.
â­ Long-lasting formula provides up to 12 hours of wear.
â­ Creamy, glide-on texture for seamless application.
â­ Available in 14 vibrant shades to perfectly complement your favorite lipstick.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish RG Lip Liner 505 - Dynamite Red**:
â­ Outline your natural lip line with the pencil tip.
â­ Use to define lips before applying lipstick or lip gloss.
â­ Can also be used to fill in lips for a uniform lip look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish RG Lip Liner 505 - Dynamite Red**:
â­ Mineral Oil, Candelilla Wax, Carnauba Wax, Beeswax, Castor Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850).

description_en:
Discover ultimate volume and length with **Rimmel Kind & Free Lash Loader Mascara 001 Black**.

This mascara revolutionizes your lash game, delivering up to 300% more volume compared to bare lashes. Its 100% vegan formula is enriched with plant-based fibers and aloe leaf for buildable volume, making it specially designed to be gentle on sensitive eyes, ensuring a safe and effective makeup experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Lash Loader Mascara 001 Black**:
â­ Hold the fiber brush against your lashes.
â­ Sweep from root to tip repeatedly until the desired volume and length are achieved.
â­ Apply additional coats for a more dramatic, buildable effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Lash Loader Mascara 001 Black**:
â­ 100% vegan formula enriched with plant-based fibers and aloe leaf for buildable volume.
â­ Organic shea butter and biotin to nourish and condition lashes.
â­ Brush made from 100% bio-based fibers for an eco-friendly application.
â­ Long-lasting, water-resistant wear for up to 36 hours.
â­ Ophthalmologist-tested, suitable for sensitive eyes.

#RimmelMascara #KindAndFree #VoluminousLashes #EyeMakeup #RimmelLondon #BeautyProducts #LongLashes #SensitiveEyesMakeup #SaudiBeauty #BestMascara

description_en:
The Rimmel Kind & Free Clean Tinted Lip Balm leaves your lips perfectly moisturized with a subtle sheen to bolder colors. This product has an inclusive palette that can appeal to all skin tones. More than just hydrating, this cruelty-free and vegan lip balm nourishes and conditions lips gliding on effortlessly with a buttery texture. Available in 5 stunning shades, the packaging is FSC certified and made with an eco-friendly minimum of 30% post-consumer recycled (PCR) content. It's a hydrating tinted lip balm that nourishes and conditions lips while adding a dewy kiss of color. The buttery texture allows it to glide on lips effortlessly with sheer and lightweight coverage. This cruelty-free cosmetic is made with a clean and 100% vegan skin care formula. It's made with FSC certified packaging and an eco-friendly minimum of 30% post-consumer recycled (PCR) content. Available in 5 stunning & inspired shades so you can be sure you'll always look amazing.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 004 Pink**
â­ Start by lining your lips with a lip pencil.
â­ Top it off with the hydrating **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 004 Pink**, and reapply throughout the day for maximum hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 004 Pink**
â­ 100% Vegan Formula
â­ Cruelty-Free
â­ FSC Certified Packaging
â­ Made with min. 30% Post-Consumer Recycled (PCR) Content
â­ Available in 5 stunning shades

description_en:
Define your lips with precision using **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 215 Pink**. This lip liner offers a smooth, glide-on application for perfectly sculpted lips that stay defined all day long. Its creamy texture allows for effortless blending, making it the ideal partner for your favorite lipstick. Available in 14 vibrant shades to seamlessly match your lipstick choice.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 215 Pink**
â­ Begin by outlining your upper lip from the cupid's bow towards the corners.
â­ Repeat the process for your lower lip.
â­ Use the lip liner to fill in your lips entirely or to contour before applying lipstick.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 215 Pink**
â­ Creamy, smooth-glide formula.
â­ Rich, long-lasting color.
â­ For external use only.

description_en:
Discover the secret to naturally radiant skin with **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint Foundation**. Our unique formula is 100% vegan, free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients, giving you a moisturizing skin tint and a healthy-looking complexion.

â­ Deep nourishment and hydration for your skin.
â­ 100% vegan formula, free from fragrance and harmful ingredients.
â­ Provides a natural, even-toned complexion.
â­ Lightweight on the skin, non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint Foundation**
Step 1: Squeeze out a pea-sized amount and apply to skin with your favourite method: fingertips, brush, or sponge. For more coverage, simply apply a little more product until you achieve the desired look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint Foundation**
â­ Aqua/water/eau
â­ Dicaprylyl carbonate
â­ Dicaprylyl ether
â­ Glycerin
â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate
â­ Aluminum starch octenylsuccinate
â­ Ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate
â­ Sodium chloride
â­ Zinc oxide [nano]
â­ Panthenol
â­ Aloe barbadensis leaf juice

description_en:
Achieve a perfect canvas with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Primer - Nude**. This ultra-lightweight primer extends foundation wear for up to 8 hours, ensuring your makeup stays fresh all day. It effectively minimizes the appearance of pores and evens out skin tone, leaving you with a smooth, matte finish without over-drying. Ideal for all skin types, it's your secret weapon for makeup that withstands daily elements like sweat and humidity.

â­ Increases foundation wear by up to 8 hours.
â­ Visibly blurs and minimizes pores, evening out skin tone.
â­ Ultra-lightweight formula for endless comfort on the skin.
â­ Skin looks instantly smoother and appears brightened.
â­ Mattifies without over-drying.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Primer - Nude**
1. After moisturizing, wait 30 seconds for skin to absorb.
2. Blend evenly into the skin, paying attention to the T-zone and under-eye area.
3. Allow the primer to absorb before applying foundation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Primer - Nude**
â­ Skin-perfecting formula for a flawless base.
â­ High-quality ingredients for extended makeup wear.
â­ Gentle formulation that doesn't dry out the skin.

description_en:
Experience bold, long-lasting color with **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips** â€“ the 2-step liquid lipstick that locks in high-impact color and moisture for up to 16 hours.

**Rimmel Lasting Provocalips** delivers transfer-proof, kiss-proof, and life-proof color with an unparalleled shine and hydration. This innovative formula ensures your lipstick stays comfortable, never caking, flaking, or drying out. Enjoy a comfortable, mess-free application with the unique 2-step process featuring a hydrating top coat to lock in your look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**
â­ Step 1: Sweep on the bold, high-impact lip color and keep lips apart for 60 seconds to allow the pigment to set.
â­ Step 2: Complete your look by applying the top coat for shine, moisture, and long-lasting wear.
â­ Available in a vibrant range of 12 shades.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**
â­ Formulated with high-quality ingredients for vibrant, lasting color and continuous hydration.

#RimmelLondon #Lipstick #LongLastingLips #Beauty #Makeup #SaudiBeauty #KissProof #HydratingLipstick #BeautyProducts #LipColor

description_en:
Awaken your tired skin with **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**! This revolutionary product combines the benefits of a concealer and foundation, giving your skin instant brightness and correcting imperfections with a refreshing feel. Its buildable formula and radiant finish are perfect for covering dark circles and evening out skin tone, leaving your face looking more revitalized and lively. It comes with an innovative applicator for massaging and cooling to enhance skin refreshment.

â­ A comprehensive formula combining concealer and foundation.
â­ Contains caffeine to awaken and invigorate the skin.
â­ Enriched with Vitamin C to brighten and even out skin tone.
â­ Features 2% Niacinamide to firm the skin and improve its appearance.
â­ Cooling metallic applicator for massaging and contouring the face.
â­ Provides skin with a refreshed and depuffed look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**
â­ Use the cooling metallic applicator to massage the skin and contour facial features.
â­ Can be used to cover targeted areas or the entire face.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**
â­ Aqua/Water, Isododecane, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Niacinamide, Caffeine, Vitamin C, Tocopherol.
â­ Contains natural extracts and nourishing oils for the skin.

#Rimmel #Foundation #Concealer #Makeup #Skincare #Beauty #EyeMakeup #FaceMakeup #SaudiArabia #Cosmetics

description_en:
Add a touch of shine and hydration with **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 500 Pine To The Apple**. This ultra-glossy lip gloss delivers a refreshing and bold color with a stunning glassy finish, inspired by the unique pine to the apple shade. It features a lightweight, non-sticky formula that ensures comfortable wear all day, while moisturizing and softening your lips. Whether worn alone for a daily bright look, or as a top coat over lipstick for added shine and dimension, **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 500 Pine To The Apple** is the perfect addition to your makeup collection for a modern and captivating touch.

â­ Ultra-glossy glassy finish for fuller, more attractive lips.
â­ Non-sticky, comfortable formula for long-lasting wear.
â­ Moisturizes and softens lips, providing deep nourishment.
â­ The unique Pine To The Apple (500) shade adds a bold and playful touch to your look.
â­ Refreshing fruity scent complements the vibrant color.
â­ Versatile: wear it alone or over lipstick for a complete look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 500 Pine To The Apple**
â­ Prep your lips by exfoliating and moisturizing if needed.
â­ Apply the gloss directly to your lips using the applicator, starting from the center and moving outwards.
â­ Layer for intensified color and shine as desired.
â­ For a more dramatic effect, apply over your favorite lipstick.
â­ Reapply throughout the day to maintain freshness and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 500 Pine To The Apple**
â­ Antioxidant Berry Complex.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid.

#Rimmel #LipGloss #GlassyLips #MakeupSA #Beauty #LipCare #EyeMakeup #LipMoisture #Lipstick #SaudiMakeup

description_en:
Experience natural radiance with the **Rimmel Kind & Free Eyeliner - (Brown) Pecan**. Achieve a stunning eye look with high-color impact and a precise finish thanks to this 100% vegan and eco-conscious liner. Crafted from Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified wood, the **Rimmel Kind & Free Eyeliner - (Brown) Pecan** offers a smooth application with an ultra-creamy, buttery texture that glides effortlessly for sharp lines or soft blending. Choose from five luxurious shades inspired by London's chic style. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Eyeliner - (Brown) Pecan**

â­ Effortlessly glide along the lash line.
â­ Blend quickly for a soft, diffused look, or leave as is for a bold, vibrant cat eye.
â­ Finish with a Rimmel Mascara for added volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Eyeliner - (Brown) Pecan**

â­ 100% vegan and cruelty-free formula.
â­ Ultra-creamy and buttery texture.
â­ Eco-friendly packaging made with FSC certified wood.
â­ Available in 5 stunning shades.

#Rimmel #Eyeliner #Makeup #EyeMakeup #BrownEyeliner #Pecan #VeganMakeup #CrueltyFree #Beauty #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
The **Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex 350 Spicy** delivers extreme 3D latex shine with unstoppable color in one swipe. Achieve a bold, unresistable look with this liquid lipstick that drenches your lips in vivid, intense color with a long-lasting stain. It provides instant shine, a hit of hydration, all-day comfort, and an ultra-smooth finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex 350 Spicy**
â­ In just one swipe, the color glides on evenly for a flawless application.
â­ The diamond-like applicator ensures a sharp line and full coverage for a bold look.
â­ The easy-grip bottle with a soft-touch finish makes it easy to hold and less likely to slip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex 350 Spicy**
â­ Features a lightweight, lip-loving vegan formula.
â­ Infused with aloe vera, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin E for hydration and shine.
â­ Provides a smooth shine and leaves lips feeling hydrated.

description_en:
Achieve an instant, hydrating, and buildable color with the **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick 005 Rich Purple**. This cruelty-free, clean, and vegan formula is perfect for adding a touch of color to your cheeks or lips. It delivers highly pigmented, buildable color with intense moisture, gliding effortlessly onto the skin with its nourishing, skin-loving ingredients. The packaging is made with 48% post-consumer recycled material, making it an environmentally conscious choice.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick 005 Rich Purple**
â­ Step 1. Apply on lips and/or cheeks, and blend out using fingertips.
â­ Step 2. Use alone or underneath your base to give skin a healthy glow.
â­ Step 3. Layer up to build color as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick 005 Rich Purple**
â­ Cruelty-free, clean, and vegan formula.
â­ Formulated without perfume and mineral oils.
â­ Infused with skin-loving ingredients for intense moisture.
â­ Packaging made with 48% post-consumer recycled material.

#Rimmel #KindAndFree #MultiStick #Blush #Lipstick #Makeup #Beauty #SaudiBeauty #CreamBlush #VeganMakeup

description_en:
Achieve the ultimate HD look with high-color impact using the **Rimmel Kind & Free** Eyeliner in Anime Blue. This 100% vegan and cruelty-free eyeliner is crafted with Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified wood for an environmentally conscious beauty choice. Its ultra-creamy and buttery texture glides effortlessly for a seriously eye-popping look, perfect for precise lines or bold styles. Available in five stunning, prestige-inspired shades for every occasion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ Effortlessly glide onto the lash line. Blend out quickly for a soft pigmented look, or leave it as-is for a bold and vibrant cat eye.
â­ Finish with a Rimmel Mascara for extra volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ 100% vegan and cruelty-free formula.
â­ Eco-friendly packaging made with FSC certified wood.
â­ Ultra-creamy and buttery texture for effortless glide.
â­ Available in 5 stunning shades.

description_en:
Discover the secret to radiant, healthy-looking skin with **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint Liquid Foundation - 201 Classic**. Our unique formula is 100% vegan, free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients, providing your skin with natural moisture and a healthy glow.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint Liquid Foundation - 201 Classic**:
â­ Step 1: Squeeze out a pea-sized amount.
â­ Apply to your skin using your favorite method: fingertips, brush, or sponge.
â­ For more coverage, simply apply a little more product until you achieve your desired look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint Liquid Foundation - 201 Classic**:
â­ Aqua/water/eau
â­ Dicaprylyl carbonate
â­ Dicaprylyl ether
â­ Glycerin
â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate
â­ Aluminum starch octenylsuccinate
â­ Ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate
â­ Sodium chloride
â­ Zinc oxide [nano]
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Panthenol
â­ Sodium benzoate
â­ Aloe barbadensis leaf juice
â­ [May contain/peut contenir/ +/-: Titanium dioxide (CI 77891), Iron oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)]

#Rimmel #Foundation #SkinTint #VeganMakeup #CleanBeauty #NaturalLook #FragranceFree #LightCoverage #Skincare #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Get an instant hydrating buildable colour in a rush with the **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick 004 Sunny Coral**. This versatile stick delivers instant hydration and easily buildable colour for your cheeks and lips. Its cruelty-free, clean, and vegan formula, free from perfume and mineral oils, ensures a healthy and attractive look.

â­ Instant hydrating and buildable colour for a natural, attractive look.
â­ Multi-use: Can be used as a cream blush or lipstick.
â­ Clean, vegan, and cruelty-free formula, free from perfume and mineral oils.
â­ Infused with skin-loving ingredients that glide on effortlessly.
â­ Packaging made with 48% post-consumer recycled material.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick 004 Sunny Coral**:
â­ Step 1: Apply on lips and/or cheeks, and blend out using fingertips.
â­ Step 2: Use alone or underneath your base to give skin a glow.
â­ Step 3: Layer up to build your desired colour.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Multi-Stick 004 Sunny Coral**:
â­ Nourishing formula infused with skin-loving ingredients.
â­ Free from perfume and mineral oils.

description_en:
Achieve the London look effortlessly with **Rimmel London Strengthening Nail Polish Remover**! This gentle yet effective formula removes nail polish in a flash, while fortifying your nails with protein and Vitamin B for healthier, stronger growth.

â­ Quick and effective nail polish removal.
â­ Moisturizing formula strengthens weak and brittle nails.
â­ Promotes stronger nail growth with regular use.
â­ Ideal for daily nail care.
â­ Gives your nails a healthy appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel London Strengthening Nail Polish Remover**:
â­ Thoroughly soak a cotton pad with **Rimmel London Strengthening Nail Polish Remover**.
â­ Place the soaked cotton pad over your nail and wait a moment.
â­ Swipe clean to gently remove the nail polish.
â­ Use regularly for best results and stronger nails.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel London Strengthening Nail Polish Remover**:
â­ ACETONE, AQUA/WATER/EAU, GLYCERIN, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, ISOPROPYL PALMITATE, STYRENE/ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, BENZOPHENONE-1, CITRIC ACID, PEG/PPG-4/12 DIMETHICONE, ARACHIDYL PROPIONATE, ETHYLHEXYL HYDROXYSTEARATE, SODIUM LAURYL SULFATE, DENATONIUM BENZOATE, PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE, TRIISOPROPANOLAMINE, FD&C YELLOW NO. 5 (CI 19140).

#RimmelLondon #NailPolishRemover #StrengtheningNails #NailCare #BeautySaudi #StrongNails #NailGoals #Manicure #SaudiBeauty #RiyadhFashion

description_en:
Achieve a flawless matte finish with **Rimmel Stay Matte Pressed Powder**. This essential face powder offers exceptional shine control and long-lasting wear, leaving your skin looking smooth, shine-free, and perfected. It's perfect for setting your foundation or for a quick touch-up to mattify your complexion. Build your coverage for a seamless look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Stay Matte Pressed Powder**:
â­ Use a powder brush or sponge to apply to the face.
â­ Start from the center of the face and blend outwards.
â­ Can be used to set foundation or worn alone for a natural look.
â­ Reapply as needed for shine control.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Stay Matte Pressed Powder**:
â­ Talc
â­ Mica
â­ Magnesium Silicate
â­ Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate
â­ Polyisobutene
â­ DMDM Hydantoin
â­ Fragrance
â­ Iron Oxides
â­ Titanium Dioxide

#RimmelPowder #RimmelLondon #FaceMakeup #PressedPowder #NaturalLook #MatteFinish #MakeupSetting #SaudiMakeup #DarkBeige #Skincare

description_en:
Effortlessly define and enhance your lips with the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Exaggerate Automatic Lip Liner**. Its creamy, smooth formula glides on easily, providing precise definition and locking your lipstick in place for longer wear. The convenient twist-up design means no sharpening is ever needed, and with six stunning shades available, you're sure to find your perfect pout.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Exaggerate Automatic Lip Liner - 024 Diva Red**:
â­ Define your natural lip line.
â­ Use the automatic tip to draw slightly outside the lip contour for a fuller, glamorous pout.
â­ Blend the lip liner with fingertips.
â­ Apply your lipstick shade for a long-lasting result.
â­ Prevents color bleed and makes your lip color pop.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Exaggerate Automatic Lip Liner - 024 Diva Red**:
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Polyethylene
â­ Synthetic Wax
â­ Di-Ppg-3 Myristyl Ether Adipate
â­ Cera Alba/Beeswax/Cire Dâ€™abeille
â­ Polybutene
â­ Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate
â­ Stearyl Dimethicone
â­ Pentaerythrityl Tetrabehenate
â­ Boron Nitride
â­ Isodecyl Neopentanoate
â­ Synthetic Beeswax
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Stearalkonium Bentonite
â­ Propylene Carbonate
â­ Ascorbyl Palmitate
â­ Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer
â­ May Contain/Peut Contenir/ +/-: Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), D&C Red No. 30 (Ci 73360), Fd&C Blue No. 1 Aluminum Lake (Ci 42090), Carmine (Ci 75470), D&C Red No. 28 Aluminum Lake (Ci 45410), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), D&C Red No. 22 Aluminum Lake (Ci 45380), D&C Red No. 21 (Ci 45380), D&C Red No. 7 (Ci 15850), D&C Yellow No. 5 Aluminum Lake (Ci 19140), Fd&C Yellow No. 6 Aluminum Lake (Ci 15985), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), D&C Red No. 6 Barium Lake (Ci 15850), Mica, Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163).

description_en:
Achieve the ultimate HD look with intense color impact using the **Rimmel Kind & Free** Creamy White Eyeliner. This eyeliner delivers sharp definition and vibrant hues, making your eyes pop. Proudly 100% vegan and crafted with Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified wood, **Rimmel Kind & Free** allows you to enhance your eyes with environmental consciousness.

Its ultra-creamy and buttery texture glides effortlessly along the lash line, perfect for creating anything from subtle definition to bold, statement cat eyes. Available in five stunning, prestige-inspired shades, you're sure to look amazing for every occasion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ Effortlessly glide onto the lash line.
â­ Blend quickly for a soft pigmented look, or leave as is for a bold and vibrant cat eye.
â­ Finish with a **Rimmel** Mascara for extra volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ Clean, 100% vegan, and cruelty-free formula.
â­ Ultra-creamy and buttery texture.
â­ Eco-friendly packaging made with FSC certified wood.
â­ Available in 5 stunning and inspired shades.

title_en: Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex 400 Rebel - Bold, Shiny, Long-Lasting Color
title_ar: Ø±ÙˆØ¬ Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø«Ø±ÙŠÙ„ Ø³ÙŠÙƒØ± Ù„Ø§ØªÙƒØ³ Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ 400 Ø±ÙŠØ¨Ù„ - Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø¬Ø±ÙŠØ¡ ÙˆÙ„Ø§Ù…Ø¹ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Unleash your bold side with **Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex**. This liquid lipstick delivers an extreme 3D latex shine with unstoppable color in one swipe. Drench your lips in vivid, lasting color that stains your lips with instant shine, a hit of hydration, and comfort that lasts all day with an ultra-smooth finish. Its lightweight, lip-loving vegan formula is infused with aloe vera, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin E to nourish and hydrate your lips. The color glides on evenly in just one swipe, and the diamond-shaped applicator of the **Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex** ensures a sharp line and full application for an unstoppable, bold look. The easy-grip bottle with a soft-touch finish makes application comfortable and secure.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex**:
â­ Apply the liquid lipstick in a single swipe for instant color payoff.
â­ Use the diamond-tip applicator for precise lip contouring.
â­ For best results, ensure lips are clean and dry before application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Thrillseeker Lip Latex**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: For deep lip hydration.
â­ Aloe Vera: For soothing and moisturizing lips.
â­ Vitamin E: As an antioxidant to nourish lips.
â­ Lightweight, vegan formula.

#RimmelLipstick #LipMakeup #LiquidLipstick #GlossyLips #SaudiMakeup #LipCare #FullCoverage #RimmelLondon #Beauty #Thrillseeker

description_en:
Discover the secret to radiant skin with **Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters**. This revolutionary product is your 3-in-1 primer, highlighter, and glow booster, delivering the ultimate filter-like complexion. Wear it your way for the skin glow you desire, available in 8 skin-adapting shades. Say goodbye to social media filters and hello to naturally luminous skin.

â­ Offers an instant filter-like complexion.
â­ Can be worn alone, as a primer under makeup, mixed with foundation, or as a highlighter over base.
â­ Lightweight, blendable formula infused with skin-loving ingredients like natural biopeptides and Vitamin C.
â­ Provides anti-ageing and antioxidant benefits in just 4 weeks.
â­ Light-reflecting pigments give the skin a perfectly lit and smooth glow.
â­ Available in 8 skin-adapting shades.
â­ Cruelty-free.
â­ Vegan.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters**:
â­ Wear alone for a healthy, natural glow.
â­ Wear under makeup as a tinted, glowy primer.
â­ Mix with your favorite skincare or foundation for a more radiant finish.
â­ Apply over your base as a highlighter.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multitasker Better Than Filters**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Isododecane, Mica, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Sodium Chloride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Boron Nitride, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Propylene Carbonate, Panthenol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Methicone, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Pantolactone, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

#SaudiBeauty #SkinGlow #RimmelLondon #SaudiMakeup #QuickMakeup #Contour #Highlighter #FacePrimer #VitaminC #Skincare

description_en:
Discover clean beauty with **Rimmel Kind & Free** Nail Polish in 151 Fresh Undone. Our 100% vegan formula is free from fragrance*, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients, delivering rich color and dazzling shine while keeping your nails healthy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ Step 1: Starting with clean nails, paint nails with 3 strokes from base to tip: 1 per side and 1 in the middle.
â­ Step 2: Once dry, apply a 2nd coat if needed, allow to dry and apply a topcoat for dazzling shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ Ethyl acetate, butyl acetate, nitrocellulose, adipic acid/neopentyl glycol/trimellitic anhydride copolymer, acetyl.

description_en:
Present your lips with a stunning, long-lasting look with **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips** - 310 Pouting Pink. Enjoy rich color and a glossy finish that lasts up to 16 hours with no transfer or smudging, perfect for any occasion. Its lightweight and flexible formula adapts to your lip movements, offering superior comfort. It provides vibrant and captivating color with an easy, 2-step application process. Say goodbye to touch-up worries and embrace fun, flirty, and fearless confidence with a lipstick that leaves no marks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**:
â­ Apply the color and keep lips apart for 60 seconds to set.
â­ Apply the top coat to lock in color, moisture, and add a beautiful shine.
â­ Easily removed with an oil-based makeup remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**:
â­ ISODODECANE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, DIMETHICONE, C9-13 ISOPARAFFIN, DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE, BARIUM SULFATE / CI 77120, ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE, PROPYLENE CARBONATE, SILICA, PROPYLPARABEN, PHENOXYETHANOL, TIN OXIDE, BENZOIC ACID, CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE, MICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), D&C RED NO. 28 (CI 45410), D&C RED NO. 36 (CI 12085), D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15850), BISMUTH OXYCHLORIDE (CI 77163), CARMINE (CI 75470).
â­ RICINUS COMMUNIS (CASTOR) SEED OIL, CERA ALBA/BEESWAX/CIRE D'ABEILLE, PENTAERYTHRITYL STEARATE/CAPRATE/CAPRYLATE/ ADIPATE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, ALCOHOL, ISOPROPYL MYRISTATE, TOCOPHEROL, CAPRYLIC/ CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, ASCORBYL PALMITATE, ASCORBIC ACID, CITRIC ACID, BHT.

description_en:
Discover natural color and superior hydration with the **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 005 Red**. It leaves your lips perfectly moisturized with a subtle sheen to bolder colors, ideal for all skin tones. Its cruelty-free and vegan formula nourishes and conditions lips with a smooth, buttery texture. Available in 5 stunning shades, featuring eco-friendly FSC-certified packaging made with a minimum of 30% post-consumer recycled content.

â­ Hydrating tinted lip balm that nourishes and conditions lips.
â­ A dewy kiss of natural color.
â­ Buttery texture that glides on effortlessly.
â­ Sheer and lightweight coverage.
â­ Clean and 100% vegan formula, cruelty-free.
â­ FSC-certified packaging with at least 30% PCR content.
â­ Available in 5 stunning shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 005 Red**:
â­ Start by lining your lips with a lip pencil.
â­ Top it off with the hydrating Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm, and reapply throughout the day for maximum hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 005 Red**:
â­ 100% vegan formula.
â­ Hydrating and conditioning ingredients.

description_en:
Achieve flawless radiance with Rimmel **Lasting Finish Compact Powder**. This lightweight powder foundation offers a soft-touch feel, controls shine without drying your skin, and delivers medium, buildable coverage for a natural, all-day look. Its convenient compact makes on-the-go touch-ups effortless. A vegan, transfer-proof, sweat & water-resistant face powder, dermatologist-tested, suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder**:
â­ Step 1: Using the included sponge or a foundation brush, apply the compact powder foundation onto moisturised skin. Start from the center and blend outwards for a flawless all-day finish.
â­ Step 2: Use the sponge or brush to build coverage in areas where you need extra.
â­ Step 3: For best results, finish with a setting spray to lock your makeup in place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder**:
â­ MICA, TALC, DIMETHICONE, TITANIUM DIOXIDE [NANO], ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, METHICONE, METHYL METHACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, ALUMINA, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE, BHT, AQUA/WATER/EAU.
â­ [MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR/+/-: IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)].

title_en: Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner 003 Smokey Grey - 24hr Professional Eye Definition
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø³ÙƒÙ†Ø¯Ù„ Ø§ÙŠØ² Ø£ÙˆØªÙˆ Ù„Ø§ÙŠÙ†Ø± 003 Ø±Ù…Ø§Ø¯ÙŠ - ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø¹ÙŠÙˆÙ† Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… 24 Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø©
description_en:
Define your eyes with precision and vibrant color using the **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner**. This exceptional eyeliner glides on effortlessly, delivering high color impact for instantly enhanced eyes. Its buttery-soft, water-repellent formula ensures extreme wear for up to 24 hours, offering a smudge-proof and fade-resistant finish. Choose from 6 stunning shades to create any look you desire.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner**

â­ Apply your shade of **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner** to the upper lash line, gliding lightly from the inner corner to the outer corner of the eye.
â­ Using your fingers, gently blend over the line to smoke the eyeliner upwards and outwards for a captivating smoky effect.
â­ Retrace the eyeliner over the upper lash line to add definition to your smokey look, then finish with mascara.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner**

â­ Buttery-soft formula.
â­ Water-repellent.
â­ Extreme wear for up to 24 hours.

#Rimmel #Eyeliner #EyeMakeup #SmokeyEye #MakeupKSA #BeautySaudi #LongLastingMakeup #SaudiBeauty #Eyeshadow #Cosmetics

title_en: Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish - 090 Porcelain: Professional Gel Manicure at Home
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø± Ø¬Ù„ Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± - 090 Ø¨ÙˆØ±Ø³Ù„ÙŠÙ†: Ù…Ø§Ù†ÙŠÙƒÙŠØ± Ø¬Ù„ Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù†Ø²Ù„
description_en:
**Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish - 090 Porcelain** is a two-step gel colour system that revolutionizes nail care. Achieve a chic French mani look with a brilliant gel finish, straight from a salon, all without a UV lamp or any mess.

â­ A breakthrough in gel nails for exceptional shine.
â­ Perfect French Mani with a brilliant gel finish.
â­ Easy, streak-free application with a precision brush.
â­ No UV lamp needed, making it safe and easy to use.
â­ Long-lasting wear for an elegant look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish**:
â­ Step 1: Apply 1-2 coats of **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish**.
â­ Step 2: Wait for nails to dry completely.
â­ Step 3: Sweep Super Gel Top Coat over the top to activate curing.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish**:
â­ BUTYL ACETATE, ETHYL ACETATE, NITROCELLULOSE, ACETYL TRIBUTYL CITRATE, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL, TOSYLAMIDE/EPOXY RESIN, STEARALKONIUM BENTONITE, STYRENE/ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, TRIPHENYL PHOSPHATE, GLYCIDYL NEODECANOATE/PHTHALIC ANHYDRIDE/TMP CROSSPOLYMER, ADIPIC ACID/NEOPENTYL GLYCOL/TRIMELLITIC ANHYDRIDE COPOLYMER, AQUA/WATER/EAU, ISOSORBIDE DICAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, SILICA, DIACETONE ALCOHOL, ETOCRYLENE, KAOLIN, MEK, HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/IPDI/PPG-15 GLYCERYL ETHER COPOLYMER, ACRYLATES/DIMETHICONE COPOLYMER, PHOSPHORIC ACID, LITHOTHAMNIOM CALCAREUM EXTRACT, CETYL PEG/ PPG-10/1 DIMETHICONE, MANNITOL, n-BUTYL ALCOHOL, DIMETHICONE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, BENZOPHENONE-1, POLYVINYL BUTYRAL, SOLUM DIATOMEAE/DIATOMACEOUS EARTH/TERRE DE DIATOMEES, CORALLINA OFFICINALIS EXTRACT, TRIMETHYLPENTANEDIYL DIBENZOATE, POLYETHYLENE, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, ZINC SULFATE, MACROCYSTIS PYRIFERA (KELP) EXTRACT, HYDROLYZED CONCHIOLIN PROTEIN, METHYLPARABEN, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/ +/-:MICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), FD&C YELLOW NO. 5 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 19140), D&C RED NO. 6 BARIUM LAKE (CI 15850), D&C YELLOW NO. 11 (CI 47000), D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15850), MANGANESE VIOLET (CI 77742), ULTRAMARINES (CI 77007), FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090), D&C RED NO. 34 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15880), FERRIC FERROCYANIDE (CI 77510), D&C VIOLET NO. 2 (CI 60725)].

description_en:
Get ready to pamper your pout with the **Rimmel London Moisture Renew** lipstick in Vintage Pink. This lipstick drenches lips in a brilliant burst of rich, pure colour infused with creamy moisture, offering a feminine rosy-mauve lip look. Enriched with Vitamins A, C, and E, **Rimmel London Moisture Renew** gives your lips a hydrated, cared-for feel day after day, with added SPF protection. Its ultra-creamy, soft texture glides on smoothly for a rich, luscious finish, ensuring no compromise on moisture or colour. The perfect everyday wear, this warm, flattering lip colour belongs in every girl's makeup bag. Make your lips stand out with **Rimmel London Moisture Renew**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel London Moisture Renew**
â­ Apply directly from the tube onto clean, dry lips.
â­ For a more precise application, use a lip brush.
â­ Enjoy a stunning, glossy finish that lasts for hours.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel London Moisture Renew**
â­ Enriched with Vitamins A, C, E for lip nourishment and hydration.
â­ Pure pigments deliver bright, fresh, intense colour.
â­ Ultra-creamy, soft texture for a silky feel.
â­ SPF for added sun protection.
â­ Unique Vintage Pink shade with a modern retro vibe.

description_en:
Achieve bold volume and unparalleled intensity with **Rimmel Volume Thrill Seeker Pitch Black Mascara**. This innovative formula is supercharged with ultra-black pigments to give you irresistibly pitch black lashes with maximum volume that defines your eyes.

**Product Features:**
â­ Live the London look with intensely pitch black lashes.
â­ Intense Black Pigment for maximum depth of black.
â­ Cruelty-Free Formula, kind to animals.
â­ Bold, dramatic volume that turns heads.
â­ Creamy, whipped formula for a smooth application.
â­ Lash-loving panthenol to nourish and enhance lashes.
â­ Hyper-soft fibre mascara brush for perfect coverage.
â­ Vegan formula, completely plant-based.
â­ Smudge-proof for long-lasting results.
â­ Doesn't clump, for a clean and tidy application.
â­ Quick to apply, saving you time.
â­ Easy to remove without fuss.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Volume Thrill Seeker Pitch Black Mascara**:
â­ Step 1: Swipe on the **Rimmel Volume Thrill Seeker Pitch Black Mascara** from root to tip in a zig-zag motion.
â­ Step 2: Layer this **Rimmel Volume Thrill Seeker Pitch Black Mascara** up to achieve bold volume and outlandish length.

description_en:
Wake up to radiant, refreshed skin with **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**! This innovative product acts as both a concealer and foundation, providing instant brightness and correcting imperfections. Its buildable formula offers perfect coverage with a luminous finish, enriched with energizing caffeine to awaken your skin, Vitamin C to brighten and even out skin tone, and 2% niacinamide for firmer-looking skin. It features a unique facial tool-inspired applicator designed to contour and massage targeted areas or the entire face, delivering a cooling, refreshing sensation and reducing puffiness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**
â­ Contour and massage the skin with the cooling metallic applicator.
â­ Use on targeted areas or all over the face for a revitalized glow.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**
â­ Caffeine: To energize and awaken the skin.
â­ Vitamin C: To brighten and even out skin tone.
â­ 2% Niacinamide: To promote skin firmness and reduce puffiness.
â­ Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil: For skin hydration and nourishment.

#RimmelSaudi #SaudiMakeup #RimmelConcealer #Foundation #MakeupGoals #RadiantSkin #EverydayMakeup #BeautyProducts #FullCoverage #WakeUpSkin

description_en:
Achieve a sophisticated grey look with **Rimmel 60 Sec Rg Reformulation #558- Gray**. This innovative nail polish features a 3-in-1 color technology that delivers ultra-shiny color, a protective base coat, and a glossy top coat in just one stroke. It dries in under a minute, providing a perfect and practical finish. Enjoy long-lasting wear that resists chips and fading for up to 10 days, making it ideal for frequent changes or special occasions. **Rimmel 60 Sec Rg Reformulation #558- Gray** is your perfect choice to add a touch of modern elegance to your nails, suitable for both everyday and evening looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Sec Rg Reformulation #558- Gray**

â­ Apply a single, swift stroke to the nail.
â­ For a more intense color finish, add an extra coat once the first layer has dried.
â­ Dries exceptionally fast, minimizing downtime.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Sec Rg Reformulation #558- Gray**

â­ 3-in-1 Color Technology (Color, Base, Top Coat).
â­ Quick-drying formula.
â­ High shine and long-lasting wear.
â­ Chip and fade resistant.

#RimmelLondon #NailPolish #Manicure #Beauty #GreyNails #LongLasting #QuickDry #NailGoals #SaudiBeauty #MakeupAddict

title_en: Rimmel Lasting Finish Exaggerate Automatic Lip Liner - 063 Eastend - Pink
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ø­Ø¯Ø¯ Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø£ÙˆØªÙˆÙ…Ø§ØªÙŠÙƒ Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªÙŠÙ†Ø¬ ÙÙŠÙ†Ø´ 063 - ÙˆØ±Ø¯ÙŠ
description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined lips and unparalleled allure with the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Exaggerate Automatic Lip Liner - 063 Eastend - Pink**. This liner offers superior precision for shaping your lips and ensures your lipstick stays put for hours. Its creamy formula, enriched with waxes and oils, guarantees a smooth and even application. The automatic twist-up design eliminates the need for sharpening. Discover the secret to perfectly defined lips with the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Exaggerate Automatic Lip Liner - 063 Eastend - Pink** available in six stunning shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Exaggerate Automatic Lip Liner - 063 Eastend - Pink**:
â­ Define your natural lip line with precision.
â­ Use the automatic tip to draw slightly outside the lip contour for a fuller, glamorous pout.
â­ Blend the lip liner with fingertips.
â­ Apply your favorite Rimmel London lipstick shade for a long-lasting result.
â­ Prevents color bleed and enhances your lip color pop.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Exaggerate Automatic Lip Liner - 063 Eastend - Pink**:
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane, Polyethylene, Synthetic Wax, Di-Ppg-3 Myristyl Ether Adipate, Cera Alba/Beeswax/Cire Dâ€™abeille, Polybutene, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Stearyl Dimethicone, Pentaerythrityl Tetrabehenate, Boron Nitride, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Synthetic Beeswax, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopherol, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Propylene Carbonate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer.
â­ May Contain/Peut Contenir/ +/-: Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), D&C Red No. 30 (Ci 73360), Fd&C Blue No. 1 Aluminum Lake (Ci 42090), Carmine (Ci 75470), D&C Red No. 28 Aluminum Lake (Ci 45410), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), D&C Red No. 22 Aluminum Lake (Ci 45380), D&C Red No. 21 (Ci 45380), D&C Red No. 7 (Ci 15850), D&C Yellow No. 5 Aluminum Lake (Ci 19140), Fd&C Yellow No. 6 Aluminum Lake (Ci 15985), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), D&C Red No. 6 Barium Lake (Ci 15850), Mica, Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163).

Discover unparalleled hydration and radiance with **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Hydration Foundation**. This full-coverage foundation offers a natural-looking finish with up to 35 hours of wear, featuring a cruelty-free, vegan formula enriched with Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, and 2% Niacinamide. It boasts SPF20 and is sleep-proof, waterproof, crease-resistant, and transfer-resistant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Hydration Foundation**:
â­ Apply the foundation using a brush, sponge, or fingertips to blend seamlessly into the skin.

description_en:
Achieve a radiant complexion with **Rimmel Kind & Free Foundation 103 True Ivory**. At Rimmel London, we believe â€˜good for usâ€™ should mean good for all. Our product is made with 100% vegan & Kind to Animals ingredients, itâ€™s good for you & good for the planet.

Our lightweight, sheer formula evens skin-tone and blurs away any unwanted imperfections while giving your skin the moisturization it needs. This foundation is infused with an antioxidant vitamin complex (E & B5) and aloe vera for a fresh glow and natural makeup finish. All packaging is made with recycled materials that are easily recyclable and kinder to the environment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Foundation 103 True Ivory**

Our lightweight, sheer formula evens skin tone and blurs away any unwanted imperfections while giving your skin the moisturization it needs. Rimmel foundation is infused with an antioxidant vitamin complex (E & B5) and aloe vera for a fresh glow and natural makeup finish. All packaging is made with recycled materials which can be easily recycled and is kinder to the environment. Nourish your skin with KIND & FREE tinted moisturizer â€“ itâ€™s a better kind of beauty.

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined brows with the **Rimmel Brow This Way 2In1 Filler & Fixer - Dark**. This dual-ended wonder combines a precise brow pencil and a handy spoolie brush, allowing you to define and sculpt your brows for a natural yet polished look. Its long-lasting, transfer-proof, and fade-proof formula ensures your brows stay flawless for up to 12 hours, making it the ultimate tool for effortless beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Brow This Way 2In1 Filler & Fixer - Dark**:
â­ STEP 1: Apply the triangular tip to precisely fill and define your eyebrows.
â­ STEP 2: Use the integrated spoolie brush to groom and set your brows in place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Brow This Way 2In1 Filler & Fixer - Dark**:
â­ Brow filling pencil.
â­ Spoolie brush for brow setting.
â­ Transfer-proof, fade-proof formula for up to 12 hours.

title_en: Rimmel Kind & Free Dual Ended Brow Definer 003 Warm Brown: Bold & Natural Brows
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ ÙƒØ§ÙŠÙ†Ø¯ & ÙØ±ÙŠ Ù…Ø­Ø¯Ø¯ Ø­ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨ Ø«Ù†Ø§Ø¦ÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ø·Ø±Ù 003 ÙˆÙˆØ±Ù… Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙˆÙ†: Ø¥Ø·Ù„Ø§Ù„Ø© Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ© ÙˆØ¬Ø±ÙŠØ¦Ø©
description_en:
Achieve perfect brows with the **Rimmel Kind & Free Dual Ended Brow Definer 003 Warm Brown**. This is Rimmelâ€™s first clean dual-ended brow pencil, delivering both bold and natural-looking eyebrows. It features an ultra-fine 1.7mm tip for precise, hair-like strokes and a spoolie brush for seamless blending, making brow definition and filling easier than ever. The vegan formula is infused with organic certified shea butter and biotin for clean, conditioning, and defining brows. This versatile **Rimmel Kind & Free Dual Ended Brow Definer 003 Warm Brown** offers one end for defined, fuller-looking brows, and another for ultra-fine, hair-like strokes. The spoolie brush ensures a groomed, natural look by smoothly blending the tint through your brow hairs. It's a vegan and kind-to-animals product, formulated without added fragrances or mineral oils.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Dual Ended Brow Definer 003 Warm Brown**:
â­ Start by applying the brow pencil from the under-brow arch, moving towards the tail end.
â­ Outline the upper arch of your brow.
â­ Use the spoolie brush to comb through and blend the tint for a seamless, natural finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Dual Ended Brow Definer 003 Warm Brown**:
â­ Diisostearyl Malate, C20-40 Acid, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, C20-40 Alcohols, Mica, Synthetic Wax, Isoamyl Laurate, Glyceryl Behenate/Eicosadioate, Ethylcellulose, Boron Nitride, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Propanediol.
â­ [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)].

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined brows with the **Rimmel Brow This Way 2In1 Filler & Fixer**. This innovative dual-ended pencil combines a precise brow filler with a spoolie brush to set your brows, delivering a natural yet sculpted look that lasts. Its quick and easy-to-use formula is transfer-proof and fade-proof for up to 12 hours, making it ideal for enhancing your brows.

â­ Features a triangular retractable tip for precise brow filling.
â­ Includes an easy-to-use spoolie brush to shape and set your brows.
â­ Transfer-proof and fade-proof for up to 12 hours.
â­ Available in multiple shades to complement all hair colors.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Brow This Way 2In1 Filler & Fixer**:
â­ Step 1: Apply the buildable formula to fill in your brows.
â­ Step 2: Use the spoolie brush to groom and shape your brows.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Brow This Way 2In1 Filler & Fixer**:
â­ High-quality formula for filling and defining brows.
â­ Soft brush for product distribution and brow shaping.
â­ Setting agents for long-lasting brow hold.

description_en:
Achieve your desired lash volume with **Rimmel Scand Rg Vol On Dmand Wtp Eu # 1 20Iv - Black**, from a subtle feathered look to a dramatic full blast. This buildable mascara allows you to customize your lash intensity effortlessly, ensuring clump-free results for any occasion. Experience the ultimate day-to-night mascara that's smudge-proof, flake-proof, and easy to remove. Live the London Look with **Rimmel Scand Rg Vol On Dmand Wtp Eu # 1 20Iv - Black**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Scand Rg Vol On Dmand Wtp Eu # 1 20Iv - Black**:
â­ Apply from the root to the tip of your lashes.
â­ Build additional coats for desired volume without clumping.
â­ The unique soft, waxy bristle brush separates lashes for a fanned-out, voluminous effect.
â­ Smudge-proof, flake-proof, and easy to remove.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Scand Rg Vol On Dmand Wtp Eu # 1 20Iv - Black**:
â­ Conditioning formula to nourish lashes.
â­ High-pigment ingredients for rich black color.
â­ Fixing agents for waterproof and smudge-proof wear.

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 60 Ø³ÙƒÙ†Ø¯Ø³ Ø³Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙŠÙ…Ø± - 151 ØªØ§Ù† Ù„Ø§ÙŠÙ†Ø²
description_en:
Discover your perfect summer touch with **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 151 Tan Lines & Good Times Nail Polish**. This fast-drying polish delivers high-impact colour with an ultra-shiny finish, offering chip and fade resistance for up to 10 days of flawless wear.

The one-step precise application nail polish quickly locks in superior colour with a quick downward stroke. **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 151 Tan Lines & Good Times Nail Polish** dries in just 60 seconds, so you're ready to hit the town with no downtime. Celebrate creativity with these fun-loving and playful colours or opt for a shimmery neutral finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 151 Tan Lines & Good Times Nail Polish**
â­ Offers precise application in just one stroke with no downtime.
â­ Apply the colour to your nails with a downward stroke and leave to dry for one minute â€“ no UV lamps needed!
â­ For a more intensely coloured finish, add an extra coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 151 Tan Lines & Good Times Nail Polish**
â­ ETHYL ACETATE, BUTYL ACETATE, NITROCELLULOSE, ACETYL TRIBUTYL CITRATE, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL, TOSYLAMIDE/EPOXY RESIN.
â­ STYRENE/ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, SILICA, STEARALKONIUM BENTONITE, TRIPHENYL PHOSPHATE.
â­ ADIPIC ACID/NEOPENTYL GLYCOL/ TRIMELLITIC ANHYDRIDE COPOLYMER, AQUA/WATER/EAU, DIACETONE ALCOHOL, ETOCRYLENE.
â­ KAOLIN, ACETONE, GLYCIDYL NEODECANOATE/PHTHALIC ANHYDRIDE/TMP CROSSPOLYMER, CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE.
â­ BENZOPHENONE-1, MEK, CORALLINA OFFICINALIS EXTRACT, ACRYLATES/DIMETHICONE COPOLYMER.
â­ ISOSORBIDE DICAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, DIMETHYL ISOSORBIDE, PHOSPHORIC ACID, n-BUTYL ALCOHOL.
â­ TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, DIMETHICONE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, CETYL PEG/PPG-10/1 DIMETHICONE.
â­ POLYVINYL BUTYRAL, POLYBUTYLENE GLYCOL/MDI COPOLYMER, TRIMETHYLPENTANEDIYL DIBENZOATE, POLYETHYLENE.
â­ HYDROLYZED CONCHIOLIN PROTEIN, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL, TIN OXIDE.
â­ MACROCYSTIS PYRIFERA (KELP) EXTRACT, [May Contain/ Peut Contenir/+/-:MICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

description_en:
Achieve the perfect London look with the Rimmel Btw Eyebrow Pro Pencil.

Dreaming of the iconic London look? Discover subtle definition and natural beauty with the Rimmel Btw Eyebrow Pro Pencil. This professional kohl pencil is your secret weapon to enhance and refine your eyebrow shape. Effortlessly fill in gaps or lengthen your brow arch for a stunning, natural-looking result. The cap doubles as a handy brush, perfect for grooming your brow hairs before and after application â€“ making it super easy to achieve beautifully sculpted eyebrows that balance your features and frame your eyes. When you desire perfectly groomed eyebrows, choose the Rimmel Btw Eyebrow Pro Pencil!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Btw Eyebrow Pro Pencil**:
â­ Apply directly onto eyebrows.
â­ The brush is ideal for filling in any gaps, lightly diffusing the color, and softening the overall look.
â­ Use short, light strokes to perfectly fill in the outer third of your brows, creating a naturally fuller appearance.
â­ Blend the edges with your fingertips and use the brush applicator to comb hairs evenly.
â­ Perfect for beginners as the Rimmel Btw Eyebrow Pro Pencil is easy to use and blends beautifully with its integrated brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Btw Eyebrow Pro Pencil**:
â­ HYDROGENATED PALM KERNEL OIL
â­ HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE OIL
â­ HYDROGENATED PALM GLYCERIDES
â­ SYNTHETIC BEESWAX
â­ COPERNICIA CERIFERA CERA/COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX/CIRE DE CARNAUBA
â­ HYDROXYLATED LANOLIN
â­ PROPYLPARABEN
â­ TOCOPHEROL
â­ ASCORBYL PALMITATE
â­ LECITHIN
â­ GLYCERYL STEARATE
â­ GLYCERYL OLEATE
â­ CITRIC ACID
â­ [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-:IRON OXIDES (CI 77499, CI 77492, CI 77491), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)].

description_en:
**Rimmel Kind & Free** Nail Polish - your go-to for clean, vibrant nails. Experience our 100% vegan and kind-to-animals formula, free from fragrance*, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients. This clean, plant-based formula delivers shine, gloss, and rich pigment while keeping your nails healthy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ Step 1: Starting with clean nails, paint nails with 3 strokes from base to tip: 1 per side and 1 in the middle.
â­ Step 2: Once dry, apply a 2nd coat if needed, allow to dry, and apply a topcoat for dazzling shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ Ethyl acetate
â­ Butyl acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic acid/neopentyl glycol/trimellitic anhydride copolymer
â­ Acetyl

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 60 Ø³ÙƒÙ†Ø¯Ø³ Ø³Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙŠÙ…Ø± - 155 Ø¨ÙŠØªØ´ Ø¨Ø±ÙŠØ² Ø¨Ù„ÙŠØ²
description_en:
Achieve perfect nails with a single stroke with **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 155 Beach Breeze Please**. This nail polish features a fast-drying formula that delivers high-impact color and an ultra-shiny finish, with chip and fade resistance for up to 10 days of flawless wear. Its precise design ensures a smooth application in just 60 seconds, making it perfect for a quick, ready-to-go look. Celebrate your creativity with this stunning shade inspired by a shimmering beach breeze.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 155 Beach Breeze Please**

*   Apply the color to your nails with a single downward stroke.
*   Leave to dry for just one minute â€“ no UV lamps needed!
*   For a more intensely colored finish, add an extra coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 155 Beach Breeze Please**

*   ETHYL ACETATE, BUTYL ACETATE, NITROCELLULOSE, ACETYL TRIBUTYL CITRATE, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL, TOSYLAMIDE/EPOXY RESIN, STYRENE/ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, SILICA, STEARALKONIUM BENTONITE, TRIPHENYL PHOSPHATE, ADIPIC ACID/NEOPENTYL GLYCOL/TRIMELLITIC ANHYDRIDE COPOLYMER, AQUA/WATER/EAU, DIACETONE ALCOHOL, ETOCRYLENE, KAOLIN, ACETONE, GLYCIDYL NEODECANOATE/PHTHALIC ANHYDRIDE/TMP CROSSPOLYMER, CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE, BENZOPHENONE-1, MEK, CORALLINA OFFICINALIS EXTRACT, ACRYLATES/DIMETHICONE COPOLYMER, ISOSORBIDE DICAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, DIMETHYL ISOSORBIDE, PHOSPHORIC ACID, n-BUTYL ALCOHOL, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, DIMETHICONE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, CETYL PEG/PPG-10/1 DIMETHICONE, POLYVINYL BUTYRAL, POLYBUTYLENE GLYCOL/MDI COPOLYMER, TRIMETHYLPENTANEDIYL DIBENZOATE, POLYETHYLENE, HYDROLYZED CONCHIOLIN PROTEIN, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL, TIN OXIDE, MACROCYSTIS PYRIFERA (KELP) EXTRACT, [May Contain/ Peut Contenir/+/-: MICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), ALUMINUM POWDER (CI 77000), D&C RED NO. 34 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15880), D&C YELLOW NO. 11 (CI 47000), FD&C YELLOW NO. 5 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 19140), D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15850), MANGANESE VIOLET (CI 77742), ULTRAMARINES (CI 77007), D&C RED NO. 6 BARIUM LAKE (CI 15850), FERRIC FERROCYANIDE (CI 77510), FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090), D&C VIOLET NO. 2 (CI 60725)].

title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¶ØºÙˆØ·Ø© Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªÙŠÙ†Ø¬ ÙÙŠÙ†ÙŠØ´ Ù…Ù† Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ - Ø¯Ø±Ø¬Ø© 001 Ø¨ÙˆØ±Ø³Ù„ÙŠÙ† Ø¨ÙŠØ¬
description_en:
Discover the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder**, a lightweight, soft-touch powder foundation designed to control shine without leaving your skin feeling dry. Its fine powder blends seamlessly to provide medium, buildable coverage with a natural-looking finish that lasts all day. Packaged in a convenient compact, it's perfect for easy on-the-go touch-ups.

â­ Soft touch powder for long-lasting wear.
â­ Medium buildable coverage, transfer-proof, sweat & water resistant.
â­ Lightweight vegan formula controls shine without dryness.
â­ Dermatologist tested, suitable for sensitive skin, and non-comedogenic.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder**:
â­ Step 1: Using the included sponge or a foundation brush, apply the compact powder foundation onto moisturised skin.
â­ Start from the center and blend outwards for a flawless all-day finish.
â­ Step 2: Use the sponge or brush to build up coverage in areas that need it.
â­ Step 3: For best results, finish with a setting spray to lock your look in place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder**:
â­ MICA, TALC, DIMETHICONE, TITANIUM DIOXIDE [nano], ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, METHICONE, METHYL METHACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, ALUMINA, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE, BHT, AQUA/WATER/EAU, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)].

shortdescription_en: Rimmel Lasting Finish Powder: Lightweight, soft, long-lasting. Controls shine for a perfect complexion.

title_en: Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder - 008 Soft Beige
title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªÙŠÙ†Ø¬ ÙÙŠÙ†ÙŠØ´ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¶ØºÙˆØ·Ø© 008 Ø¨ÙŠØ¬ Ù†Ø§Ø¹Ù…
description_en:
Discover the Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder in 008 Soft Beige, a lightweight, soft-touch powder foundation designed for flawless, all-day wear. This effective powder controls shine without feeling dry, leaving your skin looking naturally radiant. The fine powder of the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder - 008 Soft Beige** blends seamlessly to provide medium, buildable coverage, allowing you to customize your desired finish. It comes in a convenient compact for easy touch-ups on the go.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder - 008 Soft Beige**:
â­ Step 1: Using the included sponge or a foundation brush, apply the compact powder foundation on top of moisturised skin. Start at the centre and blend outwards for a flawless finish all day.
â­ Step 2: Use the sponge or brush to build up coverage in areas you need extra.
â­ Step 3: For best results, finish with the **Rimmel Lasting Finish** Setting Spray to hold in place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder - 008 Soft Beige**:
â­ MICA, TALC, DIMETHICONE, TITANIUM DIOXIDE [nano], ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, METHICONE, METHYL METHACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, ALUMINA, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE, BHT, AQUA/WATER/EAU, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)].

#RimmelPowder #Foundation #FaceMakeup #SaudiMakeup #ClearSkin #FullCoverage #LongLastingMakeup #DailyMakeup #RimmelLondon #SaudiBeauty

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ù†Ø¯Ù† Ø³ÙƒÙ†Ø¯Ù„ Ø§ÙŠØ² Ø£ÙˆØªÙˆ Ù„Ø§ÙŠÙ†Ø± Ù‚Ù„Ù… ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø§Ù„Ø¹ÙŠÙˆÙ† 006 ØªÙˆ Ø¨ÙŠ - Ù†ÙˆØ¯
description_en:
Discover the ultimate eye definition with the **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner**. This eyeliner pencil boasts a buttery-soft formula that glides on effortlessly, delivering high colour impact to instantly define and enhance your eyes. It's waterproof and offers extreme wear for up to 24 hours, making it your go-to for a look that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner**
â­ Apply your shade of **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner** to the upper lash line.
â­ Glide it lightly from the inner corner to the outer corner of the eye.
â­ Using your fingertips, lightly blend over the line to smoke the eyeliner upwards and outwards.
â­ Retrace eyeliner over the upper lash line to add definition to this smokey look.
â­ Finish by applying mascara.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner**
â­ Smooth and blendable formula.
â­ Waterproof.
â­ Up to 24-hour extreme wear.
â­ High colour impact.

Achieve the natural, fluffy brow look you've always dreamed of with the **Rimmel Brow Pen Precision Hair-Stroke**. Its ultra-fine 0.2 mm tip offers ultimate precision to draw fine, hair-like strokes for naturally perfected, radiant brows. The buildable color allows you to easily achieve your desired brow fullness and definition.

â­ Fill in gaps and shape your brows as desired for the perfect finish.

description_en:
Achieve the natural, fluffy brow look you've always desired with the **Rimmel Brow Pen** - Soft Dark. Its ultra-fine 0.2 mm micro-tip offers ultimate precision to draw delicate, hair-like strokes, creating naturally perfected brows. The buildable color allows you to achieve your ideal eyebrow shape, and you'll find that filling and refining your brows has never been easier. The **Rimmel Brow Pen** is smudge-proof and sweat-proof, ensuring worry-free brows all day long. Sculpt your eyebrows stroke by stroke with the precise tip, filling in gaps and shaping as desired. For the most natural effect, follow the direction of your brow hairs to create fine, hair-like strokes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Brow Pen**
â­ For the most natural effect, follow the direction of your brow hairs to create fine, hair-like strokes.
â­ Use the precise tip to fill in gaps and shape your brows as desired.
â­ The color is buildable to adjust coverage intensity as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Brow Pen**
â­ Smudge-proof formula.
â­ Sweat-proof formula.
â­ Fine tip for drawing natural-looking hair strokes.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled lip perfection with **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips** - 440 Maroon Swoon. This revolutionary lipstick delivers up to 16 hours of high-impact, endless color that is completely transfer-proof. Enjoy lips that feel smooth and moisturized all day long, leaving a stunning finish that enhances your natural beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**:
â­ Step 1 (2.3ml): Apply the color and allow to dry for 60 seconds until the product sets.
â­ Step 2 (1.6g): Apply top coat to seal color, hydrate and add shine.
â­ To remove **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**, use an oil-based makeup remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**:
â­ ISODODECANE
â­ TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE
â­ DIMETHICONE
â­ MICA
â­ DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE
â­ PROPYLENE CARBONATE
â­ TALC
â­ PROPYLPARABEN
â­ PARFUM/FRAGRANCE
â­ BENZYL BENZOATE
â­ BENZYL SALICYLATE
â­ BENZYL CINNAMATE
â­ LINALOOL

title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªÙŠÙ†Ø¬ ÙÙŠÙ†ÙŠØ´ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¶ØºÙˆØ·Ø© - Ø¯Ø±Ø¬Ø© 004 Ø±ÙˆØ² Ø§ÙŠÙÙˆØ±ÙŠ Ø¨ÙŠØ¬
description_en:
Achieve a flawless look that lasts all day with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder**. Experience shine-free skin and a silky-smooth feel with this lightweight powder that provides medium, buildable coverage for a natural and radiant finish. This vegan formula is transfer-proof, sweat and water-resistant, dermatologist-tested, and gentle on sensitive skin, ensuring it won't clog pores. Perfect for all skin types, it offers long-lasting wear and a beautiful matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder**:
â­ Using the included sponge or a foundation brush, apply the compact powder foundation on top of moisturised skin.
â­ Start at the centre of your face and blend outwards for an even, flawless finish.
â­ Layer the product as needed to build extra coverage in specific areas.
â­ For best results, finish with a setting spray to lock your makeup in place all day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder**:
â­ MICA, TALC, DIMETHICONE, TITANIUM DIOXIDE [nano].
â­ ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, METHICONE, METHYL METHACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER.
â­ CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, ALUMINA, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE.
â­ HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE, BHT, AQUA/WATER/EAU.
â­ [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-:IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)].

description_en:
Achieve the perfect gel-like manicure at home with **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish**. Enjoy a high-shine, chip-resistant, and long-lasting finish that lasts up to 14 days without any UV lamp. Get professional-looking nails with ease.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish**:
â­ Step 1: Apply 1-2 coats of **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish**.
â­ Step 2: Wait for nails to dry completely.
â­ Step 3: Sweep Super Gel Top Coat over the top to activate curing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol.
â­ Tosylamide/epoxy Resin, Styrene/acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Triphenyl Phosphate.
â­ Phosphoric Acid, Lithothamniom Calcareum Extract, N-butyl Alcohol, Mannitol, Dimethicone.
â­ Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Hydrolyzed Conchiolin Protein, Methylparaben.
â­ May Contain: Titanium Dioxide, D&c Red No. 6 Barium Lake, Fd&c Yellow No. 5 Aluminum Lake, D&c Red No. 7 Calcium Lake, Manganese Violet.

description_en:
Experience the ultimate glassy shine with **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 150 Pink Candy**. This vibrant lip gloss delivers an intense, high-shine finish with a delicate, youthful pink hue for your lips. Its non-sticky, smooth formula glides on effortlessly, leaving lips feeling soft, hydrated, and luminous all day long. Perfect for adding a touch of glossy fun whether worn alone or over your favorite lipstick.

â­ High-shine, glassy finish for a plump, irresistible look.
â­ Non-sticky formula for comfortable, all-day wear.
â­ Moisturizes and hydrates lips, keeping them soft and smooth.
â­ Delicate Pink Candy shade offers a subtle, youthful glow suitable for all skin tones.
â­ Versatile use: wear alone for a fresh, natural look or over lipstick for added dimension and shine.
â­ Convenient applicator for precise and smooth application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 150 Pink Candy**:

â­ Antioxidant Berry Complex for lip protection.

title_ar: Ø¨Ø®Ø§Ø® Ù…Ø«Ø¨Øª Ø§Ù„Ù…ÙƒÙŠØ§Ø¬ Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ø§ØªØ´ Ø¨Ø±ÙÙŠÙƒØ´Ù† - Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ù†Ù‡Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ© Ù…Ø·ÙÙŠØ© ØªØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Experience a revolution in makeup setting with the **Rimmel Match Perfection RG Set & Fix Spray**. Achieve makeup that stays flawless for hours with its unique 2-in-1 formula that acts as both a primer and a setting spray. It can be applied before makeup to prep the skin or after to lock it in place, providing a perfect matte finish. It dries quickly, ensuring your makeup stays put all day, and can be used throughout the day to refresh and revive your look. Get a perfect, fresh makeup look that lasts with **Rimmel Match Perfection RG Set & Fix Spray**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Match Perfection RG Set & Fix Spray**:
â­ After applying makeup, hold the bottle 8 inches from your face.
â­ Close your eyes and spray evenly in circular motions to cover the entire face.
â­ Can be used throughout the day to refresh and revive your makeup.
â­ Apply before makeup to prime the skin for a more durable effect.
â­ Avoid spraying directly into eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Match Perfection RG Set & Fix Spray**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ PVP
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Parfum (Fragrance)

#SaudiMakeup #SettingSpray #RimmelLondon #MakeupFixer #ProfessionalMakeup #LongLastingMakeup #MatteFinish #BeautyKSA #MakeupInstagram #MakeupArtist

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 60 Ø³ÙƒÙ†Ø¯Ø³ Ø³Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙŠÙ…Ø± - 150 Ø³Ø§Ù†Ø¯ÙŠ ØªÙˆØ²
description_en:
Achieve a glossy summer look with **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 150 Sandy Toes**. This fast-drying nail polish delivers high-impact color with an ultra-shiny finish in just 60 seconds.

It's chip- and fade-resistant for up to 10 days of flawless wear, making it the perfect choice for quick and lasting manicures. Celebrate creativity with these fun-loving, playful shades or shimmery neutrals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 150 Sandy Toes**:
â­ Offers precise application in just one stroke with no downtime.
â­ Apply the color to your nails with a downward stroke and leave to dry for one minute.
â­ No UV lamps needed.
â­ For a more intensely colored finish, add an extra coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Seconds Summer Shimmer - 150 Sandy Toes**:
â­ ETHYL ACETATE, BUTYL ACETATE, NITROCELLULOSE.
â­ ACETYL TRIBUTYL CITRATE, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL.
â­ TOSYLAMIDE/EPOXY RESIN, STYRENE/ACRYLATES COPOLYMER.
â­ SILICA, STEARALKONIUM BENTONITE.
â­ TRIPHENYL PHOSPHATE, ADIPIC ACID/NEOPENTYL GLYCOL/ TRIMELLITIC ANHYDRIDE COPOLYMER.
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU, DIACETONE ALCOHOL, ETOCRYLENE, KAOLIN.
â­ ACETONE, GLYCIDYL NEODECANOATE/PHTHALIC ANHYDRIDE/TMP CROSSPOLYMER.
â­ CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE, BENZOPHENONE-1, MEK.
â­ May Contain/ Peut Contenir/+/-: MICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE, IRON OXIDES, ALUMINUM POWDER, and various colors (CI 77891, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499, CI 77000, CI 15880, CI 47000, CI 19140, CI 15850, CI 77742, CI 77007, CI 77510, CI 42090, CI 60725).

#NailPolish #Rimmel #Makeup #Beauty #NailCare #Manicure #SummerNails #Shimmer #NailColor #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined lips with the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Automatic Lip Liner - 105 Spell-Mauve**. This creamy lip liner glides on effortlessly, thanks to its formula enriched with waxes and oils, ensuring a smooth and even application. Its automatic twist-up design means no sharpening is ever needed, providing long-lasting wear and the secret to your perfect pout. Ideal for defining your natural lip line or creating a fuller, more glamorous look while enhancing your lipstick's staying power and preventing color bleed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Automatic Lip Liner - 105 Spell-Mauve**:
â­ Define your natural lip line with precision.
â­ Use the automatic tip to draw slightly outside the lip contour for a fuller, more glamorous pout.
â­ Blend the liner with your fingertips.
â­ Apply your favorite lipstick shade over it for a long-lasting result that prevents color bleeding.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Automatic Lip Liner - 105 Spell-Mauve**:
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Polyethylene
â­ Synthetic Wax
â­ Castor Seed Oil
â­ Shea Butter
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Natural Pigments

description_en:
Experience timeless beauty with **Rimmel Lasting Matte Rg Lipstick - 710- Beige**. This lipstick offers a superior experience with a natural soft matte finish and easy application. Our innovative formula combines pure pigments with blur-effect powders and balm-like conditioners for soft, attractive lips all day long. **Rimmel Lasting Matte Rg Lipstick - 710- Beige** is available in 15 enchanting shades to suit all skin tones and your looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Matte Rg Lipstick - 710- Beige**:
â­ Start by applying the lipstick to your upper lip, beginning from the center and moving towards the corners.
â­ Repeat the process on your lower lip.
â­ For a more precise definition, use a lip liner in a similar shade before applying the lipstick.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Matte Rg Lipstick - 710- Beige**:
â­ Pure pigments.
â­ Blur-effect powders.
â­ Balm-like conditioners.
â­ Lightweight formula.
â­ Paraben-free (if applicable).
â­ Velvety matte finish.

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ù†Ø¯Ù† Ø³ÙƒÙ†Ø¯Ù„ Ø§ÙŠØ² Ø£ÙˆØªÙˆ Ù„Ø§ÙŠÙ†Ø± - 005 Ø£Ø¨ÙŠØ¶ Ø«Ù„Ø¬ÙŠ
description_en:
Discover ultimate allure with the **Rimmel London Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner**, designed to give your eyes irresistible definition and deep color impact. Its creamy, waterproof formula ensures exceptional wear for up to 24 hours without smudging or fading, making it your perfect choice for a complete and bold look all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel London Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner**
* Apply your shade of **Rimmel London Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner** to the upper lash line, gliding lightly across from the inner corner to the outer corner of the eye.
* Using fingers, lightly blend over the line to smoke eyeliner upwards and outwards, for a touch of smoky charm.
* Retrace eyeliner over the upper lash line to add definition to this smokey look.
* Finish by applying mascara to complete the look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel London Scandal'Eyes Auto Liner**
* Effortlessly gliding eyeliner pencil.
* Creamy, soft-feel formula.
* Waterproof.
* Long-lasting wear up to 24 hours.
* High color impact.

**Rimmel Kind & Free** Nail Polish - 100% vegan, free from fragrance*, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients. Experience a clean, plant-based formula that delivers brilliant shine, rich pigment, and healthy-looking nails.
