description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**. This foundation offers unbeatable hydration and up to 35 hours of wear, providing full coverage with a natural-looking finish. Clinically proven to improve skin radiance, its cruelty-free and vegan formula is infused with hyaluronic acid, vitamin E, and niacinamide, plus SPF20 for sun protection.

Product Features:
â­ Full coverage for a uniform, flawless complexion.
â­ Up to 35-hour wear, perfect for a long day.
â­ Breathable formula to keep skin comfortable.
â­ Clinically proven to improve skin radiance.
â­ Cruelty-free and vegan, kind to the environment and animals.
â­ Enriched with hyaluronic acid and vitamin E for extra hydration.
â­ Contains 2% niacinamide for skin-enhancing benefits.
â­ SPF20 for protection against sun rays.
â­ Sleep-proof, waterproof, crease-resistant, and transfer-resistant for a perfect look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**:
â­ Apply the foundation using a brush, sponge, or fingertips and blend well into the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ 2% Niacinamide.
â­ Cruelty-free and vegan formula.

#Rimmel #Foundation #FullCoverage #HydratingFoundation #MakeupSaudi #Beauty #HealthySkin #ProfessionalMakeup #Cosmetics #LongWearMakeup

description_en:
Elevate your look with **Rimmel Wonderswipe 2-in-1 Liner to Shadow 014 Fashun - Silver**. Transform your eyes with a single swipe, as the bold metallic liner transforms into shimmering eyeshadow when blended with your fingertips.

â­ Dual-ended innovation: Use it as a bold metallic eyeliner or a vibrant, shimmering eyeshadow.
â­ 16 intensely pigmented metallic shades to suit every look.
â­ Smudge-proof, transfer-proof, and touch-proof for up to 10 hours.
â­ Touch-proof wear ensures your makeup stays flawless all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Wonderswipe 2-in-1 Liner to Shadow 014 Fashun - Silver**:
â­ Step 1: For a dramatic liner look, glide the shade directly onto the upper lash line.
â­ Step 2: For a sparkling glitter shadow look, use fingertips to blend the line upwards and outwards.
â­ Step 3: Frame eyes and complete your look by applying your favorite mascara.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Wonderswipe 2-in-1 Liner to Shadow 014 Fashun - Silver**:
â­ Liquid formulations rich in metallic pigments and shimmer particles.
â­ Fixing agents for smudge and transfer resistance.
â­ Vitamins and moisturizing ingredients for skin care.

#Rimmel #Wonderswipe #Eyeshadow #Eyeliner #MakeupSA #SaudiMakeup #BeautySA #ShimmerEyes #LinerGoals #FashunSilver

description_en:
Get the ultimate HD look with high-color impact with the **Rimmel Kind & Free Eyeliner**.

The **Rimmel Kind & Free Eyeliner** is 100% vegan and made with Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified wood, making looking your best more environmentally conscious. This cruelty-free eyeliner glides on effortlessly with an ultra-creamy, buttery texture for a seriously eye-popping look.

Available in 5 stunning, prestige-inspired shades for all occasions. Live the London look!

â­ Instantly defines and enhances eyes with super-rich, high-color impact.
â­ Ultra-creamy and buttery texture allows it to glide around eyes effortlessly.
â­ Clean, 100% vegan, skin-caring, cruelty-free formula.
â­ Eco-friendly packaging made with Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified wood.
â­ Available in 5 stunning & inspired shades, ensuring you always look amazing.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Eyeliner**:
â­ Effortlessly glide on the lash line.
â­ Blend out quickly for a soft pigmented look, or leave it as-is for a bold and vibrant cat eye.
â­ Finish with a Rimmel Mascara for extra volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Eyeliner**:
â­ C10-18 TRIGLYCERIDES
â­ MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX / CERA MICROCRISTALLINA
â­ HYDROGENATED COCONUT OIL
â­ HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL
â­ BEHENYL ALCOHOL
â­ RHUS SUCCEDANEA FRUIT WAX
â­ CETYL PALMITATE
â­ SORBITAN PALMITATE
â­ COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX / COPERNICIA CERIFERA CERA
â­ HYDROGENATED COCO-GLYCERIDES
â­ MYRISTYL MYRISTATE
â­ STEARALKONIUM HECTORITE
â­ PROPYLENE CARBONATE
â­ BIOTIN
â­ PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-t-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE
â­ [MAY CONTAIN(+/-) : TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), BLUE 1 LAKE (CI 42090), BLACK 2 (CI 77266) [NANO], YELLOW 5 LAKE (CI 19140)].

#Rimmel #KindAndFree #VeganMakeup #CrueltyFreeBeauty #Eyeliner #CleanBeauty #SaudiMakeup #KSABeauty #MakeupLover #EyeMakeup

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined lips with the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 125 - Radiant Pink**. Experience a long-lasting, flawless definition with our creamy, gliding texture that sculpts your lips for all-day perfection. The **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 125 - Radiant Pink** is available in 14 vibrant shades, making it easy to find your perfect match for any lipstick.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 125 - Radiant Pink**:
â­ Start by tracing your upper lip line from the cupid's bow to the corners.
â­ Repeat for the lower lip.
â­ For a fuller look, fill in your lips with the liner before applying lipstick.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 125 - Radiant Pink**:
â­ Creamy, gliding formula for easy application and seamless blending.
â­ Rich, vibrant shades.
â­ Long-wearing formula.

#LipLiner #RimmelLondon #Makeup #PinkLips #LipDefinition #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #LipCare #Cosmetics #OOTD

title_en: Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 100 Coco Suga | High-Shine Lip Gloss
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø«Ø±ÙŠÙ„ Ø³ÙŠÙƒØ± Ø¬Ù„Ø§Ø³ÙŠ Ø¬Ù„ÙˆØ³ 100 - ÙƒÙˆÙƒÙˆ Ø³ÙˆØ¬Ø§ | Ù…Ù„Ù…Ø¹ Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚ Ø§Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù†
description_en:
Experience irresistible shine with **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 100 Coco Suga**. This ultra-glossy lip gloss delivers vibrant color with a dazzling, glass-like finish. Indulge in a delicious coconut scent and a non-sticky formula that glides on smoothly, providing instant hydration and a plump, alluring look. The perfect Coco Suga shade offers a warm, sweet caramel-brown hue, ideal for everyday wear or adding a special touch to any makeup look.

â­ Ultra-high glassy finish for a mirror-like shine.
â­ Smooth, non-sticky formula for comfortable wear.
â­ Deeply moisturizes lips, keeping them soft and supple.
â­ Delightful coconut fragrance for a sweet, tropical scent.
â­ Shade 100 - Coco Suga: A warm, desirable caramel-brown.
â­ Perfect for wearing alone or layering over lipstick for added dimension.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss**
â­ Prep your lips by exfoliating gently and applying a lip balm.
â­ Apply the gloss directly to your lips using the applicator for an even layer of color and shine.
â­ For a more intense effect, build up with additional layers or layer over your favorite lipstick.
â­ Reapply as needed to maintain shine and hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss**
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Antioxidant Berry Complex
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil: For hydrating and conditioning lips.

#RimmelLondon #LipGloss #ThrillSeeker #CocoSuga #HighShineGloss #SaudiBeauty #MakeupSaudi #LipCare #BeautyKSA #Oligopoly

description_en:
Experience intense, long-lasting lip color for up to 8 hours with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick** in the captivating Amethyst Shimmer shade. This creamy formula, enriched with vitamins A, C, and E, provides superior hydration and a subtle shimmer that gives lips a fuller, more attractive appearance. Perfect for an elegant look that embodies the modern London essence, this product glides on smoothly and maintains its wonderful color all day without reapplication.

â­ Intense lip color that lasts up to 8 hours.
â­ Enriched with vitamins A, C, & E for hydration and lip protection.
â­ Creamy texture glides on easily and provides a subtle shimmer.
â­ Gives lips a fuller, more attractive appearance.
â­ Available in various shades to suit all occasions and skin tones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick**:
â­ Step 1: Define your lips using a lip liner.
â­ Step 2: Apply **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick** directly from the bullet for bold, beautiful color payoff.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick**:
â­ Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil.
â­ Candelilla Cera (Candelilla) Wax.
â­ Enriched with Vitamins A, C, E.
â­ Contains natural extracts like Chamomile and Cucumber.

description_en:
Discover the beauty of your nails with **Rimmel Lasting Finish 856** Nail Polish. This polish delivers a high-shine, bold color that's anti-fade, chip-resistant, and lasts up to 10 days. Featuring a precision brush for quick, one-stroke application, you can achieve a professional finish effortlessly. Enjoy perfect, captivating nails with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish 856**:
â­ Start with a base coat. â­ Apply a thin layer of **Rimmel Lasting Finish 856**, from the base of the nail to the tip. â­ Allow to dry completely before applying a second coat if desired. â­ Finish with a top coat for protection and extra shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish 856**:
â­ Butyl Acetate â­ Ethyl Acetate â­ Nitrocellulose â­ Isopropyl Alcohol â­ Acetyl Tributyl Citrate â­ Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer â­ Acrylates Copolymer â­ Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer â­ Benzophenone-1 â­ Silica Dimethyl Silylate. Ingredients may vary.

description_en:
Achieve captivating lips with the **Rimmel Lasting Matte Rg Lipstick** in the alluring Pink shade, number 160. This lipstick boasts a unique formula that combines pure pigments with blur-effect powders and balm-like conditioners, delivering a natural, soft matte finish that lasts for hours.

âœ¨ **Product Features & Benefits:**
â­ Delivers rich color payoff with pure pigments.
â­ Provides a natural, soft matte finish for a sophisticated look.
â­ Offers long-lasting wear without drying out the lips.
â­ Features a comfortable, balm-like texture for hydrated lips.
â­ Available in 15 wearable shades to suit every style and occasion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Matte Rg Lipstick**:
â­ Apply the lipstick directly to clean, dry lips.
â­ For precise definition, use a lip liner beforehand.
â­ Can be applied in one coat for a natural look or layered for increased intensity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Matte Rg Lipstick**:
â­ Pure Pigments.
â­ Blur-effect Powders.
â­ Balm-like Conditioners.
â­ Mineral Oil.
â­ Paraffin Wax.
â­ Carnauba Wax.

Experience the superior power of **Rimmel Eye Make Up Remover 0513000**, specially formulated to gently and effectively remove all eye makeup, including long-lasting and waterproof formulas. Its advanced formula is perfectly suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers, ensuring a safe and comfortable cleansing experience. Effortlessly remove stubborn eye makeup in a single swipe, with high definition and emphasis on your eyes. Your smart choice for clear, captivating eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Eye Make Up Remover 0513000**
â­ Apply a small amount to a cotton pad.
â­ Press gently against your closed eyelid to loosen makeup.
â­ Use gentle strokes to remove makeup from the lids and lashes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Eye Make Up Remover 0513000**
â­ Gently removes all eye makeup, including long lasting.
â­ Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.
â­ Gentle yet effective formula.
â­ Relinquishes a high definition and emphasis to the eyes.

description_en:
Discover the secret to a shine-free complexion with **Rimmel Stay Matte** Pressed Powder in 030 Caramel. This lightweight powder is crafted to provide you with flawless, long-lasting coverage, imparting a natural-looking matte finish to your skin. Enjoy exceptional shine control for up to 6 hours, with an oil-free and paraben-free formula that perfectly suits all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Stay Matte**:
â­ Apply a light dusting with a brush and blend onto your skin to set your foundation and achieve a true matte look.
â­ Use it as a shine touch-up throughout the day with the puff as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Stay Matte**:
â­ Feather-light for all-day comfort.
â­ Delivers a natural, matte finish.
â­ Provides 6-hour shine control.
â­ Free from oils and parabens.
â­ Fits your skin type perfectly.

description_en:
Achieve a natural sun-kissed glow with **Rimmel London Natural Bronzer Powder**, Shade 001. This ultra-fine formula blends effortlessly to provide a natural bronzed color, mimicking the radiance of skin after a sunny day. Its lightweight texture feels barely there, making it perfect for a healthy-looking, radiant complexion. Ideal for those seeking a subtle, natural tan effect without the fuss. Let your skin glow with a sophisticated bronze touch with this versatile powder that offers buildable coverage and a natural finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel London Natural Bronzer Powder**
â­ Use a soft brush to apply the powder to areas you wish to warm and enhance, such as cheekbones, forehead, and the bridge of the nose.
â­ Blend well for a natural color gradient.
â­ Can be used for subtle contouring or an all-over radiant finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel London Natural Bronzer Powder**
â­ Talc, Mica, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Magnesium Stearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Polybutene, Methylparaben, Tocopheryl Acetate, Propylparaben, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Paraffinum Liquidum/Mineral Oil/Huile Minerale, Parfum/Fragrance, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract.

#Rimmel #Bronzer #NaturalGlow #Makeup #Beauty #HealthySkin #SunKissed #FaceMakeup #BeautyTips #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined lips with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Automatic Lip Liner - 070 Enchantment Pink**. This creamy formula glides on smoothly, delivering precise definition and helping your lipstick stay put longer. Its automatic twist-up tip never needs sharpening, and it comes in six stunning shades to unlock your perfect pout.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Automatic Lip Liner - 070 Enchantment Pink**:
â­ Define your natural lip line or slightly exaggerate it by drawing just outside the contour for a fuller, more glamorous pout.
â­ Blend the liner with your fingertips, then apply your favorite Rimmel London lipstick shade for a long-lasting finish.
â­ Prevents color bleed and enhances your natural lip color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Automatic Lip Liner - 070 Enchantment Pink**:
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Polyethylene
â­ Synthetic Wax

description_en:
Achieve flawless, natural-looking skin with **Rimmel Match Perfection Foundation**. This innovative foundation blends seamlessly with your unique complexion, providing an undetectable, perfect match in any light. Its moisture-rich formula, infused with SPF20, ensures your skin looks visibly perfected, healthy, and protected, keeping it hydrated for up to 24 hours.

â­ Blends seamlessly for a perfect, natural match.
â­ Invisible, mistake-proof coverage.
â­ Lightweight, smooth texture.
â­ Hydrates skin and reduces imperfections, pores, and dark circles.
â­ Offers SPF20 sun protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Match Perfection Foundation**:
â­ Step 1: Using a foundation brush, sponge, or fingertips, smooth the foundation onto your skin.
â­ Step 2: Dot and blend the Match Perfection Concealer under eyes to complete your look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Match Perfection Foundation**:
â­ 24-hour moisture complex.
â­ SPF20.
â­ Finely dispersed pigments for perfect skin matching.
â­ Lightweight liquid formula.

description_en:
Achieve the ultimate HD look with the **Rimmel Kind & Free** Eyeliner in Soft Orchard. This 100% vegan and cruelty-free eyeliner delivers rich color payoff and an ultra-creamy, buttery texture that glides effortlessly for precise lines or bold looks. Made with FSC-certified wood, it's an environmentally conscious choice for your eyes.

â­ Ultimate HD look with high-color impact.
â­ 100% vegan and cruelty-free formula.
â­ Ultra-creamy and buttery texture for effortless gliding.
â­ Eco-friendly packaging made with FSC-certified wood.
â­ Available in 5 stunning, prestige-inspired shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ Effortlessly glide onto the lash line.
â­ Blend out quickly for a soft pigmented look, or leave as-is for a bold, vibrant cat eye.
â­ Finish with a Rimmel Mascara for extra volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ C10-18 TRIGLYCERIDES
â­ MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX
â­ HYDROGENATED COCONUT OIL
â­ BIOTIN
â­ [MAY CONTAIN(+/-) : TITANIUM DIOXIDE, IRON OXIDES, BLUE 1 LAKE, BLACK 2, YELLOW 5 LAKE]

description_en:
Experience the ultimate in long-lasting lip colour with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Soft Matte Lipstick**. This luxurious lipstick boasts a creamy texture and a highly-pigmented formula that creates a stunning, velvety lip look in seconds. Enjoy rich, vibrant colour that stays put for up to eight hours, giving you a flawless and bold pout that lasts all day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Soft Matte Lipstick**:
â­ Step 1: Define your lips using a lip liner for a precise application.
â­ Step 2: Glide **Rimmel Lasting Finish Soft Matte Lipstick** onto lips in one smooth stroke for a rich, daring, and flawless colour.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Soft Matte Lipstick**:
â­ Shea Butter for intense hydration.
â­ Vitamin E for lip protection.
â­ High-pigment formula for long-lasting colour.
â­ Creamy texture for a smooth feel.

description_en:
For a radiant and revitalized finish, discover the **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation** - 100 Mocha. This innovative product brightens, corrects, and revives your skin, making it an essential addition to your beauty routine.

â­ Brightens, corrects, and revives skin for an awake appearance.
â­ Buildable formula with a radiant finish.
â­ Infused with caffeine to wake up skin, vitamin C to brighten and even skin tone, and 2% niacinamide for firmer-looking skin.
â­ Features a facial tool-inspired applicator, perfect for targeted areas or all-over face application.
â­ Contours and massages with a cooling feeling.
â­ Skin looks depuffed and refreshed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**:
â­ Contour and massage the skin with the cooling metallic applicator.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Isododecane, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Triethyl Citrate, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Mica, Sodium Chloride, Caffeine, Silica, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Benzoate, Methicone, Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol.

#Foundation #Concealer #RiyadhMakeup #JeddahMakeup #KhobarMakeup #SaudiMakeup #Rimmel #HealthySkin #RadiantSkin #Skincare

description_en:
Experience healthy, luminous nails with **Rimmel Kind & Free Nail Polish - 159 Midnight Sky**. Our first clean makeup that works, it's 100% vegan & kind to animals, free from fragrance*, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients. This plant-based, clean formula delivers on shine, gloss, and rich pigment, all while keeping your nails healthy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Nail Polish - 159 Midnight Sky**
â­ Step 1: Starting with clean, dry nails, paint nails with 3 strokes from base to tip: 1 for each side and 1 for the middle.
â­ Step 2: Once dry, apply a second coat if needed, and allow to dry completely.
â­ For a dazzling shine, apply a topcoat after the second coat has dried.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Nail Polish - 159 Midnight Sky**
â­ Ethyl acetate
â­ Butyl acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic acid/neopentyl glycol/trimellitic anhydride copolymer
â­ Acetyl

description_en:
Discover the beauty of your nails with **Rimmel Kind & Free** Nail Polish, a 100% vegan formula free from fragrance*, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients. It provides your nails with exceptional shine and rich pigment while keeping them healthy. This clean polish ensures a radiant look without compromise.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ Step 1: Start with clean, dry nails. Apply the polish in three even strokes from base to tip: one for each side and one in the middle.
â­ Step 2: Once the first coat is dry, apply a second coat if needed and allow it to dry completely.
â­ Step 3: For dazzling shine and extra protection, apply a topcoat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free**:
â­ Ethyl acetate
â­ Butyl acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic acid/neopentyl glycol/trimellitic anhydride copolymer
â­ Acetyl

description_en:
Discover the beauty of healthy nails with **Rimmel Kind & Free** Nail Polish, a 100% vegan and clean formula that delivers rich color and exceptional shine without compromise. This polish is completely free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients, caring for your nails while adorning them with elegance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free** Nail Polish:
â­ Step 1: Start with clean, dry nails. Apply one coat of nail polish using three even strokes from the base to the tip: one on each side and one in the middle.
â­ Step 2: Once the first coat is dry, apply a second coat if you desire more color intensity. For dazzling shine and long-lasting wear, finish with a topcoat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free** Nail Polish:
â­ Ethyl acetate
â­ Butyl acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic acid/neopentyl glycol/trimellitic anhydride copolymer
â­ Acetyl

description_en:
**Rimmel Contour Face Kit - Bronze (003)** is a clever combo of three powder shades â€“ a highlighter, contour, and blush â€“ that seamlessly blend with your natural skin tone to create a perfectly sculpted look. This kit works with every face shape and skin tone, adding definition and structure for a beautifully enhanced complexion. Achieve a natural, fresh look or go bold for a dramatic sculpted effect with **Rimmel Contour Face Kit - Bronze (003)**.

â­ Highlight, blusher & contour in one palette.
â­ Works with every face shape and skin tone.
â­ Adds definition and structure.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Contour Face Kit - Bronze (003)**:
This kit makes sculpting and contouring as easy as 1, 2, 3:

â­ Step 1: Apply the soft shimmer highlighter to highlight areas that naturally catch the light â€“ cheekbones, brow bones, the center of the chin, forehead, and bridge of the nose.
â­ Step 2: Use the darker shading powder to contour and recede areas of the face you donâ€™t want to emphasize, such as the sides of the nose, jawline, and hairline.
â­ Step 3: Add the shimmer powder blush for definition and color to the cheeks, and to add warmth to the entire face.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Contour Face Kit - Bronze (003)**:
This innovative formula combines highlighter powder, contour powder, and blush powder to deliver a complete makeup experience.

#Rimmel #ContourKit #FaceSculpting #HighlightAndContour #MakeupEssentials #BeautySaudi #SaudiBeauty #MakeupAddict #GetTheLook #Cosmetics

description_en:
Experience thrill with the **Rimmel Volume Thrill Seeker Waterproof Mascara**, designed to give you bold volume without the weight. This creamy, whipped vegan formula is enriched with lash-loving panthenol to enhance lash health. The hourglass mascara brush grips each lash for a thrilling, voluminous effect from root to tip, making the **Rimmel Volume Thrill Seeker Waterproof Mascara** your perfect choice for stunning lashes all day long.

Product Features:
â­ Volumising and waterproof Rimmel mascara, quick and easy to apply.
â­ Creamy, rich vegan formula.
â­ Contains lash-loving panthenol.
â­ Hourglass-shaped brush to grip every lash.
â­ Waterproof formula for 24hr long-lasting wear.
â­ Provides instant bold volume.
â­ Vegan, smudge-proof, flake-proof, and clump-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Volume Thrill Seeker Waterproof Mascara**:
â­ Step 1: Swipe the mascara from root to tip in a zig-zag motion.
â­ Step 2: Layer up to achieve bold volume and outlandish length.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Volume Thrill Seeker Waterproof Mascara**:
â­ Creamy vegan formula.
â­ Lash-loving panthenol.
â­ Waterproof ingredients.

#RimmelMascara #VoluminousLashes #EyeMakeup #WaterproofMascara #LongLashes #SaudiBeauty #Cosmetics #Foundation #Powder #Highlighter

title_en: Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 250 Peachy Vibes - High-Shine Glassy Finish
title_ar: Ù…Ù„Ù…Ø¹ Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø«Ø±ÙŠÙ„ Ø³ÙŠÙƒØ± Ø¬Ù„Ø§Ø³ÙŠ Ø¬Ù„ÙˆØ³ 250 Ø¨ÙŠØªØ´ÙŠ ÙØ§ÙŠØ¨Ø² - Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ù†Ù‡Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ© Ø²Ø¬Ø§Ø¬ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø±Ø§Ù‚Ø©
description_en:
Achieve irresistibly glossy lips with the **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss 250 Peachy Vibes**. This high-shine lip gloss delivers a stunning, mirror-like finish with a refreshing peachy tint. Perfect for a natural look or to add a touch of radiance to your favorite lipstick, this gloss offers a comfortable, non-sticky formula that hydrates and smooths your lips all day long. Enjoy the warm peachy shade and a light, fruity scent that makes application a delightful experience.

â­ **High-Shine Glassy Finish:** Delivers an intense, mirror-like shine for fuller, more captivating lips.
â­ **Comfortable Non-Sticky Formula:** Experience a smooth, lightweight texture that glides on effortlessly without any sticky feel.
â­ **Moisturizing & Smoothing:** Enriched with nourishing ingredients to keep your lips soft, smooth, and hydrated throughout the day.
â­ **Natural Peachy Tint:** A hint of warm peach color adds a youthful, fresh look to your lips.
â­ **Refreshing Fruity Scent:** Lightly fragranced for a pleasant application experience.
â­ **Versatile Wear:** Great worn alone for a subtle glow or layered over lipstick for amplified shine.

ğŸ”¹ **Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss**:
â­ Prep your lips by exfoliating and hydrating them.
â­ Apply the gloss directly to your lips using the applicator.
â­ For deeper color or more shine, layer additional coats.
â­ Can be worn over lipstick to enhance shine.
â­ Reapply as needed to keep lips hydrated.

ğŸ”¹ **Ingredients of **Rimmel Thrill Seeker Glassy Gloss**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Anti-oxidant berry complex

#Rimmel #LipGloss #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #GlossyLips #MakeupSaudi #LipCare #Lipstick #DailyMakeup #LipHydration

description_en:
Discover a natural, healthy glow with **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint Foundation - 400 Natural**. Our first clean makeup that works, with no compromises. This foundation is 100% vegan, kind to animals, and free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients. It provides a moisturizing skin tint made with beneficial ingredients that are good for you and the planet.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint Foundation - 400 Natural**

â­ Step 1: Squeeze out a pea-sized amount and apply to skin with your favorite method: fingertips, brush, or sponge.
â­ For more coverage, simply apply a little more product until you achieve your desired look.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint Foundation - 400 Natural**

â­ 100% vegan ingredients.
â­ Free from fragrance and mineral oils.
â­ Free from animal-derived ingredients.
â­ Contains Aloe Vera Leaf Juice and Vitamin E.
â­ Lightweight and moisturizing formula.

#Rimmel #SkinTint #Foundation #VeganMakeup #CleanBeauty #NaturalCoverage #SaudiMakeup #BeautyKSA #Skincare #MakeupSA

description_en:
Experience the rich color and enchanting matte finish with **Rimmel Lasting Matte Lipstick - Red 170**. This lipstick boasts a unique formula that combines pure pigments with blur-effect powders for a long-lasting, natural soft matte finish. Enjoy effortless application for an unparalleled makeup experience. Available in 15 captivating shades to suit all looks and occasions.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Matte Lipstick - Red 170**

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Matte Lipstick - Red 170**

description_en:
Discover your natural radiance with **Rimmel Kind & Free Foundation 200 Soft Beige**. At Rimmel London, we believe â€œgood for usâ€ should mean good for all â€“ our wellbeing, our planet and our society. This moisturizing foundation offers a 100% vegan and Kind to Animals formula, making it a perfect choice for you and the environment.

Our lightweight, sheer formula evens skin-tone and blurs away imperfections while providing your skin with the hydration it needs. **Rimmel Kind & Free Foundation 200 Soft Beige** is infused with an antioxidant vitamin complex (E & B5) and aloe vera for a fresh glow and natural makeup finish. All our packaging is made with recycled and easily recyclable materials, reflecting our commitment to the planet.

Nourish your skin and let it glow with **Rimmel Kind & Free Foundation 200 Soft Beige** â€“ itâ€™s a better kind of beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Foundation 200 Soft Beige**:

â­ Squeeze out a pea-sized amount.
â­ Apply to your skin using your favorite method: fingertips, brush, or sponge.
â­ For more coverage, simply apply a little more product until you achieve your desired look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Foundation 200 Soft Beige**:

â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU, DICAPRYLYL CARBONATE, DICAPRYLYL ETHER, GLYCERIN, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, ALUMINUM STARCH OCTENYLSUCCINATE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, ZINC OXIDE [nano], TRI(POLYGLYCERYL-3/LAURYL) HYDROGENATED TRILINOLEATE, STEARALKONIUM BENTONITE, SILICA, CETYL PEG/PPG-10/1 DIMETHICONE, MICA, PROPYLENE CARBONATE, TOCOPHEROL, PANTHENOL, SODIUM BENZOATE, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, CHLORPHENESIN, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, METHICONE, PANTOLACTONE, BHT, PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/ +/-:TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

#RimmelLondon #Foundation #FaceMakeup #Skincare #NaturalCoverage #HydratingFoundation #VeganBeauty #CrueltyFreeMakeup #BeautyTips #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Achieve a naturally bronzed complexion with **Rimmel Natural Bronzer** powder from Rimmel London. Its ultra-fine formula blends effortlessly for a sunkissed look, mimicking the natural glow of a real tan. The versatile formula is incredibly light, feeling barely there, perfect for a healthy, radiant complexion. **Rimmel Natural Bronzer** is your secret to a natural glow.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Natural Bronzer**:
â­ Swirl your brush into the powder.
â­ Apply to areas you wish to enhance or add a bronzed color.
â­ Use to contour or to add an even sunkissed shade.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Natural Bronzer**:
â­ Talc, Mica, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Magnesium Stearate.
â­ Phenyl Trimethicone, Polybutene, Methylparaben.
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate, Propylparaben.
â­ Coconut Oil, Mineral Oil.
â­ Fragrance, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract.
â­ May Contain: Iron Oxides, Titanium Dioxide, Ultramarines.

title_en: Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish - 054 Trust You
title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø± Ø¬Ù„ Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± - 054 Trust You
description_en:
Achieve a professional gel manicure at home with **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish**.

Experience high-shine, chip-resistant, and long-lasting gel-like nails for up to 14 days, with no UV lamp required. It's super easy to apply and removes like regular nail polish, allowing you to switch shades effortlessly. Nailed it!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish**:
â­ Apply 1-2 coats of the nail polish.
â­ Allow nails to dry completely.
â­ Apply the Super Gel Top Coat to activate curing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate.
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol, Tosylamide/epoxy Resin, Styrene/acrylates Copolymer.
â­ Stearalkonium Bentonite, Triphenyl Phosphate.
â­ Phosphoric Acid, Lithothamniom Calcareum Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract.
â­ Nourishing oils and vitamins for nail health.

#Rimmel #SuperGel #NailPolish #GelNails #Manicure #NailCare #Beauty #Makeup #SaudiArabia #Riyadh

title_en: Rimmel Natural Bronzer Shade 004 - Natural Radiant Tan
title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù†Ø§ØªØ´ÙˆØ±Ø§Ù„ Ø¨Ø±ÙˆÙ†Ø²Ø± Ø±Ù‚Ù… 004 - Ø³Ù…Ø±Ø© Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ© Ù…ØªØ£Ù„Ù‚Ø©
description_en:
Achieve a natural sun-kissed glow with the **Rimmel Natural Bronzer** Shade 004, crafted with an ultra-fine formula to give your skin a beautiful bronze hue.

The soft and smooth powder blends effortlessly, creating a naturally sunkissed look that mimics the radiant glow of a real tan. Its versatile formula is infused with natural-looking pigments and feels incredibly lightweight, as if it's barely there. Perfect for achieving a healthy-looking, radiant complexion every day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Natural Bronzer**:
â­ Use a wide powder brush to pick up the desired amount.
â­ Gently sweep the bronzer onto the areas of your face you want to warm up and define, such as cheekbones, forehead, and nose.
â­ Blend thoroughly for an even distribution and a natural finish.
â­ Can be used for contouring or adding a touch of warmth to the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Natural Bronzer**:
â­ Talc
â­ Mica
â­ Magnesium Stearate
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract
â­ Parfum/Fragrance
â­ May also contain Iron Oxides, Titanium Dioxide, Ultramarines.

#RimmelLondon #NaturalBronzer #MakeupSaudi #BeautySaudi #FaceMakeup #BronzeGlow #SunKissedSkin #PowderBronzer #SaudiBeauty #RimmelBeauty

description_en:
Define your lips with the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 725 - Beige**, designed for precise application and long-lasting lip definition. Experience a creamy, gliding texture that smooths onto your lips, ensuring effortless application and a seamless blend with your favorite lipstick. Choose from 14 vibrant shades for an unparalleled makeup experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 725 - Beige**

â­ Apply the liner along the lip line for a precise and bold definition.
â­ Blend softly towards the center of the lips for a smoother finish.
â­ Use before lipstick to enhance color longevity and prevent feathering.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 725 - Beige**

â­ Long-wearing formula that gives your lips perfect definition all day.
â­ Creamy texture that allows for easy application and a smooth glide.
â­ Available in 14 vibrant shades to suit all preferences.
â­ For external use only.

Capture the edgy flair of London fashion with **Rimmel L.F Kate Coll - My Real Pink - 1423005**. description_en:
Experience unparalleled hydration and up to 35 hours of wear with the **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**. This is Rimmel's most hydrating long-wear foundation, offering full coverage with a natural-looking finish. It's clinically proven to improve skin radiance. Enjoy a clean (D5-free), vegan, and cruelty-free formula, enriched with Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, and 2% Niacinamide, plus SPF20. It's also sleep-proof, waterproof, crease-resistant, and transfer-resistant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**:
â­ Apply with a foundation brush, sponge, or fingertips to blend into the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Vitamin E
â­ 2% Niacinamide
â­ SPF20

description_en:
Achieve flawless skin all day long with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder**. This lightweight, soft-touch powder foundation controls shine without feeling dry on your face. The fine powder blends seamlessly to provide medium, buildable, natural-looking coverage that lasts all day. It comes in a convenient compact for easy on-the-go makeup refreshing.

**ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder:**

â­ Step 1: Using the included sponge or a foundation brush, apply the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder** onto moisturised skin.
â­ Start at the centre of your face and blend outwards for a flawless, all-day finish.
â­ Step 2: Use the sponge or brush to build coverage in areas where you need extra concealing.
â­ Step 3: For best results, finish with a spritz of Lasting Finish Setting Spray to lock your look in place.

**ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder:**

â­ Soft touch powder that lasts.
â­ Fine powder blends seamlessly for buildable yet lightweight coverage, that lasts all day and controls shine without feeling dry.
â­ Lightweight vegan powder foundation that controls shine without feeling dry.
â­ Medium buildable coverage, transfer-proof, sweat & water-resistant, vegan.
â­ Dermatologist-tested, suitable for sensitive skin, won't clog pores, and suitable for all skin types.
â­ Key Ingredients: MICA, TALC, DIMETHICONE, TITANIUM DIOXIDE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, METHICONE, METHYL METHACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, ALUMINA, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE, BHT, AQUA/WATER/EAU.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled hydration and up to 35 hours of wear with **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**, Rimmel's most hydrating long-wear foundation. This full-coverage foundation delivers a natural-looking finish and is clinically proven to enhance skin radiance. It features a clean (D5-free), cruelty-free, and vegan formula.

â­ Full coverage for a flawless complexion.
â­ Up to 35-hour unbeatable hydration and wear.
â­ Breathable formula for healthy-looking skin.
â­ Clinically proven to improve skin radiance.
â­ Cruelty-free and vegan.
â­ Infused with hyaluronic acid and vitamin E.
â­ Contains 2% niacinamide for added benefits.
â­ Provides SPF20 sun protection.
â­ Sleep-proof, waterproof, crease-resistant, and transfer-resistant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**:

â­ Apply this **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation** with a foundation brush, sponge, or fingertips to blend into the skin for unbeatable wear and coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**:

â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Niacinamide
â­ SPF20

description_en:
Wake up tired skin with the **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**! This innovative product combines the power of a foundation and the precision of a concealer to brighten, correct, and revive your skin. Its buildable formula delivers a radiant finish, infused with caffeine to awaken the skin, Vitamin C to brighten and even skin tone, and 2% niacinamide to promote firmer-looking skin.

â­ Combines concealer and foundation in one product.
â­ Buildable formula for customized coverage.
â­ Brightens and corrects skin imperfections.
â­ Enriched with Caffeine, Vitamin C, and Niacinamide for multiple benefits.
â­ Features a unique applicator for contouring and a cooling massage effect.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**
â­ Contour and massage with the cooling metallic applicator on this **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation** for a refreshing experience.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Multi-Tasker Wake Me Up Concealer & Foundation**
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Isododecane, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Niacinamide, Tri(Polyglyceryl-3/Lauryl) Hydrogenated Trilinoleate, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Triethyl Citrate, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Mica, Sodium Chloride, Caffeine, Silica, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Sodium Benzoate, Methicone, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)]

#Foundation #Concealer #FaceMakeup #Rimmel #RadiantSkin #SaudiBeauty #ProMakeup #RimmelConcealer #RimmelFoundation #FullCoverage

description_en:
Experience unbeatable hydration and up to 35HR wear with the **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35HR Hydration Foundation** - Rimmel's most hydrating long-wear foundation. This full-coverage foundation delivers a natural-looking finish and is clinically proven to improve skin radiance. A clean (D5-free), cruelty-free, and vegan formula.

âœ¨ Product Features:
â­ Full coverage
â­ Up to 35HR wear
â­ Breathable formula
â­ Clinically proven to improve skin radiance
â­ Cruelty-free and vegan
â­ Infused with hyaluronic acid, vitamin E
â­ 2% niacinamide
â­ SPF20
â­ Sleep-proof, waterproof, crease-resistant, transfer-resistant

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35HR Hydration Foundation**:
â­ Apply this **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35HR Hydration Foundation** with a foundation brush, sponge, or fingertips to blend into the skin for unbeatable wear and coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35HR Hydration Foundation**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Niacinamide

title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¶ØºÙˆØ·Ø© Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªÙŠÙ†Ø¬ ÙÙŠÙ†ÙŠØ´ - 005 Ø¹Ø§Ø¬ÙŠ-Ø¨ÙŠØ¬
description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder Foundation**. This lightweight, soft-touch powder foundation is expertly formulated to control shine without leaving your skin feeling dry. 

The fine powder blends seamlessly to provide medium, buildable coverage with a natural-looking finish that lasts all day. It comes in a convenient compact container, perfect for easy on-the-go makeup touch-ups.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder Foundation**:
â­ Step 1: Using the included sponge or a foundation brush, apply the compact powder foundation onto moisturised skin. Start at the centre and blend outwards for a flawless all-day finish.
â­ Step 2: Use the sponge or brush to build coverage in areas where you need extra help.
â­ Step 3: For best results, finish with a Lasting Finish Setting Spray to lock your look in place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Powder Foundation**:
â­ Soft-touch powder that lasts.
â­ Medium buildable coverage, transfer-proof, sweat & water-resistant.
â­ Lightweight vegan formula controls shine without feeling dry.
â­ Dermatologist tested, suitable for sensitive skin, and will not clog pores.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.
â­ Key Ingredients: MICA, TALC, DIMETHICONE, TITANIUM DIOXIDE [NANO], ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, METHICONE, METHYL METHACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, ALUMINA, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE, BHT, AQUA/WATER/EAU, [MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR/+/-: IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)].

#RimmelPowder #FaceMakeup #SaudiMakeup #MakeupSaudi #CompactPowder #LastingFinish #RimmelLondon #NaturalCoverage #FlawlessSkin #OnlineShopping

shortdescription_en: Rimmel Lasting Finish Powder: Long-lasting natural coverage, controls shine without dryness. Perfect for everyday.

title_en: Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Face Powder - 011 Caramel-Beige
title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¶ØºÙˆØ·Ø© Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªÙŠÙ†Ø¬ ÙÙŠÙ†ÙŠØ´ Ø±Ù‚Ù… 011 - Caramel-Beige
description_en:
**Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Face Powder - 011 Caramel-Beige** is a lightweight, soft-touch powder foundation, meticulously crafted to provide you with flawless coverage and a natural, long-lasting finish.

This powder excels at controlling shine without leaving your skin feeling dry, giving your face a desirable matte look. Its fine texture blends seamlessly to offer medium, buildable coverage, allowing you to achieve your desired look, whether it's natural or more intense. It comes in a sleek and convenient compact for easy on-the-go makeup touch-ups.

â­ Soft touch powder that lasts.
â­ Buildable medium coverage with a natural finish.
â­ Controls shine without feeling dry.
â­ Transfer-proof, sweat & water-resistant.
â­ Vegan and dermatologist-tested.
â­ Non-comedogenic, suitable for sensitive skin and all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Face Powder - 011 Caramel-Beige**:
Step 1: Using the included sponge or a makeup brush, apply the compact powder foundation on top of moisturised skin. Start at the center and blend outwards for a flawless all-day finish.
Step 2: Use the sponge or brush to build up coverage in areas you need extra.
Step 3: For best results, finish with the Lasting Finish Setting Spray to hold in place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Face Powder - 011 Caramel-Beige**:
â­ MICA
â­ TALC
â­ DIMETHICONE
â­ TITANIUM DIOXIDE [nano]
â­ ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE
â­ METHICONE
â­ METHYL METHACRYLATECROSSPOLYMER
â­ CAPRYLYL GLYCOL
â­ PHENOXYETHANOL
â­ ALUMINA
â­ SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE
â­ HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE
â­ BHT
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU
â­ [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)].

description_en:
Discover the **Rimmel Lasting Matte Lipstick - 560 Red**, a long-lasting lipstick that provides a natural, soft matte finish with incredibly easy application. Our unique formula combines pure pigments with blur-effect powders and balm-like conditioners for ultimate comfort. Available in 15 wearable shades to complement every lip.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Matte Lipstick - 560 Red**
â­ Apply the lipstick from the center of your upper lip to the outer edges.
â­ Repeat the process for the lower lip.
â­ For a more defined look, use a lip liner in a matching shade before applying the lipstick.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Matte Lipstick - 560 Red**
â­ Pure Pigments.
â­ Blur-effect Powders.
â­ Balm-like Conditioners.
â­ Lightweight, long-lasting formula.

shortdescription_en: Long-lasting matte lipstick with a natural finish. Our unique formula gives you soft, captivating lips.

title_en: Rimmel London Mega Matte Liquid Lipstick - Pink Blink 200
title_ar: Ø±ÙˆØ¬ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ù…ÙŠØºØ§ Ù…Ø§Øª Ù…Ù† Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ù†Ø¯Ù† - Ø¯Ø±Ø¬Ø© 200 Ø¨ÙŠÙ†Ùƒ Ø¨Ù„ÙŠÙ†Ùƒ
description_en:
Discover Rimmel London's Mega Matte Liquid Lipstick in Pink Blink 200, your go-to for long-lasting, mega-matte lips. This cruelty-free and vegan formula melts onto your lips, delivering a colour-drenched matte finish that lasts up to 16 hours. 

Our Mega Matte liquid lipstick is super hydrating, infused with lip-loving ingredients like squalane and coconut oil, providing instant hydration and leaving your lips feeling moisturized and smooth. The drip-tip applicator ensures a smooth and precise application, sealing in mega long-wearing matte coverage without any cracks or settling. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel London Mega Matte Liquid Lipstick**:
â­ Start by applying the lipstick to your upper and lower lips.
â­ Allow one layer to dry for a perfect matte finish.
â­ For a more intense color payoff, you can add a second layer.
â­ Can be worn alone or with a lip liner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel London Mega Matte Liquid Lipstick**:
â­ Squalane.
â­ Coconut Oil.
â­ Cruelty-free vegan formula.
â­ Mega flexible pigments.
â­ Moisturizing lip ingredients.

description_en:
Elevate your eye makeup with **Rimmel Wonderswipe Liner to Shadow**.

Experience the magic of transforming bold metallic liner into shimmering eyeshadow with a single swipe. This versatile liquid formula allows you to create diverse looks, from a striking metallic eyeliner to a dazzling glitter shadow. With **Rimmel Wonderswipe Liner to Shadow**, you can enhance your eyes' shine and radiance, featuring 16 intensely pigmented metallic shades. Its smudge-proof, transfer-proof, and touch-proof formula lasts up to 10 hours, ensuring you stay confident all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Wonderswipe Liner to Shadow**

â­ Step 1: For a dramatic liner look, glide your stand-out shade of **Rimmel Wonderswipe Liner to Shadow** onto the upper lash line.
â­ Step 2: For a sparkling glitter shadow look, use fingertips to blend the line upwards and outwards, transforming your makeup.
â­ Step 3: Frame eyes and finish your look by applying your go-to mascara.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Wonderswipe Liner to Shadow**

â­ Innovative liquid formula transforms from metallic to shimmer.
â­ 16 intensely pigmented, metallic shades.
â­ Smudge-proof, transfer-proof, and touch-proof, lasting up to 10 hours.

#EyeMakeup #Eyeliner #Eyeshadow #RimmelLondon #SaudiMakeup #GreenEyes #Glitter #EveningMakeup #SaudiBeauty #KSAFashion

description_en:
Experience ultimate allure with the **Rimmel Lasting Matte Lipstick - Mulberry 840**. This lipstick features a unique formula that combines high-quality pure pigments with blur-effect powders, delivering an ultra-soft, velvety finish to your lips. Enjoy rich color and long-lasting wear with effortless application for a natural, soft matte look that's always in vogue. Available in 15 wearable shades to complement all lip types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Matte Lipstick - Mulberry 840**

â­ Begin by hydrating your lips, then apply the lipstick directly from the bullet or using a lip brush for enhanced precision.
â­ For a perfectly defined pout, use a lip liner in a matching shade before applying the lipstick.
â­ Layer for intensified color or reapply throughout the day to refresh your look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Matte Lipstick - Mulberry 840**

â­ Advanced blend of pure pigments for rich, vibrant color payoff.
â­ Blur-effect powders for a smooth, soft-focus matte finish.
â­ Balm-like conditioners to keep lips moisturized and comfortable all day.
â­ Lightweight formula that prevents lip dryness.

This innovative product allows you to effortlessly transition your look from a sharp, metallic liner to a shimmering glitter shadow with just a sweep of your fingertip. Build up the color for a dazzling glitter eyeshadow or play with bold metallic liner looks. Whatever your mood, **Rimmel Wonderswipe 2-in-1 Liner to Shadow - 002 Instafamous** is here to amp up the shine.

â­ Bold metallic liner transforms into shimmering eyeshadow when blended.
â­ Available in 16 intensely pigmented, metallic shades.
â­ Smudge-proof, transfer-proof, and touch-proof for long-lasting wear.
â­ Lasts up to 10 hours, keeping your look flawless.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Wonderswipe 2-in-1 Liner to Shadow - 002 Instafamous**:
â­ Step 1: For a dramatic liner look, glide your stand-out shade of **Rimmel Wonderswipe 2-in-1 Liner to Shadow - 002 Instafamous** onto the upper lash line.
â­ Step 2: For a sparkling glitter shadow look, use fingertips to blend the line upwards and outwards, transforming your makeup.
â­ Step 3: Frame eyes and finish your look by applying your go-to mascara.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Wonderswipe 2-in-1 Liner to Shadow - 002 Instafamous**:
â­ High-pigment liquid formula.
â­ Shimmering metallic particles.
â­ Long-wear fixing agents.
â­ Smudge and transfer resistant.

description_en:
Discover your glow with **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint**, our first clean makeup that works, with no compromises. This 100% vegan formula is free from fragrance, mineral oils, and animal-derived ingredients, offering a moisturizing, natural-looking finish. Experience makeup that's good for you and the planet.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint**:
â­ Step 1: Squeeze out a pea-sized amount and apply to your skin with your favorite method: fingertips, brush, or sponge. For more coverage, simply apply a little more product until you achieve your desired look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Skin Tint**:
â­ 100% Vegan Formula
â­ Free from Fragrance & Mineral Oils
â­ Free from Animal-Derived Ingredients
â­ Moisturizing & Natural Finish
â­ Enriched with Aloe Vera & Vitamin E

description_en:
Achieve the perfect London look with the Professional Eyebrow Pencil from Rimmel London.

Want the London look? Discover a subtle pencil that wonâ€™t spoil your natural look. The Professional Eyebrow Pencil from **Rimmel London** is a kohl pencil with which to enhance and refine the shape of your eyebrows. Use it to fill gaps or lengthen the arc of the eyebrow for a stunning natural look. The lid doubles as a little brush so you can brush your eyebrow hairs before and after filling them in â€“ super handy!

When you want perfectly groomed eyebrows to balance your features and frame your eyes, choose the Professional Eyebrow Pencil from **Rimmel London**!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel London**:
â­ Apply directly onto eyebrows.
â­ The brush is great for filling in any gaps, spreading out the colour a bit, and softening the look.
â­ Use short, light strokes to fill in that outer third perfectly and make your eyebrows look naturally full.
â­ Blend with fingertips and use the brush applicator to brush hairs evenly.
â­ Perfect for those who are just starting out with filling in their eyebrows as the Professional Eyebrow Pencil is easy to use and blends well with the brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel London**:
â­ HYDROGENATED PALM KERNEL OIL
â­ HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE OIL
â­ HYDROGENATED PALM GLYCERIDES
â­ SYNTHETIC BEESWAX
â­ COPERNICIA CERIFERA CERA/COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX/CIRE DE CARNAUBA
â­ HYDROXYLATED LANOLIN
â­ PROPYLPARABEN
â­ TOCOPHEROL
â­ ASCORBYL PALMITATE
â­ LECITHIN
â­ GLYCERYL STEARATE
â­ GLYCERYL OLEATE
â­ CITRIC ACID
â­ [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: IRON OXIDES (CI 77499, CI 77492, CI 77491), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)]

description_en:
Achieve a salon-style French Mani look with **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish - 093 Peppermint Promise**. This is a breakthrough in gel nails, delivering a brilliant gel finish for your French Mani. Enjoy an easy, streak-free application with the precision brush. Best of all, **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish - 093 Peppermint Promise** requires no UV lamp and no mess!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish - 093 Peppermint Promise**:

â­ Step 1: Apply 1-2 coats of **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish - 093 Peppermint Promise**.
â­ Step 2: Wait for nails to dry completely.
â­ Step 3: Sweep Super Gel Top Coat over the top to activate curing.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish - 093 Peppermint Promise**:

â­ BUTYL ACETATE, ETHYL ACETATE, NITROCELLULOSE, ACETYL TRIBUTYL CITRATE, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL, TOSYLAMIDE/EPOXY RESIN, STEARALKONIUM BENTONITE, STYRENE/ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, TRIPHENYL PHOSPHATE, GLYCIDYL NEODECANOATE/PHTHALIC ANHYDRIDE/TMP CROSSPOLYMER, ADIPIC ACID/NEOPENTYL GLYCOL/TRIMELLITIC ANHYDRIDE COPOLYMER, AQUA/WATER/EAU, ISOSORBIDE DICAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, SILICA, DIACETONE ALCOHOL, ETOCRYLENE, KAOLIN, MEK, HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/IPDI/PPG-15 GLYCERYL ETHER COPOLYMER, ACRYLATES/DIMETHICONE COPOLYMER, PHOSPHORIC ACID, LITHOTHAMNIOM CALCAREUM EXTRACT, CETYL PEG/ PPG-10/1 DIMETHICONE, MANNITOL, n-BUTYL ALCOHOL, DIMETHICONE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, BENZOPHENONE-1, POLYVINYL BUTYRAL, SOLUM DIATOMEAE/DIATOMACEOUS EARTH/TERRE DE DIATOMEES, CORALLINA OFFICINALIS EXTRACT, TRIMETHYLPENTANEDIYL DIBENZOATE, POLYETHYLENE, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, ZINC SULFATE, MACROCYSTIS PYRIFERA (KELP) EXTRACT, HYDROLYZED CONCHIOLIN PROTEIN, METHYLPARABEN, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/ +/-:MICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), FD&C YELLOW NO. 5 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 19140), D&C RED NO. 6 BARIUM LAKE (CI 15850), D&C YELLOW NO. 11 (CI 47000), D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15850), MANGANESE VIOLET (CI 77742), ULTRAMARINES (CI 77007), FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090), D&C RED NO. 34 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15880), FERRIC FERROCYANIDE (CI 77510), D&C VIOLET NO. 2 (CI 60725)].

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined lips with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 620 - Soft Beige**. Our long-wearing formula offers a creamy, gliding texture for precise application and a seamless blend that lasts all day. Choose from 14 vibrant shades to perfectly complement your favorite lipstick. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 620 - Soft Beige**
â­ For precise definition, start at your cupid's bow and trace the natural lip line towards the corners.
â­ Use it to fill your lips entirely before lipstick for enhanced longevity.
â­ Gently blend with your finger or a lip brush for a softer look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner 620 - Soft Beige**
â­ Long-wearing formula.
â­ Creamy, easy-to-apply texture.
â­ Available in 14 different shades.

description_en:
**Rimmel Lasting Matte** lipstick is your go-to for a long-lasting, soft matte finish that feels as good as it looks. Experience effortless application and a natural, velvety texture that enhances your lips for hours. Our unique formula is crafted with pure pigments, blur-effect powders, and balm-like conditioners to ensure ultimate comfort and vibrant color payoff. Available in 15 wearable shades, this lipstick is designed to complement every skin tone and occasion, making it a must-have for any makeup collection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Matte**
â­ Begin application by swiping the lipstick from the center of your upper lip towards the cupid's bow and corners.
â­ Repeat the process on your lower lip for an even coverage.
â­ For a more defined look, use a lip liner before applying the lipstick.
â­ Avoid pressing your lips together immediately after application to ensure maximum color longevity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Matte**
â­ Pure pigments for rich color payoff.
â­ Blur-effect powders for a soft matte finish.
â­ Balm-like conditioners for lip nourishment.
â­ Long-wearing formula.

#RimmelSaudi #MatteLipstick #RiyadhMakeup #PinkLips #Lipstick #RimmelLastingMatte #EidMakeup #MakeupDeals #MakeupBrands #NaturalBeauty

description_en:
Discover a flawless matte finish with **Rimmel Lasting Matte Rg Lipstick** in the captivating shade 730 Pink. This long-lasting lipstick offers effortless application and a natural soft matte look, thanks to its unique formula that blends pure pigments with blur-effect powders and balm-like conditioners. Available in 15 wearable shades, **Rimmel Lasting Matte Rg Lipstick** is your go-to for perfectly defined lips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Matte Rg Lipstick**
â­ Apply directly from the bullet, starting from the center of your upper lip and moving outwards.
â­ Repeat on the lower lip for a seamless finish.
â­ For a softer look, gently blend with your fingertip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Matte Rg Lipstick**
â­ Pure pigments for intense color payoff.
â­ Blur-effect powders for a smooth, soft matte finish.
â­ Balm-like conditioners for hydrated, comfortable lips.

Our unique formula blends pure pigments with blur-effect powders and balm-like conditioners for perfectly plush lips. Choose from 15 wearable shades designed to complement every skin tone.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Matte Lipstick**:

description_en:
Achieve the ultimate lip look with **Rimmel London Lasting Finish Lipstick - Airy Fairy**.

If you dream of lipstick that stays on (and on), you'll love **Rimmel London Lasting Finish Lipstick - Airy Fairy**. Its creamy texture and long-lasting formula create the ultimate lip look in seconds.

â­ Glide onto lips to veil your pout in highly-pigmented, long-lasting lip colour.
â­ Enjoy a rich, flawless finish that lasts.
â­ Experience up to eight hours of comfortable wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel London Lasting Finish Lipstick - Airy Fairy**
â­ Step 1: Line and define your lip shape with an easy-to-use lip liner.
â­ Step 2: Sweep your shade of **Rimmel London Lasting Finish Lipstick - Airy Fairy** onto lips straight from the bullet for bold, flawless colour.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel London Lasting Finish Lipstick - Airy Fairy**
â­ Features a creamy texture for smooth application.
â­ Formulated for up to 8 hours of wear.

description_en:
Achieve your ultimate lip goal with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Soft Matte Lipstick**, the perfect choice for a stunning matte finish. Its luxurious creamy texture and unique formula provide your lips with rich, velvety color and a comfortable matte look that lasts for up to eight hours without needing reapplication. **Rimmel Lasting Finish Soft Matte Lipstick** offers full coverage and incredible comfort throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Soft Matte Lipstick**:
â­ Step 1: Prepare your lips with a lip balm for the best results.
â­ Step 2: Apply one coat of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Soft Matte Lipstick** directly to lips for a bold, long-lasting matte color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Soft Matte Lipstick**:
â­ RICINUS COMMUNIS (CASTOR) SEED OIL
â­ CANDELILLA CERA/EUPHORBIA CERIFERA (CANDELILLA) WAX/CIRE DE CANDELILLA
â­ OCTYLDODECANOL
â­ CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE
â­ MYRISTYL LACTATE
â­ VP/HEXADECENE COPOLYMER
â­ OZOKERITE
â­ LANOLIN
â­ CASTOROIL/IPDI COPOLYMER
â­ MEADOWFOAM ESTOLIDE
â­ MYRISTYL MYRISTATE
â­ PARFUM/FRAGRANCE
â­ BENZYL BENZOATE
â­ DI-PPG-3 MYRISTYL ETHER ADIPATE
â­ DIPENTAERYTHRITYL HEXA C5-9 ACID ESTERS
â­ SILICA
â­ SORBITAN SESQUIOLEATE
â­ TOCOPHEROL
â­ PROPYLPARABEN
â­ COPERNICIA CERIFERA CERA/COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX/CIRE DE CARNAUBA
â­ DIAMOND POWDER
â­ ASCORBYL PALMITATE
â­ BENZYL SALICYLATE
â­ BENZYL CINNAMATE
â­ LINALOOL
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU
â­ CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT
â­ CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) FRUIT EXTRACT
â­ TIN OXIDE
â­ CINNAMYL ALCOHOL
â­ EUGENOL
â­ [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-:MICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), D&C RED NO. 27 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 45410), D&C RED NO. 6 BARIUM LAKE (CI 15850), D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15850), D&C RED NO. 28 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 45410), D&C RED NO. 33 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 17200), FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090), FD&C YELLOW NO. 5 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 19140), FD&C YELLOW NO. 6 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 15985), CARMINE (CI 75470)].

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªÙŠÙ†Øº ÙÙŠÙ†ÙŠØ´ - Ø¯Ø±ÙˆØ¨ Ø§ÙˆÙ Ø´ÙŠØ±ÙŠ
description_en:
Discover the captivating beauty of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick - Drop Of Cherry**. This lipstick delivers intense, long-lasting lip color for up to eight hours of wear, with a +25% beautiful color impact without the need for reapplication. Its smooth, creamy texture is enriched with vitamins A, C, & E, making this **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick - Drop Of Cherry** comfortable, nourishing, and moisturizing to stay in place all day long. The subtle shimmer in the formula brightens and illuminates lips, creating the illusion of a fuller, plumper pout. Whether you're seeking a bold cherry red or a natural beige, find your perfect shade for lip color that lasts.

â­ Intense color that lasts up to 8 hours
â­ Creamy texture enriched with Vitamins A, C, & E
â­ Moisturizes lips for a fuller, plumper pout
â­ Illuminating finish for brighter-looking lips
â­ Available in a variety of shades to suit all looks and occasions

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick - Drop Of Cherry**:
â­ Step 1: Line and define your lips with a lip liner.
â­ Step 2: Sweep your perfect shade of lipstick onto lips straight from the bullet.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick - Drop Of Cherry**:
â­ Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil
â­ Candelilla Cera
â­ Enriched with Vitamins A, C, & E
â­ Contains Shea Butter
â­ Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract

description_en:
Experience ultimate beauty with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Matte Lipstick**, your perfect solution for captivating, long-lasting lips with a natural soft matte finish. Its innovative formula combines pure pigments with blur-effect powders and balm-like conditioners, offering superior comfort. **Rimmel Lasting Finish Matte Lipstick** is available in 15 versatile, wearable shades to complement all skin tones and elevate your everyday looks and special occasions.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Matte Lipstick**:
â­ Apply the lipstick directly to your lips.
â­ For a flawless finish, start from the center of the upper lip and move towards the outer corners.
â­ Repeat for the lower lip.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Matte Lipstick**:
â­ Pure pigments.
â­ Blur-effect powders.
â­ Balm-like conditioners.

description_en:
Discover the beauty of your lips with the **Rimmel Lasting Matte Lipstick - Hollywood 530 Red**. This lipstick features a unique formula that combines pure pigments with blur-effect powders, giving you a natural, attractive, and long-lasting soft matte finish.

Enjoy easy application and rich color with the **Rimmel Lasting Matte Lipstick - Hollywood 530 Red**. Our innovative formula is enriched with balm-like conditioners to keep your lips soft and smooth. Available in 15 trendy shades to complement all your looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Matte Lipstick - Hollywood 530 Red**
â­ Apply the lipstick directly to your lips for best results.
â­ For a more precise definition, use a lip liner before applying the lipstick.
â­ Suitable for daily use and special occasions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Matte Lipstick - Hollywood 530 Red**
â­ Pure pigments for intense and attractive color payoff.
â­ Blur-effect powders for a soft matte finish.
â­ Moisturizing and balm-like ingredients to maintain lip softness and hydration.
â­ Free from harmful substances.

description_en:
Discover flawless, long-lasting skin with **Rimmel Lasting Finish 25H Foundation**. This foundation offers unparalleled coverage and all-day comfort, blending seamlessly into your skin to conceal imperfections and provide a flawless look for up to 25 hours. It's perfect for resisting sweat, heat, and humidity, making it your ideal choice for all occasions. It provides instant hydration and skin protection thanks to Vitamin E.

â­ Lasts up to 25 hours with its advanced formula.
â­ Sweat, heat, and humidity-resistant for unwavering hold.
â­ Provides perfect coverage, concealing blemishes and dark circles.
â­ Instantly hydrates the skin with its rich comfort serum.
â­ Offers additional skin protection from Vitamin E.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish 25H Foundation**:
Step 1: Start by applying a pea-sized amount of the foundation to your skin.
Step 2: Evenly distribute **Rimmel Lasting Finish 25H Foundation** across your entire face for a uniform complexion.
Step 3: For best results, use concealer to cover any signs of fatigue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish 25H Foundation**:
â­ Long-lasting liquid formula.
â­ Infused with Hyaluronic Acid for deep hydration.
â­ Vitamin E for added skin protection.

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined lips with the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner Sunset - 195 - Pink**.  Our long-wearing formula provides lip shape definition that lasts all day. The creamy, gliding texture allows for precise application and a seamless blend, making it perfect for enhancing your natural lip shape. Available in 14 vibrant shades to effortlessly match your favorite lipstick.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner Sunset - 195 - Pink**:
â­ Start from the cupid's bow and move towards the corners of the upper lip.
â­ Outline the outer corners of the lower lip.
â­ Draw a single, continuous line along the lower lip.
â­ For extra staying power, you can gently fill in your lips with the liner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner Sunset - 195 - Pink**:
â­ Creamy, gliding texture.
â­ High-pigment color.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients.

title_ar: Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ù†Ø¯Ù† Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªÙŠÙ†Ø¬ Ø¨Ø±ÙˆÙÙˆÙƒØ§Ù„ÙŠØ¨Ø³ - 740 ÙƒØ§ÙˆØª Ø±Ø¯ Ù„ÙŠØ¨Ø¯: Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹ Ø¨Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ù†Ù‡Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ© Ù…Ø±Ø·Ø¨Ø©
description_en:
Experience ultimate staying power and intense hydration with the bold shade of **Rimmel London Lasting Provocalips**. This innovative 2-step liquid lipstick from Rimmel London delivers high-impact, transfer-proof colour and shine that lasts up to 16 hours.

**Rimmel London Lasting Provocalips** features a unique two-step application for flawless, long-lasting wear: start with the colour-intense liquid for a rich base, followed by the hydra-balm top coat to lock in colour, hydrate, and prevent caking, flaking, or drying. Enjoy unparalleled comfort and a professional look that lasts all day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel London Lasting Provocalips**:
â­ Apply the colour-intense liquid to clean, dry lips.
â­ Allow the colour to dry down completely.
â­ Apply the hydra-balm top coat to seal in colour, add shine, and hydrate.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel London Lasting Provocalips**:
â­ ISODODECANE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, DIMETHICONE, MICA, DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE, PROPYLENE CARBONATE, TALC, PROPYLPARABEN, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, BENZYL BENZOATE, BENZYL SALICYLATE, BENZYL CINNAMATE, LINALOOL.

#RimmelLondon #LongLastingLipstick #LipstickSaudi #MakeupKSA #TransferProofLips #HydratingLipstick #BeautySaudi #RimmelLipstick #LipCareSaudi #SaudiFashion

title_ar: ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø£Ø³Ø§Ø³ Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ù†ÙŠÙˆÙ…Ø§ØªØ´ - Ø¯Ø±Ø¬Ø© 203 Ø¨ÙŠØ¬ Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠ Ø¨Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ù„ Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© SPF20
description_en:
Achieve flawless, radiant skin with **Rimmel New Match Perfection Foundation** in True Beige 203. This innovative foundation offers a buildable, natural finish that adapts to your skin tone, providing a smooth and even complexion. Enriched with SPF20, it protects your skin from sun damage while ensuring all-day hydration and comfort. Experience a visibly perfected look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel New Match Perfection Foundation**
â­ Start with a well-moisturized face.
â­ Apply a small amount of **Rimmel New Match Perfection Foundation** to your fingertips, a makeup sponge, or a foundation brush.
â­ Blend evenly across your face and neck using upward and outward motions for seamless coverage.
â­ Build up the coverage as needed for your desired finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel New Match Perfection Foundation**
â­ Aqua, Cyclomethicone, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Cetyl Dimethicone, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Diethylhexyl Cyclohexane, Magnesium Sulfate, Phenoxyethanol, Aluminum Stearate, Methylparaben, Benzyl Alcohol, Parfum, Polyethylene, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylparaben, Butylparaben, Propylparaben, Sorbic Acid.

#Rimmel #NewMatchPerfection #Foundation #Makeup #Beauty #FlawlessSkin #SPF #Skincare #BeautyTips #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Achieve flawless lip definition with the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner** in shade 850, Underground Purple. This lip liner boasts a long-wearing formula that provides all-day definition and color payoff. Its creamy, gliding texture ensures precise application and a seamless blend, giving you perfectly defined and alluring lips. The **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner** is available in 14 vibrant shades to perfectly complement your favorite lipstick.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner**:
â­ Precisely outline your lips using the liner.
â­ For an intensified look, fill in your lips entirely with the liner.
â­ Gently blend the edges for a natural finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lip Liner**:
â­ Creamy texture for smooth application.
â­ High-quality pigments for rich color.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients to keep lips soft.

#LipLiner #RimmelLondon #LipMakeup #DefinedLips #SaudiMakeup #Lipstick #LongLastingLipLiner #ProMakeup #WomensBeauty #Rimmellooks

description_en:
Discover flawless skin with **Rimmel New Match Perfection Foundation**, designed to blend seamlessly with your complexion for a perfectly natural match that's undetectable in any light. Its SPF-enriched formula protects and makes your skin look healthy and perfected. Enjoy a unified skin appearance, with a noticeable reduction in imperfections, pores, and dark circles.

â­ Invisible, mistake-proof formula for visibly perfected, healthier-looking skin.
â­ Weightless, smooth texture blends with your skin's real tone instead of masking it.
â­ Leaves skin feeling hydrated and reduces imperfections, pores, and dark circles.
â­ Provides 24-hour moisture complex and soft-focus finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel New Match Perfection Foundation**:
â­ Step 1: Using a foundation brush, sponge, or fingertips, smooth the **Rimmel New Match Perfection Foundation** onto skin.
â­ Step 2: Dot and blend Match Perfection Concealer under eyes to complete your look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel New Match Perfection Foundation**:
(Please refer to the product packaging for the full ingredient list).

description_en:
Discover radiant skin with **Rimmel Kind & Free Foundation 82 Golden Ivory**. At Rimmel London, we believe â€œgood for usâ€ should mean good for all â€“ our wellbeing, our planet and our society. The **Rimmel Kind & Free Foundation 82 Golden Ivory** offers a 100% vegan and Kind to Animals formula, providing your skin with essential moisture, evening out skin tone, and blurring imperfections with its lightweight, sheer consistency. This Rimmel foundation is infused with an antioxidant vitamin complex (E & B5) and aloe vera for a fresh glow and natural makeup finish. Our packaging is made from recycled and recyclable materials, making it an eco-friendly choice.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Foundation 82 Golden Ivory**

â­ Squeeze out a pea-sized amount and apply to skin using your preferred method: fingertips, brush, or sponge.
â­ For increased coverage, apply a little more product gradually until you achieve your desired look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Foundation 82 Golden Ivory**

â­ 100% Vegan & Kind to Animals ingredients.
â­ Enriched with antioxidant vitamin complex (E & B5).
â­ Contains Aloe Vera for added hydration.

description_en:
Experience unbeatable hydration and up to 35 hours of wear with **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**, Rimmel's most hydrating long-wear foundation. This full-coverage foundation delivers a natural-looking finish and is clinically proven to improve skin radiance. Its cruelty-free and vegan formula, infused with hyaluronic acid, vitamin E, and 2% niacinamide, makes it an ideal choice for your skin, featuring SPF20 sun protection. It's also sleep-proof, waterproof, crease-resistant, and transfer-resistant, ensuring you get unparalleled wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**
â­ Apply this foundation with a foundation brush, sponge, or fingertips to blend into the skin for unbeatable wear and coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**
â­ Infused with hyaluronic acid and vitamin E
â­ Contains 2% niacinamide
â­ SPF20 sun protection
â­ Cruelty-free and vegan formula
â­ D5-free

description_en:
Experience the magic of perfect lips with **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**, the 2-step liquid lipstick that delivers locked-in, high-impact color and deep hydration lasting up to 16 hours. Enjoy transfer-proof color, a captivating shine, and a hydrating topcoat that keeps your makeup looking freshly applied. Its comfortable formula prevents caking, flaking, or drying, making it your go-to for an unforgettable look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**:
â­ Apply the color-intense liquid to clean, dry lips.
â­ Follow with the hydrating topcoat to lock in long-lasting wear and shine.
â­ Achieve a precise, smooth application with effortless glide.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**:
â­ Color-intense liquid with a comfortable, non-caking, non-drying formula.
â­ Hydrating topcoat for added shine and protection.
â­ Available in a range of 12 versatile shades to suit every preference.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled softness with **Rimmel Moisture Renew Lipstick**, the creamy lipstick that provides your lips with superior hydration and rich, long-lasting color. Achieve a natural and captivating look with the unique "Notting Hill Nude" shade.

â­ Delivers intense lip hydration for up to 24 hours.
â­ Creamy formula rich in color for fuller, more attractive lips.
â­ Easy to apply and provides perfect coverage.
â­ Leaves lips soft, smooth, and free from dryness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Moisture Renew Lipstick**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of lipstick to your lips.
â­ Start from the center of your lips and extend to the edges for even application.
â­ You can add another layer to intensify the color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Moisture Renew Lipstick**:
â­ Hydrating formula enriched with shea butter and avocado oil.
â­ Vitamin E for lip hydration and protection.
â­ High-quality pigments ensure color longevity.
â­ Paraben-free.

description_en:
Take your eyeshadow look to the next level with **Rimmel Wonderswipe 2-in-1 Liner to Shadow**. Choose your makeup vibe: bold metallic liner or shimmering glitter shadow. Transform eyes in one sweep of a fingertip by blending out the liquid formula across lids. Build up the colour for glitter eyeshadow or play with metallic liner looks. Whatever youâ€™re feeling, **Rimmel Wonderswipe 2-in-1 Liner to Shadow** is here to step up the shine.

â­ Bold metallic liner turns to shimmering eyeshadow when blended.
â­ 16 intensely pigmented, metallic shades.
â­ Smudge-proof, transfer-proof and touch-proof.
â­ Lasting up to 10 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Wonderswipe 2-in-1 Liner to Shadow**:
â­ Step 1: For a dramatic liner look, glide your stand-out shade of **Rimmel Wonderswipe 2-in-1 Liner to Shadow** onto the upper lash line.
â­ Step 2: For a sparkling glitter shadow look, use fingertips to blend the line upwards and outwards, transforming your makeup.
â­ Step 3: Frame eyes and finish your look by applying your go-to mascara. FLAWLESS.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Wonderswipe 2-in-1 Liner to Shadow**:
â­ Advanced liquid formula.
â­ Shimmering metallic pigments.
â­ Smudge-proof and transfer-proof ingredients.

description_en:
Achieve flawless brows that last all day with **Rimmel Wonderfull Brow Gel 003 Dark**. This 24-hour waterproof brow mascara, infused with fibers, delivers instantly full and plumped brows that stay put. Say goodbye to bad brow days and hello to effortlessly defined and natural-looking eyebrows.

Features:
â­ Instantly creates fuller, plumper-looking brows.
â­ 24HR waterproof formula for long-lasting wear.
â­ Infused with fibers to boost brow density.
â­ Defines, shapes, and grooms brows with micro precision.
â­ Waterproof, long-wear, smudge-proof formula.
â­ Dermatologist tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Wonderfull Brow Gel 003 Dark**:
â­ Fill in any gaps or patches in sparse brows using the narrow pencil tip to create hair-like strokes.
â­ Use the integrated spoolie brush to shape and tidy any unruly brow hairs.
â­ For extra hold, you can finish with a clear brow gel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Wonderfull Brow Gel 003 Dark**:
â­ Water, Alcohol Denat., Ammonium Acrylate Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, etc.
