Experience lasting beauty with **Rimmel Provocalips Liquid Lipstick - Dare To 110 Pink**. This high-performance liquid lipstick offers incredible 16-hour wear, infused with a moisturizer to keep your lips feeling soft and hydrated. Enjoy a rich color payoff and a lightweight formula for a stunning look that lasts all day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Provocalips Liquid Lipstick - Dare To 110 Pink**
â­ Apply the color evenly to your lips.
â­ Use the applicator for precise application.
â­ Avoid contact with water for 5 minutes after application for maximum staying power.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Provocalips Liquid Lipstick - Dare To 110 Pink**
â­ Castor Seed Oil
â­ Candelilla Wax
â­ Carnauba Wax
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Shea Butter
â­ High-concentration pigments for vibrant color.

description_en:
Discover ultimate beauty with **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color 210**, the liquid lipstick that gives you long-lasting matte lips.

The **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color 210** features a cruelty-free and vegan formula that melts onto your lips, leaving behind a colour-drenched matte finish that lasts all day long. It's super hydrating and contains lip-loving ingredients like squalane and coconut oil, making it the perfect choice for full, moisturised lips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color 210**

â­ Begin at the center of your upper lip and glide outwards to the corners.
â­ Repeat on the lower lip for a perfect look.
â­ Use the drip-tip applicator for a smooth and precise application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color 210**

â­ Cruelty-free and vegan formula.
â­ Squalane for deep hydration.
â­ Coconut oil for lip nourishment.
â­ Flexible pigments for even coverage.

description_en:
Discover undetectable, perfect skin with **Rimmel New Match Perfection SPF20 Foundation**. It blends seamlessly with your complexion for a match so perfect and natural, it's flawless in any light. Its SPF-enriched formula protects and enhances your skin for a healthy, perfected look.

â­ Invisible, mistake-proof formula for visibly perfected and healthier-looking skin.
â­ Weightless, smooth texture blends with skin's real tone instead of masking it.
â­ Leaves skin feeling hydrated and reduces imperfections, pores, and dark circles.
â­ Provides 24-hour moisture and a soft-focus finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel New Match Perfection SPF20 Foundation**:
â­ Step 1: Using a foundation brush, sponge, or fingertips, smooth **Rimmel New Match Perfection SPF20 Foundation** onto skin.
â­ Step 2: Dot and blend Match Perfection Concealer under eyes to complete your look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel New Match Perfection SPF20 Foundation**:
â­ SPF-enriched formula.
â­ 24-hour moisture complex.
â­ Soft-focus concentrate to reduce imperfections and pores.

description_en:
Discover ultimate beauty with **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**, the lipstick that delivers endless color for 16 hours with a stunning glossy finish. Enjoy a unique transfer-proof, food-proof experience, with an easy 2-step application process that locks in vibrant, captivating color. **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips** features a lightweight, flexible formula that adapts to your lips' movements, giving you comfort and confidence all day long. Have fun, be flirty, be fearless â€“ kiss and try, your lips won't tell!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**
* Apply the color and keep your lips apart for 60 seconds to set.
* Then, apply the top coat to lock in the color and moisture while adding a magical shine.
* **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips** can be easily removed with an oil-based makeup remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Provocalips**
* COLOUR SIDE: ISODODECANE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, DIMETHICONE, C9-13 ISOPARAFFIN, DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE.
* Contains additives like BARIUM SULFATE / CI 77120, ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE, PROPYLENE CARBONATE, SILICA, PROPYLPARABEN, PHENOXYETHANOL, TIN OXIDE, BENZOIC ACID, CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE.
* May contain color variations such as MICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), D&C RED NO. 28 (CI 45410), D&C RED NO. 36 (CI 12085), D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15850), BISMUTH OXYCHLORIDE (CI 77163), CARMINE (CI 75470).
* TOP SIDE: RICINUS COMMUNIS (CASTOR) SEED OIL, CERA ALBA/BEESWAX/CIRE D'ABEILLE, PENTAERYTHRITYL STEARATE/CAPRATE/CAPRYLATE/ ADIPATE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, ALCOHOL, ISOPROPYL MYRISTATE, TOCOPHEROL, CAPRYLIC/ CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, ASCORBYL PALMITATE, ASCORBIC ACID, CITRIC ACID, BHT.

#RimmelLipstick #SaudiMakeup #LipColor #GlossyLips #KSABeauty #Cosmetics #WomensFashion #MakeupDeals #BeautyEssentials #RimmelLondon

Achieve flawless skin with **Rimmel New Match Perfection** Foundation, engineered to adapt to your natural skin tone. It offers seamless coverage and a long-lasting natural finish, coupled with sun protection. Discover the secret to beauty with **Rimmel New Match Perfection**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel New Match Perfection**:

â­ Blend evenly across your face and neck for perfect coverage.
â­ Use alone or over your moisturizer.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel New Match Perfection**:
â­ Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Titanium Dioxide, etc.
â­ Lightweight formula that won't clog pores.
â­ Oil-free and suitable for all skin types.

description_en:
Discover the captivating beauty of your lips with **Rimmel Provocalips 16HR**. This liquid lip colour delivers high-impact, 16-hour kiss-proof, food-proof, and transfer-proof color. It's the perfect companion for all your moments, ensuring your lips stay flawless. An exclusive 2-step product, **Rimmel Provocalips 16HR** is incredibly lightweight and flexible, adapting to the movement of your lips for unparalleled comfort and lasting wear. A fun and flirty addition to any makeup collection!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Provocalips 16HR**:
â­ Apply color and keep lips apart for 60 seconds until the product sets.
â­ Apply the topcoat to lock in the color, moisture, and add shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Provocalips 16HR**:
â­ Kiss-proof liquid lipstick for a glossy finish.
â­ Two-step process applies and locks in vibrant hues.
â­ Lightweight and flexible formula adapts to lip movement for lasting wear.
â­ Food-proof and transfer-proof.

description_en:
Indulge your lips with the **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 003 Coral**, the perfect balm for deeply moisturized lips with a natural, attractive color tint. Its luxurious, buttery texture glides on effortlessly, leaving your lips feeling incredibly soft. This cruelty-free, vegan formula is designed for ultimate lip care with a fresh pop of color. It's more than just a lip balm, it's complete lip nourishment.

â­ Provides deep hydration and maintains lip softness.
â­ Adds a natural, attractive color tint with a subtle sheen.
â­ 100% vegan and cruelty-free formula for safe nourishment.
â­ Buttery texture glides on easily for a smooth application.
â­ Eco-friendly packaging FSC certified and made from recycled materials.
â­ Available in 5 stunning shades to suit all skin tones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 003 Coral**
â­ Apply a light layer to lips for daily hydration.
â­ Can be reapplied throughout the day to maintain hydration and color.
â­ For a more defined look, use after a lip liner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 003 Coral**
â­ Castor Seed Oil
â­ Coconut Oil
â­ Shea Butter
â­ Carnauba Wax
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Natural Colorants.

description_en:
Discover the ultimate in matte perfection with **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color Blush 110**, the ideal fusion of bold color and supreme comfort. This lipstick boasts a cruelty-free and vegan formula that melts onto your lips, delivering a color-drenched matte finish that lasts all day without drying. Its hydrating ingredients ensure your lips feel soft and refreshed with every application.

Experience exceptional color payoff with **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color Blush 110**, specifically designed for perfect mega matte lips that last up to 16 hours. The innovative formula with mega flexible pigments provides a color-drenched matte finish, while the precise drip-tip applicator ensures smooth, even application for seamless, long-wearing matte coverage without any cracks or settling.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color Blush 110**
â­ Start by applying to your upper lip, then your lower lip.
â­ For best results, use the precise applicator.
â­ For long-lasting matte wear, wait a few seconds for it to dry completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color Blush 110**
â­ Squalane for deep hydration.
â­ Coconut oil for lip nourishment.
â­ Cruelty-free and vegan formula.
â­ Flexible pigments for color longevity.

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined and sculpted brows with **Rimmel Brow This Way 2In1 Filler & Fixer LIGHT**. This dual-ended brow definer expertly fills and shapes your brows, then sets them with its integrated spoolie brush for a natural yet defined look that lasts. Its unique formula is transfer-proof and fade-proof for up to 12 hours, ensuring your brows stay flawlessly in place all day long.

â­ Double-ended brow definer for perfectly defined & sculpted brows.
â­ Triangular retractable tip to fill your brows with precision.
â­ Easy to use spoolie brush to set your brows.
â­ Transfer proof, fade proof, up to 12hrs.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Brow This Way 2In1 Filler & Fixer LIGHT**:
â­ STEP 1: Apply the buildable formula to fill your brows.
â­ STEP 2: Use the spoolie brush to shape your brows and set them.

(Please refer to the product packaging for a full ingredient list, as formulations may vary slightly by shade).

description_en:
Discover the secret to radiant, glowing skin with **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**. This foundation provides exceptional hydration and up to 35 hours of wear, making it your perfect choice for a flawless look all day long. It features a breathable formula that offers full coverage with a natural-looking finish, clinically proven to improve your skin's radiance thanks to hyaluronic acid, vitamin E, and niacinamide.

**Product Features:**
â­ Full coverage and natural radiance.
â­ Up to 35-hour wear.
â­ Breathable and lightweight formula.
â­ Clinically proven to improve skin radiance.
â­ Cruelty-free and vegan.
â­ Enriched with hyaluronic acid and vitamin E.
â­ Contains 2% niacinamide for added skin benefits.
â­ Provides sun protection with SPF20.
â­ Sleep-proof, waterproof, crease-resistant, and transfer-resistant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**:
â­ Apply this **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation** with a foundation brush, sponge, or fingertips to blend seamlessly into the skin for ultimate wear and coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ 2% Niacinamide.
â­ SPF20 Sun Protection.
â­ Vegan, D5-free formula.
â­ Cruelty-free.

Discover the secret to radiant, hydrated skin with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Hydration Foundation 300 Sand**. Enjoy unbeatable hydration and up to 35 hours of wear with Rimmel's most hydrating long-wear foundation. This full-coverage foundation offers a natural-looking finish and is clinically proven to improve skin radiance. Its cruelty-free and vegan formula (D5-free) makes it an ideal choice for responsible beauty.

Product Features:
â­ Full coverage
â­ Up to 35-hour wear
â­ Breathable formula
â­ Clinically proven to improve skin radiance
â­ Cruelty-free and vegan
â­ Infused with hyaluronic acid and vitamin E
â­ Contains 2% niacinamide
â­ SPF20
â­ Sleep-proof, waterproof, crease-resistant, and transfer-resistant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Hydration Foundation 300 Sand**
â­ Apply this **Rimmel Lasting Finish Hydration Foundation 300 Sand** with a foundation brush, sponge, or fingertips to blend into the skin for unbeatable wear and coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Hydration Foundation 300 Sand**
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Niacinamide (2%)
â­ SPF20
â­ Vegan & D5-free formula
â­ Cruelty-free

description_en:
Discover ultimate matte perfection with **Rimmel Mega Matte** Lip Color in Love Bite 725. This cruelty-free and vegan formula melts onto your lips, delivering a colour-drenched, long-lasting matte finish.

â­ Cruelty-free and vegan formula for guilt-free beauty.
â­ Colour-drenched matte finish that lasts up to 16 hours.
â­ Super hydrating with lip-loving ingredients for instant nourishment.
â­ Precision applicator for a smooth, even application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Mega Matte**:
â­ Apply the colour directly onto lips using the accompanying applicator.
â­ Start from the center of your lips and sweep outwards to the corners for optimal results.
â­ Allow the colour to dry completely for a flawless matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Mega Matte**:
â­ Squalane for deep nourishment and hydration.
â­ Coconut oil for enhanced softness and suppleness.
â­ Mega flexible pigments for rich colour payoff.

description_en:
Discover unparalleled radiance with **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**. This foundation provides superior hydration and up to 35 hours of wear, making it your perfect choice for a natural and glowing look all day long. It features a breathable, D5-free formula, clinically proven to improve skin radiance, and is enriched with hyaluronic acid, Vitamin E, and 2% niacinamide, along with SPF20.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**
â­ Apply this **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation** with a foundation brush, sponge, or fingertips. Blend well into the skin for even coverage and long-lasting wear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Vitamin E
â­ 2% Niacinamide
â­ SPF20
â­ Cruelty-free and vegan formula
â­ Transfer-resistant
â­ Crease-resistant
â­ Waterproof
â­ Sleep-proof

description_en:
Discover the secret to radiant skin with **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation** in shade 303 Honey. This foundation offers unbeatable hydration and up to 35 hours of wear, making it the perfect choice for a luminous and healthy complexion all day long. Its full-coverage formula provides a natural-looking finish and is clinically proven to improve skin radiance. It features a vegan, cruelty-free, and D5-free formula, enriched with hyaluronic acid, vitamin E, and 2% niacinamide, along with SPF20 protection. It's sleep-proof, waterproof, crease-resistant, and transfer-resistant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**:
â­ Apply the foundation using a brush, sponge, or your fingertips.
â­ Blend well into the skin for even coverage and long-lasting wear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**:
â­ Hyaluronic acid and Vitamin E for deep hydration.
â­ 2% Niacinamide to improve skin texture and radiance.
â­ SPF20 for protection against sun rays.
â­ Breathable formula, sleep-proof, waterproof, crease-resistant, and transfer-resistant.
â­ Vegan and cruelty-free formula.

description_en:
Discover the secret to captivating lips with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick**, delivering intense color that lasts up to 8 hours with +25% color impact, no reapplication needed.

The smooth, creamy texture is enriched with vitamins A, C & E, making **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick** comfortable, nourishing, and moisturizing to stay in place all day long. Its formula features a subtle shimmer that brightens and illuminates lips, giving the illusion of a fuller, plumper pout. Whether you desire rouge cherry, deep red, or natural beige, find your perfect shade for your skin tone and long-lasting lip color.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick**:
â­ First, line and define your lip shape with an easy-to-use lip liner.
â­ Sweep your perfect shade of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick** onto lips straight from the bullet for bold, beautiful color payoff.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Lipstick**:
â­ Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil
â­ Candelilla Cera (Candelilla) Wax
â­ Enriched with Vitamins A, C, & E
â­ Provides superior hydration and lip care
â­ Subtle shimmer for a natural radiance

#RimmelLondon #Lipstick #SaudiMakeup #KSABeauty #LongLastingLips #MakeupSaudi #LipColor #FullerLips #LipCare #EverydayMakeup

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined lips with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Automatic Lip Liner - 045 Nude**. This innovative liner from Rimmel allows you to shape your lips with unparalleled precision. Its creamy formula, enriched with waxes and oils, ensures a smooth and even application. Featuring an automatic, twist-up tip that never needs sharpening, it offers long-lasting wear, keeping your lipstick in place and preventing color bleed. Discover the secret to beautifully defined lips effortlessly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Automatic Lip Liner - 045 Nude**:
â­ Define your natural lip line or slightly exaggerate it using the liner's fine tip to draw just outside the lip contour for a fuller, more glamorous pout.
â­ Blend the liner with your fingertips, then apply your favorite Rimmel London lipstick shade for a long-lasting result.
â­ Adds staying power to your lipstick and prevents color bleed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Automatic Lip Liner - 045 Nude**:
â­ Creamy formula rich in waxes and oils for easy application.
â­ Automatic twist-up tip requires no sharpening.
â­ Long-lasting, superior performance.
â­ Available in six stunning shades to complement your look.

description_en:
Discover the secret to radiant, healthy-looking skin with **Rimmel Kind & Free Foundation 303 Honey**. At Rimmel London, we believe true beauty is beauty that cares for you and our planet.

Our **KIND & FREE** Moisturizing Skin Tint is made with 100% vegan & Kind to Animals ingredients â€“ stuff thatâ€™s simply good for you & good for the planet.

â­ Our lightweight, sheer formula evens skin-tone and blurs away any unwanted imperfections.
â­ Infused with antioxidant vitamin complex (E & B5) and aloe vera for a fresh glow.
â­ Provides essential moisturization for supple, hydrated skin.
â­ Packaging is made with recycled materials, making it kinder to the environment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kind & Free Foundation 303 Honey**:
â­ Squeeze out a pea-sized amount and apply to skin with your favorite method: fingertips, brush, or sponge.
â­ For more coverage, simply apply a little more product until you achieve your desired look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kind & Free Foundation 303 Honey**:
â­ Vitamin E & B5 Complex
â­ Aloe Vera
â­ 100% Vegan & Kind to Animals ingredients

description_en:
At Rimmel London, we believe â€œgood for usâ€ should mean good for all â€“ our wellbeing, our planet and our society. Our **KIND & FREE** Moisturizing Skin Tint is made with 100% vegan & Kind to Animals ingredients â€“ stuff thatâ€™s simply good for you & good for the planet. Our lightweight, sheer formula evens skin-tone and blurs away any unwanted imperfections while giving your skin the moisturization it needs. **KIND & FREE** foundation is infused with an antioxidant vitamin complex (E & B5) and aloe vera for a fresh glow and natural makeup finish. All packaging made with recycled materials which can be easily recycled and is kinder to the environment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KIND & FREE**:
â­ Squeeze out a pea-sized amount and apply to skin with your favorite method: fingertips, brush, or sponge.
â­ For more coverage, simply apply a little more product until you achieve the desired look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KIND & FREE**:
â­ 100% Vegan & Kind to Animals formula.
â­ Antioxidant Vitamin Complex (E & B5).
â­ Aloe Vera for added hydration.
â­ Gentle and eco-friendly ingredients.

description_en:
Indulge your lips with rich color and a long-lasting matte finish with **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color - Be My Baby 700**. This cruelty-free and vegan formula melts onto your lips, delivering a color-drenched, super-hydrating matte finish. Enjoy soft, moisturized lips that last up to 16 hours thanks to lip-loving ingredients like squalane and coconut oil. The innovative drip-tip applicator ensures a smooth, precise application for perfect, crack-free coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color - Be My Baby 700**
â­ Begin by applying **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color - Be My Baby 700** from the center of your upper lip and sweep towards the corners.
â­ Repeat the process on your lower lip.
â­ For best results, use a lip liner before application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color - Be My Baby 700**
â­ Cruelty-free and vegan formula.
â­ Squalane for deep hydration.
â­ Coconut oil for lip nourishment.
â­ Mega flexible pigments for rich, matte color.
â­ Super hydrating formula.

#RimmelLipstick #SaudiMakeup #MatteLips #LipColor #SaudiBeauty #RimmelLondon #BeMyBaby #LipMakeup #BeautyKSA #LongLastingLipstick

description_en:
Achieve your perfect pout with the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Exaggerate Automatic Lip Liner** in shade 018 Rose Addiction. This creamy lip liner provides precise definition and a smooth application, helping your lipstick stay put longer and preventing color bleed. The automatic twist-up format of the **Rimmel Lasting Finish Exaggerate Automatic Lip Liner** never needs sharpening, making it your ideal on-the-go beauty essential. Discover the secret to flawlessly defined lips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Exaggerate Automatic Lip Liner**:
â­ Define your natural lip line or 'exaggerate' it slightly for a fuller, more glamorous pout.
â­ Blend the liner with fingertips for a seamless finish.
â­ Apply your favorite Rimmel London lipstick shade for enhanced color and long-lasting wear.
â­ Prevents color bleeding and makes your lip color pop.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Exaggerate Automatic Lip Liner**:
â­ Creamy formula infused with waxes and oils for a smooth application.
â­ Automatic twist-up tip that never needs sharpening.
â­ Long-wearing formula.
â­ Available in 6 stunning shades to suit every look.

description_en:
Discover **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color Ruby Passion 930**, a cruelty-free and vegan formula that melts onto your lips, leaving a color-drenched matte finish that lasts all day. This liquid lipstick is super hydrating, enriched with lip-loving ingredients like squalane and coconut oil for a comfortable, moisturized feel. Enjoy up to 16 hours of mega matte wear thanks to its mega flexible pigments. The precision drip-tip applicator ensures a smooth, seamless application for long-lasting, crack-free matte coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color Ruby Passion 930**
â­ Start by applying the lipstick from the center of your upper lip and sweep outwards to the corners.
â­ Repeat the process on your lower lip for complete coverage.
â­ Avoid pressing your lips together after application to maintain the matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color Ruby Passion 930**
â­ Squalane
â­ Coconut Oil
â­ Mega Flexible Pigments
â­ Vegan & Cruelty-Free Formula

description_en:
Achieve unbeatable hydration and up to 35-hour wear with **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**. **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation** offers full coverage with a natural-looking finish, making it Rimmel's most hydrating long-wear foundation. Clinically proven to improve skin radiance, it features a cruelty-free and vegan formula.

Product Features:
â­ Full coverage
â­ Up to 35-hour wear
â­ Breathable formula
â­ Clinically proven to improve skin radiance
â­ Cruelty-free and vegan
â­ Infused with hyaluronic acid and vitamin E
â­ Contains 2% niacinamide
â­ SPF20
â­ Sleep-proof
â­ Waterproof
â­ Crease-resistant
â­ Transfer-resistant

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**:
â­ Apply with a foundation brush, sponge, or fingertips to blend into the skin for unbeatable wear and coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish 35 Hour Foundation**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Niacinamide
â­ SPF20

description_en:
Discover natural beauty with the **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 001 Clear**. This balm delivers perfect hydration and a subtle sheen, featuring a 100% vegan and cruelty-free formula. Available in 5 stunning shades to suit all skin tones, it boasts eco-friendly packaging that's FSC certified and made with a minimum of 30% post-consumer recycled content.

Product Features:
â­ A hydrating tinted lip balm that nourishes and conditions lips while adding a dewy kiss of color.
â­ Its buttery texture allows it to glide on lips effortlessly with sheer and lightweight coverage.
â­ A clean and 100% vegan skin care formula, this cosmetic is cruelty-free.
â­ Made with FSC certified packaging and an eco-friendly minimum of 30% post-consumer recycled (PCR) content.
â­ Available in 5 stunning & inspired shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 001 Clear**:
â­ Start by lining your lips with a lip pencil.
â­ Top it off with the hydrating **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 001 Clear**, and reapply throughout the day for maximum hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Kind & Free Tinted Lip Balm 001 Clear**:
â­ 100% Vegan Formula.
â­ Cruelty-Free.
â­ Clean Skincare Ingredients.
â­ FSC Certified Packaging.
â­ Minimum 30% Post-Consumer Recycled Content.

Achieve a stunning lip look with **Rimmel Oh My Gloss- Ooh La La - No:500**. This lip gloss provides a brilliant shine and captivating color that lasts, giving your lips a full and attractive appearance. Its lightweight and comfortable formula is non-sticky, ensuring your lips feel soft and hydrated all day long.

â­ Delivers a brilliant, captivating shine.
â­ Rich, long-lasting color.
â­ Lightweight and non-sticky formula.
â­ Hydrates and softens lips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Oh My Gloss- Ooh La La - No:500**
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to your lips.
â­ Use alone or over lipstick.
â­ For best results, use a lip brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Oh My Gloss- Ooh La La - No:500**
â­ Polybutene, Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum), Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Octyldodecanol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Tocopheryl Acetate.

Experience the ultimate lip look with **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color Urban Affair 860**. This liquid lipstick delivers a bold, long-lasting matte finish that feels as good as it looks. Featuring a cruelty-free and vegan formula, it glides effortlessly onto your lips, providing full coverage with a rich, velvety color while keeping your lips hydrated. Enjoy stunningly matte lips that last up to 16 hours without cracking or drying.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color Urban Affair 860**
â­ For precision, start by lining your lips.
â­ Apply **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color Urban Affair 860** from the center of your lips outwards.
â­ Ensure lips are clean and dry before application for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Mega Matte Lip Color Urban Affair 860**
â­ Squalane for deep hydration.
â­ Coconut oil to nourish lips.
â­ Mega-flexible pigments for stunning color payoff.
â­ Vegan and cruelty-free formula.

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin and long-lasting makeup with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Primer**. This innovative primer provides up to 8 hours of extended makeup wear, making it your go-to choice for an enduring look from morning to night.

â­ Skin-perfecting formula that creates a smooth, even canvas.
â­ Visibly blurs and minimizes pores & imperfections, creating a flawless base for makeup application.
â­ Skin looks instantly smoother and appears brightened, enhancing your natural beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Primer**:
â­ Start with a clean, dry face.
â­ Apply a small amount of primer to your fingertips.
â­ Gently blend it across your entire face, focusing on areas that need refinement.
â­ Allow a few moments for the primer to absorb before applying foundation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Primer**:
â­ Lightweight and fast-absorbing formula.
â­ Contains ingredients that help to smooth skin and even out skin tone.
â­ Ensures ideal makeup longevity throughout the day.

#RimmelPrimer #LongLastingMakeup #MakeupBase #RimmelLondon #FullCoverage #PerfectSkin #SaudiBeauty #KSAFashion #ProMakeup #Cosmetics

description_en:
Discover ultimate softness and natural, long-lasting coverage with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 002 Pearl**. This lightweight powder foundation effectively controls shine without leaving your skin feeling dry, making it perfect for daily wear. Its fine powder ensures medium, buildable coverage that blends seamlessly for a healthy, natural look that lasts for hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 002 Pearl**
â­ Use the included sponge applicator to apply the powder to your skin.
â­ Gently blend from the center of your face outwards.
â­ Can be reapplied throughout the day for a makeup refresh.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 002 Pearl**
â­ Soft touch powder that lasts.
â­ Fine powder blends seamlessly for buildable yet lightweight coverage.
â­ Controls shine without feeling dry.
â­ Medium buildable coverage, transfer proof, sweat & water resistant.
â­ Vegan, dermatologist tested, suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Will not clog pores, suitable for all skin types.

description_en:
Achieve a flawless complexion with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 009 Honey**. This lightweight powder foundation offers a soft-touch, long-lasting finish, controlling shine without feeling dry on your skin. Its fine powder seamlessly blends to provide medium, buildable, natural-looking coverage that lasts all day. It comes in a convenient compact for easy on-the-go touch-ups.  Vegan, transfer-proof, sweat & water-resistant, and dermatologist-tested, it's suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, and won't clog pores.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 009 Honey**
â­ Use the included puff or a powder brush to apply the product all over your face.
â­ Blend gently from the center of the face outwards for a uniform coverage.
â­ Build up for higher coverage as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 009 Honey**
â­ Fine powder to absorb excess oil and control shine.
â­ Vegan ingredients for a gentle touch on the skin.
â­ Lightweight formula for a comfortable feel.
â­ Sweat and water-resistant for long-lasting wear.

#makeup #foundation #compactpowder #rimmel #saudimakeup #fullcoverage #mattefinish #dailymakeup #beauty #facebase

description_en:
**Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 004 Rose Ivory** is a lightweight, soft-touch powder foundation designed to control shine without feeling dry on your face. Achieve medium, buildable coverage that blends seamlessly for a natural look that lasts all day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 004 Rose Ivory**
â­ Use the included pressed powder puff or a clean makeup brush to apply the product.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to the entire face, focusing on areas that need extra coverage.
â­ Can be used alone or over liquid foundation for added longevity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 004 Rose Ivory**
â­ Fine powder for seamless blending and natural coverage.
â­ Lightweight vegan formula that controls shine.
â­ Transfer-proof, sweat, and water-resistant.
â­ Dermatologist tested, suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Non-comedogenic, suitable for all skin types.

description_en:
Discover a smooth, radiant complexion with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 001 Fair Porcelain**. This lightweight, soft-touch powder foundation provides a natural, radiant finish that lasts all day. It effectively controls shine without drying out your skin, thanks to its fine powder that blends seamlessly for medium, buildable coverage. Perfect for on-the-go touch-ups, it comes in a convenient compact. This compact foundation is vegan, transfer-proof, sweat & water-resistant, and dermatologist-tested, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, and it won't clog pores.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 001 Fair Porcelain**
â­ Use the included brush or sponge to apply the desired amount to your entire face.
â­ Start from the center of the face and blend outwards for even coverage.
â­ Build up layers for increased coverage as needed.
â­ Ideal for daily wear or for refreshing your makeup on the go.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 001 Fair Porcelain**
â­ Soft touch powder that lasts.
â­ Fine powder blends seamlessly.
â­ Medium buildable yet lightweight coverage.
â­ Controls shine without feeling dry.
â­ Transfer-proof, sweat & water resistant.
â­ Vegan formula.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin and all skin types.
â­ Will not clog pores.

#SaudiMakeup #Foundation #RimmelLondon #CompactPowder #FullCoverage #HealthySkin #ProMakeup #EverydayMakeup #Waterproof #BeautyProducts

â­ Lightweight vegan powder foundation that controls shine without feeling dry.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled softness with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 008 Soft Beige**. This lightweight powder foundation provides a velvety finish that controls shine without drying out your skin. Its fine powder formula blends seamlessly to offer medium, buildable coverage for a natural look that lasts all day. It comes in a convenient compact for easy on-the-go touch-ups.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 008 Soft Beige**
â­ Use a powder brush or the included sponge to apply the foundation all over your face.
â­ Blend gently from the center of the face outwards for even coverage.
â­ Reapply as needed for increased coverage or to control shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 008 Soft Beige**
â­ Soft touch powder that lasts.
â­ Fine powder blends seamlessly for buildable yet lightweight coverage that lasts all day.
â­ Controls shine without feeling dry.
â­ Medium buildable coverage, transfer proof, sweat & water resistant, vegan.
â­ Dermatologist tested, suitable for sensitive skin, will not clog pores, suitable for all skin types.

#SaudiMakeup #Foundation #RimmelLondon #CompactPowder #DailyMakeup #SaudiBeauty #HealthySkin #MediumCoverage #LongLasting #ProMakeup

description_en:
Discover ultimate softness and perfect shine control with **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 005 Ivory**. This lightweight powder foundation features a soft touch that blends seamlessly into your skin, offering medium, buildable coverage with a natural look that lasts all day, without any dry feeling. Its vegan, transfer-proof, sweat, and water-resistant formula is ideal for the modern woman on the go.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 005 Ivory**
â­ Use the included brush or sponge to apply the powder all over your face.
â­ Blend with circular motions for even coverage.
â­ Reapply as needed for touch-ups throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Lasting Finish Compact Foundation 005 Ivory**
â­ Fine powder for a silky touch.
â­ Lightweight vegan formula.
â­ Shine-controlling ingredients.
â­ Non-comedogenic.
â­ Dermatologist tested.

description_en:
Achieve flawless nails with **Rimmel Studio Pro Nail Polish - Shade 880**. **Rimmel Studio Pro Nail Polish - Shade 880** features a formula that dries in under 60 seconds, delivering bold, high-shine, anti-fade color. Enjoy long-lasting wear for up to 10 days, thanks to a precision brush that ensures quick and easy one-stroke application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Studio Pro Nail Polish - Shade 880**:
â­ Apply one coat to nails.
â­ Allow to dry completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Studio Pro Nail Polish - Shade 880**:
â­ Butyl Acetate
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ Silica
â­ Benzophenone-1
â­ Dimethicone
â­ [Ingredients may vary by shade]

Achieve salon-style nails at home with **Rimmel Super Gel Polish - Top Coat**. Enjoy long-lasting, chip-resistant nail color with a 2-step gel system. No UV lamp needed; simply set your color with the **Rimmel Super Gel Polish - Top Coat** to activate curing and get up to 14 days of gel color and shine. The maxi brush makes application incredibly easy, providing ultimate control and precision.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Super Gel Polish - Top Coat**:
â­ Apply 1-2 coats of Super Gel Nail Polish.
â­ Follow with **Rimmel Super Gel Polish - Top Coat** to activate curing.
â­ Easy to Remove.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Super Gel Polish - Top Coat**:
â­ Patented 2-Step Gel Colour System.
â­ Up to 14 days of gel color and shine.
â­ Rivals a salon mani with no lamps, no mess, no damage to nails.
â­ Chip-resistant, high-gloss finish.

description_en:
Achieve perfectly polished and protected nails with **Rimmel Nail Care Top Coat Transparent**. This high-shine top coat provides a durable protective layer, adding a brilliant glossy finish to your manicure while shielding your nails from chips and fading. Its advanced formula ensures a flawless look that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Nail Care Top Coat Transparent**:
â­ Apply one coat over clean, dry nails.
â­ For maximum shine and protection, reapply an additional coat as needed.
â­ Allow to dry completely before engaging in activities.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Nail Care Top Coat Transparent**:
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Butyl Acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ Acetyl Tributyl Citrate
â­ Acetyl Hexapentanoate
â­ Benzophenone-1
â­ Mineral Oil
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum
â­ Fragrance

description_en:
Achieve a professional gel-like manicure at home with **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish**. Enjoy a high-shine, chip-resistant finish that lasts up to 14 days without the need for UV light. **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish** is incredibly easy to apply for a perfect nail look. It removes like regular nail polish with a cotton pad soaked in nail varnish remover.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish**:
â­ Step 1: Apply 1-2 coats of nail polish.
â­ Step 2: Wait for nails to dry completely.
â­ Step 3: Sweep Super Gel Top Coat over the top to activate curing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel Super Gel Nail Polish**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol.
â­ Tosylamide/epoxy Resin, Styrene/acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Triphenyl Phosphate.
â­ Adipic Acid/neopentyl Glycol/trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Aqua/water/eau, Silica.
â­ Phosphoric Acid, Lithothamniom Calcareum Extract, Polyvinyl Butyral, Solum Diatomeae/diatomaceous Earth.
â­ Corallina Officinalis Extract, Butylene Glycol, Zinc Sulfate, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract.
â­ Hydrolyzed Conchiolin Protein, Methylparaben.
â­ May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), D&c Red No. 6 Barium Lake (CI 15850).

description_en:
Achieve super-glossy, ultra-shiny nails with just one sweep using **Rimmel 60 Sec Nail Polish - 235 Preppy In Pink**. This quick-dry polish delivers precise application and high-impact color in just 60 seconds, lasting up to 10 days. Perfect for busy schedules, **Rimmel 60 Sec Nail Polish - 235 Preppy In Pink** ensures a professional manicure with effortless ease.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Sec Nail Polish - 235 Preppy In Pink**
â­ Step 1: Glide on your shade of **Rimmel 60 Sec Nail Polish - 235 Preppy In Pink** in one swift stroke.
â­ Step 2: Wait for the color to dry completely, then apply a second coat for intensified color.
â­ Step 3: For added sparkle to your high-shine mani, glide on the glitter top coat for a dazzling effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Sec Nail Polish - 235 Preppy In Pink**
â­ Butyl acetate, ethyl acetate, nitrocellulose, acetyl tributyl citrate, isopropyl alcohol, tosylamide/epoxy resin, styrene/acrylates copolymer, stearalkonium bentonite, silica, triphenyl phosphate, adipic acid/neopentyl glycol/ trimellitic anhydride copolymer, aqua/water/eau, diacetone alcohol, etocrylene, kaolin, glycidyl neodecanoate/ phthalic anhydride/tmp crosspolymer, mek, synthetic fluorphlogopite, corallina officinalis extract, acrylates/ dimethicone copolymer, isosorbide dicaprylate/caprate, dimethyl isosorbide, phosphoric acid, trimethylsiloxysilicate, n- butyl alcohol, dimethicone, tocopheryl acetate, benzophenone-1, cetyl peg/ppg-10/1 dimethicone, polyvinyl butyral, polybutylene glycol/mdi copolymer, acetone, trimethylpentanediyl dibenzoate, polyethylene, stearalkonium hectorite, hydrolyzed conchiolin protein, carthamus tinctorius (safflower) seed oil, macrocystis pyrifera (kelp) extract, tin oxide, [may contain/peut contenir/+/-: mica, d&c yellow no. 11 (ci 47000), titanium dioxide (ci 77891), iron oxides (ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499), d&c red no. 7 calcium lake (ci 15850), fd&c yellow no. 5 aluminum lake (ci 19140), manganese violet (ci 77742), ultramarines (ci 77007), aluminum powder (ci 77000), d&c red no. 6 barium lake (ci 15850), fd&c blue no. 1 aluminum lake (ci 42090), d&c red no. 34 calcium lake (ci 15880), ferric ferrocyanide (ci 77510), bismuth oxychloride (ci 77163), d&c violet no. 2 (ci 60725)].

description_en:
Achieve super-glossy, ultra-shiny nails with just one sweep using the **Rimmel 60 Sec Nail Polish - 810 Grungy Grey**. This quick-dry polish delivers high-impact color and precise application in a mere 60 seconds, lasting up to 10 days for a flawless finish. Perfect for a fast-paced lifestyle, the **Rimmel 60 Sec Nail Polish - 810 Grungy Grey** is your go-to for instant elegance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rimmel 60 Sec Nail Polish - 810 Grungy Grey**:
â­ Step 1: Glide on your shade of **Rimmel 60 Sec Nail Polish - 810 Grungy Grey** in one stroke for a super-glossy look.
â­ Step 2: Wait for the color to dry, then apply a second coat for added intensity.
â­ Step 3: For an extra sparkle, glide on a glitter top coat for a twinkly effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rimmel 60 Sec Nail Polish - 810 Grungy Grey**:
â­ Fast-drying, high-shine formula.
â­ Provides high-impact color in a single stroke.
â­ Perfect for quick, on-the-go application.
â­ Lasts for up to 10 days.

Experience fast and effective relief from sore throat pain with **Strepsils Lozenges Honey & Lemon**. Its dual anti-bacterial action and soothing honey-lemon flavor provide comfort for minor mouth irritations and mouth ulcers. **Strepsils Lozenges** are your go-to for throat care, offering a refreshing and soothing experience with every lozenge.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Strepsils Lozenges Honey & Lemon**:
â­ Dissolve 1 lozenge slowly in the mouth every 2 to 3 hours, or as prescribed by a doctor.
â­ Do not exceed the stated dose.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Store below 25Â°C.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Strepsils Lozenges Honey & Lemon**:
â­ Each lozenge contains: 2,4-Dichlorobenzyl alcohol 1.2mg, Amylmetacresol B.P 0.6mg.

â­ Honey and Lemon.

Enjoy the refreshing blackcurrant flavour for immediate and lasting comfort.

â­ Effective relief for moderate to severe sore throats.
â­ Contains Hexylresorcinol for powerful anaesthetic properties.
â­ Refreshing blackcurrant flavour.
â­ Double action: Anaesthetic and Antiseptic.
â­ Helps soothe sore mouth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Strepsils**:
â­ For adults and children 6 years and above: Dissolve 1 lozenge slowly in the mouth every 3 hours.
â­ Do not give to children under 6 years of age.

description_en:
Experience powerful and long-lasting relief from sore throat pain with **Strepsils** Lozenges. Designed to soothe the discomfort and irritation of a sore throat, **Strepsils** offers dual anti-bacterial action for instant and sustained relief. Whether you're battling a sore throat or a blocked nose, **Strepsils** Sore Throat and Blocked Nose lozenges with menthol vapour help to unblock nasal passages and alleviate symptoms.

â­ Powerful, long-lasting sore throat relief.
â­ Effectively soothes and treats sore throat pain.
â­ Helps unblock the nose with menthol vapour action.
â­ Also effective for sore mouth and minor mouth irritations.
â­ Contains dual anti-bacterial ingredients to fight throat infections.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Strepsils**
â­ Slowly dissolve 1 lozenge in the mouth every 2 to 3 hours as needed, or as directed by your doctor.
â­ Store below 25Â°C.
â­ Do not take more than 12 lozenges in 24 hours.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Not suitable for children under 6 years of age.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Strepsils**
â­ Each lozenge contains approximately:
  â­ 2,4-Dichlorobenzyl alcohol 1.2mg
  â­ Amylmetacresol B.P 0.6mg
  â­ Menthol B.P 8.0mg

description_en:
Soothe your sore throat and blocked nose with **Strepsils** Menthol Lozenges. Experience fast-acting, long-lasting relief thanks to their dual-action antibacterial formula. These powerful lozenges are designed to combat throat infections and provide soothing comfort. The added menthol vapour helps to unblock your nasal passages, making **Strepsils** the ideal choice for comprehensive throat and nasal care.

â­ Dual anti-bacterial action for effective sore throat relief.
â­ Provides instant and long-lasting comfort.
â­ Contains menthol vapour to help clear a blocked nose.
â­ Addresses sore throat, mouth soreness, and minor mouth irritation.
â­ Trusted brand for throat care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Strepsils**:
â­ Dissolve one lozenge slowly in the mouth every 2 to 3 hours.
â­ Do not take more than 12 lozenges in 24 hours.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Not suitable for children under 6 years of age.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Strepsils**:
â­ 2, 4-Dichlorobenzyl alcohol 1.2mg.
â­ Amylmetacresol B.P 0.6mg.
â­ Menthol B.P 8.0mg.

description_en:
Soothe your throat with **Strepsils Extra Blackcurrant Lozenges**.

Experiencing painful and irritating sore throats? **Strepsils Extra Blackcurrant Lozenges** provide instant and long-lasting relief with their dual anti-bacterial action. They are perfect for medium to more troublesome sore throats, as the anaesthetic Hexylresorcinol quickly numbs the pain.

â­ Provides effective sore throat relief.
â­ Offers instant and continuous comfort.
â­ Features a dual action: anaesthetic and antiseptic.
â­ Suitable for adults and children aged 6 years and above.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Strepsils Extra Blackcurrant Lozenges**:
â­ For adults and children aged 6 years and above: Dissolve 1 lozenge slowly in the mouth every 3 hours.
â­ Do not give to children under 6 years of age.
â­ Do not take more than 12 lozenges in 24 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Strepsils Extra Blackcurrant Lozenges**:
â­ Each lozenge contains approximately: Hexylresorcinol 2.4mg, levomenthol 5mg, Blackcurrant flavor 12mg.
â­ Powerful formula for sore throat pain.

description_en:
Introducing **Strepsils** Original Lozenges, your ultimate solution for irritating sore throats. **Strepsils** offers powerful, long-lasting relief from throat pain, with a dual anti-bacterial action that effectively and quickly combats bacterial throat infections. Perfect for relieving mild to moderate sore throats, mouth ulcers, and minor mouth irritations.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Strepsils**:
â­ Dissolve 1 lozenge slowly in the mouth every 2 to 3 hours, or as directed by your doctor.
â­ Do not exceed 12 lozenges in 24 hours.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Strepsils**:
â­ Each lozenge contains: 2, 4-Dichlorobenzyl alcohol 1.2mg, Amylmetacresol B.P. 0.6mg.
â­ Store below 25Â°C.

description_en:
Boost your health with **Centrum Multivitamins with Lutein**, a comprehensive formula with 24 essential nutrients to support the general wellbeing of adults. Backed by over 35 years of nutritional expertise, **Centrum Multivitamins with Lutein** provides you with what you need to stay active and energized daily, even with a busy lifestyle.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Centrum Multivitamins with Lutein**
â­ For adults and children over 11 years: Take 1 tablet daily with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Centrum Multivitamins with Lutein**
â­ Vitamin A (Retinol) 4000 IU
â­ Vitamin E 14.9 IU
â­ Vitamin C 60mg
â­ Folic Acid 195mcg
â­ Vitamin B1 1.4mg
â­ Vitamin B2 1.6mg
â­ Niacinamide 18mg

â­ Lutein 250 mcg

description_en:
Unlock your vitality with **Centrum Silver with Lutein**, the ultimate solution for supporting your health as you age. This unique formula delivers 26 essential vitamins and minerals that are often difficult to obtain through your diet, ensuring you maintain optimal energy and well-being.

â­ **Energy Release:** Boost your energy levels with B-complex vitamins that help convert food into energy.
â­ **Bone Health:** Vitamin D and calcium work together to maintain strong bones and protect against osteoporosis.
â­ **Eye Health:** Enriched with lutein, zinc, and vitamins C and E, **Centrum Silver with Lutein** supports clear vision and protects your eyesight.
â­ **Heart Function:** B vitamins and folic acid contribute to maintaining a healthy heart and supporting cardiovascular well-being.
â­ **Nutritional Support:** Provides vital nutrients essential for your body's efficient functioning at a cellular level.

As we get older, our nutritional needs change. **Centrum Silver with Lutein 50+** is specifically formulated for adults over 50 to meet these evolving health requirements and support your overall wellness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Centrum Silver with Lutein**:
â­ For adults over 50 years, take one tablet daily with water, preferably with food.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Centrum Silver with Lutein**:
â­ Features a comprehensive blend of 26 essential vitamins and minerals, including Lutein, Zinc, Vitamin D, Calcium, B-complex vitamins, Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Folic Acid.

#Centrum #Vitamins #Minerals #BoneHealth #HeartHealth #EyeHealth #Supplements #Multivitamins #SaudiArabia #KSA

title_ar: Ø³Ù†ØªØ±Ù… Ø§ÙŠÙ†Ø±Ø¬ÙŠ: ÙÙŠØªØ§Ù…ÙŠÙ†Ø§Øª Ù…ØªØ¹Ø¯Ø¯Ø© Ù…Ø¹ Ø¬ÙŠÙ†ÙƒÙˆ & Ø¬Ù†Ø³Ù†Ø¬ - 30 Ù‚Ø±Øµ Ù„ØªØ¹Ø²ÙŠØ² Ø§Ù„Ø·Ø§Ù‚Ø©
description_en:
Boost your energy and vitality with **Centrum Energy**, a multivitamin expertly crafted to support your body's dynamism with a unique blend of Ginkgo and Ginseng. **Centrum Energy** provides you with the nutritional support you need to face your day efficiently and vibrantly, featuring a rich formula of essential vitamins and minerals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Centrum Energy**
â­ For Adults: Take 1 tablet daily, preferably with food.
â­ Close tightly and keep out of reach of children.
â­ Do not exceed the recommended daily dose.
â­ Consult your doctor before taking this supplement if you have any serious medical condition, are pregnant, or breastfeeding.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Centrum Energy**
â­ Vitamins: Beta-carotene, Folic acid, Niacinamide, Biotin, Pantothenic acid, Vitamins A, E, C, B1, B2, B6, B12, D3, K1.
â­ Minerals: Calcium, Iodine, Iron, Magnesium, Copper, Manganese, Phosphorus, Chromium, Molybdenum, Selenium, Zinc.
â­ Herbs: Ginko Biloba Extract (60 mg), Ginseng Extract (50 mg).
â­ Non-Active Ingredients: Crospovidone, Magnesium stearate, Microcrystalline cellulose, Silicon Dioxide, Opadry yellow.

#CentrumEnergy #Multivitamins #Ginseng #GinkgoBiloba #Supplements #Health #Energy #SaudiArabia #Wellness #NutritionalSupplements

Discover the nutritional power of **Centrum Silver with Lutein 50+**, the ultimate solution for supporting your health as you age. Specially formulated to meet the changing needs of adults over 50, this unique product delivers 26 essential vitamins and minerals that are difficult to obtain from diet alone. B-complex vitamins aid in energy release from food, while Vitamin D and Calcium support strong bone health. Enjoy enhanced eye health thanks to Lutein, Zinc, Vitamins C, and E. **Centrum Silver with Lutein 50+** also contributes to healthy heart function by providing B Vitamins and Folic Acid. This dietary supplement offers comprehensive nutritional support, ensuring your body receives the essential nutrients for optimal performance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Centrum Silver with Lutein 50+**

â­ For adults 50+, take one (1) tablet daily with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Centrum Silver with Lutein 50+**

â­ Retinol 4000 IU
â­ Vitamin E 14.9 IU
â­ Vitamin C 60mg
â­ Folic Acid 195mcg
â­ Vitamin B1 1.4mg
â­ Vitamin B2 1.6mg
â­ Niacinamide 18mg
â­ Vitamin B6 2mg
â­ Vitamin B12 1mcg
â­ Vitamin D3 400 IU
â­ Biotin 100mcg
â­ Pantothenic Acid 6mg
â­ Vitamin K1 30mcg
â­ Calcium 162mg
â­ Iodine 100mcg
â­ Iron 10mg
â­ Magnesium 50mg
â­ Copper 0.5mg
â­ Manganese 1mg
â­ Phosphorus 125mg
â­ Potassium 40mg
â­ Chromium 40mcg
â­ Molybdenum 50mcg
â­ Selenium 30mcg
â­ Zinc 5mg
â­ Lutein 1000 mcg

#CentrumSilver #MensVitamins #WomensVitamins #HeartHealth #BoneHealth #ImmuneSupport #DietarySupplements #EyeHealth #Multivitamins #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort with **Sofy Feminine Napkin**, specially designed for your sensitive skin. These large (29cm) napkins feature a unique formula enriched with moisturizing olive oil, which helps reduce itchiness and maintain healthy, refreshed skin throughout your period. An exceptionally soft experience confirmed by 98% of women.

â­ Large sanitary napkins, 29cm.
â­ Enriched with olive oil to moisturize skin and reduce itchiness.
â­ Dermatologically tested for superior softness on skin.
â­ Features 25 attractive, individually wrapped designs.
â­ Ultra-soft cotton touch for unparalleled comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sofy Feminine Napkin**:
â­ Change the pad regularly every 3-4 hours for maximum hygiene and comfort.
â­ Use the adhesive strip to securely attach the pad to your underwear.
â­ Dispose of used pads safely in a trash bin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sofy Feminine Napkin**:
â­ Soft cottony top sheet.
â­ Super absorbent core with moisturizing olive oil formula.
â­ Leak-proof back sheet.
â­ Secure adhesive materials.

#Sofy #SanitaryNapkins #FeminineCare #WomensHealth #PersonalHygiene #OliveOil #Comfort #Softness #FeminineProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort with **Sofy Feminine Napkin** Olive Oil. These slim, large-sized 29cm sanitary napkins are designed for superior protection while gently caring for your skin. Enriched with moisturizing Olive Oil, **Sofy Feminine Napkin** helps reduce itchiness and keeps your skin healthy and fresh.

â­ Features Olive Oil Moisturiser for a Healthy and Fresh Skin.
â­ 98% out of 110 women attested it is Soft on Skin.
â­ Dermatologically Tested for maximum safety.
â­ 25 attractive non-woven individual wrap designs for a soft touch.
â­ Ultra-soft cotton touch for a feeling of comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sofy Feminine Napkin**:
â­ Change the pad regularly for hygiene and freshness.
â­ Use during your menstrual cycle for reliable protection.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sofy Feminine Napkin**:
â­ Soft cotton top layer with moisturizing Olive Oil.
â­ Super absorbent core.
â­ Leak-proof barriers.
â­ Secure adhesive.

Experience ultimate comfort with **Sofy Pure Pantyliner Unscented Regular**. These daily panty liners are designed to provide you with a feeling of cleanliness and freshness all day long, thanks to their silky-soft touch and pure ingredients. Perfect for everyday use, and before and after your menstrual period, offering reliable protection while maintaining your comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sofy Pure Pantyliner Unscented Regular**:
â­ Use a fresh panty liner daily for maximum hygiene.
â­ Change the panty liner regularly throughout the day to maintain freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sofy Pure Pantyliner Unscented Regular**:
â­ Soft cotton touch for ultimate comfort.

â­ Triple individual wrapping for hygiene and portability.
â­ Fragrance-free to suit sensitive skin.

description_en:
Experience superior protection and ultimate comfort with **Sofy Antibacterial Slim Large with wings 52 Pads**. Designed with advanced anti-bacterial sheets that minimize bacteria growth on the surface, these pads help prevent irritation and keep your skin healthy and fresh.

â­ Advanced antibacterial protection for lasting comfort.
â­ Soft, gentle top layer for skin comfort.
â­ Secure wings for a stay-put fit and leak protection.
â­ Slim design for a discreet feel.
â­ High absorbency for extended freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sofy Antibacterial Slim Large with wings 52 Pads**:
â­ Remove the adhesive backing and wing strips.
â­ Place the pad in the center of your underwear.
â­ Wrap the wings around the sides of your underwear and secure them.
â­ Change the pad regularly for optimal hygiene and freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sofy Antibacterial Slim Large with wings 52 Pads**:
â­ Super absorbent materials.
â­ Soft non-woven top sheet.
â­ Waterproof back sheet with adhesive wings.
â­ Antibacterial agents.
â­ May contain light fragrance (depending on variant).

Experience superior protection with **Sofy Musk Slim Large With Wings**. These sanitary pads feature anti-bacterial sheets that minimize bacteria growth on the surface, helping to protect your skin from irritation and keep it healthy. Enjoy a feeling of freshness and confidence all day long.

â­ Slim and flexible design for unparalleled comfort.
â­ Soft and gentle top layer for sensitive skin.
â­ Advanced absorption technology for lasting dryness.
â­ Secure side wings for leak-proof protection.
â­ Refreshing musk scent for enhanced confidence.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sofy Musk Slim Large With Wings**:
â­ Remove the adhesive strip from the back.
â­ Position the pad in place.
â­ Use the wings to secure the pad firmly around your underwear.
â­ Change the pad regularly for optimal hygiene.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sofy Musk Slim Large With Wings**:
â­ Soft and breathable fibers.
â­ Anti-bacterial top sheet.
â­ Super absorbent particles.
â­ Secure adhesive.
â­ Natural musk fragrance.

description_en:
Experience uninterrupted sleep with **Sofy Night Comfort** pads. Designed for ultimate nighttime protection, these long sanitary pads feature an extra-wide back to prevent leakage, even when you toss and turn, ensuring you enjoy a deep, comfortable sleep.

â­ Slim and flexible design for maximum comfort.
â­ Extended back coverage to prevent leaks during sleep.
â­ Ultra-soft surface to protect against irritation.
â­ High absorbency for long-lasting dryness.
â­ Wings for secure and reliable fit.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sofy Night Comfort**:
â­ Remove the backing strip from the pad.
â­ Unfold the wings and secure them around your underwear for stability.
â­ Change the pad regularly for hygiene and freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sofy Night Comfort**:
â­ Soft topsheet (e.g., Polypropylene).
â­ Absorbent core (e.g., Super Absorbent Polymer).
â­ Wide, leak-proof backsheet.
â­ Adhesive strips for securement.
â­ Side wings for fixation.

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort and superior protection with **Sofy Maxi Large With Wings 30+10 Sanitary Pads**. These pads are designed for exceptional absorbency, leaving you feeling fresh and dry all day long. Featuring a comfortable winged design, the pad adheres securely to your underwear, preventing leaks and giving you the confidence you need.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sofy Maxi Large With Wings 30+10 Sanitary Pads**
â­ Remove the paper backing from the adhesive strip and press the sticky side of the pad to your underwear.
â­ If your pad has wings, remove the paper backing and wrap the wings around the sides of your underwear for maximum protection.
â­ It's recommended to change the pad every 3-4 hours, or as needed, to ensure cleanliness and comfort.
â­ Choose the absorbency level that suits your flow for an optimal experience.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sofy Maxi Large With Wings 30+10 Sanitary Pads**
â­ Slim design for invisible comfort.
â­ Wings for secure fixation and leak prevention.
â­ Soft top layer gentle on the skin.
â­ High absorbency capacity to maintain dryness.
â­ Provides up to 8 hours of protection.

description_en:
Experience superior comfort with **Sofy Feminine Napkin** with Olive Oil, specially designed to provide ultimate care for your skin. These slim, large-size sanitary napkins, measuring 29cm, are enriched with a moisturizing Olive Oil formula that helps reduce itchiness and maintain healthy, supple skin throughout your period.

**Product Features:**
â­ Enriched with Olive Oil moisturiser for healthy and protected skin.
â­ 98% out of 110 women attested to its superior softness on the skin.
â­ Dermatologically Tested for maximum safety.
â­ Soft, non-woven individual wrap with 25 attractive designs, ensuring hygiene and privacy.
â­ Soft cotton touch that provides all-day comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sofy Feminine Napkin**:
â­ Change the sanitary napkin regularly every 3-4 hours for optimal hygiene and comfort.
â­ Use the appropriate pad for protection during your menstrual cycle.
â­ Dispose of used pads properly after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sofy Feminine Napkin**:
â­ Key ingredient: Moisturizing Olive Oil.
â­ High-quality absorbent and soft materials.
â­ Soft cotton outer layer.
â­ Secure and attractive individual packaging.

#Sofy #SanitaryNapkins #FeminineCare #WomensHealth #OliveOil #Comfort #Hygiene #PeriodCare #SaudiArabia #DailyCare

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness and purity with **Sofy Pantyliner Fresh Regular**. These pantyliners are designed to provide you with unparalleled comfort and hygiene throughout your day. Featuring a soft, cotton-like touch and flexible design that moves with you, you'll feel confident with every step. Each pantyliner is triple-wrapped to ensure absolute hygiene and protection, making them perfect for daily use and for before and after your menstrual period for a refreshing and reassuring experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sofy Pantyliner Fresh Regular**
â­ Use one pantyliner daily for a lasting feeling of cleanliness and freshness.
â­ Change the pantyliner as needed for maximum comfort.
â­ Ideal for everyday use, and during days before or after your menstrual cycle.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sofy Pantyliner Fresh Regular**
â­ Soft cotton materials for superior comfort.
â­ Advanced absorption layer to maintain dryness.
â­ Triple individual wrapping for hygiene.

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort and protection with **Sofy Nina** Maternity Pads, designed specifically for your postpartum needs. These extra-large pads are perfect for overnight use and periods requiring enhanced absorbency and security.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sofy Nina**:
â­ The pads feature strong adhesive strips to securely attach to your underwear.
â­ Remove the paper backing and press the sticky side of the pad to your panties.
â­ If your pad includes wings, remove the paper backing and wrap the wings around the sides of your underwear for maximum leakage protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sofy Nina**:
â­ Super absorbent material for rapid and efficient absorption.
â­ Soft, skin-friendly top layer for unparalleled comfort.
â­ Extra side wings for ultimate leak protection.
â­ Strong adhesive strips to keep the pad in place.

**Caution and Warnings:**
â­ Do not flush used products down the toilet.
â­ To avoid danger of suffocation, keep this plastic bag away from babies and children.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled comfort and superior protection with **Sofy Slim Sanitary Pads with Wings - Large Size**. These sanitary pads, featuring 30 pieces per pack, are designed for super absorption in seconds, making them ideal for heavy blood flow. Thanks to their extra slim design, **Sofy Slim Sanitary Pads with Wings - Large Size** provide a clean, dry, and fresh feeling all day, allowing you to confidently go about your busiest days. They offer up to 8 hours of absorbency for unmatched protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sofy Slim Sanitary Pads with Wings - Large Size**:
â­ The pads have adhesive strips to attach securely to your panties. Remove the paper backing and press the sticky side of the pad to your underwear.
â­ If your pad also has wings, extra flaps that fold over the sides of your underwear for increased protection, remove the paper backing and wrap the wings around the crotch, pressing firmly to the underside of your panties.
â­ For optimal experience, it's recommended to change the pad every 3-4 hours or as needed to maintain cleanliness and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sofy Slim Sanitary Pads with Wings - Large Size**:
â­ Soft and skin-friendly top layer.
â­ Super absorbent core for heavy flow.
â­ Adhesive wings for extra security and leak protection.
â­ Leak-proof back layer.

description_en:
Experience superior softness and protection with **Sebamed** Baby Powder.

Say goodbye to irritation and chafing! **Sebamed** Baby Powder is meticulously formulated to provide a gentle protective barrier for your baby's delicate skin, effectively preventing uncomfortable friction.

â­ Soothes and nourishes with Olive Oil, which moisturizes and shields the skin from dryness.
â­ Offers instant comfort with Allantoin, known to reduce irritation, prevent nappy rash, and minimize the effects of rubbing and chafing.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed**:
â­ Simply apply a moderate amount of powder to your baby's clean and dry skin, focusing on areas prone to friction like the diaper area.
â­ Use after every diaper change or as needed to maintain skin dryness and reduce irritation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed**:
â­ Olive Oil
â­ Allantoin
â­ Pure Talc
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Shea Butter

Warning and cautions: For external use only.

description_en:
Give your baby the ultimate care they deserve with **Sebamed Baby Shampoo** 250 ml. This shampoo is specially formulated to be gentle on your baby's delicate hair and scalp, while maintaining the natural pH balance of their skin for protection against external factors. Its soothing chamomile formula leaves hair silky smooth and helps maintain a healthy scalp, making it the ideal choice from day one. It's the perfect solution for scalp issues like cradle cap and seborrheic dermatitis, ensuring no tears during bath time.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed Baby Shampoo**:
â­ Gently wet your baby's hair.
â­ Dispense a few drops of the shampoo into your palm.
â­ Gently massage the baby's scalp in circular motions to cleanse.
â­ Rinse off the lather thoroughly with clear water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed Baby Shampoo**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium methyl cocoyl taurate, Chamomilla Recutita flower extract, sodium lactate, sodium ascorbate, sodium Laureth sulfate, laureate-2laurete-2, PEG-150 distearate, PEG-3 distearate, parfum, citric acid, ascorbyl palmitate, phenoxyethanol, sodium benzoate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, disodium cocoamphodiacetate, coco-glucoside, sodium acetate, glyceryl oleate, alcohol, lactic acid, sodium hydroxide, benzyl alcohol.

Provide your little one with optimal care with **Sebamed Baby Wipes Oil**. These wet wipes are designed to offer thorough and gentle cleansing, effectively protecting your baby's delicate skin from environmental influences and renewing it to resist irritation. These wipes ensure complete and gentle cleansing for the diaper area without causing any skin irritation. The rich natural oils in **Sebamed Baby Wipes Oil** nourish and protect the skin from dryness and irritation, giving your baby unparalleled comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed Baby Wipes Oil**
â­ Gently use for cleaning your baby's diaper area.

â­ Ensure the pack is sealed tightly after each use to maintain the wipes' moisture.

description_en:
The **Sebamed Baby Diaper Rash Cream** is designed to accelerate the healing of rashes caused by trapped moisture in diapers. Carefully formulated for delicate baby skin, this cream soothes and protects against irritation, while stimulating skin regeneration and providing nourishment. Regular use after every diaper change offers an effective protective barrier thanks to titanium dioxide, preventing skin irritation from contact with urine. It is clinically tested to ensure its safety on your baby's delicate skin, visibly reducing redness and providing rapid relief, while hydrating the skin and maintaining its softness and suppleness. It is suitable even for newborns.

â­ Provides gentle and effective protection for delicate baby skin.
â­ Soothes and relieves diaper rash quickly.
â­ Forms a protective barrier with micronized titanium dioxide.
â­ Maintains skin pH of 5.5 for faster skin recovery.
â­ Enriched with natural herb oil for increased softness.
â­ Contains a rich lipid complex with squalene and lecithin.
â­ Dermatologically tested and safe for baby skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed Baby Diaper Rash Cream**:
â­ Open the tube and squeeze out the required amount of cream.
â­ Apply a generous layer to the baby's clean and dry diaper area.
â­ It is recommended to change the diaper every 3-4 hours, or as needed.
â­ Apply the cream after every diaper change to ensure continuous protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed Baby Diaper Rash Cream**:
â­ Aqua, Disodium EDTA, Petrolatum, Citric Acid, Paraffinum Liquidum, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-2-Sesquiisostearate, Cera Microcristallina, Panthenol, Cera alba, Sodium Lactate, Sorbitol, Allantoin, Squalane, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Titanium Dioxide, Dimethicone, Triticum Vulgare bran extract, and Lecithin.

title_en: Sebamed Baby Bath Bubble: Ultimate Gentleness for Your Baby's Sensitive Skin
title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ¨Ø§Ù…ÙŠØ¯ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ø§Ø³ØªØ­Ù…Ø§Ù… Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„: Ù„Ø·Ù ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚ Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø·ÙÙ„Ùƒ Ø§Ù„Ø­Ø³Ø§Ø³Ø©
description_en:
Experience a unique bathing ritual for your baby with **Sebamed Baby Bath Bubble**, specially formulated for delicate infant skin. Say goodbye to tears with our gentle, tear-free formula that causes no irritation and is 100% free from soap and alkali. The extra-mild tenside complex gently cleanses your baby's hair and scalp without dehydrating, preserving its natural moisture.

Infused with extracts of medicinal plants, **Sebamed Baby Bath Bubble** soothes, hydrates, and protects your baby's skin, combating inflammation and irritation for unparalleled softness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed Baby Bath Bubble**
â­ Use for washing and cleansing the skin of newborns, even before the umbilical cord falls off.
â­ Safe for daily use.
â­ Apply a small amount to bathwater or your wet hand to create a rich lather, then rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed Baby Bath Bubble**
â­ pH 5.5 balanced to suit baby's skin.
â­ Unique extra-mild tenside complex for gentle cleansing.
â­ Extracts of medicinal plants to soothe, hydrate, and protect the skin.
â­ Soap and alkali-free.
â­ Tear-free formula that does not irritate the eyes.

#SebamedBaby #BabyBath #SensitiveSkinCare #BabyProducts #BabyHygiene #BabyShampoo #BabyConditioner #SoftSkin #Dermatological #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate gentle care with **Sebamed Baby Wash Extra Soft 200 ml**. Our "No Tears" formula is specially designed for your baby's delicate skin, being 100% soap and alkali-free. The ultra-mild Sugar Tensid complex protects the skin against dryness, while the vernix-related squalane provides essential lipids your baby's skin needs. Allantoin makes the skin soft and smooth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed Baby Wash Extra Soft 200 ml**
â­ For washing and cleansing newborn babies' skin before the umbilical cord falls off.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed Baby Wash Extra Soft 200 ml**
â­ pH 5.5
â­ Sugar Tensid complex
â­ Vernix-related squalane
â­ Allantoin

description_en:
Discover **Sebamed Extra Soft Baby Cleansing Wipes - 72 Count**, crafted to provide the gentlest care for your baby's delicate skin. These ultra-mild, extra-humid plant-based wipes ensure a thorough yet gentle cleanse. They are specifically formulated to support the natural pH balance of the skin at 5.5, which is crucial for the development of the protective acid mantle that newborns lack during the first few months of life.

â­ Mild formula for gentle everyday cleansing.
â­ Extra-humid, plant-based wipes for ultimate hydration.
â­ Ideal for sensitive baby skin.
â­ pH 5.5 promotes skin health and the development of the skin's natural protective acid mantle.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed Extra Soft Baby Cleansing Wipes - 72 Count**:
â­ Use the wipes to gently cleanse your baby's skin as needed.
â­ Ensure the pack is sealed tightly after each use to maintain moisture.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed Extra Soft Baby Cleansing Wipes - 72 Count**:
â­ Water, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Polysorbate 20, Lactic Acid, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Allantoin.

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ¨Ø§Ù…ÙŠØ¯ ØµØ§Ø¨ÙˆÙ†Ø© Ù…Ù†Ø¸Ù Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø­Ø³Ø§Ø³Ø© 150 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover superior purity for your skin with **Sebamed Cleansing Bar for Sensitive Skin**. This soap is specially formulated to cleanse your skin gently and deeply, while maintaining your skin's natural pH of 5.5. It is alkali-free and nourishes your skin with natural vitamins and amino acids, supporting moisture balance and reinforcing the skin's natural acid mantle. Enjoy a subtle floral fragrance that provides lasting freshness. Globally recommended by dermatologists for its effectiveness on sensitive skin and its non-comedogenic properties.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed Cleansing Bar for Sensitive Skin**
* Wet your body with water.
* Lather the soap bar with wet hands and rinse thoroughly.
* Gently cleanse your entire body.
* Wash off the soap with warm water.
* Dry your body completely with a towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed Cleansing Bar for Sensitive Skin**
* Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate.
* Wheat starch.
* Stearic Acid.
* Cetearyl Alcohol.
* Palmitic Acid.
* Talc.
* Lactic Acid.
* Water (Aqua).
* Lecithin.
* Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate.
* Cocamidopropyl Betaine.
* Panthenol (Vitamin B5).
* Inulin.
* Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate.
* Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E).
* Glycine.
* Magnesium Aspartate.
* Alanine.
* Lysine.
* Leucine.
* Benzophenone-4.
* Tartaric Acid.
* Fragrance (Parfum).
* Yellow 10 (CI 47005).
* Green 5 (CI 61570).
* Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).

#Sebamed #SensitiveSkinSoap #Skincare #SkinHydration #SkinCleansing #CareProducts #HealthySkin #SaudiDeals #Cosmetics #SkinCareProducts

description_en:
Achieve clear, impurity-free skin with **Sebamed Clear Face Soap for Acne**. This soap is specifically designed for deep facial cleansing, effectively removing impurities, dirt, and grime that accumulate after a long day. Its unique formula combats the problems of oily, impure, and acne-prone skin, helping to prevent the formation of blackheads and pimples. Restore your skin's balance with **Sebamed Clear Face Soap for Acne** and enjoy healthy, refreshed skin.

â­ The pack contains one 100g soap cleansing bar.
â­ Effectively reduces skin impurities.
â­ Helps in dealing with oily skin, whiteheads, and blackheads.
â­ Gentle on your skin and offers deep cleansing.
â­ Contains a care complex with amino acids and vitamins to prevent skin dryness.
â­ Ideal solution for impure and acne-prone skin types.
â­ Maintains a pH level of 5.5 to support the skin's natural barrier function.
â­ Dermatologically tested.
â­ Unisex product.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed Clear Face Soap for Acne**:
â­ Wet your face and hands with water.
â­ Rub the soap bar between your hands to create a rich lather.
â­ Gently apply the lather to your facial skin in circular motions for at least 45-60 seconds.
â­ Rinse your face thoroughly with water, ensuring all lather is removed.
â­ Use twice daily, once in the morning and once in the evening.
â­ Avoid rubbing your face roughly; use gentle, upward circular motions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed Clear Face Soap for Acne**:
â­ Alanine
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Palmitic Acid
â­ Talc
â­ Lactic Acid
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate
â­ Stearic Acid
â­ Triticum Vulgare Starch
â­ Parfum
â­ Inulin
â­ Lecithin
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate
â­ Glycine
â­ Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate
â­ Magnesium Aspartate
â­ CI 77891
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol

description_en:
Discover superior care with **Sebamed Baby Cream Soft**, specially formulated to protect your baby's delicate skin.

â­ Forms an effective protective film against dryness and irritation with its unique formula.
â­ Rich in a soothing and moisturizing blend of Panthenol, Allantoin, and Chamomile extract to regenerate your baby's skin.
â­ Ideal for daily care and protecting the skin from harsh external factors like cold weather.
â­ Highly recommended for areas prone to chafing, such as elbows and knees.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed Baby Cream Soft**:
â­ Gently apply to clean, dry baby skin.
â­ Use as needed, especially after bath time or diaper changes.
â­ Best used on areas prone to dryness or irritation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed Baby Cream Soft**:
â­ Balanced pH 5.5 formulation.
â­ Contains 42% lipid composition for deep moisturization.
â­ Enriched with Panthenol, Allantoin, and Chamomile extract to soothe and regenerate the skin.
â­ For external use only.

#Sebamed #BabyCream #SkinCare #SensitiveSkin #BabyMoisturizer #BabyProducts #BabyCare #Cosmetics #SaudiArabia #BabyHealth
