shortdescription_en: Superior protection and moisture for your baby's sensitive skin with Sebamed Baby Cream Soft. Enriched with Panthenol & Chamomile.

title_en: Sebamed Soap Cleansing 100 gm - For Healthy, Revitalized Skin
title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ¨Ø§Ù…ÙŠØ¯ ØµØ§Ø¨ÙˆÙ†Ø© Ù…Ù†Ø¸Ù 100 Ø¬Ù… - Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© ØµØ­ÙŠØ© ÙˆÙ†Ø¶Ø±Ø©
description_en:
Discover superior skincare with **Sebamed Soap Cleansing 100 gm**. This medicated soap, specially formulated for sensitive and normal skin, offers deep hydration and helps treat skin infections like Psoriasis, Eczema, and Acne. Its unique, patented formula maintains your skin's natural pH balance at 5.5, leaving it hydrated and healthy. Enriched with Panthenol to fight irritation and enhance skin regeneration, and Lecithin, amino acids, and vitamins to relieve skin from stress and fatigue. **Sebamed Soap Cleansing** effectively cleanses pores, removes excess sebum, reducing blackheads and pimples, and combats acne-causing bacteria. Plus, it's 100% biodegradable, making it an eco-friendly choice.

â­ Suitable for cleansing sensitive to normal skin.
â­ Features a hydrating formula gentle enough for daily use.
â­ Maintains the skin's healthy pH balance at 5.5.
â­ Effective in minimizing blackheads and pimples.
â­ Amino acids moisturize and promote healthy skin.
â­ Vitamin C revitalizes the skin, combating stress and fatigue.
â­ Suitable for preventing and treating mild skin infections.
â­ Deep pore cleansers control sebum secretion, preventing acne spread.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed Soap Cleansing**:
â­ Use twice daily or as recommended by a dermatologist.
â­ For optimal results, complement with Sebamed moisturizing cream and body lotion.
â­ Store in a dish to allow proper drying after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed Soap Cleansing**:
â­ Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate.
â­ Palmitic Acid, Triticum Vulgare Starch.
â­ Glyceryl Stearate, Stearic Acid, Talc, Cetearyl Alcohol.
â­ Cera alba (Beeswax), Sodium Lactate, Lecithin.
â­ Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine.
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Inulin.
â­ Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate.
â­ Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Magnesium Aspartate.
â­ Glycine, Lysine, Alanine, Benzophenone-4.
â­ Leucine, Parfum, CI 77891, CI 61570, CI 47005.

#Sebamed #MedicatedSoap #SkinCare #SensitiveSkin #SkinHydration #AcneTreatment #Riyadh #Jeddah #SaudiArabia #HealthySkin

description_en:
Keep your baby's skin soft and healthy with **Sebamed Protective Facial Cream 50 ml**. This cream provides deep, effective hydration to prevent dryness. The panthenol and lipid compound work to protect your baby's delicate skin from irritation caused by saliva, especially around the mouth area. Vitamin E further safeguards your baby's skin against harmful environmental influences, making it the perfect choice for daily care. Ideal for dry skin and irritations.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed Protective Facial Cream 50 ml**:
â­ Relieves irritation caused by saliva.
â­ Suitable for dry skin.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed Protective Facial Cream 50 ml**:
â­ Balanced pH 5.5.
â­ Rich in Panthenol and Allantoin.
â­ Vitamin E for enhanced protection.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid for added moisture.

#Sebamed #BabyCream #SkinCare #HealthySkin #SkinHydration #BabyProducts #BabyCare #SkinProtection #Cosmetics #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Indulge your baby's delicate skin with **Sebamed Baby Body Milk 200 ml**. This moisturizing milk is specially formulated to provide maximum protection against dryness for your baby's sensitive skin. Its rich formula contains German Chamomile, known for its soothing properties, which helps relieve irritation and redness, while Allantoin works to smooth the skin, leaving it with a silky-smooth texture and superior suppleness. It is ideal for the intensive care of stressed and dry baby skin, especially after bathing or in cold climates and winter. Give your baby an unparalleled moisturizing experience with **Sebamed Baby Body Milk 200 ml**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed Baby Body Milk 200 ml**
â­ Especially recommended for use in cold climates or in winter.
â­ Ideal for the intensive care of stressed baby skin and dry skin symptoms after washing and bathing.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed Baby Body Milk 200 ml**
â­ pH 5.5 to ensure natural skin balance.
â­ Contains 23% natural lipids for deep nourishment.
â­ Sweet almond oil for superior hydration.
â­ Shea butter to soften the skin.
â­ Squalane and lecithin to support the skin barrier.
â­ Allantoin for soothing and smoothing the skin.

#Sebamed #BabyMilk #BabyMoisturizer #Skincare #BabySkin #BabyProducts #BodyMoisturizer #NewbornCare #BabyCosmetics #BabyHealth

Give your baby a refreshing and gentle scent with **Sebamed Baby Eau De Cologne**, specially formulated for your baby's delicate skin. This unique fragrance combines deep hydration with a beautiful, long-lasting aroma. The moisturizing complex with sodium lactate and hydrolized silk works to maintain your baby's skin balance and impart superior softness, making it the perfect addition to their daily care routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed Baby Eau De Cologne**
â­ Gently spray onto your baby's skin or clothing for a refreshing and gentle scent.
â­ Suitable for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed Baby Eau De Cologne**
â­ Moisturizing complex.
â­ Sodium lactate.
â­ Hydrolized silk.
â­ Balanced pH (pH 5.5).

description_en:
Give your baby's delicate skin the ultimate care with **Sebamed Baby Soap Cleansing Bar**. This gentle, sugar-based, soap-free cleanser effectively cleans your baby's tender skin without drying it out, maintaining essential moisture and preventing allergies. The **Sebamed Baby Soap Cleansing Bar** ensures your baby's skin is free from bacteria and dirt, leaving it soft and nourished. Free from chemicals and color additives, it deeply hydrates, replenishing nutrients and moisture that infant skin often lacks. It's the top-selling choice, trusted by parents and doctors alike.

â­ A mild and balanced cleanser with a pH of 5.5.
â­ Free from irritants, with a zero percent chance of irritant reactions.
â­ Alkali-free, ideal for infants aged one month and up.
â­ Refining compounds protect against dryness and lipid removal during processing.
â­ A moisturizing complex of wheat germ fat, vitamins, and amino acids nourishes and hydrates infant skin, reducing water loss.
â­ Supports the balance of natural skin lipids.
â­ Panthenol in the soap promotes skin regeneration.
â­ Contains Chamomile to help soothe the skin.
â­ Features a pleasant, mild fragrance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed Baby Soap Cleansing Bar**

â­ Wet your baby's body with warm water.
â­ Take a small amount of the **Sebamed Baby Soap Cleansing Bar** and rub it between your hands to create a gentle lather.
â­ Apply the lather softly to the baby's body and face.
â­ Gently rub the baby's skin and rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Clean exposed areas gently; avoid vigorous rubbing.

â­ Note: The **Sebamed Baby Soap Cleansing Bar** does not lather as much as conventional soaps because it is natural and free from chemicals.

Caution & Warnings:

â­ Avoid direct contact with eyes.
â­ Ensure hands are clean and washed before use.
â­ Prevent water from entering the baby's ears.
â­ Consult a doctor for any skin concerns.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed Baby Soap Cleansing Bar**

â­ Beeswax
â­ Inulin
â­ Panthenol
â­ Wheat Germ Oil
â­ Lecithin

description_en:
Introducing **Sebamed** Anti Stretch Marks Cream, your ultimate solution for skin care during pregnancy and postpartum. Its uniquely formulated triple-soft formula is designed to intensively care for your skin, helping to prevent the appearance of stretch marks and reduce the visibility of existing ones, while effectively restoring connective tissue.

**Sebamed** Anti Stretch Marks Cream boasts a rich blend of natural avocado oil, shea butter, and essential lipids that nourish and protect the skin's superficial layers. It also contains Centella Asiatica (Tiger Grass) extract and peptides, enhanced by a diverted olive oil complex, to improve connective tissue elasticity and promote healthier-looking skin.

With a balanced pH of 5.5, **Sebamed** Anti Stretch Marks Cream is safe for use during breastfeeding after thoroughly cleansing the skin before feeding. It is also compatible with sonograms and does not stain clothing, making it a practical and high-quality choice for your skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed** Anti Stretch Marks Cream:
â­ Gently massage the cream onto areas prone to stretch marks twice daily in a circular motion until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed** Anti Stretch Marks Cream:
â­ Natural Avocado Oil
â­ Shea Butter
â­ Centella Asiatica Extract
â­ Peptides from Olive Oil
â­ Balanced pH 5.5

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØ¨Ø§Ù…ÙŠØ¯ ØºØ³ÙˆÙ„ Ù†Ø³Ø§Ø¦ÙŠ 200 Ù…Ù„ - Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„ÙŠÙˆÙ…ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Experience superior natural protection for your intimate areas with **Sebamed Feminine Wash**. Specially formulated to maintain the natural pH balance of your intimate zones (pH 3.8), it helps prevent the growth of harmful bacteria, unpleasant odors, and infections. Developed by dermatologists, its gentle, soap-free formula is non-harsh for sensitive areas, enriched with natural compounds like Aloe Barbadensis for added hydration and protection.

â­ Gentle wash that prevents infections and odor.
â­ Maintains beneficial bacteria balance and optimal pH for intimate areas.
â­ Contains antibacterial agents like Alpha Bisabolol and Lactic Acid.
â­ Enriched with Aloe Barbadensis leaf extract for protective and soothing properties.
â­ Leaves you feeling fresh with a unique scent.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Sebamed Feminine Wash**:
â­ Apply 2-3 drops to your hands or a clean cloth.
â­ Gently cleanse the area, separating the labia, with lukewarm water.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
â­ For optimal results, use twice daily.
â­ Avoid harsh scrubbing or using disinfectants.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Sebamed Feminine Wash**:
â­ Natural Tenside Complex.
â­ Alpha Bisabolol.
â­ Lactic Acid.
â­ Citric Acid.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extracts.
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate.
â­ Sorbic Acid.
â­ Benzyl Alcohol.
â­ Xanthan Gum.

description_en:
**Cetaphil Moisturizing Cream for Dry to Very Dry Skin 550 gm** is a rich, non-greasy moisturizer that provides immediate, long-lasting relief for even severely dry skin. It contains a superior system of extra-strength emollients and humectants proven to bind water to the skin and prevent moisture loss for intense moisturization with 24-hour hydration. Ideal for areas that require extra attention, such as hands, elbows, and feet.

â­ Provides 24-hour hydration.
â­ Instantly hydrates for long-lasting relief.
â­ Soothes very dry skin.
â­ Clinically proven to nourish dry skin in 1 day.
â­ Binds water to the skin and prevents moisture loss for soft, supple skin.
â­ Excellent for hands, feet, elbows, knees, and any other areas needing intensive moisturization.
â­ Excellent overnight facial moisturizer.
â­ Safe for sensitive skin.
â­ Fast absorbing and non-sticky.
â­ Fragrance-free and paraben-free.
â­ Suitable for babies, children, and adults.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Moisturizing Cream for Dry to Very Dry Skin 550 gm**
â­ For best results, use directly after bathing, wetting the skin, or washing hands.
â­ Apply liberally as often as needed.
â­ Do not use if you are allergic to any of its ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Moisturizing Cream for Dry to Very Dry Skin 550 gm**
â­ Extra-strength emollients.
â­ Effective humectants.
â­ Skin-nourishing ingredients.

#Cetaphil #Moisturizer #Skincare #DrySkin #Hydration #SensitiveSkin #DeepHydration #24HourHydration #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Cetaphil Moisturizing Cream** is a rich, non-greasy formula that provides immediate and long-lasting relief for even severely dry skin.

It contains a superior system of extra-strength emollients and humectants proven to bind water to the skin and prevent moisture loss, delivering intense moisturization with 24-hour hydration.

Ideal for areas requiring extra attention, such as hands, elbows, and feet, making it your ultimate choice for deep nourishment.

â­ For Dry to Very Dry Skin
â­ Suitable for Face & Body
â­ Gentle on Sensitive Skin
â­ Fast Absorbing and Non-Sticky
â­ Non-Greasy and Won't Clog Pores
â­ Clinically Tested
â­ For Babies, Children & Adults
â­ Fragrance-Free & Paraben-Free
â­ Provides 24-Hour Hydration
â­ Instantly Soothes and Softens Skin

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Moisturizing Cream**

â­ For best results, use immediately after bathing, wetting skin, or washing hands.
â­ Apply liberally as often as needed.
â­ Do not use if you are allergic to any of its ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Moisturizing Cream**

â­ Water, Glycerin, Petrolatum, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ceteareth-20, Cetyl Alcohol, Steareth-2, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Laureth-7, Cetyl Alcohol, Fragrance, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Dimethiconol, Tocopheryl Acetate.

#Cetaphil #Moisturizer #Skincare #DrySkin #SkinHydration #BodyCare #DeepMoisture #BeautyProducts #HealthySkin #SaudiSkincare

description_en:
Provide your skin with the protection and care it deserves with **Cetaphil Pro Moisturizing Lotion SPF 30 For Acne Prone Skin**. This lotion features a lightweight, non-greasy formula that absorbs quickly, offering immediate and lasting hydration. Its soothing ingredients work to relieve skin irritation and calm it, while the broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection with SPF 30 keeps your skin safe from sun damage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Pro Moisturizing Lotion SPF 30 For Acne Prone Skin**:
â­ Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Use a water-resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating.
â­ Reapply at least every 2 hours.
â­ Children under 6 months: ask a doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Pro Moisturizing Lotion SPF 30 For Acne Prone Skin**:
â­ Avobenzone 3%, Octisalate 5%, Octocrylene 7%
â­ Water, Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Silica, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Sucrose Tristearate, Dimethiconol, Pentylene Glycol, Polysorbate 61, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycyrrhetinic Acid, Panthenol, Triethanolamine, Allantoin, Carbomer, Potassium Sorbate, Zinc Gluconate, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Hydroxypalmitoyl Sphinganine (Ceramide).

description_en:
Experience the ultimate care for your baby's skin and hair with **Cetaphil Baby Wash & Shampoo with Organic Calendula**. This gentle, tear-free formula leaves baby's skin and hair soft and smooth with a light, pleasant fragrance, gently cleansing hair and scalp without drying. It's a mild cleansing lotion suitable for baby's delicate skin from birth, specifically designed for daily head-to-toe use. **Cetaphil Baby Wash & Shampoo with Organic Calendula** is hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested, ensuring the utmost safety for your little one.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Baby Wash & Shampoo with Organic Calendula**:
â­ Pour into hand or wash cloth.
â­ Gently massage over hair and body to lather, then rinse.
â­ Pat dry with a towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Baby Wash & Shampoo with Organic Calendula**:
â­ Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate.
â­ Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Parfum, Sodium Chloride.
â­ Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Citrate.
â­ Panthenol, Heliotropine, Polyquaternium-10, Propylene Glycol.
â­ Quaternium-80, Sodium Hydroxide.

title_en: Cetaphil Protective Lip Balm SPF 50+ for Superior Protection & Deep Hydration, 8 ml
title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØªØ§ÙÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ø±Ø·Ø¨ Ù„Ù„Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø¨Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ù„ Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© SPF 50+ Ù„Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© ÙˆØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ø¹Ù…ÙŠÙ‚ØŒ 8 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
**Cetaphil Protective Lip Balm** offers superior protection and soothing for dry, chapped lips. Its advanced formula acts as an effective barrier against moisture loss and provides comprehensive protection against harmful UVA and UVB rays. It leaves lips with a non-sticky, transparent layer, ensuring they remain soft and hydrated all day long.

â­ Provides effective barrier against moisture loss.
â­ Protects from both UVA and UVB rays.
â­ Formulated to soothe dry, chapped, and cracked lips.
â­ Offers a transparent layer to protect lips from environmental factors.
â­ Barrier against moisture loss with high lipid content for smooth application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Protective Lip Balm**
â­ Apply generously before sun exposure.
â­ Can be reapplied as needed for continuous hydration and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Protective Lip Balm**
â­ Contains Vitamin E to help promote healthy lips.
â­ Non-greasy, lightweight, transparent, and colourless formula.
â­ Fragrance-free.
â­ No white residue.
â­ Hypo-allergenic.
â­ Clinically and dermatologically tested.

#Cetaphil #LipBalm #SunProtection #LipCare #HealthyLips #DeepHydration #SaudiBeauty #Skincare #Sunscreen #Jeddah

description_en:
Experience ultimate care for your little one with **Cetaphil Baby Gentle Wash & Shampoo 300 ml**. This delicate, tear-free formula is specially designed to gently cleanse your baby's sensitive skin and hair, leaving them soft and smooth with a light, fresh fragrance. Perfect for daily head-to-toe use, it cleanses without drying and is suitable for sensitive skin from birth. **Cetaphil Baby Gentle Wash & Shampoo 300 ml** is dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested, hypoallergenic, and allergy-tested, making it the ideal choice for maximum care for your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Baby Gentle Wash & Shampoo 300 ml**
â­ Pour a suitable amount into your hand or a washcloth.
â­ Gently apply to baby's hair and body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water and pat dry gently.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Baby Gentle Wash & Shampoo 300 ml**
â­ Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Parfum, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Citrate, Panthenol, Heliotropine, Polyquaternium-10, Propylene Glycol, Quaternium-80, Sodium Hydroxide.

#Cetaphil #BabyCare #GentleWashShampoo #BabyProducts #SensitiveSkin #BabyHairCare #Newborn #BabyEssentials #SaudiArabia #GentleCare

description_en:
Experience intense and lasting hydration with **Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion**, specially formulated for all skin types, including sensitive skin. This luxurious lotion works to restore your skin's natural moisture barrier, leaving it feeling incredibly soft and smooth with a long-lasting silky touch. **Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion** is the perfect choice for daily skincare, preventing dryness and maintaining optimal skin hydration after every application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion**:
â­ Apply the moisturizing lotion as often as needed.
â­ It is recommended to use it regularly, especially after showering, to ensure maximum benefits and deep hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion**:
â­ AQUA, GLYCERIN, HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, PERSEA GRATISSIMA OIL, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, CETEARETH-20, CITRIC ACID, DIMETHICONE, PANTHENOL, SODIUM ANISATE, SODIUM LEVULINATE, STEAROXYTRIMETHYLSILANE, STEARYL ALCOHOL, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE.

description_en:
Achieve clean and refreshed skin with **Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser for Dry to Normal Skin 500 ml**. This creamy cleanser is clinically proven to hydrate while cleansing and helps strengthen the skin's moisture barrier. Formulated with innovative micellar technology, **Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser for Dry to Normal Skin 500 ml** gently yet effectively removes dirt, makeup, and impurities, making it ideal for dry to normal skin.

â­ Gently yet effectively removes dirt, oil, and makeup.
â­ Hydrates skin while cleansing.
â­ Strengthens the skin's moisture barrier.
â­ Suitable for dry to normal skin.
â­ Safe for sensitive skin.
â­ Non-comedogenic (does not clog pores).
â­ Free from fragrance, soap, and parabens.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser for Dry to Normal Skin 500 ml**

**Direction for Use Without Water:**
â­ Apply a liberal amount of cleanser to the skin and rub gently.
â­ Remove excess with a soft cloth, leaving a thin film on the skin.

**Direction for Use With Water:**
â­ Apply cleanser to the skin and rub gently. Rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser for Dry to Normal Skin 500 ml**

â­ Micellar Technology.
â­ Gentle formula that does not irritate the skin.
â­ Nourishing moisturizing ingredients.

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØªØ§ÙÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ù†Ø¸Ù Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¯Ù‡Ù†ÙŠØ© | Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙŠÙˆÙ…ÙŠØ© Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¯Ù‡Ù†ÙŠØ© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù…Ø®ØªÙ„Ø·Ø©
description_en:
Experience the gentle yet effective cleansing power of **Cetaphil Oily Skin Cleanser**, your daily solution for oily and combination skin. This cleanser expertly removes excess sebum, dirt, and dead skin cells with a mild foaming action that helps to clear pores. Clinically proven to restore combination skin to its normal state, **Cetaphil Oily Skin Cleanser** is the perfect, low-foaming facial cleanser for everyday use. Achieve a soothed and balanced complexion that feels refreshed and revitalized.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Oily Skin Cleanser**:
â­ Wet your face with lukewarm water.
â­ Dispense a small amount into your hands and lather.
â­ Gently massage onto your face, focusing on oily areas.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water and pat dry gently with a soft towel.
â­ Use morning and/or evening as part of your daily skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Oily Skin Cleanser**:
â­ Gentle and effective formula for skin cleansing.
â­ Removes excess oil without drying the skin.
â­ Soap-free, fragrance-free, and paraben-free.
â­ Non-comedogenic, meaning it won't clog pores.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Leaves skin feeling soothed and balanced.

description_en:
Introducing **Cetaphil Daily Advance Ultra Hydrating Lotion**, the ultimate solution for dry and sensitive skin. This rich lotion works to instantly replenish, hydrate, and protect your skin for up to 24 hours. Featuring a unique formula with the ERC-5 complex, **Cetaphil Daily Advance Ultra Hydrating Lotion for Dry Skin** relieves dryness and leaves your skin feeling nourished, soft, and smooth. It's fragrance-free and paraben-free for maximum safety on sensitive skin.

â­ Hydrates and protects dry skin for 24 hours.
â­ Contains ERC-5 complex for skin replenishment.
â­ Enriched with shea butter and vitamin E to soothe skin.
â­ Fast-absorbing, non-greasy, and non-comedogenic.
â­ pH-balanced, fragrance-free, and paraben-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Daily Advance Ultra Hydrating Lotion for Dry Skin**:
â­ Use daily to hydrate sensitive skin and prevent moisture loss.
â­ Reapply as needed for continued dry skin relief.
â­ Do not use if you are allergic to any of its ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Daily Advance Ultra Hydrating Lotion for Dry Skin**:
â­ Shea Butter
â­ Vitamin E
â­ ERC-5 (Epidermal Replenishing Complex)
â­ Water
â­ Glycerin
â­ Dimethicone

description_en:
The **Cetaphil Baby** Daily Lotion with Calendula is a superior moisturizer for babies' sensitive skin, specially formulated to provide deep hydration and lasting protection throughout the day. It imparts exceptional softness to your baby's skin and shields it from dryness for up to 24 hours, making it the ideal choice for daily care.

â­ Moisturizes baby's delicate skin for 24 hours.
â­ Protects baby's skin from dryness.
â­ Gentle formula suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Dermatologist recommended.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Baby** Daily Lotion with Calendula:
â­ Apply a generous amount of lotion to baby's skin after bath time or as needed.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Baby** Daily Lotion with Calendula:
â­ Formulated with Calendula to soothe skin.
â­ Enriched with Vitamin E for skin nourishment.
â­ Sweet Almond Oil and Sunflower Seed Oil to soften skin.
â­ Unsaturated fatty acids to enhance skin softness.

description_en:
Introducing **Cetaphil Pro Foam Wash For Acne Prone Skin**, the ultimate solution for oily, sensitive, and acne-prone skin.

This foaming formula effectively and gently removes excess oil without over-drying the skin, leaving you with clear, healthy-looking skin. With its innovative Zinc Technology, this cleanser helps reduce spots, blemishes, and shininess, while maintaining a pH-balanced formula for healthy-looking skin. It is dermatologically tested and clinically proven to be gentle on sensitive skin, making it ideal for daily use. It helps protect against the 5 signs of skin sensitivity, including dryness, irritation, roughness, tightness, and weakened skin barrier.

â­ Deep cleansing foaming formula gently removes excess oil.
â­ Zinc Technology helps reduce spots, blemishes, and shininess.
â­ pH-balanced formula for healthy-looking skin.
â­ Gentle on sensitive skin and dermatologically tested.
â­ Paraben-free, non-irritating, and non-comedogenic.
â­ Protects against the 5 signs of skin sensitivity.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Pro Foam Wash For Acne Prone Skin**:
â­ Cleanse your skin morning and night.
â­ Massage the foam onto damp skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Pro Foam Wash For Acne Prone Skin**:
â­ Aqua, Zinc Coceth Sulfate, Glycerin, Peg-75, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Benzoate, Citronellol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Disodium Edta, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Peg-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate, Sodium Benzoate, Zinc Gluconate, Parfum.

#Cetaphil #FaceWash #OilySkin #AcneTreatment #SkinCare #FoamWash #SensitiveSkin #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #SkincareRoutine

description_en:
Nourish and soothe your babyâ€™s delicate skin with **Cetaphil Baby Daily Lotion**, the gentle, dermatologist-tested lotion designed to hydrate, protect, and comfort your precious one's skin.

Featuring a unique triple blend of sunflower seed oil, soybean oil, and shea butter, **Cetaphil Baby Daily Lotion** is proven to effectively retain the skin's natural moisture, preventing dryness and leaving skin feeling soft and smooth.

Its essential ingredients like glycerin, panthenol, and tocopherol work to strengthen the skin barrier, enhancing its resilience against external factors.

â­ Effectively nourishes and hydrates baby's sensitive skin.
â­ Soothes, softens skin, and improves texture.
â­ Protects skin from dryness.
â­ Free from parabens and mineral oil.
â­ Gentle, non-irritating, and non-sensitizing formula.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Baby Daily Lotion**
â­ Pour the lotion into your palm.
â­ Rub your hands together to warm the lotion.
â­ Gently apply to your baby's face and body.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Baby Daily Lotion**
â­ Aqua, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Sorbitol, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Octyldodecanol, Glycerin, Panthenol, Hexyldecanol, Hexyldecyl Laurate, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Caprylyl Glycol, Carbomer, Citric Acid, Dimethicone, Dipropylene Glycol, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Glycine Soja Oil, Heliotropine, Parfum, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopherol.

description_en:
Achieve soft, hydrated skin with **Cetaphil Moisturizing Cream for Dry to Normal Skin**. This rich, non-greasy moisturizer provides immediate, long-lasting relief for even severely dry skin. Its superior system of extra-strength emollients and humectants is proven to bind water to the skin and prevent moisture loss, delivering intense 24-hour hydration. Ideal for areas that need extra attention, such as hands, elbows, and feet.

âœ¨ Product Features:
â­ For Dry to Normal Skin
â­ For Face & Body
â­ Safe for Sensitive Skin
â­ Fast Absorption, Non-Sticky, Non-Greasy
â­ Clinically Tested, Non-Comedogenic
â­ Fragrance-Free, Paraben-Free
â­ Suitable for Babies, Children, and Adults

âœ¨ Product Benefits:
â­ Provides instant hydration for long-lasting relief that soothes very dry skin.
â­ Clinically proven to nourish dry skin in 1 day, binding water to the skin and preventing moisture loss for soft, supple skin.
â­ Excellent for hands, feet, elbows, knees, and any other areas requiring intensive moisturization.
â­ Great overnight facial moisturizer.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Moisturizing Cream for Dry to Normal Skin**:
â­ For best results, use directly after bathing, wetting the skin, or washing hands.
â­ Apply liberally as often as needed.
â­ Do not use if you are allergic to any of its contents.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Moisturizing Cream for Dry to Normal Skin**:
â­ Contains a superior system of extra-strength emollients and humectants.
â­ Clinically proven to bind water to the skin and prevent moisture loss.

#Cetaphil #Moisturizer #SkinCare #DrySkin #DeepHydration #24HourHydration #HealthySkin #SaudiArabia #DailyCare #Beauty

description_en:
Gently and effectively cleanse your skin with **Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser for Dry to Normal Skin - 236 ml**. This creamy cleanser is clinically proven to hydrate while cleansing and helps to strengthen the skin's moisture barrier, making it ideal for dry to normal skin. Its micellar technology formulation gently removes dirt, makeup, and impurities without irritation. It's safe for sensitive skin, free from fragrance, soap, and parabens, and non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser for Dry to Normal Skin - 236 ml**
**Direction for Use Without Water:**
â­ Apply a liberal amount of cleanser to the skin and rub gently.
â­ Remove excess with a soft cloth, leaving a thin film on the skin.
**Direction for Use With Water:**
â­ Apply cleanser to the skin and rub gently. Rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser for Dry to Normal Skin - 236 ml**
â­ Creamy formula to hydrate skin while cleansing.
â­ Micellar technology to effectively remove dirt, makeup, and impurities.
â­ Free from fragrance, parabens, and soap.
â­ Hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic.
â­ Defends against five signs of skin sensitivity.

#Cetaphil #SkinCleanser #DrySkin #NormalSkin #Hydration #Skincare #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #Cosmetics #FacialCleansing

description_en:
Experience intense hydration with **Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion for Dry to Normal Skin**. This luxurious lotion is specially formulated to provide everyday, deep moisture for all skin types, especially dry and sensitive skin. Its effective formula helps your skin retain its much-needed moisture, leaving your body feeling soft, smooth, and hydrated long after application.

Experience superior gentleness with **Cetaphil Soap for Dry & Sensitive Skin 127 gm**. This non-soap, daily cleansing bar is specially formulated to moisturize and nourish your dry, sensitive skin while cleansing. Ideal for both face and body, it leaves your skin feeling soft and hydrated after every use.

â­ Gentle and effective cleansing for dry and sensitive skin
â­ Deeply moisturizes the skin during cleansing
â­ Suitable for daily use on face and body
â­ Non-soap formula that maintains skin balance
â­ Leaves skin feeling soft and moisturized

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Soap for Dry & Sensitive Skin 127 gm**
â­ Wet the soap with water.
â­ Gently lather onto skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØªØ§ÙÙŠÙ„ ØµÙ† Ù„ÙˆØ´Ù† SPF 50+ Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø­Ø³Ø§Ø³Ø© 50 Ù…Ù„ - Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø©
description_en:
**Cetaphil Sun Liposomal Lotion SPF 50+** offers very high protection against UVB, UVA, and IR rays. Its uniquely light, unscented, fast-absorbing, non-sticky, and highly water-resistant formula provides a great skin feeling and long-lasting sun protection. It is extremely gentle on the skin and suitable for dry to sensitive skin.

Product Features:
â­ SPF 50+ Sun Protection
â­ Fast-Absorption and No White Marks
â­ Clinically-Tested, Non-Comedones
â­ Suitable for Dry and Sensitive Skin
â­ Paraben-Free, Non-Greasy, Water-Resistant, Hypoallergenic
â­ Helps maintain skin elasticity and prevents wrinkles
â­ Helps lessen the risk of sunburn
â­ Nourishing with aloe vera and vitamin E

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Sun Liposomal Lotion SPF 50+**:
â­ Apply liberally to face and body 15 to 20 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Re-apply regularly every 2 hours, especially after swimming or toweling.
â­ Applying small amounts considerably reduces protection; avoid intense and direct sun exposure, especially during midday.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Sun Liposomal Lotion SPF 50+**:
â­ Effective broad spectrum UVB & UVA filters
â­ Nourishing with aloe vera and vitamin E
â­ Free from parabens, fragrance, and emulsifiers
â­ Very water resistant, hypoallergenic, and non-comedogenic

#Cetaphil #Sunscreen #SunProtection #SensitiveSkin #SkinCare #Moisturizing #HealthySkin #Beauty #SkinHealth #SaudiArabia

description_en:
The **Cetaphil Pro Restoring Body Wash for Eczema-Prone Skin** is expertly formulated to repair the skin's protective barrier and soothe atopic, eczema-prone skin. It provides intense hydration and long-lasting comfort for very dry, itchy, and sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Pro Restoring Body Wash for Eczema-Prone Skin**:
â­ Apply to wet skin and massage into a lather.
â­ Rinse cleanly and pat dry.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ Suitable for all ages, including infants from three months.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Pro Restoring Body Wash for Eczema-Prone Skin**:
â­ Shea Butter (Butyrospermum Parkii)
â­ Sunflower Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Niacinamide (Vitamin B3)
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E)
â­ Patented Filaggrin Technologyâ„¢ to help restore the skin's moisture barrier.

description_en:
Experience superior sun protection with **Cetaphil Sun Light Gel SPF 50+**, specially formulated for very sensitive and oily skin. This light, non-greasy gel provides very high protection against UVA and UVB rays, with quick absorption for a matt finish.

â­ High UVA & UVB Protection
â­ Oil-free and non-comedogenic formula
â­ No white marks left on the skin
â­ Water and sweat resistant
â­ Enriched with Vitamin E to nourish the skin
â­ Clinically and dermatologically tested
â­ Free from parabens, perfumes, emulsifiers, and preservatives
â­ Suitable for sensitive and acne-prone skin
â­ Pleasant, non-sticky texture

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Sun Light Gel SPF 50+**:
â­ Apply the sunscreen product generously just before direct sun exposure.
â­ Re-apply frequently and generously to maintain protection, especially after swimming, perspiring, or toweling.
â­ Choose a suitable skincare routine: Cleanser, Toner, Moisturizer, and Sunscreen.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Sun Light Gel SPF 50+**:
â­ Advanced, photostable UVA & UVB filters
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Light, quickly absorbing formulation
â­ Non-comedogenic and sweat-resistant formula
â­ Gentle on the skin formulation

#Cetaphil #Sunscreen #SunProtection #OilySkin #SensitiveSkin #SkinCare #SPF50 #SkinHydration #Cosmetics #HealthAndBeauty

description_en:
Experience ultimate relief with **Cetaphil Pro** Restoraderm Body Moisturizer, specifically formulated to soothe irritated and eczema-prone skin. **Cetaphil Pro** works to effectively repair the skin's protective barrier, leaving you with soft, hydrated skin for long-lasting comfort. Restore your skin's vitality with an advanced formula that provides the care it deserves.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Pro**:
â­ Apply liberally as often as needed or as directed by a physician.
â­ Suitable for all ages, safe even for babies as young as three months.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Pro**:
â­ Water, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Helianthus Annus (Sunflower) Seed Oil.
â­ Pentylene Glycol, Shea Butter, Sorbitol, Cyclopentasiloxane.
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Tocopheryl Acetate.
â­ Niacinamide, Panthenol, Arginine, Disodium Ethylene Dicocamide PEG-15 Disulfate.
â­ Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Citric Acid, Dimethiconol, Sodium Hyaluronate.

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØªØ§ÙÙŠÙ„ Ø¯Ø§Ù‰ Ù„ÙˆÙ†Ø¬ Ù„ÙˆØ´Ù† Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ù„ Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠÙ‡ 50 + 150 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover superior protection for your child's delicate skin with **Cetaphil Daylong Kids SPF 50+ Lotion**. This sun-protective lotion is enriched with Panthenol, Glycerin, and Aloe Vera, specifically formulated to nourish and moisturize sensitive children's skin. **Cetaphil Daylong Kids SPF 50+ Lotion** provides broad-spectrum protection against harmful UVA and UVB rays, with extra water and sweat resistance for long-lasting defense even in wet conditions. It features an extremely gentle, fast-absorbing formula, free from parabens, fragrances, and emulsifiers, making it the ideal choice for your child's healthy and safe skin.

â­ Broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection.
â­ Contains Panthenol, Glycerin, and Aloe Vera to nourish the skin.
â­ Extra water and sweat resistant.
â­ Extremely gentle and fast-absorbing.
â­ Free from parabens, fragrance, and emulsifiers.
â­ Non-greasy, hypoallergenic, and non-comedogenic.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Daylong Kids SPF 50+ Lotion**

â­ Apply liberally to clean, dry skin at least 15 minutes prior to sun exposure.
â­ Reapply every 2 hours, and especially after swimming, sweating, or towel drying.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Daylong Kids SPF 50+ Lotion**

â­ Glycerin
â­ Panthenol
â­ Vitamin E

#Cetaphil #Sunscreen #Kids #Skincare #SunProtection #SkinMoisturizer #SensitiveSkin #KidsHealth #Summer #SaudiArabia

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØªØ§ÙÙŠÙ„ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø¨Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ù„ Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© 50+ | Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¹Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© ÙˆØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨
description_en:
**Cetaphil Sun Face Fluid SPF 50+ Tinted** is an advanced sunscreen that combines high sun protection with effective skin hydration. Specially formulated for sensitive skin, this protective fluid offers broad-spectrum defense against harmful UVA and UVB rays, helping to prevent sunburn and premature aging. Its tinted formula provides an immediate natural-looking finish, evening out skin tone and blurring minor imperfections, making it ideal for daily use under makeup or on its own. The lightweight, non-greasy texture ensures superior comfort and a silky finish, while its hydrating properties help keep skin soft and moisturized all day. It's your perfect choice for protected, even-toned, and hydrated skin.

**Product Features:**

â­ SPF 50+ broad-spectrum protection against UVA/UVB rays.
â­ Tinted formula for a natural color and coverage of imperfections.
â­ Lightweight and non-greasy for daily comfort.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin and dermatologically tested.
â­ Non-comedogenic, does not clog pores.
â­ Hydrating to maintain skin softness.
â­ Water-resistant for periods of time.
â­ Oil-free, perfect for oily and combination skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Sun Face Fluid SPF 50+ Tinted**:

â­ Apply generously to your face and neck before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply every 2 hours, especially after swimming or sweating.
â­ Avoid direct contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Sun Face Fluid SPF 50+ Tinted**:

â­ Zinc Oxide
â­ Titanium Dioxide
â­ Glycerin
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Iron Oxides
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Water (Aqua)

#Cetaphil #Sunscreen #Skincare #SunProtection #SensitiveSkin #SkinHydration #Makeup #DailyCare #SkinHealth #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience superior hydration with **Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion**, the perfect solution for calm, radiant skin.

This lightweight lotion is clinically proven to instantly soothe sensitive skin and hydrate for 48 hours. Its unique formula, powered by a blend of niacinamide, panthenol, and hydrating glycerin, helps improve the resilience of your sensitive skin and restores its natural protective moisture barrier.

**Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion** defends against 5 signs of skin sensitivity, including a weakened skin barrier, irritation, roughness, tightness, and dryness.

â­ Fragrance-free and paraben-free.
â­ Hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic.
â­ Dermatologist tested.
â­ Instantly soothes and hydrates skin for 48 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion**
â­ Use daily to hydrate skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion**
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dimethicone, Persea Gratissima Oil, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Pantolactone, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol, Citric Acid.

#Cetaphil #CetaphilLotion #SkinHydration #SensitiveSkin #Skincare #SaudiArabia #DeepHydration #Beauty #SkinHealth #DailyMoisturizer

description_en:
Discover superior sun protection with **Cetaphil UVA/UVB Defence Sun Cream SPF 50+** (50 ml), specifically formulated with an optimum blend of UV filters for broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection. Clinically proven to nourish and hydrate your skin, this high SPF facial moisturizer helps protect your skin against sunburn and premature skin aging. Enjoy its lightweight, non-greasy, and water-resistant formula that absorbs quickly, leaving no white marks, making it ideal for daily use on all skin types, even sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil UVA/UVB Defence Sun Cream SPF 50+**:
â­ Apply the sunscreen product just before sun exposure.
â­ Re-apply frequently and generously to maintain protection, especially after swimming, perspiring, or towelling.
â­ Select your perfect skincare routine: Cleanser, Toner, Moisturizer, and Sunscreen.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil UVA/UVB Defence Sun Cream SPF 50+**:
â­ Broad-spectrum UVA/UVB filter system.
â­ Nourishing and hydrating formula.
â­ SPF 50+.
â­ Paraben-free and fragrance-free.
â­ Non-comedogenic and non-irritating.
â­ Water-resistant.

description_en:
Start your skincare routine with **Cetaphil Oily Skin Cleanser**. This cleanser is specifically formulated for oily skin to help remove excess sebum, dirt, and dead skin cells with its gentle foaming action that deeply clears pores. It leaves your skin feeling clean, soothed, and perfectly balanced. **Cetaphil Oily Skin Cleanser** is your first step towards healthy, radiant skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Oily Skin Cleanser**:
â­ Massage the foam onto damp skin.
â­ Rinse your face thoroughly with water.
â­ To boost skin's hydration, immediately follow with your favorite Cetaphil Facial Moisturizer.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Oily Skin Cleanser**:
â­ Purified Water
â­ PEG-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate & PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate
â­ Acrylates/Steareth-20 Methacrylate Copolymer
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Butylene Glycol
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Parfum
â­ Panthenol
â­ PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ Disodium ETA
â­ Methylparaben

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØªØ§ÙÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ø±Ùˆ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ù…Ø±Ø·Ø¨ Ù„ÙŠÙ„ÙŠ Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø±Ø¶Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø§Ø­Ù…Ø±Ø§Ø± 50 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
**Cetaphil Pro Night Moisturizer Cream For Redness Prone Skin 50 ml** provides continuous moisturization throughout the night for your rosacea/redness-prone skin. It's clinically proven to significantly reduce redness in just one week, offering immediate calming for dry, sensitive skin. This night cream helps manage skin discomfort, including dryness, stinging, and burning, while restoring the skin's barrier function. **Cetaphil Pro Night Moisturizer Cream For Redness Prone Skin 50 ml** delivers lasting moisture to reduce the appearance of redness due to dryness overnight, leaving your skin feeling soothed and balanced. Clinically tested to be gentle on sensitive skin, it is fragrance-free, paraben-free, non-comedogenic, and won't irritate or clog pores.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Pro Night Moisturizer Cream For Redness Prone Skin 50 ml**:
â­ Apply the moisturizer gently over the face each night.
â­ For best results, use Cetaphil PRO Foaming Face Wash before applying the night moisturizer.
â­ Do not use if you are allergic to any of its ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Pro Night Moisturizer Cream For Redness Prone Skin 50 ml**:
â­ Immediately soothes redness-prone skin due to dryness.
â­ Visibly improves skin texture by rehydrating dry, sensitive skin.
â­ Leaves skin feeling soothed and balanced.
â­ Fragrance-free & Paraben-free.
â­ Hypo-allergenic & Non-comedogenic.
â­ Dermatologist tested.

#Cetaphil #Skincare #Moisturizer #SensitiveSkin #RednessRelief #NightCream #SkinBarrier #HealthySkin #BeautyRoutine #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience unparalleled comfort for your baby's delicate skin with **Cetaphil Baby Diaper Cream With Natural Chamomile**. This gentle, everyday formula is designed to act as a protective barrier, shielding against chafed skin and leaving your baby's skin soft and smooth. Its non-sticky, non-greasy formula, enriched with natural ingredients and vitamins, keeps skin hydrated and improves diaper rash in three effective ways.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Baby Diaper Cream With Natural Chamomile**:
â­ Apply a layer to the baby's clean, dry diaper area as needed.
â­ Ideal for everyday use for maximum protection.
â­ Soothes diaper rash symptoms with overnight results.
â­ Helps to relieve diaper rash discomfort from the very first use.
â­ Protects from wetness that causes diaper rash, forming a protective barrier on the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Baby Diaper Cream With Natural Chamomile**:
â­ Zinc Oxide (8%) for superior protection.
â­ Chamomile for its natural soothing properties.
â­ Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 for nourishing and repairing the skin.
â­ Enriched with natural ingredients like Sunflower seed oil, Soybean oil, and Shea butter.
â­ Clinically-proven for all skin types, even sensitive skin.

#CetaphilBaby #DiaperCream #BabySkincare #SensitiveSkin #SaudiMoms #BabyCare #BabyProducts #BabyHygiene #HealthySkin #Cetaphil

description_en:
Soothe and revitalize your skin with **Cetaphil After Sun Repair Lotion For Sensitive Skin**. Expertly formulated for sensitive skin, this lotion effectively calms and deeply moisturizes skin after sun exposure.

â­ Effectively soothes sun-exposed skin.
â­ Provides immediate refreshment and deep hydration.
â­ Supports the skin's repair mechanism to prevent sun damage.
â­ Helps prevent the signs of premature aging, such as wrinkles.
â­ Gentle, hypoallergenic, and paraben-free formula.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil After Sun Repair Lotion For Sensitive Skin**:
After sun exposure, apply a generous amount to the entire body and gently massage until absorbed by the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil After Sun Repair Lotion For Sensitive Skin**:
â­ Glycerin
â­ Panthenol
â­ Vitamin E

title_ar: Ø³ÙŠØªØ§ÙÙŠÙ„ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ù…Ø±Ø·Ø¨ ÙŠÙˆÙ…ÙŠ SPF 30 Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø±Ø¶Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø§Ø­Ù…Ø±Ø§Ø± 50 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Achieve calm, balanced skin with **Cetaphil Pro Daily Facial Moisturizer SPF 30 For Redness Prone Skin 50 ml**. Specifically formulated for redness-prone and sensitive skin, this neutral-tinted moisturizer neutralizes the appearance of redness and evens skin tone. It provides broad-spectrum sun protection with SPF 30 and gentle, mineral-based UV filters. This nourishing formula hydrates and soothes the skin's natural protective barrier, leaving it feeling calm and comfortable all day long. Enriched with licorice extract, allantoin, and caffeine, it's designed to calm redness-prone skin. It is hypoallergenic, fragrance-free, and non-comedogenic, nourishing without irritating or clogging pores.

â­ Neutralizes the appearance of redness and evens skin tone.
â­ Provides broad-spectrum SPF 30 sun protection.
â­ Hydrates the skin's natural barrier, leaving it soothed and balanced.
â­ Formulated with licorice extract, allantoin, and caffeine to soothe redness-prone skin.
â­ Hypoallergenic, fragrance-free, and non-comedogenic.
â­ Dermatologically tested on sensitive and redness-prone skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cetaphil Pro Daily Facial Moisturizer SPF 30 For Redness Prone Skin 50 ml**

â­ Apply to freshly cleansed skin in the morning.
â­ Re-apply as needed throughout the day.
â­ For best results, use with Cetaphil PRO Face Wash.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cetaphil Pro Daily Facial Moisturizer SPF 30 For Redness Prone Skin 50 ml**

â­ Licorice extract.
â­ Allantoin.
â­ Caffeine.
â­ Mineral-based UV filters.

title_en: Citizen Flex Digital Thermometer CTA303 - Accurate & Convenient Measurement
title_ar: Ù…ÙŠØ²Ø§Ù† Ø­Ø±Ø§Ø±Ø© Ø±Ù‚Ù…ÙŠ Citizen Flex CTA303 - Ø¯Ù‚Ø© ÙˆØ±Ø§Ø­Ø© ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ù‚ÙŠØ§Ø³
description_en:
Get accurate temperature readings easily at home with the **Citizen Flex Digital Thermometer CTA303**. Featuring a comfortable design, antibacterial coating, and full washability for hygiene and health. It complies with international ISO22196 standards and offers a clear 3-digit display, auto power-off, and last reading recall. Ideal for everyday home use.

â­ The thermometer body features a special antibacterial coating for maximum hygiene.
â­ Fully washable and water-resistant for easy cleaning and sterilization.
â­ Clear 3-digit display with decimal points.
â­ Auto power-off feature for battery saving.
â­ Automatic memory recall for the last recorded reading.
â­ Accurately records peak temperature.
â­ Wide measuring range from 32.0Â°C to 42.9Â°C.
â­ High measurement accuracy up to Â± 0.1Â°C.
â­ Operates on a DC1.5V (LR41x1) battery with a lifespan of up to 2 years (with 10 minutes of daily use).
â­ Lightweight (10.2g) and travel-friendly.
â­ Celsius and Fahrenheit switching.
â­ Buzzer notification for faster and more accurate results.
â­ Displays battery low and memory mark indicators.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Citizen Flex Digital Thermometer CTA303**:
â­ Clean the thermometer tip with soap and cold water, then rinse.
â­ Turn on the thermometer by pressing the button.
â­ Place the tip under your tongue towards the back of your mouth.
â­ Close your lips around the thermometer.
â­ Wait for the buzzer to beep.
â­ Check the temperature on the display.
â­ For underarm temperature measurement, place the device in the center of the underarm and hold it tightly.
â­ Wait for the buzzer to beep.
â­ Check the temperature on the display.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Citizen Flex Digital Thermometer CTA303**:
â­ Digital thermometer device.
â­ DC1.5V Battery (Micro Alkaline Battery: LR41x1).
â­ User manual.

title_ar: Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø² Ù‚ÙŠØ§Ø³ Ø¶ØºØ· Ø§Ù„Ø¯Ù… Ø³ÙŠØªØ²Ù† CH456 - Ø¯Ù‚Ø© ÙˆÙ…ÙˆØ«ÙˆÙ‚ÙŠØ© ÙÙŠ Ù…Ù†Ø²Ù„Ùƒ
description_en:
Introducing the **Citizen Blood Pressure Monitor CH456**, your ideal solution for effortless and accurate home blood pressure monitoring. This device utilizes advanced Oscilloscope technology to deliver rapid and precise readings displayed clearly on its digital screen. With a battery-saving automatic power-off function and a low battery indicator, the **Citizen Blood Pressure Monitor CH456** ensures a smooth and reliable user experience. It's designed to automatically determine your blood pressure and pulse on your upper arm, and offers memory space to store up to 90 readings, making it an essential health companion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Citizen Blood Pressure Monitor CH456**:
â­ Firmly plug the air hose connector into the main unit's socket.
â­ Unroll the cuff and thread the end through the metal hoop, ensuring the hook-and-loop fastener side faces outward.
â­ Place the cuff around your arm, aligning the blue marker towards the palm side.
â­ Adjust the cuff snugly around your arm and secure it with the hook-and-loop fastener.
â­ Rest your arm on a flat surface so the center of the cuff is at heart level.
â­ Press the "START/STOP" button to begin the measurement.
â­ After measurement, press "START/STOP" to turn it off or allow automatic shutdown.
â­ If the Irregular Heartbeat (IHB) indicator appears frequently, consult your doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Citizen Blood Pressure Monitor CH456**:
â­ Easy-to-read LCD digital display.
â­ Memory capacity for 90 readings.
â­ Body movement detection feature.
â­ Accurate measurement mechanism using the Oscilloscope method.
â­ Low battery indicator.
â­ Ergonomic design for home use.
â­ Powered by 4 "AA" 1.5V batteries or an optional AC adapter.

#BloodPressure #Citizen #MedicalDevices #HeartHealth #BPMonitor #Saudi Arabia #Health #BloodPressureMonitor #HealthProducts #Healthcare

description_en:
Discover precision and comfort with the **Citizen CTD711** Digital Thermometer.

The **Citizen CTD711** offers an innovative and safe way to measure temperature contactlessly, making it the perfect health companion for the entire family at home.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Citizen CTD711**
â­ Instant and accurate readings in just 1 second.
â­ Four versatile measurement modes: Ear, Forehead, Ambient, and Surface temperatures (ideal for baby bottles).
â­ Backlit LCD display for easy reading in any lighting condition.
â­ Built-in high-temperature alarm for early alerts.
â­ Perfect for use with infants and babies without disturbing them.
â­ Stores the last 9 readings to track health progress.
â­ Long battery life providing up to 2800 readings with a single CR2 battery.
â­ Automatic power-off feature for energy saving.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Citizen CTD711**
â­ The thermometer unit.
â­ One CR2 battery.
â­ User manual.

title_en: Citizen CH650 BCN Wrist Blood Pressure Monitor
title_ar: Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø² Ù‚ÙŠØ§Ø³ Ø¶ØºØ· Ø§Ù„Ø¯Ù… Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø¹ØµÙ… Ø³ÙŠØªØ²Ù† CH650 BCN
description_en:
Achieve accurate blood pressure readings with the **Citizen CH650 BCN** Wrist Blood Pressure Monitor. This reliable device provides you with an average of the last three readings on its large LCD screen, making it ideal for regular daily monitoring. It features a body movement indicator and an irregular heartbeat indicator to help you better understand your heart health. It also includes an auto-power-off function to conserve battery life and a compact storage case for easy carrying and storage.

â­ 60 memory recall function.
â­ Body movement indicator to detect motion during measurement.
â­ Irregular heartbeat indicator to alert you to any irregularities.
â­ Large, clear LCD display showing time and date.
â­ Average of the last three readings for more accurate results.
â­ Large, one-touch operation buttons for ease of use.
â­ Reliable oscillometric measurement method.
â­ Powered by 2x AAA batteries.
â­ Lightweight, approximately 103g without batteries.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Citizen CH650 BCN**:
â­ Wrap the cuff around your left wrist, with the monitor positioned on the inside of your wrist.
â­ Position the top edge of the cuff approximately 1-2 cm away from the crease of your wrist.
â­ Ensure the wrist circumference is between 13.5 cm and 21.5 cm.
â­ Avoid wrapping the cuff too tightly or too loosely to ensure accurate measurement.
â­ Sit up straight, take a deep breath, and relax during the measurement.
â­ Place your palm facing up, keeping your fingers relaxed.
â­ Avoid moving or talking during the measurement.
â­ Press the "START/STOP" switch to begin and end the measurement.
â­ If the irregular heartbeat indicator appears frequently, consult your doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Citizen CH650 BCN**:
â­ 1 Ã— **Citizen CH650 BCN** Blood Pressure Monitor
â­ 1 Ã— Wrap Cuff
â­ 1 Ã— Instruction Manual
â­ 1 Ã— Batteries and Storage Case
